Each packet cost is less than 100Rs. .  Overall very good experience. Don't forget to seat for sometimes there.

Name: NIL_MODI
Title: Nice Temple
Review: This Jagannath Temple is located in Banjara Hills area. widely spreaded. Peaceful and divine atmosphere. Neat and clean temple area. make a visit.

Name: sirisha k
Title: Peaceful and spacious Temple
Review: Peaceful and spacious temple , located in the heart of the city, ample car parking, clean and neat, u can have darshan of lord jagannath and other Gods also.

Name: Hamad
Title: Auspicious Jaganath Temple
Review: One of the most beautiful and peaceful temple in Hyderabad of Lord Jaganath. The temple environment is clean, quite & peaceful. They have nice meals as well for cheap price. The temple is highly decorated during Rath Yatra.

Name: Gaurav G
Title: Very good place, Mostly quite. Just noisy during prayers due to bells ringing
Review: Very good temple. Peace and calm. Visited here with family and offered my prayers. although the bell ringing makes a lot of noise but it really helps remove all the distracting thoughts from your mind and allows you to calm down.

Name: Devesh P
Title: Beautiful Temple - Very Peaceful too
Review: Visited Shri Jagannath Temple - Very well maintained temple in am excellent location for both locals and tourists. Open till 8 PM in the evening and ample parking space provided. Best time to visit would be morning or late evening after sunset since there are six smaller deity temples within. The murals work on the walls are beautiful and artistic. The temple architecture is unique to that as temples in orissa.

Name: Shailendra
Title: Replica of Jagannath temple Puri
Review: Shri Jagannath temple situated near KBR Park in Hyderabad is a replica of the famous Jagannath temple Puri.While it is built beautifully but still it cannot replace the beauty of the original temple.

Name: vinod
Title: Lemon tree hotel review
Review: The hotel is good and provides excellent support and services. The hired staff, food quality is too good.

Name: RajaSekar M
Title: Sri Jagannadh Temple- Good to visit in the evening
Review: Sri Jagannadh temple is good and clean. Only thing which is of more concern is that tiles are too hot in mid day time. Had very difficult in placing the foot on floormat(small width). Only one person can use. If other person comes opposite, one has to step aside from it.Darshan was good and had happy time. Very peaceful place. Temple Prasad are not worth for money.

Name: Jayashree D
Title: Get satisfaction of visiting original JAagannathpuri Temple.
Review: If you don't have time to visit Jagannathpuri & you are in Hyderabad, Do visit this temple. Just same as original Murtis.

Name: KP Ram
Title: good place to get peace.
Review: good place to get peace. beautiful architexture. Aarti @ 6.15pm superb. Jagannath Aarti. must visit place.

Name: Jason K
Title: Impressive architecture
Review: This temple looks very impressive and is in fact a replica of the Puri Jagannath Temple in Odisha. Colorful carvings adorn the walls. Shoes are forbidden to be worn inside the temple. A half hour visit was sufficient for us to explore and take photos.

Name: RajeshKota
Title: Jai Jagannath!!
Review: A great replica of Puri Jagannath temple. A very serene atmosphere to be at where a lot of artistic views give wonderful experience..

Name: beyondtravel
Title: Mini puri temple
Review: A mini replica of puri jaganath temple with great upkeep and a flow of oriya traditions,  great temple to be at Hyderabad

Name: DeeTalwar
Title: Good Temple
Review: Recently, I have visited this temple of Lord Jagannath with my family and it's really good temple. They have a Parking place just in front of entry gate to temple, but that is limited to few number of cars. I was lucky that when we visited one car was doing exit, so I get a parking just in front of the entry gate of Temple.

Name: Arun
Title: highly spiritual
Review: excellent piece of architect & very clean beautiful  temple with peaceful location. had blessing of god

Name: Ravi M
Title: Serene and beautiful.
Review: I have not been to the Jagannath Temple in Odisha but feel that I may not have missed much. This replica of the original Jgannath Temple is so well copied to the tee.Beatiful architecture, and spotlessly clean, it impressed me for its serenity and pious feel. A must visit for all and highly recommended.

Name: Balasubramanian
Title: Exact replica of puri Jagannath temple
Review: Go in the evenings before sunset , that way you will enjoy the natural daylight view and evening lightings in the temple as well.Don't miss the murals on the walls, you can teach the children the history of Vishnu avatar.There are stalls that serve Prasad for a price, worth it.Easily you will end up spending 1.5 hrs to 2 hrs.

Name: Murthy TVR
Title: Nice Temple
Review: Built on a big chunk of land with ample parking right in the heart of the city.A must see will be after sunset. Gives Immanence pleasure and treat to eye.

Name: 30tv
Title: Temple, a must visit place
Review: Very nice, beautiful and very well maintained temple. Must visit place if you have time, located at Banjara hills.

Name: HithaPrasad
Title: Nice temple
Review: It’s a well maintained, spacious temple. Beautiful architecture. Can sit and spend some time inside the temple campus.

Name: payal
Title: Cultural Beauty
Review: A beautiful temple built at hill area of the pearl City - Banjara hills..it's almost similar to the actual lord Jagannath'stemple in Orissa...I really like the way this temple is built and managed..

Name: jainms
Title: Good place to visit
Review: Very good architecture, good place and temple maintained well hygiene. one of the must visit place in Hyderabad.

Name: Sanjay Prakash
Title: Excellent temple
Review: I have visited this temple and the infrastructure is old and good. The ambiance is also breathtaking

Name: Jay Patel
Title: Great temple
Review: the infrastructure and other things are great, feels like you . really have stepped into a divine place.

Name: Srikant D
Title: Excellent place to relax
Review: A beautiful place , well maintained and organised. Located in Banjara Hills. The temple is built almost like a replica of Puri Jagannath temple.

Name: Saat A
Title: Lord Jagannath
Review: You don't have to go to Puri for seeing lord Jagannath. You can visit this temple this is just a replica of the lord here in Hyderabad.

Name: Y S N
Title: A lovely temple that's a feast for the senses
Review: Situated in Banjara Hills, this beautiful temple, though small, is a good replica of the original Puri Jagannath temple.Stories of Ramayana are beautifully etched on the walls and the temple is mostly clean and well maintained.Limited parking space, especially for cars is a big dampener.

Name: AshwanthPrathapani
Title: Very Good Temple
Review: This temple is a near replica of the famous Jagannadh temple in Puri. The temple is located in Banjara Hills and is easily accessible as it on the main road. It is well maintained and never so crowded. Best time to visit - early mornings and evenings.

Name: HARISH
Title: jai jagannath
Review: its like a jagannath temple in puri..best temple ,must visit...nice area and location..must attend aarti ..

Name: Rajesh Desai
Title: Very pious
Review: self visited temple and it is very pious , pleasant and nicely maintained. It is one the must visit location .

Name: balkivinod
Title: Chance to visit
Review: I had opportunity to visit the temple that is located in road number 12 banjara hills. It is well maintained and is clean compared to others. It is must visit and can get good darshan during weekdays as it is not much crowded.

Name: Debasis
Title: Serene
Review: This is a peaceful temple in the chaotic city Hyderabad.Very well designed, Prasadam available always.We visited and well spent time praying along with my family.Must see location.

Name: HONEY
Title: Best temple
Review: Jagannath temple is one of the best temple in the Hyderabad.The huge and massive infrastructure shown and the best place in the Hyderabad for peace.

Name: sivalenkasridhar
Title: Jai Jagannath
Review: Well maintained temple with utmost tranquility. You'll never  feel its in midst of busy roads. Should visit to experience the replicated structures as in Puri.

Name: Sindhuja Elupula
Title: peacefull world
Review: Good place to stay . Very good maintained. Very peace place and very good food. Very near to all picinic spot . thanks god sure i want visit this place with my family

Name: Abhishek p
Title: Narayani dham
Review: Good place to stay in loonava.Very good maintained.Very peace place and very good food.Very near to all picinic spot

Name: ShaanRoy
Title: Sunday evening gets crowded
Review: Parking is an issue on weekends. The temple is classy and so is the crowd. There is parking, shoe stands available. The temple is very clean and well maintained.

Name: Travellover6128
Title: Beautiful
Review: This temple is unique in design and simple in colour but wonderful to visit.  We were fortunate enough to visit with a local, who explain the history and customs, which made the trip more meaningful.

Name: Sundaresh
Title: A Pseudo  Puri Jaganath temple in Hyderabad
Review: Visiting this temple, makes you feel that you are in Puri and Orissa State. All preists from Orissa state and Rituals in Orissa style. A Prasadam is typical Puri temple style. There is a temple for Goddess Mahalakshmi and  Sun God.

Name: SRIKAKOLAPU
Title: good
Review: This temple is great and once we enter the temple we feel the inner  peace and calmness .People visit this more on Sundays

Name: TravelEnthusiast
Title: Shri Jagannath Temple - Hyderabad
Review: Jagannath Temple is located in Banjara Hills Hyderabad. It's beautiful construction. The temple resembles the Puri Jagannath Temple structure. But as it is new construction. It's so beautiful. Its so peaceful. You can see the reflection of the temple on the floor. When I visited it was a cool day. I really enjoyed the trip. It can be reached on a public transport or a city bus.

Name: Dilip kumar
Title: good place
Review: This temple is famous and has got its own history.one of the best peaceful place to visit in hyderabad.

Name: Dr I R Patil
Title: Nice temple
Review: It has good architecture, small area, main God is Vishnu surrounding with small temples lot of locals visit, for tourists optional if you have time you can visit

Name: ganapathy d
Title: A must place to visit in ones life time
Review: The city of temples, architectural beauty, historical importance, loving citizens, ample of vegetarian food. What else you want in life

Name: BRL RAO
Title: Jagannadh Temple
Review: This temples replicas original Jagannadh Temple and situated the heart the city and worth seen. also welcomed maintained.

Name: crsarma
Title: Puri Jagannath----Deja Vous
Review: We were looking for a Marriage hall in hyderabad and visited Kalinga Function Hall. After finishing that activity saw a Gopuram of a temple. Went towards it and this was the Shri Jagannath Temple managed by the same trust managing the Marriage hall-Kalinga Cultural Trust.A grand temple almost a replica of Puri-Jagannath temple. Beautiful spick and span, peaceful and Grand Temple. The atmosphere here is very much conducive for meditation and prayer. The idols are awe inspiring.  Worth visiting daily. Good parking space  and temple provision store for all the paraphernalia required for performing Pooja(worship). Jai Jagannath-Jai Shri Krishna

Name: seshu n
Title: Very beautiful temple replica of main Poori temple
Review: Harathi is very good in this temple. you have to go in the evening 5 to attend the harathi..Here donations have to put in Hundi only.

Name: pvrkaushik
Title: Beautiful place
Review: Its a kind of Puri Jagannath temple replica with the main gopuram etc... Beautiful paintings on wall etx... Take time and visit

Name: S R V
Title: Lord Jagannath
Review: Te temple is worth visiting and the atmosphere is serene. The grand look and the calm prevailing here attracts all.

Name: vchu99
Title: A beautiful temple
Review: This is a replica.  You need to take off the shoes, like most other temples in India.  It has granite floors. The feeling of walking on the hot floor was great, and supposed to be good for the health.

Name: GoWrong
Title: Bliss
Review: This was my place to relax in Hyderabad. I love the vibes of this places.. very positive and peaceful. May be its owing to the nice locality of jubilee hills which is not very crowded.

Name: AAB-PNE
Title: Wonderfully crafted temple, calm and serene environment
Review: Temple is located at Banjara Hills.Temple is beautifully built and is near replica of Puri temple.All around the temple, murals depicting events are created.Great time to spend an hour or so in calmness.

Name: reubenranjanfern2017
Title: Calm and serene.
Review: This is a very peaceful location. And quite attractive. And the place is well maintained and tidy. Nice experience.

Name: Mukta2016
Title: Shri Jagannath Temple
Review: The Shri Jagannath temple in Hyderabad has been built as a replica of the famous Jagannath temple of Puri in Orissa. The temple is well maintained and we had a very satisfying darshan of Lord Jagannath here

Name: Srinsiri
Title: Calm & Peace
Review: Looking for a silent divine space, here it is. It is awesome decorate and has very good positive vibe.

Name: Niya1315
Title: Beautiful Temple
Review: It is the best temple in Hyderabad. It remains closed for some duration in the afternoon. Shoe stands are there outside. The temple is beautiful from inside and outside.

Name: mactejas
Title: Serene Temple in midst of busy juncture
Review: This temple is located at Banjara hills beside TRS Party office, the roads leading to this temple is always busy and with traffic honks and all other chaos, but once you step inside the temple, you will be in a serene and calm place. You will have a calmness inside and it resonates inside. Do visit this temple if you are a localite. Other travelers who are not outsiders can visit this temple if you like to visit temples.

Name: thakurkunalsingh73
Title: Paradise in Hyderabad
Review: One of the beautifullly built , excellently designed and the most spiritual place in Hyderabad are the perfect words for this temple... This temple looks exactly like the original one and evening is the best time to visit this place...

Name: Prada
Title: Be at Ease Spiritually
Review: Hyderabad is surely a must visit place if you are Spiritually Inclined and yet enjoy good food and good life. Temple visits should be a MUST.

Name: ShashankOkhde
Title: Beautiful and silent temple
Review: Really beautiful temple, a near replica of Jagannath Temple in Puri. Always feels very peaceful visiting here. Sometimes on special days, the place can get crowded.

Name: Alok B
Title: Well built temple.
Review: Temple is well built, the management needs to take more care of the devotees. Apart from it everything was really good.

Name: Arunkumar
Title: one can get peaceful mind in the chaos
Review: The temple is very attractive with its attractive art and culture. very peaceful temple with great  Architecture. one of the best temple to visit in Hyderabad.

Name: k7591
Title: Serenity midst chaos
Review: Feels serene and divine.This temple has a feel of original puri temple.nice and wide space but many steps to climb.Difficult for physically imprecated people to access temple.

Name: sailaja2015
Title: Looks exactly like the original Puri Jagannath temple
Review: It’s a beautiful replica of the origyinal Puri Jagannath Temple. Very well maintained. There’s a certain and calm and peace about this temple. Not much crowds during weekdays, so you can spend time seeing the Temple and the mythological depictions on the compound walls. We sat down for a while and just absorbed the peaceful atmosphere. It’s very neatly maintained. Must visit if you’re in Hyderabad.

Name: sunilpadmanabhuni
Title: Nice temple
Review: Nice replica of Jagannath temple. The idols are so pleasant, I like this place and the sweets they sell are bit expensive

Name: vamsheekris
Title: Beautiful temple
Review: This is my favourite and regular temple in the banjara hills area. Pleasant atmosphere all the time.

Name: KapilSaraswat
Title: A Birthday Visit
Review: I think it is a must see place in the Hyderabad. Peaceful and inspiring place.Located in the Central location in Hyderabad and it gives you the feeling that you are in Puri.

Name: tamizh1974
Title: Nice Temple
Review: Nice, but crowdy, no peace. Also on Sunday there was Saraswati Devi Pooja because of which more crowd.

Name: Saurabh M
Title: Hyderabad zoo......
Review: Exploring Telangana...... Hyderabad.....at Zoo....Located at a distance of 16 km from Hyderabad, Nehru Zoological Park was opened to the public in the year of 1963. It is situated near the historically important Mir Alam Tank, which is 200 year old and is the first multi-arch masonry dam in the world. Nehru Zoological Park is one of the largest zoos of India . Run by the Forest department, Government of Telangana, the zoo has been named after Jawaharlal Nehru, the first prime minister of the country........What makes Hyderabad zoo an amiable place for both visitors and inhabitants are the open enclosures in which animals are kept. These open enclosures have been created to resemble the natural habitats. A wide variety of exotic animals have been successfully bred in this zoo park as well.There is electric car which is very helpful......

Name: SPillai
Title: Quite similar to other zoos
Review: A large area with a number of animal and bird varieties. But maintenance and upkeep leaves a lot to be desired. Visitor amenities can also be improved significantly.

Name: OctOriental
Title: Must visit these beautiful creatures
Review: The Nehru Zoological Park could be better organised. Outside the main gate it is a bit too chaotic and noisy and dusty with broken roads but that's Hyderabad. The zoo could have done with more logical signposts to different enclosures so that we don't miss a single creature. The safari rides last 15 minutes but give you a good look at lions, tigers, bisons. Lots of schoolkids on their school-organised visits lend to the nice feel of the place. Most commonly known wild animals are here. Must visit.

Name: Global-Bhatakanti
Title: Avoid weekend for zoo visit
Review: Suggested time: Min 2 hours to max 5 hours.You can buy some basic snack and food items inside zoo. There are battery vehicles with ₹100 per person charge, but not of much use as you have to get down at every halt whether or not you want to. Also on weekends there is long queue for ticket and battery vehicle.

Name: ishani b
Title: Waste
Review: Plz nvr visit, worst pathetic management.zZERo remarks... No one assisted, no guidanceHell for people to visit

Name: Santhosh K
Title: Amazing 🤩
Review: Nice experience for kids, alot many things to see. Strongly didn't felt much excited while safari, animals were less and most of the birds cages were empty.

Name: Srikanth S
Title: Good
Review: Hi,Zoo is good. There are lot more to do. Below are few1. One day feeding to animals (rs. 200)2. Many vacant places are filled with herbivores animals3. Allow common people to touch deers or non-dangered animals (rs. 500 fee/family for 10 minutes) under zoo authorities supervision4. Combo for end to end (including entry ticket till exit with food, snacks, safari, battery car pass) rs. 2000/family of 4 people)5. Mini combo. 6.Night safari in battery cars after 6 pm till 9pm (rs. 3000/family end to endRegardsSrikanthMob: 7799500742

Name: Gurus49
Title: Largest Zoo in India
Review: One cannot believe such a place can exist within a city. It is nicely laid out and the animals seem to be in their natural environment.

Name: Mitalee2012
Title: Wonderful early morning winter experience
Review: Got to see the whole gamut of wild animals enjoying the winter sun. It's best to go early (at 8:30-9am) when the animals are up and about as they tend to retire for the afternoon.Specially enjoyed the nocturnal animal den and snake pits. TPro tip: if you want to enjoy the Safari, take the hop-on/hop-off tickets and get down at the Safari stop (3rd stop after the elephant stop), as it is a LONG walk and difficult to get back to, especially with children. The toy train was also pleasant and enjoyable.

Name: Deepali G
Title: Very good place..
Review: good zoo..well maintained..try to take food on your own..there are lots of varieties...cycling is also available..but try to go early ..

Name: Mainak_Choudhuri
Title: Good zoo, but a little disappointing in Covid times
Review: This was my second time visit to the zoo to show my kid. Found that the safaris as well as the Reptile House and Nocturnal Animal house are closed. Got disappointed a bit.They have a cheetah exhibit, a large deer and emu exhibit, and a large elephant exhibit. Other animals worth note are lion, tiger, white tiger, wolf, fox, jackal, gaur, hippo, rhino, ostrich, two types of bear, giraffe, sambar, blackbuck, white deer and crocodiles. There are some walk in aviaries, but entry now restricted due to Covid situation. Did not see any large apes, but seen a few small monkeys. All animals are kept in natural settings, though sometimes a little small.There are battery cars which are hop-on hop-off types, excellent to traverse the zoo, though still it takes much walking. The toy train starts only after a minimum number of passengers. It is possible to walk the entire length, there is a major circular path and small inner walkways.There is a refundable Rs. 10 per bottle  deposit to take plastic bottles inside.

Name: Sunny Cuty
Title: Relaxed place
Review: We both enjoyed by thr laser show and had a super excitement water ride.thr charges also very reasonable and kids can enjoy very much as we r yet to have them on our next visit

Name: Natarajan K
Title: Great place to hang out
Review: This zoo is located in large space. Enjoyed the ambiance and well maintained zoo. It has a boating behind the park. It's best place to go out friends and family.

Name: Polavarapu
Title: Zoo park
Review: Nehru zoolorgical park is very famous tourism spot in Hyderabad, all varieties of animals, birds, etc we can see here

Name: Twinkle Sonar
Title: nehru park
Review: amazing park..attractive atmosphere one must visit this place .well maintain cleanliness and amazing views

Name: Sunil
Title: Best palcr for kids and family
Review: The palce is nice and its well maintained by hyderbad government .the kids wil like this palce and can find different varieties of animals

Name: NAZEER SHAIK
Title: One of the most popular place in hyderabad
Review: Nehru zoological park was one of the most popular visiting places in Hyderabad/Telangana. Nice place to visit

Name: Lesley
Title: Good for 3-4 Hours with Children
Review: Entry ticket with 60Rs per head. You can find animals like white tiger, tiger, lion, elephants, hippopotamus, rhinoceros and many wild animals. There's a highly priced canteen inside selling chat items and briyani. Have 3-4 water bottles during your visit. By the time we visited, safari ride was not there, which would take you inside the forest with freely roaming animals. Worth to go if you are going as a family with children as they would enjoy the park and the animals. For a gang of friends, you would start feeling devastated by this visit.

Name: AbhiMone
Title: Well maintained
Review: A well maintained park with many rides to keep children and adults engaged .  It's very big and walking tour takes 3 to 4 hrs

Name: Akillchowdary
Title: Nehru zoological park

We all are went Nehru zoological Park at Hyderabad, to have fun with our kids as a part of local sight see... read more   1 Comment￼￼￼PRINCE PRIYADARSHI Feb 01, 2016 09:10 AM, 16576 Views     RODWELCOME TO ANIMALS KINGDOM..a must visited place During my new year holidays me and my friends are really confused about choosing a place where we can celebrate our new year as all the places in **HYDRABAD** are well coverd and no place left for hangout.So after searching for half an hour in GOOGLE we atlast find out a place where we can spent the whole day.The place is non other than **NEHRU ZOOLOGICAL PARK.****NEHRU ZOOLOGICAL PARK** is a zoo which is located in **HYDRABAD** near MIR ALAM TANK.It is one of the oldest zoo in south india and one of the most visiting place in HYDRABAD.It is a big zoo and having more than 1000 of animals.**ENTRY FEE**-Rs **20** for adults, Extra **2 rupees** for **AQUARIUM**( which you have to pay if you are interested in it)**TIMING t**-9 AM TO 5 PM(timing varies in winter seasons)**OPEN ON**-all days except **MONDAY**.(c**losed on MONDAY**)**THE HIGHLIGHTS OF THIS PLACE ARE TOY TRAINS, LION SAFARI, WHITE TIGERS AND CUBS, SNAKE DEN, COLOURFUL INTERNATIONAL PARROTS, PEACOCKS etc**==MEAN OF TRANSPORTATION INSIDE THE ZOO-==SAFARI RIDES are available.(**Rs 100 per person**),**BICYCLE RIDES** are available on hourly basis(**deposites of 100 per bicycle and extra **20 RUPEES** for each passing hour)****ELECTRIC GOLF CARTS** are also available for small groups.You can cover the whole area by means of WALKING, It takes you hardly 4 HOURS TO explore the whole ZOO.**PERSONAL CARS AND BIKES ARE NOT ALLOWED INSIDE THE ZOO TO MAINTAIN POLLUTION FREE ENVIRONMENT.****LIKES-**The zoo is really clean and plastic free as *you have to buy the water bottles from the officials of zoo and you can redeem the money once you returned the empty bottles*.I really appreciates this idea.Healthy animals and adoption facilities is also available for animal lovers.The Zoo is very Spacious and animals habitats are well maintained. Electric vehicles for small groups and cycle rides are available inside the zoo.**BATTERY operated** vehicles in order to maintain pollution free environment inside the zoo.**The enclosures are well maintained and safe for KIDS.****DISLIKES**-There are some visitors  who do not treat the animals with respect.They are shouting, teasing and taunting the animals and throwing stones on them and for that the zoo authority do not have any **STRONG RULES AND REGULATION** or any FINE system which I really dont like about the zoo.some of the animals habitats are not maintained well and are neglected by authority for example **CROCODILE habitats.****Canteen facility** is not upto the mark as they charge too much and very limited items are available.Canteen is not clean and the staffs are rude.Aquarium is also not maintained well only some spices of fishes are available.Its a best place for people who are interested in photography.**Its a best hangout place for both ADULTS  and KIDS**.The entry fee is just rupees 20 but in return what you get in terms of experience is mind blowing and phenomenal.You are in a place which in other terms is known as ANIMAL KINGDOM.They are the king and you are just a visitor.The best thing about the zoo is not too far from city.You can easily reach their.And if you landed in HYDRABAD, you can add this zoo in your **visiting list**.

Name: Wilayat
Title: Zoo
Review: Nehru Zoological Park is one of the largest zoos of India and one of the top sightseeing places to visit in Hyderabad. Run by the Forest department, Government of Telangana

Name: Scarlet Fernandes
Title: Nehru Zoological Park, Hyderabad
Review: Spent a beautiful day at the Nehru Zoological Park in Hyderabad. At first sight I spotted very few animals and was disappointed. But the safari visit inside the park was fantastic. Young and old, all will enjoy it. The deer enclosures, the birds and the butterfly park is amazing     Need to have some more well fed animals in the park. I admire the staff for their love and caring nature towards these animals.

Name: Krishna Sandeep Siram
Title: Good Recreation place
Review: This place is Good but too expensive and mostly you will see deers and some rare species of different animals.For Lion and Tiger you have to take another Safari ride in Bus.

Name: wjw2018
Title: Very spacious grounds, plenty of walking!
Review: Once you get past the 'no plastics' security patrol, who will confiscate any plastic bags or make you get your water bottle stamped for a 10 Rs deposit, you're free to enter this zoo (tickets cost 50 Rs)...and WHAT a huge zoo it is! There are not a massive amount of animals but the ones that are there looked to be in a reasonable condition and had food and water, though the cages for the birds didn't have any greenery in them which was sad. For those who don't like walking too much, there are various transport options like a train and some small golf cart trailers who'll take you around  for a small charge. Also, halfway round the zoo there's a bus that you can board, for an extra 50 Rs, to take you on a mini 'safari' where you can see lions, a tiger and some bears. I was saddened to see them in cages though....the area of the safari would be big enough for them to roam free, but they've been contained in featureless enclosures which is sad. Outside of this, there's a lot of imagination shown, with tunnels and fossil parks and all sorts. It does make for a good day out, but there could be some improvement with more seating and some restaurants and water points. Overall, pretty good, though a bit more foliage in the bird cages would be kinder for them, plus more staff presence to stop people whistling and harassing the animals is definitely needed.

Name: advait
Title: Couple visit
Review: Zoo is quiet good .inside  zoo hotels are few but zoo is very large very much excited after seeing  white tiger bengal tiger and babbar sher

Name: Tarun
Title: Nice zoo in Hyderabad
Review: Really enjoyed the zoo by visiting along with my 8 years and 5 years old kids. Main attractions were the tigers, lion, elephants, hippo, rhino, ostrich etc. Big zoological park which we felt little uncomfortable to walk around. They have vehicles which will be useful if you have infants or toddlers. This place must maintained responsibly throughout the years. Thanks

Name: Marianne S
Title: Students walk
Review: God place for have a nice time with family and friends.Animals lives in good conditions, аll zoo looks like a beautiful park.

Name: Sangram42
Title: Boring
Review: Cleaned but too expensive and mostly you will see deers. For lion and tiger you have to take a bus and that is also not guranteed

Name: LostMySelfTraveling
Title: It was so much fun with family and young children
Review: As soon as we went inside we took tickets and also for electric buggies. So that we can go around the zoo park easily. It's a lovely zoo park. There are many visitors come here in holidays from several parts of India. There are wide varieties of wild animals that include while tiger, white peacocks and very big size in macaws ( Similar to parrots but large in size). There is an exclusive fish aquarium too with a separate entrance ticket. You can also rent bicycles for an hour or so. The bicycles must be checked before taking for rent. Overall its a great experience with little kids.

Name: Arunkumar
Title: Very worst exp i had with parking
Review: I didn't find parking on the day of Christmas. it's very crowdy. A good place to visit to have a fresh air and surrounded by the animal planet.

Name: Manoj Kumar
Title: My experience
Review: First of all place is very beautiful.entry fee 30 for children and 60 for adults and extra for camera.in weekends the place is very busy.i don't more knowledge about animals.to see animals rail will be available,it is not free .it is very famous in Hyderabad. nature lovers definitely like this park . pleasant nature can be find here

Name: chandrasekhar g
Title: Vast Zoo in Hyderabad
Review: Visited with my family members.Must have entry ticket.Entry ticket cost will differ for week days and weekends.Very huge crowd on weekends.After entering enjoy full greenery.For seeing Lion and tiger we have to reach through Safari, it will be provided inside zoo only and we have pay separate entry cost for that.First time saw lion very nearer and it was awesome.

Name: Mittal28
Title: Awesome zoo
Review: I am having 1 year old daughter..she got very happy in zoo..different types of birds,reptile,animals,water reptiles,etc are very much..zoo is very big..take battery operated car and rome inside

Name: FIRDOUS (ARMAAN)
Title: So big area it's really good
Review: In my visit as solo I got all the information from staffs they were really good. It's clean I don't like the safari trip animal was always hiding.you need at least 3 to 4 hours to see all. The best part of this zoo is bird paradise where all the birds are free and we are allowed to go inside.

Name: Farook Uddin
Title: One of the biggest Zoo Park. A good outing with family and friends. which you will love.
Review: Spreads over 380 acres of land, the zoo is managed by the Forest Department of the Government of Andhra Pradesh, Don't Carry polythene bags, bedsheets, knifes. They are not allowed. Reach early to buy tickets you won't get it online and especially on weekends there is huge crowd and long queues. I would suggest better visit on weekdays if you want peace. :-)

Name: MyNameIs Shiva
Title: Zoo of HYDERABAD.
Review: Nehru zoological Park is good place to teach the Kids on different things.Better place for kids as well as Young and old Generations.

Name: OMKAR PAGADALA
Title: Nehru Zoological Park
Review: I have enjoyed a lot by visiting this zoo. It's is a very big area. And animals are taken care very nicely.

Name: Rajujacob
Title: Family visit
Review: Its the place where I enjoed a lot during my trip. Because its a a huge collection of various animals n birds which belongs to different categories. The visit of all this made my trip happieer

Name: rggg
Title: One of the best in India!!
Review: I love going to Zoos. I have been to atleast 10 different zoos in India and abroad. I have seen high standards of zoos and safaris in Singapore, London and Bangkok and super pathetic standards of Indian zoos like jaipur, ahmedabad and crowning glory of patheticism.. Mumbai zoo where animals are caged in small iron boxes. Compared to all these... I found Hyderabad zoo much much better. It's spacious, animals looked fresh and relatively happy... They have been tried to be given their natural habitat. As with all Indian zoos... It's super cheap with ticket under 100 Rs. Golf cart tickets are extra but it's OK. It's a good service that they have provided. Please buy a ticket for golf cart if you don't want to walk too much as space is humongous. Frequency of golf carts were reasonable. I especially liked the enclosures for elephants.. They have been given huge space. I didn't try the safari bus so won't be able to comment on it but I have seen this facility only in Hyderabad zoo of all Indian zoos. Ice cream, cool drinks and some snacks are available inside the zoo but no proper restaurent. All in all i'd recommend going to this place if you like going to zoos and watching animals like Rhinos and Giraffe.

Name: Debasis
Title: Big zoo
Review: This is a very big zoo. Actually we got surprised by the sheer hugeness of the zoo. Quite well maintained and lot of varities of animals are there.

Name: sam12
Title: Picnic
Review: It is a very good place for picnic with family and friends I like specially the safari park,train and newly open butterfly park

Name: Indian
Title: Waste of time and energy - unhygienic - stinking smell
Review: Waste of time.The zoo opens at 8:30 am - however train rides - bicycle rides - boating and other shops open at 10 am or late.Unhygienic Food is thrown by visitors but no one to take rounds and check the vicinity.Stinky smellThe whole zoo stinks with bad smell of poor animals we pass by but the animals stay they in that stinky smell.Monkeys roam in the streets.

Name: Jo-Ann
Title: Cosy
Review: Awesome park. Great walk all around. Well maintained and animals looked healthy. Cosy park because there are trees everywhere. I loved it.

Name: Sounak Poddar
Title: Cherishing Memories
Review: In my childhood, during holidays, my parents used to take us to the ZOO or any other places like a park, Museum etc. After visiting a zoo in Hyderabad after a decade felt really good but I think as a child we were more eager to all this but now it's more like just going. it is a clean place to visit and a place to cherish your childhood memories.

Name: Abhishek807
Title: Train Ride is good...
Review: I have visited almost all Zoos in India so didnt felt excitment. Safari is Good. However, Train Ride is Goo

Name: Srisadhana
Title: Unwind yourself
Review: Nature is at best here. Cool calm winds are big relief from every day chores. My kids had great time here.

Name: Sanjukta d08@gmail.com
Title: Visit to nehru zoo
Review: Visited zoo today . What an amazing experience saw various animals wild as well as birds. It is maintained very well. Management has taken very good care of the animals . Will visit again.

Name: Madhu Kishore
Title: Huge zoo but nothing great
Review: Its a huge zoo for sure but the count of animals is less. The elephant enclosure is huge with only 3-5 elephants and they are so far that you can hardly see them. There are different species of deer and bears.The people who went to the safari told that no animals are visible to we skipped that. The reptile section is good. There is a train which you can take which will leave you at drop points to explore the place. There are a lot of birds including hens.But overall we were disappointed with count of animals.Please carry food as the cafeteria has limited options such as pau bhaji , puffs , corn and cool drinks. And “No plastic”. Its more of a place to enjoy the greenery, sit and relax and have fun.

Name: Krishna josyula
Title: Great place forvweek ends
Review: Great place to engage children over weekends.  Even for adults also it's best place get relaxed after week long stressful work.

Name: Ramsha Qureshi
Title: Weekend's trip
Review: Its a very good place for family and yound children... Where you can see lot of animals,birds,reptiles,amphibians,every kind of animalsTicket for normal daysChildren-30Adults-50On weekendsChildren-40Adults-60

Name: Bianca
Title: Well kept
Review: While the zoo is enormous and has well kept animals and enclosures, you tend to get lost due to no proper maps. It may take you around 4 hours. The aquarium needs to be well maintained. The have a natural history museum, fossil park, safari. The safari is not a must-do thing since the tour is in a closed bus. Do take their battery operated vehicle for 70 rupees per person if you have an elder traveling with you.

Name: jastmeet
Title: Its a nature
Review: Wanna see nature closely then visit this zoo....most of the animal species can be seen there with beautiful look around...maintenance is also nice

Name: Arun Karthik
Title: Many animals in one place
Review: Also called as Hyderabad Zoo, Nehru Zoological Park was established in the year 1959 but it was only in 1963 when it got opened for public. A must-visit for animal lovers, this zoo houses around 250 species of fauna. All the animals are kept in surroundings similar to their natural atmosphere. Spanning across an area of 300 acres, it has species of Indian rhino, Bengal tiger, Indian elephant, python, panther, Asiatic lion, gaur, antelopes, deer, Himalayan Black Bear and number of birds as its inmates. A number of animals from zoo across the country have been brought here showcasing the variety of wildlife it inhabitants.Few added attractions for children and visitors include Natural History Museum, Toy Train, Aquarium, Butterfly Park, Jurassic Park, and Children’s Park. It happens to be the first zoo that started off with the idea of Safari Park and successfully established the Lion Safari Park. This park has been extended to a Safari complex also including Bear Safari, Tiger Safari, and Bison Safari. Proper eating amenities are provided for visitors including a multi-cuisine food court, canteen,dairy parlour and bakery.Moreover, Mir Alam Tank that is situated next to this zoological park draws a number of people due to boating activity conducted by the Andhra Pradesh Tourism Department.

Name: jainms
Title: Zoo Park
Review: Lot of animals found in this zoo which is large in area. Enjoy the place with kids and family. Weekend is bit crowd visit.

Name: Suneela K
Title: Animals
Review: Takes a 6-8 hours to see completely. Fun filled train ride around the zoo. Lion safari is worth it. Separate bird enclosures. Butterfly park is also good. Nocturnal animals are in a separate enclosure. 2 canteens available for lunch. Most locals get their own food.

Name: RaviPoojari
Title: Good Zoo
Review: Good place to visit and see animals. You can see different animals but looks park dont have good resturants inside to eat something good.

Name: beyondtravel
Title: Vast and variant
Review: Went on coincidence on lions day, we're awed by the variety of animals, birds, sections such as carnivores, elephant, aves, reptiles, herbivore including rhino, giraffe and hippo , butterfly, nocturnal, bisons, deers etc. But saw 1 lion only. Overall it's a great place and takes 4-5 hours to cover on weekends, located close to city. The park is well maintained with toy train, battery operated hop on cars, and ample animals to see especially if you have kids with you or if you are first timer. However inadequate signages make you  walk a lot, stand in slow and unorganized ques etc. The safari is a total time waste considering tigers are caged. Food options are too limited, better to carry own food. Do visit as a tick in box if you stay at Hyderabad

Name: Kalilur R
Title: Need more maintanance
Review: The park is situated amist the middle of populated town. Thought it is a very old zoo in Hyderabad, the developements are lacking. Animals are very far away and seeing them is seems difficult. In safari very little wild animals.

Name: Shivkanth Y
Title: Best Zoo
Review: Have been here many time and they have many breeds of animal..It's the best zoo if people have visited zoo's abroad they would realise they paid a lot for the zoo names like singapore with just few options

Name: Muneer
Title: Close to wildlife
Review: Hi nehru zoological park is a very beautiful park to meet a wildlife closely and know about nature I and my family enjoy this trip 👍🏻🐅🐆🦒🐘🦍🦃🐇🐊🦌

Name: Manideep Vavila
Title: Enjoyed a lot
Review: Fully enjoyed all kinds of animals are there it felt like a journey going through forest. We enjoyed a lot in safari drive

Name: Prashanth
Title: Avoid weekends if you have a choice
Review: It was a good visit to the Zoo. My son loved and we could spot most of the animals. He had a great time. Now coming to the bad parts of the visit - We went on Sunday which is the most busy day for the park.So as expected it was very crowded. We wanted to rent a personal cart but after standing in the line for 1 hour I was told they dont have any available I have to do the sharing cart. But they gave a personal cart to the guy who did not even stand in the line as he had a connection with some hid ranked departments. The guys driving the carts had such an arrogant attitude that most of the people riding it could feel it and had lot of altercations with them.Other than that we had a great visit and could show so many animals to my son.

Name: abrahamsuji
Title: Natural surroundings
Review: Easy access from city. Enjoyed the visit. Well maintained premises. Can opt for hop on hop off buggy ride to reduce walking. Kids will love the experience

Name: Qkahmed
Title: Zoological Park
Review: The Nehru Zoological Park is the second largest animal and birds park stretched across several square kilometers. The zoo houses all animals and birds from India and overseas. The zoo is famous for its white tiger and lion safari park. It also has an animal and bird museum. A great place for tourist and children to watch almost all species of animals and birds.

Name: preethi d
Title: The zoo opens at 8:30am but no staff and animals in enclosure until 10am. PATHETIC MAINTENANCE
Review: The zoo opens at 8:30am and the staff comes at 10am that means all the animals will be inside the night shelters and nothing to see,  they should either shift the opening timings to 10am or the staff should come to the zoo an hour earlier than the open timings clean the zoo, animals and open all the enclosures. Worst maintenance.

Name: Rahul S
Title: Great variety
Review: I really liked the place and the structure of all the placed there, There you will find various types of all kinds of species.....Great to spend a Day

Name: Ravindra V
Title: Zoo
Review: It is one of the largest and top zoos in India. There are many exhibits inside the park. Some of the famous ones are reptiles, nocturnal animals, turtles etc. There is Lion Safari but it will be very crowded. Instead try the toy train. There is good variety of wild animals and birds. Plastic is not allowed but your own is allowed. Bring your food in steel containers so that you do not face any problem at the entrance. All those items which are not allowed can be kept in locker.

Name: amitdon2
Title: Zoo
Review: The zoo is very big and inside they have electric cars which they charge for each person 50rs.its very tiring to walk so better to take an electric car or we can take personal electric car which they charge 2000rs for 120 mins which will be with us through out and capacity is for 10persons.

Name: Farhan M
Title: Zoooooooooo
Review: Nehru zoological park is very well maintained you will get each and every animal there specially the safari park is really nice

Name: vmsatheesh22
Title: Good
Review: Nehru zoological park, beautiful place to enjoy few hours, best for family with kids, good facilities for all provide

Name: HONEY
Title: Zoo park
Review: I visit this zoo park .It was quite good.I had grate time spend here.Fully enjoyed.I recommend this place for turistor.

Name: krajeevc
Title: Must visit for families with kids
Review: This zoo is one of the best in India.You have buggy services to drop/hop you to 5 points each of which covers a significant portion of zoo.There is a seperate lion safari bus ride and a train  ride.The rest rooms are not up to the mark and need to be upgraded. Food / Canteen facilities are good and reasonably priced. One needs to spend 4-5 hrs at least to cover the entire zoo.If you do not want to explore on foot and get overly tiered, use the buggy service or rental cycles. Keep hydrated throughout. This Zoo is worth visiting.

Name: Adeeb unisa
Title: Average
Review: I feel theres scope for cleanliness and maintainence. And go ahead with children.have fun.treat animals well.

Name: Nagesh Eco Ventures
Title: Nehru Zoological Park
Review: Awesome place to see all the wild animals in one place... Paisa Vasool... especially for children of all ages.

Name: pvrkaushik
Title: Vast and good collection
Review: Its good place to take kids especially... Lion's den is the best. And hippo my favourite.. Little far from city centre... Take plenty water... Keep urself hydrated

Name: TravelEnthusiast
Title: Nehru Zoological Park - One of the best Zoo Parks in South India
Review: The trip to Nehru Zoological Park is amzing especially when you go with your friends, family and loved ones. You can reach out to here in public transport or Ola / Uber or any other cab. Its a nice zoo park perfectly maintained and organized. It has way boards, maps and directions. You can also take bycicles and buggies. You can take any of them based on your requirement. You can enjoy the trip with so much ease. This saves lot of time, effort and energy.You will find lot of people from Andhra, Telangana and many other states too. The best way I found is to take a ticket at the entrance for buggy. You will enjoy the trip. There are good canteens also in the zoo park. You can buy popcorn 🍿, Samosa and ice creams. There are many animals that you will find interesting and curios to know the facts if you carefully read about them.Overall its a nice place to enjoy the trip.

Name: NIL_MODI
Title: Explore Nature With Animals
Review: Superb Place. Must attend. Huge collections of animals birds, insect , reptiles etc...One should be ready to get tired if want to explore on feet. Big round enough to make you tired. keep drinking water and energy drink. Enough greenery to protect you from sunlight. They also provide electric car service on charge basis which will show the whole park. give enough intervals at fixed points to explore the life of animals. best option for who wants to round the park without getting tired.

Name: Peter V
Title: Superb cultural experience
Review: I had a free Sunday in Hyderabad and decided to visit the Zoo. I was pleasantly surprised by the space the animals have: I saw some beautiful albino tigers, elephants, giraffes, tropical birds, etc... What I did not know is that I was going to be the only tourist (ie. white male) in the entire Zoo; so I became the attraction. Families with kids wanted to take pictures with me which was somewhat unexpected. Oh and the other funny thing about my visit is that the most popular animals in the Zoo were the deer! I was barely interested, but the locals were all lining up to see deer.

Name: Abhilash K
Title: Big zoo
Review: This is one of the big zoos in India. There are lot of species available here. You can visit here and enjoy with your kids.

Name: Dr I R Patil
Title: Must with children's
Review: Nice place it's huge kindly opt for battery operated vehicle if you don't have much time it will close at 5.30 pm evening, most of animals goes inside the cave by 4.30 pm. By walk it takes around 3 hours with battery vehicle around 90 min. Best part is they have most of animals tiger, Lion, elephants, white tiger, hippopotamus, peacock, deer, fox, Hynes, ostrich, cheetah children's will enjoy.

Name: sophiarnd
Title: Birding at the zoo
Review: As there are lots of trees and the zoo holds a huge area we went for birding. Have to reach early but the zoo isn’t open then so have to just do with late morning birds high up in the big trees. Good place to visit

Name: GoWrong
Title: Best Zoo
Review: The thing which impresses you the most about this place is upkeep and maintenance. The confines of all the animals are nicely fenced and quite clean. There are variety of big cats, there is a butterfly park, there are giraffes. Its quite a fun way of watching wild animals.

Name: Soumyajit Saha
Title: Zoological Garden
Review: Nehru Zoological Garden is the Zoo of Hyderabad. It is very large and spanning in many acres. People must visit this place with family and children. There is a nominal charge per member. One can come to this place taking any public transport from the city.

Name: Mukta2016
Title: Nice Zoo
Review: The Nehru Zoological in Hyderabad is a very well maintained zoo and has a lot of wild animals in very nice and spacious enclosures. There is also a toy train ride inside the zoo which will be enjoyed by the kids.

Name: sree143in
Title: Animals and birds
Review: in This park we can see a lot animals like lion, tiger, elephant, and many more. a lot different birds also here.

Name: Dilip kumar
Title: Best place to have fun
Review: This place will give you good pleasant nature and also involves in getting the good healthy fresh mind.

Name: Milind Kshirsagar
Title: Awesome Zoo!
Review: A wide range of birds and animals including Lions, hippos, rhinos, tigers, giraffe, crocks, snakes. It's a very large zoo. Hire battery operated vehicle if you want to preserve your energy for other places.

Name: nik c
Title: Very pleasant way to spend a day
Review: Nehru Zoological Park is a very pleasant place to spend a day.   The park is well laid out with easy access to the exhibits.    The gardens are well maintained and there is a train ride for the kids (even the grown up kids).   There is a safari park "tour" and a "Natural History Museum" at the park, but I wouldn't bother with either of these as they were both VERY disappointing.   Overall it was a very nice visit and you could easily spend a day there.

Name: Rakesh
Title: Can spend a whole day
Review: Dont Rush your day by planning half day zoo tour, I suggest anyone to allocate whole day here. if possible, one routine suggestion i would like to give here, Plan it on weekdays (except on closing day- Monday i guess), because when we went there on Sunday, its totally Crowd, and you may not like it, people bring mats and water cans then eat food on lawns.if you are a pack of 10 or so, then you can book a resting room or retiring room also, you can google for that info.Coming to imp part, never miss lions, tigers and lot of animals like giraffe, also white tigers.Most importantly follow the path guided by them, because you may end of moving in the zoo walking extra without watching all animals. Zoo is very very bigHave fun. Enjoy your trip

Name: Ashish S
Title: Excellent Park
Review: This park was Excellent and was very well maintained. This park was very organized and neat. It was also not very busy.

Name: P V NEELAKANTA R
Title: NICE PLACE FOR WEEKEND
Review: it is a nice place to visit with family and friends on weekend .you can spend time at leisure here on weekends

Name: Suresh1976
Title: Excellent place to visit with kids
Review: We had visited this place in Dec. we had a wonderful time in this zoo and my kids enjoyed a lot. This zoo is very big, has lot of animals and different types of birds, reptiles, small fish aquarium.Animals like Cheetah, leopard, tiger, wolf, jackal, hyena, elephants, giraffe, ostrich, we found lots of deer. They have kept different types of birds, peacocks etc. in reptiles we have seen some crocodiles and different types of snakes.It is nicely maintained and it is very clean. Before the entrance there is the proper checking where staff don’t allow anyone to carry plastic bags inside the zoo. After the entrance you will find a mini van service which is quite good if you have old age people with you or if your kids are very small who cannot walk long distance. Zoo is spread in the vast area where you need to walk a long distance to cover all the animals.After the entrance there is toy train also. Ticket is very reasonable. Rs 20 for adult and Rs.10 for child. I advise you to take this toy train, kids will enjoy a lot. It covers the complete zoo area in 25 mins.There is Safari service also but we skipped it because of lot of rush. So better go early so that you don’t miss this safari service.You will not find much eateries inside. You will find ample drinking water and public toilets inside the zoo at various places.You will require full day to enjoy complete zoo but we spent 4 hours and skipped some of the places.We had a wonderful time in this zoo.

Name: Mandar Jetly
Title: Excellent zoo
Review: Wide variety of animals - Safari took more time in queue - go for AC bus if you have money as there was no queue - Reach early - you can miss Aquarium - There should be more supervision in area of Nocturnal animal & snake encounters as Peaple make crowd and push each other.Overall worth visit if you like animals.If you are strong and young do not take battery operated vehicle.

Lion safari is a highlight of this zoo. You need an entire day to see this place and enjoy it thoroughly. Definitely visiting this place again during next visit to Hyderabad.

Name: explorer india
Title: A big but not the best zoo of India.
Review: Its a big zoo housing lot of Indian, Asian  and African species of animals in big enclosures including Indian Lions , African Lion , Indian tiger , White Tiger , Cheetah , Leopard, Hippo , Rhino , Elephant , Jirrafe , Crocodile etc... Its a huge trail walking , so one can hire bicycle inside or take a battery cart hop on hop off ride for extra cost. The zoo overall is not that hygenic and the animal enclsures often smell foul. So be sure to carry your hand sanitiser also. Overall the children enjoy seeing so many animals at one place but the place reaaly needs to be better maintained.

Title: The Place is Good but can be planned better..
Review: The authorities are good in terms of maintaining things but we had been on a sunday that too in christmas vacation, so it was very crowded. It is difficult to find few locations of the animals although you can see them in them in the Map on the main road. As when you move inside from the main road there are very few guiding maps who would suggest you the way. Toilets are pay and use and there is additional fee for aquarium, noctrunal animals, fossil mueseum etc. A good place to visit but avoid on public holidays and summer hot days as need to walk a lot if u want to explore all the animals, as the electric car and the mini train would not offer you sights of important animals like lion, tiger etc

Same day onwards I am Contious to Calvary Temple. ** Calvary Temple,     Spiritual growth for every Soul. , I tasted Personally .** Calvary Swaram,Me & My family was sponcered 5 times,we enjoyed more Blessings **Calvary Mahimosavalu ,Fantastic meetings never seen before - we supported and Participated. **All Night Prayer It's Idle withness to Closer to GOD. **Friday Fasting Prayer **40 Days Fasting Prayers **Finally Our Beloved Spiritual Father Bro.Satish Garu, "Happy Birthday Bother"On 11/11/2014 , I failed one Exam, one Promotion - So again I feel Bad and Came to Calvary Temple Evening Prayer. When I enter to Gate, Our Brothers give small cake - I said why,  they Reply today Our AyyaGaru Birthday, I felt so surprised - Unfortunately and Coincidentally my Birthday also same date, First time I was seen you Brother on TV Screen on 11/11/11 ,Same day you mentioned that next we want Stadium to Worship God. In my Conclusion I strongly recommend My Spiritually Break-Through with Calvary Temple Hyderabad with Dr. P Satish Garu. I Love you So much and Love you too. 😍😍#HappyBirthdayAyyagaru#CalvaryTempleHyderabad #DrPSatishKumarGaru😍😍#LoveYourPastor
