Name: Samarth
Title: Good mall
Review: Amazing place to hangout and shopping. Every brand at one place. Quite huge mall. No very busy during weekdays. Cleanliness was well maintained.

Name: Mickey Uppal
Title: A little bit of everything under 1 roof
Review: One of the few BIG malls of hyd, which has many different brands under one roof.. you can start your day from having lunch in the food court which has reasonably price vendors to up market restaurants like Fusion9. brands like Shoppers stop, pantaloon, M&S, H&M,  are there to carter to men/women shopping needs.Entertainment zones like SMASHH, Dilouge In The Dark, Fun zone for kids.. The few drawbacks are, the drive to the mall is very tiring coz it's located in he middle of an IT HUB which means going there after 5:30-6pm is a pain in the back side. The Durgam cheruvu lake located next to the mall has got an amazing rope bridge which is visible from the mall and looks stunning in the evenings  They have ample parking so finding a spot is not hard .. OVERALL... Go there if u don't like online shopping...

Name: Sudipta Shaheen
Title: Good Place
Review: It is nice shopping mall with the facilities. All most all brands are there. The washrooms are clean and they have dedicated changing room for baby.

Name: Latha
Title: One year
Review: In terms of shopping, it's like any mall of a major Indian city. It's not so big that you would get tired walking around but big enough that they can accommodate a range of shops.nice thrilling games is there

Name: Venku reddy
Title: Good mall
Review: We've visited this mall today... It was good we can find each and every thing in this mall. We've spent very good tym in the mall.

Name: saradurban
Title: lovely mall
Review: enjoyed shopping heresome selection of stores helpful staff easy to get to with taxi good selection of options in food court

Name: Praveen K
Title: High end mall
Review: This is a very big & high end mall with two floor entry i.e. you can drop by car also on the first floor

Name: Inorbit Mall
Title: Big Mall
Review: Thank you for your review.. do visit us again :)

Name: Govind Dev
Title: Biggest mall
Review: Thank you for your review.. do visit us again :)

Name: Inorbit Mall
Title: Good hotel
Review: Good place to visit for crazy experience and enjoyment with family & friends For shopping, food courts, Gaming  & Movie. It is the nice place in Hyderabad

Name: chandrasekhar g
Review: Thank you for your review.. do visit us again :)

Name: Inorbit Mall
Review: Thank you for your review.. do visit us again :)

Name: rmgalivan
Review: Recently visited to watch Ashwadama movie.Located very near to hitech city mindspace.Shopping,movies,food courts,free parking are available.
Thank you for your review.. do visit us again :)
Thank you for your review.. do visit us again :)

Good location, newly constructed hotel. It is a good hotel but calling it a Luxury Collection is overrated.It’s a good business hotel with zero family orientation.Breakfast is ok but inferior to other hotels of similar type.Lounge is for name-sake with nothing but a couple of snacks and manned just by 1 employee. It is far inferior to any other lower category Marriott properties that I stayed at.Customer service is inferior compared to even lower rated hotels. There are many hotel employees in the lobby but no one seems to pay attention to the customers.I may stay there again primarily due to proximity to work but no other compelling reason.

Name: OPM
Title: Inorbit
Review: Nice coming up shopping destination in New Hyderabad. Catering to modern needs. A nice place to shop with family and friends

Name: Inorbit Mall
Title: Best mall near high tech city
Review: Thank you for your review.. do visit us again :)

Name: HONEY
Title: Mall is very big and has all the brands you could need
Review: Thank you for your review.. do visit us again :)

Name: Inorbit Mall
Title: One of the better malls
Review: It is located near the high tech city.Quite huge mall and best place to shopping.Gaming zone also available for kids.food, groceries,etc have good quality.

Name: Karishma Tanna
Title: Costly mall
Review: Thank you for your review.. do visit us again :)

Name: Primal Survivor
Title: Lovely Christmas Decorations & Great Shopping Options
Review: Thank you for your review.. do visit us again :)

Name: SundarRam54
Title: Excellent
Review: The mall is not that easily accessible through public transport but once you get there its pretty nice. There is a not very majestic entrance. Unlike malls in delhi this has very few gates. Still you get a lot of brands under one roof from mid range. Also there are attraction for kids to keep em busy.

Name: Jay Pradhan
Title: Perfect Hangout Place
Review: On the other side of Hyderabad in Hi-tech city , In orbit mall caters to young and not so young alike . DONOT go on weekends , holidays , festivals ~ the mall looks like a mela rather than upmarket shopping plaza.Major brands have stores & salons too (over priced )Parking is plenty which is a plus .

Name: jainms
Title: Good choice of outlets
Review: You can end up spending lot of money in this mall. Many of the shops sell high priced goods and even food there is costly. The mall does not transform itself to create any new experience, so after visiting once,subsequent visits are boring.

Name: Karthik K
Title: Modern mall
Review: One of the best and my favourite mall in Hyderabad. Its big and has variety of outlets to shop from. The food court is huge and has numerous outlets to choose from. The outdoor seating with a lovely lake view is quite relaxing. They have a number of restaurants as well, Chillis being my favourite one. The Christmas decorations were amazing, beautiful Christmas tree along with nice dance performances . The parking arrangements are excellent. Staff are well trained and polite. Overall its a lovely mall.

Name: Vikas Singh
Review: A very good place to spend time and enjoy your shopping along with Food court. weekends is very best time to visit here.

Name: Jo-Ann
Review: Its perfect for shopping,movies,food court and gaming. The ambiance and location is an added advantage to this mall.
One of the bigger malls in the city, there are good shopping options. The food court is spacious and you get variety in menu. Parking is ample. Overall nice ambiance

Just out of curiosity we visited for a bit. Security is tight at the entrance. Women needed to be body scanned in a covered booth. Handbags needed to be scanned. Inorbit Mall is just like any other modern mall. Good for Hyderabad!

Name: Lokesh1981
Title: One of the best mall of Hyderabad
Review: One of the biggest & best in the city, situated with in Hitech city, in a posh prime area, since decade, it is one of the most favourite mall of Telangana/ Andhra Pradesh, epicentre of many vibes within the city, let it be new year or Christmas, all time fully packed, ample parking area, many branded stores, hyper city, food court, multiplex, bar, coffee cafe &  cream stone, you name a outlet it is there .....The green lawn with city view is a major attraction, all together a good place to enjoy quality with family & friends and shopping !!!!!!

Name: Amashnee S
Title: Worth the visit
Review: I was on short trip and had limited time to shop. This mall has all the stores for both Indian and western clothing. I was able to have lunch at the food court, has both popular western food outlets and Indian, Chinese food. The store has a good layout, easy to find stores.

Name: Tsatsawani
Title: The flea market located in 3rd floor is a gem
Review: There is a flea market located in the 3rd floor of the mall, I bought great quality kurti tops and scarves as gifts. Well priced. Otherwise the mall looks identical to all malls throughout the world containing many department stores you can find elsewhere.

Name: Balu
Title: Worth
Review: Good one for shopping in hitech City. We can get all the required stuff at one place. Also good for entertainment.

Name: Adarsh Parida
Title: Nice Mall with good Shops
Review: Went to Inorbit Mall for shopping. The mall was quite big and had several outlets. The food court is great and has good variety. I enjoyed Taco Bell & Keventers. The PVR screens are bit small but nice. Overall a good Mall in a great location.

Name: Shailendra
Title: Too crowded on weekends
Review: Inorbit mall is one of the top shopping malls in the hitech city area of Hyderabad.With cinema theater and lot of shopping, it is one of the most visited places on weekends.Avoid visiting on weekends due to heavy rush.

Name: Mike Paholsky
Title: Good place to shop
Review: Good place to get clothes. I bought some chinos and shirts for work, a swimsuit for play, and formal Kurthas for weddings. I also picked up some souveniers including pashminas and scarves. And if you get hungary, check out Chutneys.

Name: Anita Pradhan
Title: ONE OF THE BEST MALL
Review: Inorbit Mall is my go to mall in hi tech city. The mall has a great number of brand outlets. The PVR cinemas is the also good and has good comfy setting. The food court is great and has a variety of options. The location of the mall is the best thing about it. Overall a great place to shop, eat and spend time with family & friends.

Name: Favoh
Title: Inorbit Mall
Review: I have visited this mall so many times till now. It is one of the best outing spots with your family or friends. It has a wide range of outlets at every floor, Ranging from apparels, to footwear And from electronics to grocery.

Name: Arun
Title: Good place to visit
Review: This place to is good to visit and has lit of shopping options. Food court is also very good. You can get so many options to eat.

Name: Ratna Kamalakar V
Title: One of the famous mall in Hyderabad
Review: One of the earliest and popular mall in Hyderabad. It is very spacious and has ample parking. However it might be boring for a frequent visit but once in a while the visit seems to be justified especially for shopping. Food options are good.

Name: Preetham sunny
Title: For purchasing clothes
Review: I feel excited when I visited inorbit Mall it is one of the place to really shop and have fun I had an amazing experience

Name: AunieH
Title: Nice Variety of Stores and brands
Review: This is a nice mall to visit if you are in Hyderabad. It is in the Tech center of the town and has lots of major brand stores with high end stores as well. There are also a few traditional Indian merchants that sell local merchandise which is nice. Do not expect too many price deals in this mall, but it’s nice to visit. They also have restaurants like Chili’s where I recommend ordering the sangria and veggie burger. The mall is pretty big with many levels and a food court. Pretty nice to hang out in if you’re in the mood for shopping or just walking around.

Name: beyondtravel
Title: A big all in one mall
Review: One of the most popular all in one malls of Hyderabad,  ample parking,  good food and shopping outlets.

Name: 30tv
Title: Good place with all options around
Review: Good place have good options to eat, for kids it has Fun zone, smash and turf where group can book and play food ball. Few good restaurants and movie theatre is also on 5th floor. Overall good place to spend couple of hours.

Name: SAnkeath
Title: Inorbit Hyderabad
Review: Inorbit mall in Hyderabad is a spacious shopping mall in Madhapur by Raheja Group. The parking lot is spacious and a fountain at the entrance of the mall makes it appealing. As far as shopping is concerned I did not find many good outlets here.The first floor is completely occupied by a supermarket and the other floors too do not have a good number of branded outlets. I visit this mall only to buy perfumes for which there is an exclusive store on the 3rd floor that stocks almost all good fragrances.The mall is not easily accessible except to those who work at Madhapur. It is situated a bit far from other main localities of Hyderabad. It has a food court and a multiplex both of which are not so attractive. Not a good place for a quality shopping.

Name: Dilip kumar
Title: One of the Biggest mall
Review: This mall is one of the biggest in IT corridor and it has its own style.PVR cinemas. Smaash gaming. Food courts.shopping.It has everything.

Name: LostMySelfTraveling
Title: Inorbit : One of the best malls & Multiplexes in Hyderabad
Review: It was nice mall. Enjoyed almost half day from 4 pm to 2 am. As soon as went there we went to the food court. Kids wanted to have ice cremes. Coldstone was the best choice we felt. Later we booked tickets for movie. We went to Jai Lava Kusa. It was recently released. It was a flop movie. That too we watched the latenight show. So everybody slept except two or three kids. Because it was a boring movie. The main reason for watching is kids wanted to see the multiplex. PVR Theatre was very well maintained. Everybody slept except few. Overall it was a nice mall. We went home by Ola. You can spend the whole day once you enter the mall.

Name: ramakrishnabanoth3
Title: Mega mall with rich quality.
Review: Rich interior and very good place to shop.Various food courts and brand showrooms for fashion.Nice viewpoint to look out.

Name: Satish
Title: Awesome
Review: The mall is awesome. It includes all the shops for buying clothes, watches, hypercity and theaters too.

Name: jainms
Title: Place to must visit - Best mall
Review: Inorbit mall located in Hitech-city is one of the best mall in Hyderabad. Maintained well and good place for shopping. Enough parking place available and love the food court. We always have something at food court on our visit.

Name: Madhavi
Title: One of the best malls
Review: Inorbit mall is one of my favorite malls. We are a regular there due to proximity and the varied variety of stores. The food court also has a good choice of food. Lately it has been getting a little crowded. Nevertheless, it is still my fav.

Name: Usha65
Title: Another huge mall in Hyderabad
Review: One of the oldest huge malls in Hyderabad, lying in between many IT companies with all the required amenities, shops eateries etc. It is admired by most of the Hyderabad people. It is not very crowded and the place provides lot of enjoyment. The Durgam lake nearby is a great attraction here. You can see the lake from the food court. Many varieties of food joints are available here.

Name: Valsa Mani
Title: Pleasant day at Inorbit Mall, Hyderabad
Review: Very pleasant when not overcrowded.There's wheelchair provision at the entrance itself. The stores are all lit up adequately.The washrooms are also very well maintained. Neat and tidy and clean.Eatouts are plenty on the Food Court at the top floor. Ladies stuff are mainly on the floor right below the Food Court.Altogether a memorable experience.

Name: Anita
Title: Great place to hang out while in Hitech Area
Review: During our visit to India, while staying at hotels (both at Sheraton and Westin Mindspace) Inorbit Mall was a must see. It has both stores likely to be found in U.S. including H & M as well as FabIndia for fabulous Indian attire. For the last few visits, my daughter and I visited the "fish pedicure" which might not be desired by all visitors but we loved it. We have also watched movies too.

Name: Sudha T
Title: Great Mall in Great location
Review: Visited Inorbit Mall 3 times recently during our stay at the nearby Hotel. Definitely worth visiting. Has a great selection of stores with high end products. Mall is very crowded in the afternoon, especially the food courts and it is very difficult to get seating. Interesting aspect is that most of the stores have very limited shoppers, it appears customers are just window shopping. Would definitely recommend buying products at the stores, comparable prices in a very well maintained stores. Would recommend going early in the day for lunch as the food courts are too crowded, definitely not comfortable to have family lunch. Fusion 9 is a great sit down restaurant and is ideal.Overall great experience. Would love to visit again for shopping.

Name: Anu789
Title: One stop shop
Review: Inorbit mall is a one stop shop for movies, shopping and food. If you are planning to watch a movie here, do book i advance as tickets sell out fast. The food court has plenty of options to choose from. What stood for me of malls in Hyderabad is that they have ample water coolers for drinking water instead of pushing people to buy bottled water.

Name: copenhagenvisito2017
Title: Premium Mall
Review: This is the mall in Hyderabad that sports the high end brand names. Secure mall. Food court and movies if you in the mood for some entertainment. If you using the Auto Rickshas, they can be a rip off and dishonest. Rather use an Uber. Wifi concept at this mall is still challenged by the regressive India mindset of a sim card is the golden key.

Name: beyondtravel
Title: All in one
Review: A total package mall complete with life style, shoppers stop, big bazaar and array of food outlets, parking on Sunday is cumbersome but other days a big kudos

Name: Prasad
Title: Nice Multiplex
Review: Inorbit mall is a large and good multiplex in Hyderabad. Have seen some movies in this multiplex. movie theater is good. Food courts are nice. Visited Chutneys restaurant here in this multiplex.

Name: Philip
Title: Good variety of Shops and Food Court!
Review: This mall is well planned and has a good variety of Shops suitable for all age groups. The Food court is amazing and once you enter this mall you don't have go anywhere else for your shopping needs and meals. Limited but good entertainment for toddlers/ kids. They always have some activity going on at the Atrium. Washrooms are well kept, the housekeeping should be given a pat on their back. As we know the prices are on the higher side in malls but toys in one particular toy shop on the second floor are over priced. You'll know the name when you get there. Anyways, this is the place to enjoy with your family.

Name: kurukuntla raviteja
Title: Mall
Review: Inorbit mall is located in Hyderabad near hi tech city beside I labs it is good place watch the movies and shopping children can enjoy play way it is good place

Name: Sahil_Kmr
Title: Nice
Review: Inorbit mall is a large mall in hyderabad for shopping and hangout with friends and family.Everything is available here.food court is in the top floor oof this mall.Very nice place.

Name: BNitinR
Title: Biggest @ Hyderabad
Review: Great place to shop, almost all the retail brands are available, mainly clothes, footwear etc..car parking is easy. One of the biggest malls in Hyderabad. Nice food zone on the top floor..lots of restaurants including subway, kfc, Burger King etc ..but difficult to get seating on the weekends. The play zone on the top floor is good..specially for kids, need take a card to play games and recharge with amount you want to spend. There used to be an open free play area for kids on the first floor which has been removed now, instead its a open space now with lawn were we can enjoy the outside view.

Name: koteswararao
Title: Good mall
Review: This is good mall but not in centred of city many twin city can not go this main stand but limited food items  Sunday's it may be busy not a 'll days

Name: njydlife
Title: Best place to hangout
Review: Shopping movies play areas what else you need for perfect weekend gateaway. And foodcourt with wide variety of stalls serving top flavours of india

Name: Debasis
Title: Big and good
Review: The mall is located in hi-tech city, hence crowded always. Many stores for food, clothes, to play in smaash and toy store Hamley, which we covered. Food court is big too.

Name: SvenProescher
Title: It's a shopping mall
Review: Nothing spectacular and you can find such malls everywhere around the world. International brands, clean and secured with parking area. The only difference to other malls is the food level at the 4th floor...international fast food but also local fast food...Prices similar to international standard. I could by most of the clothes cheaper in Melbourne...Made in India too :-)

Name: Preethi Gadde
Title: Cheating parking tickets
Review: Terrible parking issues. Despite of the bill they are charging for parking. The security services in the parking has no sense of customer care. No supervisor available to log complaint.

Name: Abhilash K
Title: Great experience
Review: I found Great experience here and it is one of the largest mall in the Hyderabad and I watched a mve here

Name: Vishal S
Title: Wide options for shopping and excursions
Review: Lots of options available for shopping. Overcrowded during weekends. Parking is free on showing the purchase bill.

Name: ayushagarwals022
Title: One of the best mall of the city
Review: This is perhaps the best mall of the city where one will find almost all the brands. This mall can cater to the requirements of people of all age and income groups. Nice view from the top and a special place for recreation of kids

Name: TravelingGypsy0508
Title: One of the best places to shop in Hyderabad
Review: This mall is conveniently located and houses all the big brands. Food court has got a lot of decent options to eat. Has some independent restaurants too - such as Chutneys.

Name: srk-rk
Title: Nice Mall
Review: The mall is located near Hi-Tech City in Hyderabad. Lot of stores and options for shopping. Convenient parking.

Name: DURGESH KUMAR M
Title: Best mall of Hyderabad
Review: This mall is the only place in Hyderabad wherein you find all amenities available. This mall is a central for all kind of shopping, movie , pub , sports etc. crowd is also good here and it has got sufficient space as well , good ambience for hangout here with family and friends . You will really enjoy this place only thing is that rates are marginally high as compared to other malls of Hyderabad. Well that may be because of extra amenities provided here.

Name: dhirajkumar90001
Title: Inorbit
Review: Hi tech mall situated near hitech city with all the facilities and needs available.best for shopping.good place to hangout.

Name: Georgio Valentino Rayala
Title: One of the Best Malls in Hyderabad
Review: It is located in the Hi-Tech city area and I went there to watch a movie "Avengers" at it's multiplex. We got tickets for the late night show so we decided to explore the mall for 3 hours. First we visited the "Home Centre" store which had a great collection of household furniture and accessories. Next we visited the "Hypercity" which had a good collection of groceries.After that we sat at it's huge food court and tried frankies at "Tibbs frankie". Next we ate ice cream at "Mini Meltz" outlet followed by chai at "Chai Point". Next we looked at home collections at "Home Town".Finally after waiting for 3 hours we watched the movie "Avengers" at PVR Multiplex. Over all it was a really nice experience and I think it is the best mall in Hyderabad.

Name: vanigupta031992
Title: Must visit this mall
Review: Located at the centre of the city this mall will suffice all your shopping needs. One will ind almost all the brands. The mall is well maintained, have sufficient parking space and can cater to all the needs of all the age groups

Name: Nikhhil Agarwal
Title: One in all place
Review: we have visited it several times for movies, masti and magic, shopping, food, entertainment, etc. you can find almost all major brands, superb location, superbly managed.

Name: deepa v
Title: Good collection
Review: All branded showrooms at one place.Mens Casuals are worth giving a look.Womens western outfits are good .Theatre to clothes to food court all in the city centre.

Name: prabavathi
Title: Nice place for shopping
Review: Most probably I got more things to buy like clothes, food, electronic, home decor, kids item, FMCG products and more branded products.There is a small park and sight viewing are awesome.

Name: SVRSAGAR
Title: Best mall for Big-Time Spenders!
Review: Been here many times with friends and family. This place offers variety of food, shopping and relaxing options including Hypercity super market and PVR Cinemas. Recommended mall to visit when you are new to hyderabad. Ample parking space as well.Starbucks, Chutneys, Lifestyle, Pantaloons, Shopperstop, Archies, Creamstone, MD, KFC, Pizzahut etc., are some of the many shops here.

Name: Suchig06
Title: Decent Mall for shopping, hanging out and good food options
Review: The mall provides an accessible break venue for people - professionals, families, singletons...just everybody. Meaningful and ample shopping and food options. I saw 3 ATMs in the food court but none was ICICI which was pretty disappointing. It is weird how the staff is not aware of facilities. In fact, ask them anything, in general, they would not answer at all (lack of knowledge) or not confidently. A fairly decent level of customer service is missing - be it food court, clothing stores or others.People here need to realize the growth and development in their city that has brought in and continues to draw people from diverse backgrounds to Hyderabad. People working in the mall -you can do better:)

Name: Nishita Jindal
Title: Different From Others
Review: I've been going to this mall since it was built and remember every part of it very vividly. The shops are countless in number with H&M and Marks and Spencers being the newest additions. The kids play zone and the food court are strategically located and  easily accessible. There toilets also and drinking water is available. There's also a cinema theatre. The décor and architecture of the mall with it's interior design changed for every occasion is a sight to behold.

Name: beyondtravel
Title: Populous and crowded
Review: One the big malls in Hyderabad with aplenty shopping options but too crowded on Sunday that ur cramped even to walk and food court needs better mgmt...u just can't find a space

Name: dhilipp2017
Title: Good Mall Experience...Inorbit Hyderabad...
Review: Our family visited this place for watching Movie on 7th April 2018 and we had a great experience right from getting a parking space as soon as we entered and good food as well. We had good experience with shopping here with various brands available. Best part was after our 4 hours inside mall and we were thinking of parking charges to be paid, it was understood that parking was free. This made our day hassle free.

Name: Ganesh N
Title: Inorbit mall
Review: It was nice place to going with the familyWe enjoyed a lot there is so many shops for cloths and everything is available is there

Name: SAMIRKUMARRUPARELIYA
Title: Good Mall in Hyderabad
Review: Inorbit Mall is one of the good malls in Hyderabad, however it can not beat the Inorbit mall at Navi Mumbai.A good part of Inorbit Mall in Hyderabad is, it is located at a very proximate place near to many other attractions, and bang on a main road, so it becomes easier to reach there. It is very close to Shilparamam, which is another good attraction for travelers.

Name: bose_rima
Title: Near Hitec City
Review: The mall is steadily becoming popular, maybe because of its prime location in the corporate district.

Name: Srinivas S
Title: Large mall
Review: Until Forum mall came up around Hitec city, this was largest mall. This meets all needs, be it Food, shopping or PVR screens. It adds a greenery for kids to play as well

Name: Ravindra V
Title: One of the largest
Review: One of the largest malls in Hyderabad. Has ample parking space, good number of food options with a food court at level 3. There is PVR and fun city (kids) and Howzzat (for grown ups) at top level. Will be usually very crowded on weekends. Good number of branded and multi-branded shops like lifestyle are in the mall. They have opened toys shop Hamleys recently.

Name: Gullupalli K
Title: orbitalamall
Review: it is good looking shopping and movie seeing  nice location in hyderbad waste of food price for this mall nice movie theatre

Name: Aartichand
Title: Hi tech City Mall
Review: Until recently this was the largest, busiest mall in Hyderabad. It may have lost out to the Forum Mall but still very busy specially with the local residents of the hitech city area. It is also the only H & M store in Hyderabad.There is something for everyone.

Name: rabhola
Title: New and Lovely Mall
Review: The mall is located in the newly coming up Hitech Township. It is about 45 minutes drive from the central place - Begumpet. It is a new mall and has all good brands viz. Marks & Spencer, H&M etc etc. It has on the Ground Floor one very good tea shop which has very distinct flavors of Indian teas. Overall it is a nice experience but for the location which is far off from the main areas of the town.Dr. Rajesh BholaSpiritual Writer & Columnist

Name: iamchathu
Title: Went on Shopping on my Hitech City Visit
Review: Big mall visit lot of branded products to buy. In the first floor, there is HyperCity Super Market with lot selection from fashion to kitchen items, personal care, religious, electrical products available. If you wants to buy branded T shirts, Travel bags good place to visit. In third floor inside Shoppers Stop has good book collection too.

Name: PRASAD C
Title: Big Mall In Hyderabad
Review: We are here for watching movie, great and good mall,and also bbbiiig mall. all brand stores will get here.

Name: chandresh k
Title: Regular visitor
Review: Mall is good if you want to do window shopping or looking for some fun time activities like movie,Gaming etc. it has a terrace through which one can take complete view of surrounding places. Not very good for shopping as prices seems to be quite high. Overall good for weekends.

Name: DreamerDisha
Title: Not a tourist place. Good for locals
Review: If you happen to be touring Hyderabad and need to urgently shop for some brand, you can go. Else the place is not worth a tourist attraction. Nothing is like Hyderabad special. Same brands that you get in any other city.

Name: A. M.
Title: Good Mall to see
Review: Good Mall to go to, Has plenty of local stores as well as some international brands. Contains good places to eat as well. Having free wifi is a plus. can get crowded on Weekends though

Name: Prasad
Title: Biggest Mall
Review: We have gone to inorbit mall continously for 2 days in the night time. Inorbit is a very bug mall with many branded stores and food courts. My baby and wife enjoyed to see the mall. We have taken good food here. For children there are good playing stations also there.Overall a good experience

Name: Rajni
Title: New Make over of Tand Bund
Review: Tand bund is looking beautiful after the new modification. It has become a nice place to spend time. The street lights are looking nice and the view has become more beautiful.

Name: Xavier D
Title: Tank Bund
Review: Nice place to walk in the city across the Hussain Sagar Lake, nice during early mornings and evenings.

Name: Asha K
Title: Nostalgic !
Review: I lived in Hyderabad as a child and this was a trip along memory lane 50 years later with my husband.

Name: Abhay Mehta
Title: Nice place to visit
Review: The Hussain Sagar lake is the lovely place to visit and spend your time especially in the evening. You can also enjoy the history through different statues of great personalities placed all over.

Name: Dharmendra Singh
Title: Amazing hospitality
Review: Amazing hospitality, thanks to sajid for making it once again lovely stay, Ramkrishna Reddy charming and smiling as always and forthcoming, Front desk prakash, Preeti, handsome man from northeast forgetting his name, 2× univers ( room service) And many moreThanks a lotSee you soonGod bless

Name: Kaushik G
Title: Road with scenic views
Review: We had traveled by car along this road many times during our holiday in Hyderabad. This road is along the beautiful Hussain Sagar Lake and we got a great views of the lake and the giant Buddha statue in the middle of the lake while traveling by car on this road.

Name: Veer2468
Title: Good for evening
Review: This is a good place to visit during the evening. Do visit the place when the weather is pleasant in Hyderabad. Good for driving as well.

Name: Vikas Singh
Title: Nice for early morning stroll
Review: Hussain Sagar lake is highly polluted and the lake stinks at several places. But early morning stroll is a pleasing experience. The Lumbini Park is located here from where you can take mechanized boat to the Buddha statue. There are also many good eating options including street food.

Name: Galabackhome
Title: Wow
Review: The lake doesn't smell great and don't try to cross. We were helped across the road by a little old lady!Hyderabad is not designed for wandering around on foot.

Name: TravelbuggIndia
Title: Tank Bund
Review: Tank Bund is a nice area to roam around with friends on a bike and chill. There are multiple street food outlets in this area.

Name: Rukitha sree
Title: Heart of Hyderabad
Review: Tank bund is water storage tank but very huge and deep.The famous aspect of Tankbund is The Buddha statue which was set in the mid of the tank.Near Tankbund you will find N.T.R garden, lumbini park.Eat street, Necklace road,love Hyderabad boarding, Indian National flag

Name: Krishna Sandeep Siram
Title: Nice Place
Review: Tank bund is meant for the statues and It is filled with Greenery and the best time to visit is night.

Name: moogul818
Title: Good place for an evening stroll
Review: Tank Bund makes for an interesting place to visit in Hyderabad. It connects the two twin cities; Hyderabad and Secunderabad. It also dams the Hussain Sagar Lake, which has the famous monolith of Gautam Buddha in the middle. The place is popular for 33 bronze statues of famous people of Andhra Pradesh and Telangana in the area around.   The wonderful view of Hussain Sagar Lake from Tank Bund attracts many visitors, especially in the evenings. There are several quite spots along the Tank bund where you can spend a while just enjoying the breeze and the view.

Name: Rock
Title: It is one of the nice place
Review: Tank bund is located in Hyderabad.I have visited this thrice.This is one of the most beautiful place to visit during evening time to enjoy boating and also you can visit place near to this.

Name: Sudheer P
Title: tank bund
Review: its a beautiful lake road with art and sculptures of great leaders. nice place to relax any time of the day

Name: KRAMA200
Title: A Nice Place to stroll
Review: Tank Bund is the main Artery connecting Hyderabad and Secunderabad. The Place has been developed as a Tourist Spot with Statues of Famous Personalities of Andhra. Nice to stroll in the morning or evening. You can canoe or do boating also if you desire.The Time you spend depends on Time available with you

Name: ravi g
Title: Nice for a leisurely walk and some water sports
Review: Nice place for a leisurely evening walk. There are food joints and parks around, so its a good outing option. For those who love some adventure then there are water sports activities also. Do take a boat ride to Buddha Statue located in the middle of the lake.

Name: ANU
Title: NICE
Review: There it's nice to spend in the evening...i went with my friends and had a good memory,anybody can visit...

Name: kaliprasadm2016
Title: too busy for a walk
Review: Morning walk on the tank bund is a good thing.It stinks but. Dont sit on the benches . they are used by people to sleep on and not hygienic

Name: Kiran555
Title: Happy visit to Tank Bund, Hyderabad.
Review: We all reached at Tank Bund by evening and we really enjoyed the beauty of ring road.There my young children took photo shoot and selfies.statue is very nice.

Name: Mahesh M
Title: Ganesh visarjanam
Review: I was pleasure to write this review because I don’t have words to explain at this time Ganesh Chathurthi is most memorable festival in Hyderabad there is a lot of Ganesh idols but most of these kirathabad Ganesh idol so friends u must have to visit tank bund in 11 day visarjanam . JAI BOLO GANESH MAHARAJ KI JAI

Name: sree143in
Title: visit must
Review: tank bund area is a very nice place bcoz you may see here all great people statues along with his every details. childrens will learn alot of abouth the all leaders and great personalities.

Name: ChennaiShaji
Title: The tank bund road has an excellent view of the lake and the city around
Review: A good place to just visit and roam around a bit, relaxing. A good view of the city that has grown around it

Name: jainms
Title: Best view
Review: Best view of hussain sagar lake and Buddha statue, also find few other visiting places near tank bund.

Name: Gaurav G
Title: Stinky and smelly
Review: Although the view looks great from a distance, the reality is very harsh when you see the lake and smell the surrounding air. It stinks horribly and it is a suicide point so you never know how many people jumped from the railing you are holding. it needs a lot of maintenance and a tight police watch 24x7.

Name: Vanitha Reddy
Review: Loved this place visited early mornings. Enjoyed a lot with photo shoots and nature.i visit regularly.

Name: SRIKAKOLAPU
Title: must see
Review: This is the place to go to enjoy the necklace road and it has good name and hussain sagar is also nearby.Has lot of things nearby to look for

Name: TravelEnthusiast
Title: Tank Bund is a beautiful place to relax and feel peace
Review: Tank Bund is one of the free hangout place that you can spend with your loved ones and family for free of cost. I mean there is no entry fee. In the early morning you won't find much traffic and you can see great people's statues that inspire you alot. You will also find many people walking, jogging, doing their exercises and simply meditating in the Musi river banks. It's a quite place in the morning during the sunrise 🌅. You can also enjoy the evening sun set here. Watching great Buddha statue. Love this place alot. You will also find many people feeding peogeons with grains. That was really interesting. I it would be nice if Telangana Govt takes action to purify this water. So the that the people can also enjoy the fresh air.

Name: rohit706
Title: good place for evenings
Review: Its nice place to spend evenings with family with lot of crowd. lake is clean but still looks interesting

Name: Mukta2016
Title: Tank Bund Road
Review: The Tank Bund Road runs along the main lake in Hyderabad and is a very popular place for locals to hang about. The sides of the road have been developed and beautified to make good seating arrangements with statues of famous personalities and a few eateries. Overall a nice place to spend some time in the evenings.

Name: Niya1315
Title: Nice
Review: It is a nice place near the Necklace road. I visited this place for an evening stroll. Good eateries are there near this place.

Name: idea614354
Title: Tank bund road
Review: Tank bund raod in hyderabad we can a lot of great mans like freedom fighters, writeres, national leaders and many more.

Name: Ashish Reddy
Title: Peace ✌️
Review: One can enjoy roaming around the city and we can capture the beauty of nature and ourselves. Full to time pass loved it❤️❤️

Name: rahman s
Title: Nice place for evenings
Review: Been here with family, nice place to sit in the evening time. Have boating facility here, water have bad smell

Name: siv2015
Title: Loved it!
Review: This was an amazing place - we did the speed boat ride too. If its not in the hot summer months I would recommend this place for couples, families or solo travelers.

Name: saivarma
Title: Superb
Review: Beautiful place to spend the time with friends.And one of the greatest one in Telangana (Hyderabad).You can easily found this one from very far. Easy to found the location through the bike also.Boating facilities are available. Buddha statue looks too good.If someone is feeling alone, if they goes to this place they will feel better.Best suitable word for this place Is, place of peace.

Name: Noor Ali Abbas
Title: Statues Road
Review: Tank Bund Road is a part of Necklace Road which runs along the eastern side of the heart shaped Hussain Sagar Lake. The road looks beautiful with a long stretch of lush green lawns and trees. There are more statues of famous personalities along the road. Among those statues, Swami Vivekananda's is a notable one. Major parks along the Tank Bund Road are Lumbini Park and Indira Park. Most of the government and private banks are on this road. It is one of the commercial roads which connects Hyderabad and Secunderabad. Sailing Club, Snow World and Youth Hostel are also here. View of Buddha Statue looks awesome from this road. This road has the Hussain Sagar boating point of the lake which is inside Lumbini Park.

Name: mahareddy v
Title: This is one of the beautiful place in Hyderabad.
Review: Hussain sagar is now a tank bond this new name Beautiful place to spend the time with friends.And one of the greatest one in Telangana (Hyderabad).You can easily found this one from very far. Easy to found the location through the bike also.👍

Name: MUKKU S M R S
Title: Tank Bund Road
Review: It connects the twin cities i.e.Hyderabad and Secunderabad with Great views and statues of saints, Political Leaders and Cine Artists and Freedom fighters of india

Name: Nisshant
Title: Important milestone
Review: I get to know this since my hotel was on this road only. On one side you have hussain sagar lake and on the other you have a joggers park.Good for morning & evening strolls.

Name: ROBERTS ROSHAN M
Title: Average sight seeing
Review: I used to travel on Tank Bund earlier. But now the charm of Tank Bund is decreasing. It has been changed few times.

Name: ramakrishnabanoth3
Title: Spacious Place to view
Review: Place to view the statue of Budha in the middle of the hussain sagar lake and can have fun for any celebrations with friends.

Name: 73prashantha
Title: favourite place for all Hyderabadis
Review: this is to be a favourite place for all Hyderabadis. ther eis no single person in Hydaerabad who doent recognise tis place.

Name: Dilip kumar
Title: Must visit place in hyderabad
Review: Every tourist person will visit this place when coming to hyderabad and will surely feel the greatness of it.

Name: 1Jayanthi
Title: Connect of twin cities
Review: This road connects the twin cities of Hyderabad and Secundrabad. Used as a picnic place in the evenings. There are many many statues of mostly Telugu leaders/artists/freedom fighters etc.

Name: sravan s
Title: picnic place
Review: Hussain Sagar was built across a tributary of the river Musi river in 1563 by Ibrahim Quli Qutub Shah. The lake was named after Hussain Shah Wali, who helped to design it.

Name: venkatakarthik
Title: nice place to hangout and stretch your legs
Review: nice and calming place to walk in the evening and keep out place in the afternoon unless you want to feel the sun at its fullest, harder to find a cover in the afternoon. overall enjoyed the walk and the company of my friends

Name: muthukrish2000
Title: Hyd - Sec
Review: This is the place connecting Hyderabad and secunderabad. Nice spot. We visited here evening for local shopping. Nice hangout place.

Name: rastha2001
Title: Iconic promenade connecting the twin cities of Hyderabad and Secunderabad
Review: The tank bund in the heart of the city connecting the twin cities is s great place for an evening stroll or just riding past. But the water of the Hussain Sagar lake can at times give out such a stench that it's unbearable to be anywhere around that area. The Buddha statue and boating from Lumbini park and activities there are added attractions. Must visit for any visitor to the city

Name: Sai B
Title: Heart of Hyderabad
Review: The view is great as it covers both the twin cities. It is also a good place to hang out all day as it has restaurants, parks, malls and multiplexes.

Name: rajendra p
Title: Don't forget to take selfie
Review: We are enjoyed a lot on weekend. But we forgot to take selfie at I love Hyderabad symbol. Had a great time with lots of fun

Name: Santosh1959
Title: nice place for an early morning walk or jog
Review: Ideal to finish your jogging and walking in the morning before the traffic picks up. nice greenery and good view of the lake. Difficult to cross the road after the traffic increases

Name: Debasis
Title: Average place
Review: if you hear TANK BUND, you think its great place, but instead its a average place in Hyderabad. One side water storage, other side road, foot path, parks etc. nothing special about this place.

Name: parusharouthud
Title: Tank bund is a bund arround the tank Hussain sagar in Hyderabad
Review: The Tank bund is a bund arround Hussainsagar which is having a unique lord Buddha statue. There are number of memorable people, who were great stalwarts .

Name: suresh n
Title: Beautiful  place and historical place
Review: Connecting Hyderabad and Secunderabad, Tank Bund is a popular hangout of the city. Promising its visitors with a breath taking view of the lake and its monolith of Bhudda in the center, it dams the Hussain Sagar Lake.This area showcases not just one or two but 33 bronze statues of various popular figures of the state such as of Sri Krishna Devaraya, Nannaya, Tikkana, Erra Pragada and many more.To its south it has Secretariat buildings, the NTR memorial, the Lumbini Park, and the Hyderabad boat club while to its north it has the Sanjeeviah Park, Hazrat Saidani Ma Saheba tomb, and the Secunderabad Sailing Club. Its prime location makes it even more attractive.

Name: Trending T
Title: One of the best place in hyderabad
Review: Thi place has been taken care by telangana government. KCR has made it to keep the longest indian flag hoisted everytime here.Must visit place.

Name: Brad P
Title: Neat place
Review: We had a great walk along this scenic area with statues of the famous writers, etc from Hyderabad on one side and the lake on the other. Crossing the street was quite an adventure so plan ahead

Name: Rajesh_in
Title: Nice place by the Hussain Sagar Lake
Review: Tank Bund is a nice ,busy place by Hussain Sagar Lake and had lot of food joints, parks, sitting area . You get nice view of the lake & Buddha Statue. it's one of the most frequented places by the locals and visitors alike.

Name: bh s
Title: Tank Bund
Review: Tank Bund which separates Hyderabad and Secunderabad,  statues were erected by late C.M of Andhra Pradesh N.T.Rama Rao.

Name: Devaa
Title: Only water body in heart of the city!!!
Review: Its always great to hang at this place dotted with all the attraction. Garden ,food court,Imax,rides and of course nice walking space.Even though too much traffic movement is here still this place always gets crowd.

Name: Georgio Valentino Rayala
Title: Great Place to Hangout around the Hussain Sagar lake
Review: I crossed this place many times while commuting after I shifted from Kolkata to Hyderabad and always wondered about all the statues that are there. So one fine day in February 2018 me and my friend after watching a movie at Prasads decided to explore this place.We took a cab and reached here and walked along the Hussain Sagar lake reading about the eminent personalities from erstwhile Andhra Pradesh state.They were installed during NTR's reign while Andhra and Telengana states were together. We could not see all the statues but they were interesting as they contained not only great rulers but also poets, social reformers and rebels like Alluri Sitharama Raju.After 20 minutes walk we decided to sit and there are places where people are hanging out. You can also see the Buddha statue and the giant Indian flag from this place. There are many vendors selling snacks and ice creams.

Name: Karthik Dasu
Title: Marine drive of hyderabad
Review: Though it is not on the same lines of marine drive in Mumbai.But reasonably a good place to visit in the evenings.

Name: SomnathKhaskel
Title: Lake view and walk ….
Review: If you are able to ignore the foul smell of the water then it’s a place to enjoy the walk and the view of lake along with the statue of Buddha.

Name: Sumitkumar_13
Title: Nothing special
Review: Tank Bund is not a special tourist spot. It will come across your commute and you can just see the area around from your car.

Name: Nirban P
Title: I Love Hyderabad
Review: And Tank Bund is one of the place in Hyderabad which i can visit anytime of the day, any day of the year! Just a short-drive around the Tank Bund road all the way through the Necklace Road will refresh you. BTW did you know that Necklace Road has the Only Mounted Police Battalion (and the PS)  there!!

Name: Daniel T
Title: Scenic place in the heart of the city
Review: Right in the middle of Hyderabad & Secunderabad lies this big water body, surrounded by a walk-through on both sides. Nice place for an evening walk or to spend time on weekends. Lots of activities happen around Tank Bund, be it Lumbini Park or Water front side.Be aware of notorious bike-riders, who can be mischievous on the Necklace road front.

Name: Lalitha G
Title: nice place to visit in weekends.
Review: its a very rush area in weekends. nice to visit this place with family. will also have benches to have relax and its good place to visit.

Name: Known Traveller
Title: Best place to see the view of Hyderabad
Review: Best place to see the view of Hyderabad, It is filled with Greenery and the best time to visit is night.

Name: 24x7TravellingBoy
Title: Evening hangouts at Hyderbad
Review: A nice place to hang out near the Hussein Sagar lake. A beautiful view with a little bit of photographic background. It is also a good driving place. Snow world and Indira park are at this road.

Name: Prem Fourhearts
Title: Truly Iconic Place
Review: Always a good place to hangout for all age groups, Has the Statues of Greatest Telugu People who have contributed to this land and their history written over ! Has A Garden Around and A Buddha Statue in the Center. A Good place to Jog and Ride Bicycle in the Mornings.

Name: Amanda W
Title: The lake is so full of sewerage, that a walk around it is unpleasant.
Review: The lake is no longer the attractive thing it possibly once was. Ít's heavily poluted, smells, and is generally unpleasant.

Name: smandal2858
Title: Tak Bund Road
Review: The tank bund road is in east side of Hussain Sagar Lake. The stretch have viewing points and there are several statues of famous and historical person.

Name: mahmoodkanji
Title: Interesting place to visit
Review: Hyderabad is a city of its own culture style and religion.Its worth going to see the old Nizam Style of living

Name: Kalakar
Title: Hallmark of Hyderabad
Review: This is 1+ kilometer stretch of TankBund road on the Hussain Sagar, that houses the walkways, viewing points one one side and Stature of famous historic personalities on the other side. On the side of the road, there are little green spaces for kids to play. While road will have very busy traffic, but dotted with few eatery stalls/carts.  We could manage a very short time on this stretch owing to busy traffic & parking shortages. Good for a short pass-by trip...

Name: Gaurab2017
Title: One of the tourist spots of Hyderabad undoubtedly
Review: Want to hang around with your family or life partner or friends with a misty evening with a backdrop of big lake then tankbund is the place. Do visit.

Name: fivestarholidays
Title: Disappointing
Review: The water was smelly and overall the place did not have fresh clean feel that it used to. Definitely needs attention and beautifying

Name: nikhil0210
Title: Popular
Review: This is a popular place which is looked up as division between Hyderabad and Secunderabad. But now a days it smells a lot.

Name: Aartichand
Title: Nice drive
Review: The best way to enjoy Tank Bund is to take a drive along it late evening. The peak traffic has eased and the surrounding area is well lit up. One gets a good view of the Buddha Statue. Also along the road there are some food stalls.

Name: Trips_for_Life
Title: Leisure ride and some good wind
Review: Nice place to go with family and friends. Beautiful view of lake on one side and all chat walas, icecrem vendors on other side. Its a happening place at weekends.

Name: Kainath
Title: Lake View
Review: You dont find a sea in hyderabad but yes this lake view at tank bund, it's ideal for a summer evening... After a sunny hot summer day, head to this place for some cool breeze and pocket friendly snacks.

Name: naiduks24
Title: full of water with foul smell
Review: the water receives in this pond from different places in twin cities and stagnate there, resulting very bad and could smell, the present Government of Telangana  making  excellent efforts to avoid dirty inside the water and some other measures are also taking with the help of experts, but I am sure if  same yardstick applies then it will one day become a paradise.

Name: pjanil1968
Title: Good place  to spend time
Review: This place is very good for spending evening with your family and kids.  Evenings are generally crowded. Parking is bit of problem.  Overall a nice place

Name: Durga S
Title: Tank bund
Review: Never miss sun rise and sunset of tank bund..where the water is simply floating with cool breeze and with beautiful view of Buddha statue.#heartofhyd #lovehyd #proudhydi

Name: WondererGuy
Title: Nice evening outing..
Review: If you want to have nice relaxed time with your family with good scenic view than this is a right place to be.

Name: Saikiran Rao
Title: Largest Monolith in the world
Review: Tank Bund road connects the two parts of the city Hyderabad and Secunderabad. It also dams one of the most popular sightseeing places of Hyderabad, Hussain Sagar Lake, which has the famous monolith of Gautam Buddha in the middle. This statue is said to be one of the largest monolith in the world. Breathtaking view of Hussain Sagar Lake from Tank Bund is breathtaking which also attracts many to the place. It is spectacular especially in night, when the lights around the statue are switched on.The place is popular for 33 bronze statues of famous people of Andhra Pradesh and Telangana in the area around. Some of these sculpture are of Sri Krishnadevaraya, Nannaya, Tikkana, Yerrapragada,Annamayya, Alluri Seetharama Raju, Raghupathi Venkataratnam Naidu, Molla, Tripuraneni Ramaswamy Chowdary etc. These statues were created in the memory of a few prominent personalities of the state including many renowned poets from Telugu literature, great writers, rulers, social workers and freedom fighters.These sculptures immortalize the incomparable efforts of these personalities in the development of not only their specific field but of entire human kind. Tank Bund even now reminds us of their great achievements, while humbling us at the same time. These sculptures are on both the sides of Tank Bund.These statues were erected by the former chief minister N.T. Rama Rao during 1987-88. Earlier the tank bund road used to be quite narrow and was widened in 1946. Later the place was beautified with the addition of many captivating statues and lush green gardens.Since its beautification, Tank Bund has become a popular site not only among the residents of Hyderabad but also among the tourists. People visit this place for a relaxed outing. Whether you are visiting with your family and kids, with a group of friends or partner, you will find it suitable for all the purposes.Nearby parks are perfect for family get together with varied playing options for kids. Tank Bund offers a suitable relaxed venue for couples to spend some quiet time with each other by the side of lake, away from the concrete jungle. Apart from that it acts as a common point for many popular sightseeing places.Tank Bund enjoys a good location. On the southern side of Tank Bund there are Secretariat buildings, the Lumbini Park, the NTR memorial, the Hyderabad boat club. While on its northern side, you have Hazrat Saidani Ma Saheba tomb, the Sanjeevaiah Park and the Secunderabad Sailing Club. Indira Gandhi Park is also located quite close to it. Secretariat and the state assembly are also located nearby. You can also plan a trip to Birla Mandir Hyderabad on the same day as your visit to Necklace Road.

Name: Sameena K
Title: LET US TRY AND KEEP OUR HUSSAIN SAGAR (TANK BUND) CLEAN.
Review: Friends, Hussain Sagar (Tank Bund) could have been rated 5 by all of us had it been kept clean.Tank bund could have been a beautiful sightseeing venue,had it been kept clean and well maintained As a teenager l used to do kayaking and rowing in Tank bund waters.l do have a lot of attachment for this water body, hence l feel saddened to see its water turned  into marshy green in colour with garbage litter thrown in the waters and  on the pedestrian's pavement.The beautifully carved statue's of our leaders and scholar's on one side of the Tank Bund road makes it more beautiful.The Buddha statue right in the middle of the waters and the erected lndian flag's beauty, waving it's tri colours to us adds on to its beauty but for the litter which makes me feel sad and dejected.IF WE AS INDIANS ALONG WITH THE AUTHORITIES TRY AND KEEP THIS BEAUTIFUL PLACE CLEAN, THEN IT WILL TURN OUT TO BE THE BEST PLACE IN HYDERABAD FOR AN OUTING.POSTING A PICTURE OF THE GARBAGE DUMP  ON THE PAVEMENT MEANT FOR WALKING.THANK YOU!IF YOU AGREE WITH ME, PLEASE DO NOT FORGET TO GIVE A THUMBS UP.THIS WILL BE MY INCENTIVE FOR CONTRIBUTING MY TIME IN WRITING GENUINE AND HONEST REVIEWS.

Name: Arun Karthik
Title: Divine Place
Review: ISKON is known all over for being some of the most beautiful, active, spiritual and religious centers in the country. One such ISKON temple can be found in the Nampally region in Hyderabad. The main deity in the temple is Lord Krishna. One can also see idols of Sri Gaura-Nitai, Sri Jagannatha Baladeva-Subhadra and Sri Radha Madana-Mohana. The temple carries out programs of Pujas and Aartis every day while on Sundays, special programs are organized.The architecture of this temple is magnificent. The steps of the temple have various halts that lead to further ends of the temple. By side, there are shops and beautiful fountains add to the spirituality of this shrine. Inside the shrine, the sight of idols makes one muse over the godly world. Draped with rich clothes and jewelry, the idols are decked with great delicacy and care. In the center hall, one can always hear the heavenly tune of Hare Rama Hare Krishna. Many devotional lectures and addresses are arranged for the benefit and spiritual nerve of devotees. Also known as Sri Sri Radha-Madana-Mohana temple at Nampally Station Road this temple serve everyone as a center of the cultural, spiritual, educational and social activities given to raise the lives of people here. The followers hold sessions in institutes, corporates, etc., to teach the techniques of spiritualizing daily life

Name: Bijan P
Title: Stay in Hyderabad ISKCON on June 2018
Review: Hyderabad ISKCON is in Abids. The temple is wonderful, the location to get the temple is little trcky but for local people it will be super easy. People who are outside from Hyderabad should ask taxi or auto drivers to take them to "Big Temple near to Abids Post Office" . The temple is quite old and it is one of a temple where Srila Prabhupada installed the deities personally. The temple is really serene and it provides spiritual connection while a person is inside the premises.The temple is hosting Radha Krishna, Gaur Nitai, and Jagannath,Baladev, Subhadra. All the Artis are good to see. I must recommend to go to Mangala Arti if you are in a near by place. Lot of in house and outside devotees come to the temple to do Mangala Aarti in the morning at 4:30 AM.  The temple is also having Govinda restaurant which serves different type delicious food starting from Lunch to Dinner. Lot of Snacks and other shops are also there which are purely vegetarian without onion and garlic. During lunch hour you will only be able to get North Indian and South Indian Thali. I would recommend people to have snacks and lunch if they are going to the temple in those timing as I found them tasty. All in all there is spiritual taste connected with good infrastructure and eating areas. I have given 4 as it is little difficult to find else the place is wonderful. I suggest people should visit to the temple who are planning to halt in Hyderabad.

Review: ISKCON has been great in spreading Krishna awareness throughout the world. In Hyderabad , we have two such temple in India. This temple is in Abids area and relatively larger temple. You have a nice book stall and excellent Prasadam Counter. The Idols are fabulous and you can get divine feeling immediately. You can sit and meditate on week days. Weekends , relatively more people attend here.

Name: Rajani K

Review: This is located in a serene place. Like all ISKCON temples in India, this temple is a modern period temple. It is white colored and beautifully architected.  The prayer schedule here involves aarti in evening and morning. We participated in the morning aarti. Aarti includes singing Krishna bhajans, hymns, mantras chanting and even dancing to the tune of music. It was a heart touching and wonderful experience.

They organise special festivities on the occasion of Janmashtami, Rath Yatra etc.Parking is bit of a problem
