Name: Anisha N
Title: Temple
Review: Its a  krishna temple from ISKCON group .. same as any other ISKCON in other cities.. go for bhajans and offering prayers when tired have chat food outside

Name: PankajKumarSingh
Title: Nice place to connect with Lord Radha and Krishna to their devotee.
Review: Only one line to say. This place is very good where people can submerged themselves in Lord Radha and krishna. This place also provide the peace of mind.

Name: NIDYAD
Title: PEACE
Review: No words can describe this place. Its a place where u can relax and find peace.don't miss the food is too guuuudddddd. :)

Name: lankavignesh
Title: peaceful radha temple
Review: the temple of lord krishna is very peaceful and i like the food in the temple it is very tasty and a good place to visit.

Name: Abhijit C
Title: Isckon guest house..best place to stay in Hyderabad
Review: we stay in Isckon guest house which is just beside the temple in the same building...rooms are excelent..we booked dbl ac dlx room @1500 only..you can book the room by phone in advance...non ac rooms are also available at 500/700/1000...for food we found an excelent resturant (hotel Grand) at a walking distance...southindian breakfast will be available in their own resturant "govindas"

Name: KS_Trip2014
Title: Great place to visit ISKCON
Review: Good place to visit. Srila Prabhupad himself stayed at this temple. Great kirtan, food restaurant also available.

Name: santosh2ind
Title: Iskcon temple
Review: This is beautiful temple in hyderabad. lord krishna radha and gopikas are very beautiful. every one have to visit this tempe.

Name: shirishasantosh
Title: Iscon temple
Review: This is very beautiful place to visit in hyderabad. lord krishna. radha and gopikas are very beautiful.

Name: indiragogineni
Title: Good
Review: The kitchen in ISKCON is by far too good...well maintained and hygienic...but the Hyderabad premise is not as clean as the one in Chennai.

Name: gouthamkatangur
Title: Great vegetarian food
Review: We can be sure of good quality food as ISKN folks cook food as if it is prasad they offer. You will get great tasting vegatarian food. Great place

Name: shivareddy2209
Title: go and get some peace
Review: It is a place where lord Krishna is Worshipped .Also we will get peace and calm when we visit it.you will Enjoy if your a krishna devotee

Name: sanjay v
Title: Nice temple with lot of peace to offer
Review: This is nice temple and very quite in middle of all crowdy places. Go for it when you are not peaceful and for sure you will get peace and smile

Name: jainneha
Title: Iskcon
Review: This is a beautiful temple of lord Krishna .it is huge and built like a magnificent temple .it is an experience in it self .

Name: Anand R
Title: Amazing to visit to Lord Krishna Temple
Review: its really wounder full designed  temple at Abids centrally located  in Hyderabad  people dost none the exact place of krishna temple but it tooo ISCON TEMPLE

Name: Xavier D
Title: Buddha statue
Review: The statue is situated at the middle of Hussain sagar. It is illuminated at night and looks more beautiful.

Name: OctOriental
Title: Colourful at night
Review: An identifier of Hyderabad. The Buddha statue in the middle of the lake is accessible by ferry. At night it is illuminated in multiple colours. You get 10 minutes to hang out there and take pictures before your ferry returns to base.

Name: Abhijit Naik
Title: Masterpiece
Review: It's amazing to see this beautiful statue built in the centre of the lake. The changing lights in night time make it a must to visit place in your Hyderabad trip.

Name: Vaishnavi_g
Title: It was Ok
Review: Visit to Buddha statue in the middle of Hussain Sagar lake was Ok Ok kind. You can visit once and spend few mts  there. The carvings in the front are done meticulously. But looks like the sculptors either were not given enough time, or were not interested, as the carvings on the other three sides didnt have a proper finishing. Overall it was Ok. And you can visit once.

Name: Mayank G
Title: Good Place for boating and Hangout
Review: This  huge Buddha statue located in the center of Hussain Sagar lake and central attraction of this place you can reach by boat and take a photographs over there.

Name: Abhay Mehta
Title: Prefer to go in the evening
Review: The standing statue of Lord Buddha in the mid of Hussain sagar lake gives a very good view. You can enjoy the place by taking a boat.  I will recommend you to go in the evening for better experience and enjoyment.

Name: Awadesh Sharma
Title: Peace of mind
Review: An architecture marvel this tallest Buddha statue in India is  carved out from a single piece of rock Due to less space , I would not recommend you to go in peak hours i.e just before Dawn & on Sundays too Beautiful place And indeed peace of mind achieved

Name: harish.s
Title: Great
Review: Absolutely amazing...But the best time to visit is November to jan...In march it starts to get hot and humid..Better to visit in early morning or just after sunset

Name: Sunil
Title: Crowded palce
Review: The place is very famous for Buddha statue and the water lake. Usually this palce is highly crowded and its advised to plan accordingly

Name: Kaushik G
Title: Beautiful giant statue
Review: A giant statue of Lord Buddha is located on an island in the middle of the vast Hussain Sagar Lake and we had visited the same during our sightseeing in Hyderabad. We had gone in the evening and the giant statue was lit up in different colors creating a visual treat. There were small fountains in front of the statue and everyone was busy clicking pictures and selfies with friends and family.

Name: Ratan
Title: Fresh
Review: After all day long busy and tiring trip to Golconda fort , the visit to Hussain sagar was a real refreshing one with fresh air and very beautifully managed Lumbini park.

Name: Jaykann
Title: Standing tall inside the lake
Review: Must to activity in town. Boat drive if 5 minutes from the park. They have different options of boat safari inside the lake which takes around the lake. You can get down if you take ferry option and can take back to go back. Statue stand tall inside Hussain Sagar lake. Looks beautiful with lights in the night. You can spend 20 to 30 minutes inside.Usually crowded during evenings and weekends.

Name: siv2015
Title: Worth the trip
Review: We took the motor boat over there and it was a superb trip! The wait was not bad at all. The statue really stands out - it is the largest statue of buddha in the world that was created from one piece of stone. It has a nice calming effect on you. You do not want to miss adding this to your trip while in Hyderabad.

Name: Abhishek S
Title: Good view
Review: This is a Buddha statue situated in centre of Hussian Sagar lake in Hyderabad.Its near the Birla Temple.One can take photos here.It also has a separate lane for strolling.Visit here in the night and enjoy lighting and street food

Name: PKB
Title: Very Nice
Review: Its so nice to be there. very peaceful environment, little far from the city. Many birds, clean area. Superb

Name: Scarlet Fernandes
Title: Buddha statue
Review: Beautiful statue of Buddha in the middle of Hussain Sagar. One can see it clearly, while crossing from Hyderabad to Secunderabad by bus or by car. Need more of plants and flowering trees around.

Name: nomadic_heart7
Title: wonderful statue
Review: A huge statue in the middle of Hussain Sagar lake..one can enjoy the boatr ride to reach the place and watch sunset too

Name: Vikas Singh
Title: Iconic statue
Review: Carved out of single slab of granite this 58 feet statue is the biggest monolithic statue of Buddha in the country. Take a mechanized boat ( tickets cost only Rs.50) from Lumbini park to alight at the Gibraltar rock on which the statue stands. There is a nice walkaway around the statue. Fees for cameras are a steep Rs. 1000 but you can take pictures with your mobile for free! You get to spend ten minutes here before the boat takes you back to the park.

Name: Sundaresh
Title: A place to visit and wonderful monolithic Statue
Review: Lord Buddha statue is a gem in the crown. A very beautiful place located in center of Lake. A joy rid by boat to reach and walk around. A best place to experience sunset

Name: Gorgan
Title: NOT ALLOWED! NOT ALLOWED!
Review: "Not allowed! Not allowed!" has become one of the most popular Indian mantras in recent times. It is chanted whenever a tourist carrying his camera is about to enter the site. Fortunately there was a cloak room where I could temporarily store my camera otherwise I would have been asked to pay a 1000-rupee fee. The same mantra was repeated to me at the entrance of other two parks but in those cases there were no cloak rooms. As a result I had to give up on them otherwise I would have been charged 2000 rupees.It's hard for me to understand what is wrong in taking pictures of a Buddha statue, or gardens or the Indian flag or whatever. With that being said it was nice to take the boat to visit this landmark in Hyderabad.

Name: Indusman248
Title: Quick visit with Spouse during daytime
Review: We took a speed boat and the entire experience took less than 20 minutes - from entrance to exit. They don't let you embark near the Buddha Statue for prayers of anything else. One just takes a boat and encircles the Statue and Returns. Walk around the Lake can be recommended and the Administration needs to build this attraction more experiential with Meditation and Cafes.

Name: BKTX
Title: Serene place
Review: Beautiful and serene. Statue and surroundings looks magnificent in the evening when the place lights up. A must visit when in Hyderabad.

Name: HONEY
Title: Better for spend time
Review: It is a better place to spend some time and enjoying boating.Boating facility is available here and also best place for photography.

Name: jainms
Title: Nice
Review: Good one and very scenic. There is a chance to improve more Here when it comes to maintenance, boating in the evening available here from lumbini park entrance.

Name: iti_94
Title: normal lake with a statue in the middle
Review: we went there in the evening and since it was a weekend it was too crowded.we took a ride in a big jetty and they dropped us at the buddha statue .the whole lake was filled with lights and the statue was also illuminated.There was another jetty where popular songs were playing.But there is nothing special about the lake.There was a light and sound show which we skipped and also there were some rides

Name: Eshita Shah
Title: Most visited place in Hyderabad
Review: Buddha statue has become the most important place to visit for tourists in Hyderabad.It is in the middle of Hussain Sagar lake. You need to catch a ferry to reach there.

Name: moogul818
Title: Worth a Visit
Review: You can see this  60 feet statue in the middle of the Hussain Sagar Lake while driving down the tank bund. It is even more eye catching at night. It is worth a visit during your boat ride on the Lake. Combine it with your outing to the aquarium and eateries along the tank bund.

Name: vishal
Title: Review
Review: Nothing great about the lake it actually stinks. seems it accumulat drain water of near by areas. Statue is marvelous you have to take a launcher/ boat to reach the location

Name: Mittal28
Title: Statue is very nice
Review: We have to go by boat till statue.Statue is awesome..you can click pics there..evening lights are superb looks amazing..do visit once

Name: LostMySelfTraveling
Title: Peaceful place to sit and enjoy the visit evening in Hyderabad
Review: Once it was a great place to spend in the evenings with friends and loved ones. But now sitting on the hussain sagar Bridge and spending time watching the sun rise or sunset. But nowadays this area is not cleaned properly. Even the water in hussain sagar is stinking. Once Hyderabad was so clean.. It's losing its charm.

Name: KRAMA200
Title: Budhdha Statue in Husain Sagar
Review: The Budhdha Statue made out of Single Monolith Roch and installed in Husain Sagar Lake is an attraction worth viewing. Youi can go by Boat from Lumbini Park side. The Ride is pleasant .The Statue is best viewed in Night

Name: sree143in
Title: Single Rock
Review: Buddha statue in hyderabad hussain sagar center placed. it is desigend in a single big rock. good attraction in hussain sagar.

Name: 59lifetravel
Title: very beautiful statue in the lake
Review: a lovely statue best enjoyed in evening with the lights display, and going to it by boat ride. short ride, but very enjoyable.

Name: Amashnee S
Title: Peaceful
Review: Visited Hyderabad for a conference in November 2019 and was pleased to have viewed the Buddha Statue situated in the centre of Hussein Sagar Lake. It was one of the sights that I specifically wanted to see during my trip and I was not disappointed. It is a beautiful statue and well worth visiting.

Name: R0hit171
Title: Nice place to visit
Review: To reach the statue you need to take a boat ride which costs around Rs. 55 per head. Clean place, kids enjoy a lot, there are ice cream stalls to enjoy. Once you reach the statue you can click photos in front of statue where the lights keep changing colourfully and excellent view.

Name: sophieLondon
Title: Lake is filthy
Review: This looks beautiful lit up in the evening and it is worth taking the boat trip to island at least once to get an idea of the scale. Unfortunately the lake that it sits in is filthy. It was an irony that, along side signs of Telugu tourism are piles of litter and rubbish in the water.

Name: Sunil
Title: Hussain sagar
Review: This place is very famous and many people recommend to visit as an tourist. The place is very nice and on the way to railway station you can witness the Buddha statue

Name: Mangala M
Title: Maintenance
Review: Very well constructed. One has to go near it to view it well but once you get nearer, you will be able to notice that it's not  maintained well...gives the impression that ever since it was made, it wasn't maintained! It's a pity such structures are not taken care of!

Name: dr.pragnesh Vachharajani
Title: A good place to visit
Review: Visit this in evening. Situated in the middle of Hussain Sagar lake . Need to take a boat ride of about 5 to 10 minutes. Looks great in evening due to lights. Statue is good. Typically needs half an hour to visit.

Name: Vishwas R
Title: Nice Scenic Statue
Review: Hussain Sagar is a necklace shaped lake in the heart of the city. It is quite a big lake spread over 5 to 6 square kms. A large monolithic white statue of Gautama Buddha stands on a Gibraltar Rock in the centre of the lake. This lake also separates Hyderabad from its twin city of Secunderabad. The water is not very deep though. Boating in the lake is available, entry for the same is from Lumbini Park. Buddha statue in the middle of the lake looks especially beautiful in the night with colorful illumination.

Name: Aayush G
Title: Lake view of tall statue
Review: In hussainsagar lake the view is beautiful. Hope the croud makes less noise and there were room to meditate on such beautiful location

Name: Gaurav G
Title: Good place but the lake stinks
Review: The buddha statue looks quite big from near but the surrounding water lake stinks terribly and there are leakages happening in the ground elevation where the statue is placed. Don't know when it will sink in. Not a lot of maintenance done by the authorities.

Name: Shailendra
Title: Buddha statue of Hyderabad
Review: The Buddha statue of Hyderabad is a prominent attraction in Hyderabad.One can visit the statue by boats ferrying to the statue. It looks exceptionally beautiful in the night.Worth a visit.

Name: AyushTravelGram
Title: Best viewed at night
Review: Buddha statue at Hussain Sagar is best visited at night.You can take a ferry organised by Andhra Pradesh tourism (Rs 55/person) to visit the small island and take beautiful pictures.Overall a great place to visit.Do carry water bottle with you for emergencies.

Name: RAJENDRA884 PRASAD
Title: Cultural Heritage of India seen here
Review: This statue depicts the ancient India's cultural heritage, symbol of peace, which is visited by tourists round the year.

Name: Ajith R
Title: NICE
Review: I was fortunate enough to live in tbe city of Hyderabad. A city that never sleeps and serves food to please your palette. The Budha statue is situated in the middle of the Hussain Sagar Lake and you need to get to the statue taking a boat ride. Best times are evenings and the view of the city in the evening lights is just too good. The cold wind blowing through is amazing.

Name: VISHAL G DAGLI
Title: on the way visit
Review: hussain sagar is very old and well known as bhuddha statue nice place chilly climete in evening we can do boating speed bike ride in river and we can spend good time in this place this is in heart of the city secundrabad

Name: abrahamsuji
Title: Excellent place
Review: Must visit. Easy access from city. Ample parking space. Visit the statue by boat from the boat access point. Excellent relaxation.

Name: FaisalNM
Title: Something different in Hyderabad
Review: Getting to the Buddha statue is by boat from either Lumbini park or Husain Sagar Lake. It feels like a wanna be Statue of Liberty when you reach there.It's a different experience from the museums and monuments. We had teen children, they enjoyed taking pictures and selfies.I'd you have couple of days in Hyderabad to spend, then visit-if on a tight visit schedule, visit the museums and palaces first.

Name: ShvRm_Traveller
Title: Great Statue, average visit
Review: The site in itself is very beautiful, especially in the evenings. The Statue of Buddha stand on a small island in the middle of Hussain Sagar Lake. The tall statue is mounted on a pedestal and is visible from the shore. The island can be accessed by boat, which are available from the Lumbini Park. There are various types of boat services available on different payment options. The boat service makes the experience of visiting the island, ordinary.First of all, there was a long queue to buy the tickets, then the visitors had to queue to get on the boat. Later, there was also a rush to return from the island to the shore. Overall, this whole visit was quiet taxing.Best is to avoid going to the island and absorb the beauty of the statue from the shore.

Name: Anoop Vij
Title: ABODE OF PEACE RISING FROM THE MIDDLE OF WATER
Review: The towering statue of Gautam Buddha in the middle of Hussain Sagar Lake is a treat to spend time. The place is centrally located and is always lively with a swarm of people of all age groups.

Name: George Mathew
Title: Not worth
Review: Entry to lumbini park : 20Camera : 100Boat to statue 55It does not worth to spend this much money

Name: vmsatheesh22
Title: Good
Review: Just visited here to spend few minutes, good to see the Buddha statue, place also superb, crowded area

Name: jainms
Title: Very Nice view
Review: We can get the best view from tank bund road. Must visit place in Hyderabad located in Hussain sagar lake.

Name: HARISH
Title: toooo good
Review: buddha statue in tank bund ....you can visit via boat available in lumbani park with a nominal fee..

Name: HONEY
Title: Huge statue
Review: Buddha statue in Hyderabad.It was a quite huge and look good in the night lights.you can see this in Hyderabad.

Name: NIL_MODI
Title: Cool & Calm
Review: Budhha statue is in middle of Hussain sagar lake. Boat is availabe to reach there. During evening or early night this is the best place to roam around. NTR garden is very near.

Name: Debasis
Title: Calm and beautiful
Review: You have to take boat ride of 15-20 mins to reach to the statue situated on the lake.Very well carved and beautiful.We enjoyed our time over this place for about 30 mins.

Name: Rajesh Choubey
Title: Good place to spend your evening
Review: Buddha statue situated in the middest of Hussain sagar lake and we require boat to reach there which are available in plenty out there. its a very good place to spend your evening in the lake and enjoying surrounding.

Name: SRIKAKOLAPU
Title: excellent view
Review: This place is known to people around the world and gives a identity to hyderabad.Situated in the hussain sagar lake its worth seeeing

Name: Vin Dosa
Title: One of the best things in Hyderabad
Review: The view during Sunset is just beautiful. The statue right in the middle of Hyderabad and the Hussain sagar lake is just worth the watch. While the place itself is not huge, it is definitely that gets Hyderabad on the World Map and kudos to the folks who got this done.

Name: Abhilash K
Title: Big statue
Review: This is one of the big statues available around the word. It is a single piece rock statue. It was laid by NTR Garu.

Name: Dr I R Patil
Title: Good place
Review: Visited in the evening you can go boat, nice place to spend some time with family, big statue, good lighting arrangements.

Name: LostMySelfTraveling
Title: Peaceful place to sit and enjoy the visit evening in Hyderabad
Review: I can't forget this place as we used to sit and enjoy the silence in the evening after class or office hours. after so many years I had been to this beautiful place. But I feel that Tankbund has lost its beauty because of non maintainance. But still it is attracting many tourists and local people. I don't know why people don't know why Telengana Govt doesn't take care of the cleanliness. Hope to see the beauty and glory again.

Name: Vanessa H
Title: Just another buddha
Review: That sounds terrible but for me it was just a buddha. A gigantic one though, so that was amazing. But nothing more than that.

Name: S R V
Title: I stand alone
Review: Buddha statue amidst Hussain Sagar Lake is a wonderful sight if one goes around the Necklace Road. It is more so after dusk. Lighting the lake and bund is a wonderful sight to see.

Name: Soumyajit Saha
Title: Lord Buddha Statue
Review: Lord Buddha Statue is located on the Hussain Sagar Lake in Hyderabad. It is spectacular to look at especially at night with the lightings all around.

Name: satyam t
Title: Place for Pleasant Evening Experience
Review: This Buddha Statue situated in Hussain Sagar Lake is a brilliant example of Indian Sculpture.Craft in a Single stone will mesmerize you.Pleasant atmosphere along with cool breeze will take all your tiredness.

Name: Mukta2016
Title: Famous Landmark
Review: The Buddha statue in the middle of Hussain Sagar Lake is a major landmark in Hyderabad. We saw the statue in the evening and it was very well lit and beautiful.

Name: Niya1315
Title: Center of the city
Review: Buddha statue is a prominent landmark in the centre of the city. It can be viewed from many parts of the city. However, the best way to explore is to visit a small island in Hussain Sagar by a ferry.

Name: Santosh K
Title: Awsome view
Review: This statue is situated in the lake and gives great view with lights in night.So must visit and recommended for all.

Name: mohan
Title: Sense of Calm!!
Review: The statue can be seen from any of the popular places near by(Birla mandir, Lumbini Park etc). With light and evening its gives a sense of peace to spend some time watching it. There is boating from Lumbini Park to the statue.

Name: TravellingReddy
Title: Must see place in the evening
Review: A visit to Buddha statue should be a part of your plan as this gives great views of a single monolithic statue kept in the mid of the lake. Changing light colors and the cruise that takes there is also an experience to feel and see.

Name: Pallav D
Title: A lake within a city
Review: It is rare to have a lake within a city, and the buddha statue in the middle of the Hussain sagar lake is a site to see. You take a boat to the statue, get pictures clicked and spend some quality time.

Name: NG
Title: Ordinary
Review: Water very dirty in the lake and statute did not impress. The same statute at Salarjung museum better.

Name: Arun Karthik
Title: Good Place to Hangout
Review: The creation of Buddha statue, which has been carved out of single stone, took close to 2 years. About 200 sculptors have worked endlessly to give birth to this marvellous sculpture. It has been carved out of white granite stone which was found on a mountainside, near Nalgonda, located about 40 miles from Hyderabad.Not many are aware of the fact that the Buddha statue in the Hussain Sagar boasts of being a holy pilgrimage as well. It was sanctified by the spiritual leader Dalai Lama himself in the year of 2006.This grand Gautam Buddha statue in Hyderabad owes its construction to then CM of Andhra Pradesh, Sri Late N. T. Rama Rao. The idea to create this monolithic statue of Buddha germinated from his visit to New York where he got inspired with the startling beauty of Statue of Liberty. It was after this visit, he showed keen interest to have a symbol which can stand for the opulence of our culture as well as represent the depths of our distinctive heritage.This statue is a result of the Buddha Purnima Project contribution, which was held in 1985. In the year of 1988, the statue was shipped to Hyderabad. Covering 60 km of distance, it was brought on a gigantic carriage, which had about 192 wheels. There were some troubles initially for mounting the statue. However, in the month of April in 1992, this captivating huge statue of Buddha was raised over the serene waters of Hussain Sagar Lake. Since then, it has been captivating visitors with its incomparable beauty. At the same time, the Lumbini Park with its famous musical fountains was also inaugurated.To reach the Buddha Statue, you have ferry service from Lumbini Park to the rock of Gibraltar, on which this statue stands. Although a sight worth capturing even from far, it is an enchanting experience to get a close look at the statue. You can also sit at Eat Street and enjoy the view with some mouth watering snacks.The best time to visit is evening. In evening, the statue is illuminated in different colourful lights. The sight of illuminated statue of Buddha, with just water all around it, is mesmerizing. It is something you cannot miss. The timings are from 8 am to 10.30 pm.Built in 1562, by Hazrat Hussain Shah Wali, Hussain Sagar Lake is spread over an area of 5.7 square kilometres, across a tributary of the Musi Rive

Name: PriyaMohan72
Title: Nice place to enjoy
Review: This is really pleasant place to enjoy. you need to take a small boat to reach this place. once you reach there, you will have nice experience.only issue is the smell of water in Hussian sagar while going by boat. you can go to this place from various points around the lake

Name: Dipesh Joshi
Title: Spend Sunday evening
Review: Visiting first Sunday of March 2019 as free time utilize. Nice place to visit with friends and family.

Name: Shashank R Misra
Title: intersting exoerience
Review: i happened to visit this on India Republic day i.e. 26th of Jan 2019 and the place was swarming with tourists....the day being a national joliday. the Statue itself is imposing ...but the lake can do with a bit of cleaning up

Name: Dilip kumar
Title: Best to visst
Review: All ican say  is this is the hyderabad pride and it represents the total city nature and you alaso have boating there

Name: Dhaval_B_Patel
Title: NICE PLACE TO VISIT
Review: I think this is one of the most visited place in hyderabad after Charminar & Museum., nice maintained park with boating facility (either Private boat or feri service), digital/dslr camera is not allowed in the park or you have to buy a ticket for use it in garden or Nr.statue...

Name: YatriForever
Title: Nice, if you get closer.
Review: This is now the #1 attraction in , on and around the Hussain Sagar Lake. I couldn't wait for long to do the boat ride to get closer to the statute, hence I had a view of this new icon of the lake from the road. But when I zoomed in from my DSLR, the statute was beautiful and brilliant; particularly with the sunset on the back.Will certainly be back on the boat soon.Highly recommended.

Name: Prasad
Title: A big statue
Review: While travelling from Hussain Sagar Goutama Buddha Statue is visible in the middle of Hussain sagar. So mamy visitors are here. Night time view also so good

Name: Saurabh A.Khandelwal
Title: view is nice but very bad odour in air
Review: statue is in the middle of water and you have to take a paid ferry ride to visit it. as you sit in the ferry the water bad odour will take you down and its really bad. basically water body is treated sewage of hyderabad. still can visit for a short span .

Name: nik c
Title: Worth a visit
Review: The Buddha Statue on Hussain Sagar is accessed via ferry from Lumbini Park on the southern shore of the lake.   It is well maintained and worth the visit.

Name: Vids63
Title: Not well maintained
Review: Its just ok, water stinks and no proper commutation as auto rikshaws ask for high fares. The childrens playing equipments are also not proper. You need to keep your baggage in cloak room.

Name: Ashish S
Title: Beautiful
Review: This was a Beautiful place. We liked this a lot. It was great to be over there along with friends. We liked the structure.

Name: ROTH
Title: a good place to visite  but the toillet  near the lack very bad condition
Review: i  bought  a ticket and tooke a boad to see the Buddha status  on the island, the ticket is very cheap  and i will visite this city again.

Name: Kartik K
Title: Bang in the middle of a lake
Review: Situated in the middle of India's largest man made Lake, the Hussain sagar, one has to take a ferry to reach there. It's a beautiful and calm Place,even better in the evening with the lights. But not necessarily a must visit place.

Name: Google
Title: Hyderabad City Tour Cabs Call @ 040-22992299 Best Sightseeing Cabs in Hyderabad
Review: As a part of Gautama Purnima Project, an enormous monolithic sculpture of Buddha was put in on Calpe – a rock within the middle of the lake and Lumbini Park was opened with gardens and watersports activities as well as boat rides to go to Gautama sculpture. Lumbini Park could be a pleasant place to get pleasure from the sunsets with stunning read of the promenade and also the Buddha sculpture Hyderabad city tour car rental Hyderabad tourist travel by car/cabs Sightseeing Cabs in Hyderabad Local City Tour Cabs in Hyderabad, Mehdipatnam, Hyderabad, Telangana.

Name: AnuradhaBernard
Title: Icon of the Hyderabad
Review: As per I believe, this is the icon of Hyderabad and worth to visit. This is an island located in Hussain Sagar tank. This tank has much older history than city. Premises are maintaining by Telangana State Tourism with highly appreciative manner. To go to the Island, you have to visit the Water Jetty. For that, first you need to purchase a ticket to enter the Lumbini Park. Lumbini Park entry fee is INR 20 per adult (foreign). And you need to purchase a camera permit if you use a Camera other than mobile phone. (Digital DSLR or any small or large camera).  It is cost INR 100 per camera. I went with my Digital mini Camera so i purchased. You have to keep your bags on bag counter and obtain a token too. Ferry Boat ride to the island (round tour) only cost INR 55 per person. and entry to island is free of charge. Boats leave on time schedule. and will wait for 15 minutes to your sight seen in island. once the tour ends within 15 min, boat will call to you to get back. Toilets are located in Lumbini Park just for INR 5 per use. Lumbini Park is great pleasure to children. In evening, lazer show also available. I had a pleasant experience in the morning. You can't get out from the entrance. You have to use exit at near toilets and passing over restaurants etc and back to main road, and need to walk to bag counter to collect bags. You can have good foods and shopping at cafes, restaurants etc at the exit of the Lumbini Park. All together ticket cost for two person was INR 260 (entry, boat, toilets and camera permit). Go in evening for more attractive view. Go in morning for avoid rush.

Name: rahman s
Title: Nice place to visit
Review: A nice place to visit specially in evenings, can enjoy more if we visit in winter evenings. can enjoy cool breeze

Name: Mohit Agrawal
Title: Local picinic spots
Review: The statue is situated in the middle of lake and you need to take a boat to reach there. It is a good place for an hour trip.Lake is very polluted and smells a lot

Name: RitaKakkar
Title: Majestic Buddha
Review: A ferry ride takes you to the Buddha statue, where you can look around for a few minutes and then return by another ferry or motorboat. They do not wait for the ferry to fill up, but start as soon as there are a few people on board. Very well managed by the Telengana tourism department. They are helpful, but the tourists are not. In spite of our age, they were pushing past us. Buddha stands tall and majestic, carved from a single stone.Nice shops and eateries when you return to the park.

Name: MSR
Title: Buddha statue, Hussain Lake, Hyderabad
Review: Legendary Telugu film actor turned in to politician Sri. N.T.Rama Rao, then Chief Minister of united Andhra Pradesh between early 1980s to late 80s conceived the idea of having something great deed in the lines of Statue of Liberty and chosen Goutham Buddha. Even today, one can able to see the granite besides Hyderabad to Warangal highway near Yadagirigutta location, the rock out of which the statue was made by Sri. Ganapathi Stapathi, a famous temple architect and expert in  sculptures. I still remember those years, how much sum was expensed to create 58 feet toll and about 400 tones of   monolithic sculpture said to be World’s tallest statue of Buddha. Even, still remember the pain staking journey of the sculpture from Raigiri to Hyderabad by expanding roads to reach the Hussain sagar lake. Even remember the accident occurred while erection of statue which had taken couple of lives and fallen in to lake. Later, it was salvaged from lake and brought to the shore of lake again by using high technical expertise the same was successfully erected on a massive concrete platform in middle of the lake after couple of years. And, still remember the ceremony of statue consecration by His Holiness Dalai Lama and then become one of the tourist attractions of Hyderabad. One can reach this island from Lumbini park by boats. To be frank, this lake water to be cleansed. One suggestion for all, being water around, be careful while visiting this place with kids.

Name: MUKKU S M R S
Title: Tankbund Buddha Statue
Review: The Buddha Statue located in Hussain sagar lake. Lot of Street food options available & only Boating experience is satisfied

Name: aagn76_arun_Trip
Title: Second visit
Review: Hussain sagar lake is dirty and smelly, Nothing much to see @ the statue, except the statue, Opt for the mechanised boat option only

Name: Mandar Jetly
Title: Only for Buddha Statue
Review: Good but crowded- Government should clean the lake.Laser show at lumbini garden was ok - There nothing much to do in Garden if you do not have small kids.

Name: Indranil B
Title: Very nice place for evening walk
Review: It's in the heart of city and in the evening you really enjoy the walk. Lot's of food options available.

Name: Dr. Santosh Raut
Title: Best evening view
Review: Very impressive evening view arong necklace road in Hyderabad. Boating experience is nice, budget friendly enjoyment

Name: Wandering Tales Travel Dreams
Title: Nice temple to visit any time of the year including Navratri time!
Review: Very nice temple to visit.  The idol of Peddamma Devi here is quite captivating.  Went there during Navratri time, early evening.  There was a lot of rush, however, the lines moved quickly and smoothly.  Parking is available onsite.  Well maintained considering the number of people that visit, especially during festival time.

Name: Global-Bhatakanti
Title: Local Devi temple in Hyderabad
Review: It's one of the small but famous temple in Hyderabad. Though not frequented by tourists it's popular with locals. There are 3 temples.located in the same compound. Temple closed at 8 pm. Parking charges 10 rs. For 2 wh and 15 for 3 wheeler.

Name: Michael P
Title: Mother of Mothers
Review: This is one of the mst popular temles n Hyderabad. The word "Peddamma", which consists of two separate words Pedda and Amma, literally mean 'Mother of Mothers' or "The Supreme Mother". She is one of the 11 forms of Village Deities and is known as The Supreme most. The main gopuram of the temple is currently being repainted.

Name: Surya Katakam
Title: 150 Years Old Temple
Review: This temple is located in Road No. 55 Jublihils, which is one of the famous Amman Temple in Hyderabad city after Secunderabad Mahankali Temple(Mahankali) This temple is 150 years old and came to popularity in the year 1993 after constructing Raja gopuram. Ex. MLA P Janardhan Reddy(PJR) personally made much improvement to this temple. The trust individuals done huge improvement in most recent couple of years. The other deities in the Peddamma Temple are Laxmi, Ganapathi, Sarasvati, and Naga Devata. Peddamma temple is also dedicated to Santana Laxmi, who sits on a lion. The major festival celebrated at the temple is Bonalu, which comes on Ashsda Masam in the month of June-July every year. On the day of Bonalu, women carry earthen pot decorated with neem leaves with turmeric and Kumkum. Devotees prepare food in the pot with rice, jaggery, milk, and curd. The earthen pots are carried as an offering to the Goddess. Second main festival is Rathotsavam in this temple, which happened for four days on Ratha Saptami Another main festival celebrate here is Mahotsavam. During all these  three festivals hue crowd will be there in this temple. Near By Attractions: 1. KBR National Park 2. Durgam Cheruvu 3. Jagannathan temple 4. Shilparamam Temple Timings:  Morning 06:00 -13:00 and Evening 15:00-20:00 (All days Except Sunday)  Morning 06:00 -20:30 (Sunday)

Name: Mutukuloju Pranay
Title: Temple of Great Hope
Review: Peddama temple is well occupied by the space and much precious for jathara like activities. Dasara festivals are well celebrated. bonalu unique festival in Telangana state is celebrated here too. kindly don't touch the poles while standing in the queue. the are not earthed may get shock

Name: VasantaLeela
Title: Devi's energy is grand and gracious
Review: Good access by public transport, sufficient parking and walking areas, Well organized premises and staff, and beautiful 'alankaaram' of the deity-- made this a heartful and happy  visit

Name: Govind Dev
Title: Famous Temple HYD City
Review: Peddamma temple is one of the famous temple located at jubilee Hills in Hyderabad. Good place to visit for sure

Name: suryaroyl
Title: Devotional
Review: Temple ambiance and the staff keeps the visitors happy, the space of the temple and feel good environment post darshan makes very happy. Instead of buying pooja items at temple for best price you could get it from outside.

Name: Vikas Singh
Title: Famous temple
Review: This is one of the popular and most visited temples in Hyderabad. The entrance tower of gopuram is very impressive. The temple itself is enclosed in typical Dravidian styled quadrangle. The Vimana is also impressive. There are a number of smaller temples within the same temple complex. The temple timings are 7 am to 12 noon and evening 4 to 9 pm. Photography is not allowed inside the temple complex. There is ample parking space

Name: sree143in
Title: famous
Review: A VEry Very famous tempel in Hyderabad for all people, every one must visits once in a life time who goes hyd.

Name: Dutt knvs
Title: Well maintained temple
Review: This temple is being maintained well and all Hindu festivals are being performed. This is a famous temple in Hyderabad, at the heart of the city. People believe that whatever you wish, the godess will give you. In festivals, people visit in to the temple at large. Daily people visit the temple from all over the State.

Name: Srinivas_63
Title: Visit as a Devotee only
Review: Many residents believe this place and goddess as very powerful and come here and give their offerings and perform pooja. The killing of goats and chicken in the name of of sacrifice/offering especially on Sundays is a bit annoying. The darshan arrangements are good but not a peaceful place like many other temples. Suggested only for people who believe in Peddamma Talli (Goddess).

Name: srinath
Title: good place for a devotee
Review: peacefull place with a parking place trust me every temple doesnt have parking lot....bt it does....impressed😊😊

Name: Sundaresh
Title: Pseudo Attulkal Bhagavathy Temple in Hyderabad
Review: The Temple is located  and well connected in Hyderabad.   The temple follows all rituals and all Pujas done satisfactorily. Everyday vedic mantras are read and very soothing to ears and heart.Prasada Puliyorah is offered and  affordable, very tasty and filling. Once a year food as prasad is offered to all devotees and every friday upto 500 devotees are offered lunch as prasad.

Name: Debasis
Title: Temple
Review: Whatever good I have heard about this temple, all became true when I visited this temple.Very nice and we'll maintained.Choose your visit time carefully to avoid rush or crowd.My visit was calm and devotional.

Name: rkirans
Title: Very calm and peaceful place
Review: It's one of those popular temples in Hyderabad and that too in prime area. It has a big car parking lot. Well organized Darshan queues for main deity Peddamma talli. There are other small temples for Naga devatas, Lakshmi mastha, Vigneswara swami and Saraswati maatha. The prasadam served is very good here.

Name: amitthecreator
Title: Peddamma Temple
Review: Peddamma Gudi is a very powerful temple and has a peaceful divine atmosphere attracting many tourists throughout the year. Distance of Peddamma Temple from various places of the city are listed here:Mehdipatnam [8 km]MGBS [13 km]Secunderabad [12 km]HITEC City [5 km]Punjagutta [7 km]

Name: KP Ram
Title: Amma Blessings
Review: Must visit place, have peddamma talli blessings. Near to peddamma temple there is metro station for easy reaching.

Name: Prashanth
Title: very vast temple
Review: People working here as well as priests working here have attitude issues.You can feel it as soon as you ask for any information or while buying the tokens or doing any poojas

Name: Karthik K
Title: Durga Mata Temple
Review: Ladies be sure to wear traditional dress as it was written on the entrance. if possible try to visit in the weekdays to avoid rush.

Name: beyondtravel
Title: Durga temple
Review: A 150 year old historic maari temple with huge premises and lot of devotees known for its customs.  We are lucky to visit during bonulu the flower festival and diety observant of shakambari avatar... Great place to be

Name: Akshay
Title: Nice place
Review: Powerful and famous goddesses temple in Hyderabad. No entry ticket its free darshnam. its around 8-10 KM from Hyderabad station

Name: RajeshKota
Title: Deity saving you all the time
Review: It's a huge temple with colourful art work all around. The Prime Deity - Durga Devi is very kind and merciful. The Pooja rituals are done with utmost respect and dedication. There is ample space for parking. Jai Bhavani!!

Name: jainms
Title: Peddamma Temple - Devotional
Review: Very good place to visit and it is peaceful. Many people travel from long distance to visit this devotional temple locate d in Jubilee hills Hyderabad.

Name: TravelbuggIndia
Title: Peddamma Temple
Review: Peddamma Temple is a great tourist attraction in Hyderabad. Do visit this place for peaceful and calm vibes.

Name: sanaser
Title: Famous Hindu Temple
Review: Peddamma Gudi Temple is a famous Hindu Temple is located at Jubilee Hills in Hyderabad city. My first visit to temple is quite impressive. The temple is dedicated to Goddess Laxmi. After entering inside the temple,there is a place where we observed that devotees place their coins vertically to make a wish and they believe that their wish will be fulfilled if they place the coin vertically. People come from various parts of the state in the festival season of Bonnalu which celebrated in the months of June - July in every year.

Name: crsarma
Title: Awesome temple of Mother Pedamma
Review: My first visit was way back in 1999 when we got our vehicle blessed by her at the temple. The priests are knowledgeable and polite. That was when Madhapur was developing the Hi-Tech way,My many  visits have reinforced the same feeling and added to the peacefulness despite being located in one of the busiest places in Hyderabad. The parking is good and its worth visiting. Avoid Fridays , Full moon days and festival days as there are a lot of devotees.

Name: Nagesh Eco Ventures
Title: Peddamma Temple
Review: Quite a cool and relaxing worship place. Visited here many times during my stay in Hyderabad. Namaskaram

Name: Rakesh
Title: Holy Place and popular temple
Review: the temple is in prime area, you may face traffic during office hours of any weekday or working daytemple has good parking facility.if there is rush dont worry take a darshan ticket of 10 rupees,bad part is they dont have proper facility to give tokens for prasad, you may feel Sun and hot if you go after 10 AM.

Name: pvrkaushik
Title: Popular temple
Review: This place is popular as its in prime jubilee hills and film nagar area.. Ample parking. Not a MUST VISIT kind... But a temple u can cover

Name: gkrishna10
Title: Darshan
Review: Famous temple of Gaddess peddamma. It's loacated near to peddamma temple metro station. We went twice and it's been great experience.

Name: S R V
Title: Holy Trip
Review: Went to this temple on 31st of march 2019. We were five families in all. The temple is a most sought after holy place in Hyderabad and our experience proved this. Heavy crowd being a Sunday but the arrangements were good and we could worship the Goddess within 15 minutes. Wonderful experience.

Name: reubenranjanfern2017
Title: Wow and holy.
Review: It is told to be one of the famous and holy temple in Hyderabad. Nice architecture though.  Nice pace to offer your prayers.

Name: Srinsiri
Title: Positive Vibe
Review: Place has awesome vibe. Super spacious and big parking. This is the lung space in jubilee hills area where you can see some open space

Name: SenapathiAmbika
Title: Temple of Durga Maa for Spiritual people
Review: We happened to visit the Peddamma temple when we came on some official work to Jubilee hills. Jubilee hills more famous by this temple.It was early hours of Friday so, there was less rush.The temple premises is Vast with the main Garbha Gudi and there were Maa Saraswathi, Laxmi and Nagadevtha  temples  also. There is a separate Bhavan for Annadhanam and Prasadam. The dharshan of main Deity sitting on Lion ie. "SIMHAVASINI " is really adorable. I could not take away my eyes from the Maathaas serene feeling touched my heart. We performed puja. A separate arrangement is made for people to perform kumkum archana,abhisheka etc. for fee ranging from 10 to 1000 Rs.         At the entrance of the temple near the mantapa, people place the coins making a wish. If the coin stands still  then it is said the wish will be fulfilled or else No.I could see the Mahima of Maa when I placed the coin and it was standing still. It was totally an exciting and spiritual  visit. A place worth visiting. Time 1 to 2hrs if on Fridays.Photography strictly restricted.

Name: Pooja
Title: Holy Visit
Review: Devotional Place... Forget everything and meet your own self in this temple... Accessible via public transport I had been there quiet a lot of times like every alternate Sunday and felt really revived after each visit

Name: NAZEER SHAIK
Title: very pleasant and devotional
Review: iam really happy by visiting this temple. me and my friend feeling blessed with this place and so happy

Name: Usha65
Title: Most adored religious place
Review: In Hyderabad there are plenty of religious places, but this temple is the most adored worshiping place. Many people believe that a visit to this temple gives lot of peace and prosperity, hence several people are seen visiting this temple. No wonder it is crowded most of the time. During the festival times, the decorations and celebrations are not to be missed.

Name: dwincherran19
Title: powerful temple
Review: very powerful temple must visit place temple in Hyderabad  you will be blessed and this is not a place to visit in hyderabad

Name: Satish Rao
Title: Must to See Place to get the blessings
Review: Peddamma temple is the must see place to get the blessings if you start any new business or would like to do any new job.Jai Peddamma Thalli

Name: nethis
Title: blessed
Review: one will feel blessed visiting peddamma talli. very famous temple in the city, one should visit without miss. festival season will be very crowded and takes an hour for darshan during peak hours. normal days will just take 15 mins.take the blessings of the goddess and you feel happy and peaceful.

Name: Dilip kumar
Title: Visited Twice
Review: This place has got its importance and will make your mind peaceful and can take you to the different world.Best to visit in normal days than festive days.

Name: chandrasekhar g
Title: Devotional place
Review: today visited peddamma temple.crows is more compare to week days.Darshan takes 25-40mins.For prasadam also it will take minimum 35-60mins.

Name: MUKKU S M R S
Title: Hindu Temple
Review: Located in famous Jubilee Hills area , I have visited this place multiple times. Famous religious place for Bonalu festival during season

Name: venkat k
Title: Holy place
Review: Famous in hyderabd. I have visited this place multiple times also i got my new bike puja here. This is located in banjarahilles.

Name: MSR
Title: Jubilee Hills Peddamma Temple, HYB
Review: Located in famous Jubilee Hills area and situated in sprawling area with ample parking place. Late Sri. P.Janardhana Reddy, Ex.MLA was a die-hard devotee of this deity and who played key role in developing this temple. A very famous religious place for Bonalu festival during season and visiting number of times.

Name: Sathish V
Title: Always enjoyed visiting this temple
Review: This temple is located in Banjara hills, with a nice parking and organised facilities. its always serene visiting this temple. Also easy commute available through bus and Metro.

Name: SandeepSaxena-IIP
Title: “The Durga Temple” peddamma Temple
Review: Peddamma Temple , located at Jubilee Hills Hyderabad, is a famous pilgrimage spot for Hindus. The word Pedamma is derived from two words Pedda and Amma, which means Mother of Mothers. She is worshipped all across the region and is among the 11 form of village deities. This temple must be visited during the festival season of Bonaalu,  which occurs during June–July every year. People from across the region visit this temple to offer their prayers to The Mother.  The two mega events namely Mahotsavam and Rathotsavam are also celebrated in February.All days of the week except Sunday6:00 AM - 1:00 PM3:00 PM - 8:00 PMSun6:00 AM - 8:30 PMIt's a good temple with all the devotees you get all the energy and you feel there is something over here which gives you energy.

Name: mighty7886
Title: Temple with good environment
Review: The temple is large enough to handle crowds during festivals and has a peaceful environment with all the required facilities.

Name: SoloMTraveler
Title: The Durga Temple
Review: Located prime place called Jubilee Hills in Hyderabad. A holy temple of goddess "Peddamma" (Durga). Very crowded on weekends.

Name: rockzzM77
Title: The Holy place
Review: This is holly place, nice place to visit with family,  this temple is crowded with the locals, but not so clean.

Name: Travel144090
Title: Nice to see temple that is in daily use by locals
Review: If you want to see the temple that is in daily use by locals this is the place. Crowded, not so clean. You will see some real god worshiping and some ceremonial activities. Interesting place to see.

Name: keshav AGARWAL
Title: Temple visit
Review: Temple is good.I first time visit here.There r soo many gods at a single place.I love the place .Here each temple had a pujari.who takes care of it.And we r not able to click the photos inside.There r soo many lodge near temple or station.Thank you for reading my review.I love travelling.

Name: SRIKAKOLAPU
Title: Nice temple
Review: It's a good temple with all the devotees you get all the energy and you feel there is something over here which gives you energy.

Name: Dilip kumar
Title: well known temple
Review: Must visit place in hyderabad for good sacried person and will make his mind peaceful and also this place has got its own importance.

Name: Shiva P
Title: No one is capable to rate the Temple.
Review: Visiting this temple since 2001 whenever I visit my heart is filled with love,effection and peace.My suggestion visit with ur family and get with all stuff like mutton,chicken ....and have fun.

Name: sravan s
Title: peaceful place
Review: the place is devotional and many people come from long distance here. it is one of the famous temple.. people comes to worship from long distances.

Name: Manidhar
Title: Telangana traditions display
Review: In Sravana masam ( August) and on Friday, there is huge crowd and takes time. you can see that devoteed bring in Bonams or cook food in the temple premises and offer a Naivedya to the deity - Peddamma ( Mother of Mothers/Big Mother

Name: manavpmp8
Title: Excellent temple
Review: Devotees are well taken care in the temple. Diety is very powerful. Staff are very courteous. Temple can waive car parking fee. Provide lights and develop the left out huge area towards car exit gate. Scope for further development exists. Devotional place.

Name: convwp
Title: Attractive architecture
Review: Paddamma temple was famous. Architecture was really great. Temple was well maintained and attractive. Must visit it.

Name: Radkris1981
Title: Famous temple to visit in Hyderabad
Review: Famous temple in Jubilee/Banjara Hills. Peddamma talli is famous and powerful goddess. Visited in June.

Name: Sunil G
Title: Famous and Clean temple in Jubilee hilss
Review: Located in Jubilee Hills,its a famous Hindu goddess temple with clean interiors. Gets crowded during festival times, if you are just a visitor recommended to visit on weekdays.

Name: chandrasekhar g
Title: Famous Devotional temple located at jubliee hills ares
Review: Daily crowd,donations will be available at temple.2 and 4 wheelers pooja's are available.spacious temple with breakfast/lunch centers available.far away from areas like lbnagar/dilshuknagar.special darshans are available.Many devotees will come on bonalu festival.

Name: hmunjam
Title: Peaceful and clean temple
Review: Temple is quite spacious and peaceful. Not very crowded on regular weekends. Neat premises. Ample parking.

Name: Bandi P
Title: The Presiding Deity of Hyderabad
Review: A  temple located in the midst of the city that has a strong connect with the locals. A nice experience for devotees. Enough parking. Though one has to look at the timings as there could breaks for darshan during the after noon . When you are in Hyderabad do find time to seek blessings of Peddamma

Name: ramesh
Title: Very peaceful
Review: The temple is located in very busy city centre and yet you will find very peaceful when you enter the temple.

Name: Trending T
Title: Very peaceful place to visit
Review: I have visited this place for my friend family function.This place gave me immense peace to never forget in my life.

Name: Ganesh N
Title: Peddamma Temple
Review: here is a powerful god peddamma talli very nice place i went to there so many times good temple every body can go there

Name: Meghana P
Title: Serenity of Godess Peddhamma
Review: its a hindu temple located in Jubli hills. Peddamma Means Pedda- Elder  Amma-Mother, 'Mother of Mothers' or "The Supreme Mother.After entering into the temple, there is a place where coins are placed vertically and make a wish.Devotees believe that their wish will be fulfilled if they place the coin vertically

Name: Georgio Valentino Rayala
Title: Well Maintained and Clean Temple
Review: I was staying at a Hotel OYO Townhouse 005 in Jubilee Hills area and this temple is located right next to the hotel. Not a big fan of visiting temples but had some free time so decided to check out this temple. No cameras and Cell phones are allowed inside so did not take pictures of the temple and all pictures I posted here are taken from my hotel.Firstly this is a very clean and well maintained temple and it is dedicated to goddess Laxmi who is sitting on top of a Lion. Peddamma in telugu means "Big Mother" or "Mother of all Mothers". The temple has a very typical south indian style and it did not take much time for me to check out this place. There is no entrance fee and it was not that crowded when I visited it at 4 p.m.

Name: RohitNadal
Title: Famous
Review: Famous temple of Hyderabad. Once we offered a goat to the Goddess and had a family lunch get together in the premises of the temple.

Name: Joseph_Bee
Title: Nice Place
Review: Temple was very much famous, This temple was there in center of city. This was very cruddy and full rush

Name: deepa v
Title: Very peaceful
Review: The temple us very old and situated in jubliee hills area.It is dedicated to goddess Durga (pedamma).very peaceful.Fridays are generally rushy,else it is fine.It is closed in the afternoon for around 2 hrs.

Name: Devaa
Title: Durga Temple!!!
Review: This temple is located in the heart of Jubilee Hills posh locality. There is a big arch for the entrance to this age old temple dedicated to goddess Durga. It is spread over a big area and ample of parking space is there.

Name: ravi p
Title: Auspicious place
Review: I felt very nice while visiting this another ammavari temple.. A very powerful ammavaru temple..It was Wednesday around 11.30 so there wasn’t much rush so had peaceful darshan and relaxed atmosphere..Try car park in front of temple inside and if it’s full then try further away as in sunny day you have to walk few 100 mts..

Name: gopij2016
Title: Durga Devi temple in a busy Hyderabad area.
Review: Must stop for a great temple experience. Parking is there inside the premises and outside on the feeder road. I was told this is a very old temple renovated by a honorable local politician.Peaceful, serene inspite of the busy traffic. Queue system is there so everyone can get darshan of the goddess in due time.There are couple of other smaller temples closeby within walking distance.

Name: Rahul Mishra
Title: a beautiful temple of godess Durga
Review: this is a big, beautiful architecture, well organized temple. it is a must go place for durga worshipers.

Name: Santosh1959
Title: Nice and organized temple to pray
Review: The temple is very organized for piligrims, right from parking to the regulated Q. If you are not particular about the days avoid weekends when it is very crouded.

Name: TrueCityZen
Title: Spacious and Peaceful
Review: Nice ammavari(mother goddess) temple in the heart of the city with ample parking and nice infra . Make it a must visit place

Name: Sumitkumar_13
Title: Nice temple
Review: Peddamma Temple is quite a big temple with a well maintained premises. Lot of people come here to pray and worship. Nice place to meditate.

Name: SunshineB
Title: Spellbinding ...
Review: Very easy to get neck ache here trying to see the temples which reach up into the sky!     Amazing but one must show respect, normally all shoes and socks must be removed and obviously no revealing clothes.    Long trousers for men and women saves having to borrow wraps to cover up, especially male and female legs - so  dont wear shorts.     There is a lot to see and admire, definitely need a local guide.

Name: Nishita Jindal
Title: Heart And Soul Of Hyderabad
Review: This temple should definitely be on your itenerary as its one of the most iconic temples of Hyderabad. Being a resident of Hyderabad, I have gone there countless times. There is usually crowd during festival time (even during ekadasi there's a hell of a crowd). Best time to go is on Monday and during the afternoon. But to witness the pooja and the maha-darshan, you'll have to go around 8:00am. The prasad they give is pulihora (lemon rice) for around 20-30 rupees. Gents are supposed to wear full pants as shorts are not allowed and ladies should cover themselves appropraitely. Traditional wear works best for this place.

Name: Veer2468
Title: Good!
Review: This is a must visit when you are in Hyderabad. Location of the temple is at the heart of the city. Excellent.

Name: Karthik Dasu
Title: Famous and powerful temple
Review: It is one of the prominent temples in the city, located at right in the heart of city in Jublee Hills.

Name: vinitasaraf2015
Title: Deity of Hyderabad!
Review: This temple is dedicated to Pedamma devi and has strong religious following in Hyderabad. It is visited a lot by locals

Name: TADAKAMADLA A
Title: Powerful Temple
Review: Jubille Hills Peddamma Temple is very famous temple in Hyderabad. The goddess here is Peddamma. The temple is very powerful. Many people believe that all their wishes are fulfilled here.My wish also fulfilled.

Name: ramki09
Title: huge temple
Review: Pedamma temple is a beautiful Devi temple.Devi is very powerful.There are also saraswati,ganpati and Durga temples and Naga devatha temple in the premises

Name: Lalitha G
Title: very good place and nice one to visit
Review: its a great temple to visit and need to visit this with proper dress code and its very powerful goddess. go with full of trust and everything will be good.

Name: Known Traveller
Title: Awesome God - Divine Place
Review: Very Spiritual place, there are a lot of attractions in the temple. Temple is located in the heart of Jubilee Hills

Name: Pulak
Title: Nice Temple!
Review: The Peddamma Temple is dedicate to Durga Swaroop. It is very nicely maintained temple with good maintenance.

Name: dchakri87
Title: Most popular religious shrine
Review: Peddamma Temple is the most popular religious shrines in Hyderabad situated on Road No.55 of Jubilee Hills.The temple timings are from 6.00a.m. to 1.00p.m. and again from 3.00p.m. to 8.00p.m. It is easily accessible by Bus, auto, cab etc.There is free darshan as well as special darshan by entry fee.Lot of parking space is there which is a paid one.  Peddamma Temple is dedicated to Goddess Laxmi, the name is derived from two words Pedda and Amma which means Mother of Mothers denoting the Goddess.This temple is famous for various festivals during which devotees from all over the state visit and seek blessings. Bonalu festival which is famous in Telangana is celebrated with great fervour and pomp.   This temple is 150yrs old and is an important landmark of Hyderabad.

Name: SureshReddyS
Title: Very well maintained temple
Review: Very spacious and peaceful temple. Has been here multiple time, always felt peaceful and good. There are other temples as well in the premises.

Name: Neerajbans
Title: A peaceful heaven in the midst of bustling city
Review: A temple with big land area and also amazingly clean & well maintained. The main lord is in the middle of the temple and it does get crowded in the morning & evening. Also you can arrange for a special pooja if you wish to. Ample parking space is provided and recommend to leave your footwear in the car.

Name: Shri Krishan Kansal
Title: Jai Mata Ki
Review: A Ma Durga Swarup Temple located in Jubilee Hills is very well maintained neat and clean. People of the city and area have faith in Ma Durga. On Saturdays and Sundays there is huge rush of devotees.

Name: ravi p
Title: Auspicious place
Review: Being in Hyderabad since birth I only went to this temple now and I felt why I didn’t come all This time.. a must visit place to get peddamma thalli blessing.. has good parking place and well managed even though it was busy..

Name: Sailakshmy S
Title: Beautiful Temple
Review: This goddess temple was built to recognize her as the deity of Hyderabad.  It's a very colorful temple with exquisite wall art.  Avoid going here on weekends.

Name: Veer2468
Title: Peaceful
Review: This is located in the middle of the city- jubilee hills area. very peaceful temple. Even though it is crowded but nicely managed by management.

Name: naiduks24
Title: Great temple
Review: Located in Road Number 4 Jubilee Hills, Goddess Pedamma is the Prime Goddess in this temple, we visited early hours no rush, peaceful visit.

Name: harelbr
Title: Beautiful
Review: Went there on a Sunday morning while on a business trip to Hyderabad. Even though the place was packed with people, the atmosphere was wonderful, and it was super interesting to see rituals (to which I was new), the beautiful temple, and meet the friendly people. There are a couple of shops just outside the temple where you can buy souvenirs.

Name: Ideaboy
Title: Nice place
Review: You will enjoy the place when you come without any work (most of the devotees come with some poojas).

Name: SPillai
Title: A huge facility for holding conferences
Review: A big convention centre with all the multi-media facilities. Adjacent Novotel hotel offers good boarding and lodging options.

Name: Ritu jha
Title: Stay experience
Review: Thank you for making my stay wonderful I would like to thanks Ms. Sweety who was a helping hand always.

Name: DipuKV
Title: Massive
Review: HICC is a massive complex which is nicely built and well maintained. The approach road is scenic as well.

Name: Talent P
Title: state-of-the-art convention facility
Review: State-of-the art IT infrastructure, design, technology, telecommunications and AV equipment with a spacious pre-function foyer area and an In-house 5-star banqueting serviceIt is connected to Novotel international business hotel

Name: DrValliappan
Title: Best Convention Facility in India
Review: Compared to Pragati Maidan, New Delhi or CODISSIA Trade Fair Complex, Coimbatore or Convention Centre, Chennai which are pioneering facilities in the country, HICC stands out as the best with all amenities and a 5-Star Hotel (Novatel) built in.

Name: PKB
Title: One of the best Convention
Review: No dowt, this is one of the largest and best. many global tourist come for events. I participated. very well arrangement. Attached with Novotel

Name: diptendubt
Title: The best part of modernity
Review: Located north to the Hitech City, HICC at Novotel hotel is the best place for the International conference like 50 Union world Lung Health conference

Name: Venuprasath
Title: Sarvsri Catering for the Marriage function
Review: We were their to service our client for their house wedding and the facilities and support given by the convention center and also the security services made us comfortable.  Well lit and spacious halls.  Including the security gate personal were helpful in making the event a great success.

Name: Honey shah
Title: Shaswat,Karthik ,Aditya Gopal, Sudheer, saqib, Vamsi,teethi
Review: A perfect package!Amazing hospitality, very helpful and prompt staff, very approachable... amazing g property, tasty food, ... always been a pleasant stay ,fun filled and memorable..thank you team HICC

Name: moogul818
Title: Wonderful Convention Centre
Review: Hyderabad International Convention Centre (HICC) is a purpose-built, state-of-the-art convention facility, the first of its kind in South Asia. It features a pillar less internal hall measuring 6,480 square meters that can be partitioned into six smaller halls. It boasts of a state-of-the art IT infrastructure, design, technology, telecommunications and AV equipment. HICC is connected (and managed by) Novotel Hyderabad Convention Centre, an international business hotel.

Name: mustafa zakir
Title: I visit HICC regularly for entinding the exibtions and events over there.
Review: Each time I was amazed by there organizing of the event and everything they do the makes the event and expo there one of the best events.

Name: Stay282088
Title: Meetings, Exhibitions & Conferences
Review: This is a great place for organising various exhibitions with state of the art facilities. Mostly all the events are organised in 2 Big Halls.

Name: Praveen
Title: Superb convention center
Review: It's been pleasant and wonderful experience to be part of my team meeting in this hotel. Has great infrastructure and good environment

Name: Ravi P
Title: HITECH POULTRY EXHIBITION 2019
Review: Visited HITECH international convention center for Poultry India show 2019 edition, had business meeting with several international  visitors, ending up with good business tieups with African visitors

Name: Vikas Singh
Title: Ample parking space
Review: The best thing about the venue is ample parking space. The halls are well spaced out so that you do not feel claustrophobic. Many popular events like the Petex and Comic con are organized here.

Name: Amashnee S
Title: Excellent Venue
Review: Attended a conference that was held at the International  convention center held in 29October-02 November 2019. The venue is large and adequately accommodated multiple sessions concurrently. Technically there were no interruptions and all talks proceeded well.

Name: sree143in
Title: Good Palce
Review: Hitex is a very large function hall like, we can arrange big meetings, wedding functions, political meetings and many more.

Name: Lakshmi Narayanan
Title: Hospitality
Review: I stayed in Novatel Convention center on 13 and 14th Sep for a business trip.Mr. Sudheer who was in front desk was very friendly and highly professional. I wish Novatel management take note of this feedback and encourage such young employees with recognition and motivation.ThanksLakshmi Narayanan

Name: NAZEER SHAIK
Title: Landmark for every visit
Review: Hyderabad is the main place for IT People. this place is the shortcut for all it peoples traveling for Kukatpally side

Name: jainms
Title: Hitex
Review: Most of the goverment, corporate exhibitions, meetings, conventions are held here. Located opposite Shilparamam.

Name: Gaurav G
Title: It's a good exhibition center
Review: I went there for a start up exhibition thinking it would be big but the rooms are not that big. I have been to a lot of exhibitions and the room sizes are in no comparison to this. It's okay for a small exhibition, don't expect a very big exhibition if they are not using other rooms as well.

Name: Ratna Kamalakar V
Title: Good for conventions
Review: It has huge halls and ample parking space. A decent place to conduct events with large gatherings. I don't think there are any options for food unless it is part of the event.

Name: Damian9712
Title: In a word “Fantastic” !!!!!!
Review: This is my first trip to india and like most people you may have a few doubts about the food , service and standards.Well this hotel would get 11 outta 10 if I could , the place is spotless and clean , rooms are spacious with well stocked minibars and modern air con systems, but the staff make it even better  ! Had the barbecue buffet tonight , food was top standard , Huthasini and Ajay looked after my every need ,really friendly and they made sure I tried all the additional dishes that were available, a big thank you to you both ! To sum up , if your thinking of staying in hyderabad area , do yourself a favour and book this place !

Name: beyondtravel
Title: Hitex Hyderabad
Review: A landmark of future at Hyderabad,  a gigantic convention centre,  know for exhibition and conference.  Also a pleasant place for morning walk along lakeside.

Name: TravelbuggIndia
Title: Convention Centre
Review: Hyderabad International Convention center which is also known as Hitex center is a prominent place where exhibitions and shows are held.

Name: Naresh
Title: Holiday trip
Review: We enjoyed with welcome drinks mr Sudeer who is in reception counter take care us and suggest nicely

Name: Sandy D
Title: Could have been better
Review: The convention center really needs a renovation as it appears jaded and used. While it is spacious - I did not find the facilities up mark.

Name: Vikram
Title: Great exhibition grounds and infrastructure for high impact commercial results
Review: I have utilized the facilities and found this to be a great facility to host Conferences, All Hands Meetings, and Company get-togethers. It is away from the city but close to the IT city. Good place for visitors to have relaxation and do business.

Name: rajvedula
Title: Great Exhibition Place
Review: Visited many times for exhibits/fairs, very clean place and well organized for parking and ample greenery... great morning walk place if you are in that area...(strictly before 730am only)

Name: Niya1315
Title: Not a tourist place
Review: HICC is spread in a big area. It is not a tourist place but a place for arranging conferences. Away from the city. I also visited this place to attend one conference.

Name: prasad r
Title: Very excited
Review: Good best place with family to visit Good best place with family to visitGood best place with family to visit

Name: Dilip kumar
Title: Best business meetings
Review: This place is for most bussiness meeting happenings in the city and is well organuised and well done

Name: yemKeyAre
Title: Good
Review: Good location for large conventions. Brilliant choices. Good for big event gatherings. Has plenty of parking space.

Name: Shaggy
Title: Awesome food
Review: Great food. Really enjoyed.it was a treat to me and my family. Will definitely comeback. You should try it

Name: Stuti Das
Title: Facilities good but food is pathetic
Review: The overall facility is very nice and the staff is friendly and helpful. The conference hall is spacious and is one of India’s largest hall. I’ll definitely recommend it for company conferences. But the food is pathetic and by second day you can predict the menu for next. Connectivity with the main city is good and you can easily get Ola/ über easily

Name: mighty7886
Title: Amazing place
Review: I attended a conference here and had an awesome experience. Far enough from the city's noises, this provides all the facilities for all types of conventions.

Name: Trending T
Title: Best for business events
Review: I visited this place for a business event conducted in october and this place has unique style of creating customer satisfactory things.

Name: mohamedriji
Title: Ideal place for conducting large events
Review: HICC is a huge property with state-of-the-art convention facility located in HiTech city. I visited this place to attend an event. The convention center as well as its surroundings are well maintained. The halls are huge. Lot of breakout rooms are also there. Novotel hotel is also adjacent to HICC. The convention center has ample parking space.

Name: Somarajan
Title: Great facilities and ambience
Review: Have visited this place during November 2018 for the SIP competition. This is a very large property with beautiful landscape. Convention hall is very big.

Name: Travel144090
Title: High quality restaurants
Review: Had really nice experience one of the restaurant offered really wide variety of Indian cuisine. High level service.

Name: 73prashantha
Title: great place for meetiings.
Review: This one is a great place for meetings. usually their exhibitions are good and you get to see a productive crowd around.

Name: Daniel T
Title: Worth visiting during a business event
Review: HICC as its more famously called, this convention centre has given Hyderabad-based industries a good platform to host industry-level summits.The facilities are ideal for conferences, technical shows etc. Place is accessible via public transport as well.

Name: Nish0901
Title: Near Hitech City
Review: Hyderabad International Convention Center is spread in a very big area. I visited this place to attend one conference. The auditorium inside is big and can hold good gathering. It is not a tourist place.

Name: Khyati
Title: Amazingly big
Review: Huge big conference Hall and which can cater to almost 2000 people at a time.. seminars.. meetings. Events for all this is the best place..

Name: srinath18
Title: Hyderabad hitex
Review: Icon of the Hyderabad is hitex..it located near hitex city..IT area in Hyderabad Hitex is most popular in Hyderabad and It carridor area

Title: Breath taking
Review: One should attend a conference here at least once. The auditorium can hold abut 2000 people. Large screens are so clear. Accoustics are of international standards. Audio release functons happen here.

Name: Arnab B
Title: Excellent!
Review: Visited when  martin garrix was in town!A very well maintained and clean place. Can handel even 10-15 k  audience.

Title: Truely international
Review: one of the best convention center in India. the standards are kept to match any international convention center. layout is good, rest rooms, dining, convention hall , everything is good.

Name: SRIKAKOLAPU
Title: good
Review: Expos and shows happen over here.Parking place is fine and people guide you over there.nice and well maintained

Name: Pithva_Rajan
Title: Totally up to the mark.
Review: Good place for exhibition in Hyderabad. However it is located far from the Airport. Shuttle bus facilities are available but not that frequent. I recommend to chose OLA or UBER cab for transporataion.

Name: Zbyněk Z

Review: This place is known for many mega events related to cars,interiors,poultry,books,plastcs,etc...They have ample parking space.restrooms are clean and well maintained.Novotel hotel can accommodate delegates with world class facilities.

Name: Santosh1959
Title: best convention center of India
Review: It is one of the first and the best convention centers of India. It can comfortably take about 10000 guests without crowding.Well planned and built in a huge area with ample parking

Name: Pranay9518

Name: deepa v

Review: The place is quite big and hosts many different kinds of events from time to time.located in the heart of the city.

Name: Karthik Dasu
Title: Good place
Review: It is a good place to visit. It is located right in the heart of Hitech City.Not a must watch place.

Name: Navneet Nayak
Title: Nice place compared to others
Review: It is spacious enough to fit about more than 500 people at a time. Though not that big, but the best as compared to the other options you have.

Name: Abhilash K
Title: Very large
Review: It is very large convention center In the Hyderabad major government related program are done here..

Name: venkatakarthik
Title: go to place to attend events
Review: it's clean and spacious enough to fit about >500 people in there, no issue with valet parking, great place. enjoyed the stay....

Name: TravelingGypsy0508
Title: Best for corporate events
Review: Have attended so many events hosted by my company at HICC. It is spacious, parking isn't an issue and centrally located.

Name: naliniranjann
Title: Convention Centre of Choice in Hyderabad
Review: World class convention centre in Hyderabad to stay in and enjoy the wonderful Business conferences and Business Meet. Very much connected to all types of transport and all in one Campus to organise business meet and conference, as well as staying accommodation at the same campus. Very good food as well and shopping centres to have the Hyderabad Pearls in side the Convention Centre.

Name: Shivadhar
Title: Truly Corporate
Review: One of the best places in Asia to organise a truly professional conference, seminar, event, etc. Located in the center of the city with almost all possible facilities.

Name: jmodi1981
Title: Nice Place for various events
Review: One of the very good convention center to host events at this place. It has very big halls to hold grand functions here.

Name: Chetan V
Title: Ideal option for marketing events
