Review: I attended marketing and user group events during Dec 2017 and April 2018 at HICC complex. It can accommodate 500-2000 attendees across multiple halls. Decent Wifi (paid service) as well.I noticed marriage reception during the evening times.Overall, good experience and there's adjacent hotel (entry from inside the HICC complex) i.e. Novotel with restaurants and cafe at the lobby level.

Name: Dheeraj B
Title: Comic Con!
Review: The Annual Comic Con!Who doesnt go here?It is one of the spacious halls where all sorts of conventions are hosted.

Name: Kirun K
Title: Highly desirable
Review: I have visited HICC on March 23rd for some function.It is spacious and large enough to accommodate good number of people.I visited HICC for some event and enjoyed a lot.Also neat by they have Novotel hotel (5 star) very spacious and ambience is superb.It is located at hitex near by Hi Tech City.If any body wants to visit Hyderabad you must visit the place like HICC,hitex and Novotel.

Name: Known Traveller
Title: Largest Convention in Hyderabad
Review: Largest Convention in Hyderabad, located at Hitech City. It is a place for International Events and shows.

Name: Pulak
Title: All mega trade fairs take place
Review: The Hyderabad International Convention Center is very huge with state of the art facilities for exhibition.

Name: Gugan_Ilango
Title: symbol of hitech city
Review: this is the modern symbol of hyderabad and symbol of hi tech city. its the entry way to novotel and hicc complex

Name: Bawi Backpacker
Title: Good Location
Review: Came here for an exhibition. It is quite well maintained also the property has hotels within and is close to quite a few hotels and corporate offices. Food is easily available thankfully.

Name: debasis d
Title: Well maintained international complex
Review: This place is famous for exhibition , conference, seminar. Huge space, car parking, excellent food and professional atmosphere. Though costly but worth the investment.

Name: Madhavi74
Title: Hitex
Review: The Hyderabad International Convention Center is located in Novotel and Hicc Complex | Near Hitech City, Po Bag, Hyderabad.It is very famous and very big convention ceter in hyderabad. And also famous for VIP events.

Name: krutarthasahoo
Title: Exhibition
Review: It is located in the Hi-tech city of Hyderabad which is know as Cyberabad, located in the IT Park of the Hyderabad.

Name: koteswararao
Title: center place for costly exhibtion
Review: any  businessmen want to have exhibition first think about this at Hyderabad in the standed of national level

Name: Surya Katakam
Title: Best place in Hyderabad for Exhibition and Business Shows
Review: This is located near to Cyber towers. Most of the national and international business exhibitions and seminars will happen here.It is well maintained and we'll connected to the city

Name: iamchathu
Title: Unite India and NGDC 2017 was held here
Review: Unite India game conference and NGDC 2017 was held in HICC. Good spacious event location and good lighting and sound too. We stayed at Novotel Hotel which was in same Building. Air condition also good and had a great high roof and velvet floors. Food was good but not best. We had Biriyani also which was average taste. Less seating area for Lunch. We didn't have free Wi-Fi

Name: Ideaboy
Title: Best place in India
Review: This is the best place in India to do any sort of Party / Conference / Official meetings etc...Attractive Area, almost 5000+ can accommodate in single hall and Excellent Sound system, Lights, arrangements, everything is best.Very clean and neat.I didn't seen any other place like this in India for Official conferences...Only drawback is PRICE, it costs huge.

Name: samM260RZ
Title: Nice and well maintained
Review: Its a nice and well maintained place with good facilities. Went here for an event and really likes this place

Name: SuvodipMoitra
Title: World Class
Review: Indeed a great convention centre for all purposes. Last to last week visited here for the Comic Con and the Kitchen expo. Facilities, parking and space is good. Adjacent there is Novotel.

Name: NITA N
Title: HICC Facilities
Review: We had the Skal Congress 2017 here and could not fault anything as far as the food and infrastructure goes. The only concern for me was that unlike other Conference facilities there was a charge for WIFI and this did not go down well at all with delegates.

Name: Rach R
Title: Pretty Good
Review: Your experience at the Convention Center depends on what you are visiting for. I had gone for Comic Con last year, and last week I went for Soul Sante. Both were really good experiences for me. The former was held indoors and the latter was held outdoors. If you know which exhibition to go for, it can really make your experience worth while

Name: pjanil1968
Title: Good exhibition centre
Review: Most of the major conventions and exhibitions like property exhibitions, Food exhibitions etc are conducted here.Well maintained exhibition halls

Name: Mohammed Sohail Ahmed
Title: Pathetic condition
Review: Few years back when it was constructed, it was an attraction. It is being hugely affected due to pollution.

Name: Ryan
Title: Nothing special about it
Review: It's a convention centre in hyderabad where expos and conferences conducted. There is nothing special about there construction or make. It is just another building. But, as far as hyderabad is concerned, it is the only place to conduct a decent fair or exhibition

Name: Dhulev
Title: Simply conventions
Review: I am told that this is the largest convention center in the country. I too attended a meeting in HICC recently. The main audi has a vast seating area. We had lunch at the ground floor. The taste of food and the verity is almost endless. Both North Indian as well South Indian dishes were quite fine. I tasted tomato soup , Veg Biryani, Tandoori Roti, Black daal, salads, papad, plain rice, kheer and much more in moderate quantities. Found all dishes quite good. However, the centre looked quite away from any of the city points. Its about 18 Km from Hussain Sagar lake but the road to the airport is relatively traffic free as you will travel on the Outer Ring Road most of the time. Its about 37 Km from the Rajiv Gandhi Airport.

Name: Floyd A
Title: Great place for any exhibitions
Review: HICC has a huge capacity to host exhibitions and conferences, it has a massive exhibition area and multiple rooms that can hold several other sessions. it is also connected to the Hotel Novotel and hence staying at the hotel is better if you are travelling for a 2-3 day conferece

Name: BRKanth
Title: Best Convension Center
Review: This is the only and the best convension centre in Hyderabad. Visited to attend business meet and it is must watch.

Name: nj09
Title: Nice.
Review: The hyderabad International convention centre is a really good place to stay. I have given a review on the novotel airport hotel, U can check it out. It is almost similar and amzing!

Name: Siva N
Title: Yes superb
Review: The place was pleasent cool and the environment in which it was built is awesome and mostly the internal architecture is awesome the seating present there was very comfortable and the servers and staff are exceedingly doing their work good

Name: Suryamoni A
Title: there are two cities in hyderabd I) oldcity II)new city III)the one your seeing is hi-tech city
Review: international events took place here like music concerts,comic com david guetta shows are performed here

Name: Azimjon_Vohid
Title: Good place for Exhibitions...
Review: I was here for Exhibition. Center is very suitable for conducting big scale events, such as: exhibitions, fairs, trade shows, workshops, etc.

Name: G S
Title: Big Convention for Big Celebrations
Review: we went here for our company day and it's big place and it's beside novetol hotel and place and parking area is quite enough and i really like this place

Name: Wholesome_life
Title: Spacious and grand
Review: HICC is big and can accommodate large events. I recently happened to attend a conference that hosted about 1000 delegates comfortably. Air Conditioning was good and consistent. The car pick up point tends to get congested at times during morning hours when lots of delegates get dropped at HICC. The biggest sore point was the food. Very average and nothing much to write about.

Name: Rajashekhar K
Title: One of the modern monuments of trade and technology
Review: One of the modern monuments of trade and technology, it embodies the newfound attitude of Hyderabad and today finds a place of pride. Situated on the outskirts of the city, it is the nucleus of Cyberabad, the IT destination in this part of the world. Cyber Towers is the main building here.

Name: NayanKothari
Title: Best place for conventions and conferences
Review: one of its kind place in the entire country for hosting huge conventions, social or business gathering. It also has inside novatel which has a huge conference hall.

Name: Rahul_and_Niyanta
Title: Banquet event
Review: I attended the Wedding Times Fashion Fiesta at HICC on Monday evening (20th March). I am a hotelier myself and have been privy to a number of such PR and media events at the various hotels that I have worked in. However, I must say, that the execution of the event on Monday evening on your end was exceptional. I am not referring to the actual fashion show or the event set p inside the hall. I am referring to the hospitality rendered to guests both, pre and post event. I was lucky enough to attend the after party on the first floor as well. All your staff was courteous and polite, and always smiling. I know Banquet staff is generally very stressed because of their long hours, not to mention handling a complimentary event. However, each and every one of them were brilliant. Always smiling and ready to extended any assistance. For instance, on a number of occasions, your staff ensured that our drinks were brought to us instead of us having to walk up to the bar. Snack service was prompt and if  we requested one of the boys to bring one of the other snacks on rotation, it was promptly brought. Bartenders remembered our drinks and made it promptly. I would like to mention a few gentlemen whose names I caught - Mohiuddin and Anand Ravi, both managers I guess because they were dressed in a jacket, and Saroj (snack server) and Ankush (bartender at the after party). Amongst others, these four brilliant people ensured that we had a memorable evening, one that will last in our collective memories for a long time. And not to forget the food - it was delicious. The chicken satay served at the after party were generous sized and succulent. The chicken biryani, the stew and appam, the anjeer ice cream and the tres leches dessert were all mouth watering, served at the right temperature and delicious. Again, staff was helpful enough to bring us bottles of water to accompany our dinner without being prompted. A classic example of brilliant service. Thank you once again and I do hope you will share my good wishes with your banquet staff to let them know how much we appreciated their efforts that evening.

Name: saradurban
Title: great meeting venue
Review: attended endo 2017 here .first meeting in india that we have attended and we thoroughly enjoyed the venue and meeting so different to european and american meetings!so generous and friendly smiles

Name: Pintya
Title: Best corporate events
Review: The center is large enough accommodate multiple events at a time. Infrastructure is excellent. Food is awesome.

Name: Dipubose
Title: one of the best exhibition centres in Town
Review: HICC is a nice place to rewind during some exhibitions.Visited during Kids Exhibitions & also during an interior expo.The have big pavilions & provides ample parking .Very well maintained

Name: Andrew D
Title: For locals only
Review: There is not much to appreciate for tourists. It is a decent garden with an amusement park, but nothing else really.

Name: Global-Bhatakanti
Title: NTR Garden, good place to spend time
Review: 3 Nov 2022: NTR Garden ticket counter. Ticket is INR 20 for adults and free for children below 5 yr. NTR Garden is normally crowded in the evening and almost empty in the morning. Toy train is not working. Min time to spend is 30 min if you don't do any activities. There is paid parking outside. Some things to do are haunted house, typical kids play areas, 3D underwear world. Activity tickets are INR 50 each and combo is 90.

Name: lkoraj
Title: Very good
Review: Very nice place, full entertainment of family, clean and beautiful garden. Many attractions for kids. A good place to see.

Name: Mayank G
Title: Good Place to Visit if you are in Hyderabad
Review: NTR Garden is good place to Visit if you are in Hyderabad with your family. Good environment and ambiance.

Name: 795vidhis
Title: Disappointed with the maintenance. Needs a makeover !!
Review: It seems this place is past it's glory days. The place is in definite need of renovation and probably COVID made the things worse. It used to be a favorite place to take kids but I guess now there are far better options to choose from.

Name: Shankar I
Title: NTR garden - a popular place in Hyderabad
Review: Frequented by lots of people for leisure. The area is well maintained and people have a good time here.

Name: Kaushik G
Title: Beautiful gardens near Hussain Sagar Lake
Review: This is a beautiful garden created in the memory of the legendary film personality cum leader NTR and we had visited the same during our sightseeing in Hyderabad. This place is located on the banks of Hussain Sagar Lake. We paid 20 rupees per person entrance tickets. Inside there are many paid rides like toy train, swing etc. We walked around the paved walkway in the middle of well maintained manicured lawns, beautiful flowers and fountains. Good to visit this along with Lumbini Park and boating in Hussain Sagar Lake.

Name: Ratan
Title: Fun
Review: Nice park with water fountain and toy train taking one back to its childhood...and the haunted place..

Name: NAZEER SHAIK
Title: Place is good
Review: Nice place to visit with family. but no more features to enjoy with kids. infront of sagar is nice to take rest with family

Name: prudhvi
Title: Must visiting place in Hyderabad with family or friends
Review: NTR Gardens, situated on the banks of hussain sagar.Very well maintained.Security checks are good.This is mandatory as more people visit everyday. Visitors number doubles during weekends.Fountains,cradling and many other fun activities for children.Children will definitely enjoy here.stay bit cautious.

Name: Him6788
Title: Good place to hangout with family
Review: Always a good place to hang around with family at any time of the year and within the city. Next to this there is a play area for Kids

Name: Krishna Sandeep Siram
Title: Nice Place to Visit
Review: A memorial of Great Legend Nata Sarvabhouma, Nata Vikhyata Sree Nandamuri Taraka Ramarao (NTR), former chief minister of united Andhra pradesh.A nice garden near to the Hussain sagar road.

Name: chaithu k
Title: Peaceful place
Review: NTR marg is so pleasant and peaceful area which is N.T Ramarao's memorial. Beside there is small Urban park near by Hussain Sagar lake which is in Hyderabad. Park is located in the centre of the city, and is close to other tourist attractions Birla mandir, Necklace road, Lumbini Park. It maintained by Budha purnima project authority under Telangana Government.

Name: CuriousTraveller
Title: There are many tree like artificial structures that are so beautiful.
Review: It is an awesome park with lot of bequtiful artificial trees. There is also one main tree that is very big and also has some thing like a sliding thing for kids. Overall its a must visit place in Necklace road close to L V Prasad Eye max theatre. You can spend the entire Sunday here with your little ones spending time at near by iMax theatre.

Name: alpsbt27
Title: very beautiful
Review: NTR garden is one of the best places where to visit. who come here always say we will again visit it. it is a really really beautiful place I must say in my diary. and we will also visit here next year.

Name: Lokesh1981
Title: Best park in Hyderabad
Review: A very big garden cum park in front of Hussain sagar lake, one of the prominent attraction of Hyderabad, one can see Buddha statue and Birla temple both, Nicely maintained, many varieties of flowers, many options for children to play, haunted house, many rides, water tunnel etc, The best part is one toy train which gives a glimpse of entire park, In nutshell best place to enjoy time with family and friends specially kids,

Name: OMKAR PAGADALA
Title: NTR GARDENS
Review: NTR Gardens has a nice atmosphere. The place very much peaceful and calm. We can experience an peaceful climate in a very busy city like Hyderabad.

Name: sree143in
Title: nice park
Review: Near Hussainsagar lake it is located. a very big garden with lot of big trees and different varities of plants.

Name: Shailendra
Title: Average
Review: NTR Gardens located next to Hussain sagar lake has lost its charm due to poor maintenance. The toy train and tree house does not work and the park becomes overcrowded on the weekends.On the top of the above, the charge for camera is Rs. 1000/- which is too exorbitant.Overall, an average experience.

Name: Sunil
Title: Decent garden
Review: Not much great garden, it’s ok to visit with family and friends just for fun and one time visit is good

Name: chandrasekhar g
Title: Timepass place and fun time
Review: Visited during kharitabad ganesh utsav time.NTR gardens near to kharitabad ganesh utsav.Entry ticket is available.Photography is allowed inside garden.Games are available.

Name: Varsha V
Title: Visit only if you have nothing else to do
Review: NTR Gardens need a lot of repair and maintenance. After visiting other attractions in Hyderabad, I felt this park is very neglected. The toy train wasn't working, the fountain needed cleaning. Except for the plants nothing seemed lively. But that doesn't stop kids from enjoying. that's the only thing worth visiting there. You will see happy kids all around you. If you have got so much time in your hand, do visit it. Else spend more time in Salar Jung Museum!

Name: Natarajan K
Title: NTR garden
Review: This garden is located close to Hussain Sagar lake. It was a good place to spend time with family and friends who visits the lake for boating for Short time. It's named after the memory of late Mr. NTR sir. Well maintained by the city corporation. For Kids some few play games available in the park and themes too.

Name: Muneer
Title: Fun time
Review: It a very beautiful place and full of joy and great service we all are enjoy our best trip with my family and you guys also try it

Name: abrahamsuji
Title: Amazing green space
Review: Best green space in Hyderabad. Easy access. Lots of activity for kids. Endless green space to walk around

Name: tina c
Title: Can go once
Review: The place is good, but over crowded. The local vendors charge anything to the outsiders. Once the bottle of water was 20/- after sometime same shop will charge 30/- If you are going to Hussain sagar lake, then can visit this place also as its adjacent.

Name: jainms
Title: Good visit
Review: Evening times preferred here as the lights gives more beautiful look and can enjoy the visit. Couple of water games & activities here will make kids happy & enjoy their day.

Name: amitdon2
Title: Park
Review: Ntr park is big but now it's become old.all rides are old.we went on the toy train which goes round the park.

Name: Eaglesnow
Title: The temptation on eye catching veiws
Review: Located just beside the great hussain sagar . With all kind of beautiful scenery to enjoy it was a delight to see this kind of flowers plants and the cleanliness and well organised wlking path for the visitors . It also has a mini train takes you all around the garden

Name: Kishore W
Title: Ntr garden
Review: Its but on a grand  scale but ppl dobt maintain cleanliness at all  they litter everywhere...and hardly use garbage cans...the toy train was fun..but wish ppl start realizing the importance of cleanliness

Name: HARISH
Title: must visit
Review: nice and big garden...you can visit full garden via a small train in ntr garden with a nominal fee..

Name: NIL_MODI
Title: Beautiful Place
Review: Beautiful garden. Nice place. One should visit in the evening. nicely maintained. entry charge is there. small rides are also available at extra charge for kids.

Name: SRIKAKOLAPU
Title: nice
Review: With lots of greenery this place can be visited in the morning or the evening and its nice and decently maintained

Name: LostMySelfTraveling
Title: Great park with lots of artificial, natural trees and sculptures
Review: I love this park. It's a fantastic memorial of Shri Naandamuri Taraka Ramarao Ex. CM OF Andhrapradesh. It's a must vist place in Necklace Road. It's also close to Imax multiplex theatre. Children will enjoy the park alot. Very well developed and beautifully maintained park.

Name: pvrkaushik
Title: Lush green
Review: Dense Green park in the heart of the city... Couple retreat... And great place for kids too... Fun rides, eatery etc... U can beat the heat with this place's greenery

Name: S R V
Title: Children's paradise
Review: NTR gardens near Hussain Sagar Lake is a garden where children go round to enjoy their outings on week days. For people like us aged above 60s it was a leisure place where we could see cactus gardens, beautiful lawns etc.

Name: Dr Manoj Swaminathan
Title: Excellent garden for kids
Review: Kids will simply enjoy the various rides, which are indeed cost effective. Better to visit after 5PM.

Name: Mukta2016
Title: Nice Garden
Review: The NT Ramarao garden in Hyderabad is a nice garden located along one section of the bank of Hussain Sagar Lake and gives a nice view of the lake. The garden has many visitors cumming in the evening for a pleasant time.

Name: NG
Title: Run down
Review: Very sad state of garden - totally run down - absolutely avoidable - lovely trees n horticulture but on the whole sad.

Name: Nazeem M
Title: Pleasant park for family
Review: There are a few rides for children. There are combo tickets thus giving you more rides for less.the park is maintained quite well .

Name: Subas Chandran
Title: The Iconic attraction
Review: NTR Gardens Hyderabad is one of the famous sightseeing places. Built in the memory of a legend actor-politician, NTRama Rao, this urban attraction spread over  36 acres. This mini man-made nature presents a soothing atmosphere and refreshing setting to those who want to  romance with nature.The Garden offers recreation to match all ages - boat ride, Japanese garden, Roaring Cascade, a Fountain- apart visual friendly garden .It is armed with  150 plant varieties, mainly desert plants such as cacti, succulents, etc. The plants, which also boast of medicinal importance and are used for various herbal remedies, have been brought to Hyderabad from various parts of the country like Kolkata and Shirdi. A layman luxury with peace and love.

Name: UniQhu
Title: Family & Children friendly
Review: This is a very well maintained park. Good play area for children. The park is constructed around the memorial of the very famous and great actor and ex-cm of Andhra Pradesh (undivided state then). Visit if you want to have a good weekend or evening time out with your children

Name: Ashish S
Title: Great Garden
Review: This Garden is very well maintained. Place is neat and clean. It is full of greenery. Visited along with friends.

Name: Krishna K
Title: Nice open play areas and time pass for family
Review: There is 20 rs entry fees for adult and 10 rs for kids. Checkout the combo packages which will be cost effective for families. Initially disappointed to see unclean kids indoor area. Hope the authorities will give some thought  how to improve and repair the inside kids area. All rides needs extra payment indoor and outdoor. You can enjoy a small train ride which will last for 10 mins that will give a good picture for you to choose the rides or play area. Food stalls are available. Open kids area is good .

Name: rahman s
Title: NTR Garden
Review: Nice place to visit with family, have beautiful garden inside and some games to play, have 2-3 food stalls also

Name: Suresh1976
Title: Nice place to visit with family and kids
Review: This park is very near to Hussain Sagar lake. This garden is quite big. There is an entrance fee. After entering you will find a toy train. Not much expensive, you can a have nice ride, kids will enjoy it.There are different games to play like small theme park. Nicely maintained and it is clean. you will find some eateries inside as well as outside the park.We had a nice time. There is also good parking facility.

Name: Mandar Jetly
Title: Garden if you have time
Review: Visit only if you have time - large garden with bad canteen facility.3D show was not at all worth.Visit only if you have time.

Name: Sateesh
Title: NTR GARDEN
Review: Ntr garden is located in Hyderabad near Hussain Sagar.Good place for a one time visit.People usually spend half a day . The toy train is worth a ride and you can see broken down play items.The government needs to revive it . But you  can spend one day or half a day with your family.

Name: Bidisha B
Title: Gud experience
Review: If you r taking kids...they will surely luv it....njoyed alot. But each rides costs u money not included in entry fee....huge area... Different structures.... Greenery

Name: MSR
Title: NTR Garden, Necklace road, HYB
Review: An urban park meant for public at a nominal entrance fee situated adjacent to Hussain sagar lake built in several phases for a long time since late 1999s. This park is geographically situated in heart of the city, and in close vicinity of other tourist destinations of Twin cities as such Necklace road, Lumbini Park and Birla Mandir. This property is maintained by the Buddha Purnima Project authority an arm of State Government.In ester years it was well maintained with flora and fauna, but now due to heavy influx of public, the carpet lawns are not up to the mark. Precisely, this property is having number of rides which is spoiling the tranquility. Few rides may be discontinued though it is revenue generating to maintain the spirit of Garden to provide some peaceful environment in Garden.Because it is having vast area about 30 plus acres of land, there is every scope to develop much more better to attract more tourists than present  volume. And, few rides and shows are very poor in quality needs review of concern authorities as public certainly feel under value while comparing with the fee what they paid and quality of ride.

Name: Dr. Santosh Raut
Title: Nice experience
Review: Great experience, nice place to visit in Hyderabad, crowded but good evening experience and views. Recommended

Name: GLOBALSEAS
Title: great entertainment
Review: good and great entertainment in within the city to chill out with family and friends in all the days,

Name: SreejithSreekumar
Title: Average garden with poor facilities
Review: A garden which is kept running based on former glory. An entry fee charged for upkeep not justified enough. I excepted a rich diversity with exotic plants and full of flowers. But no specific layout with a cactus garden thrown in for a variety. Very amateurish in my opinion.Indoor play area for kids is a nightmare. Very poorly kept and can see broken down play items stacked in heaps.It is high time that a full revamp is done to regain past glory.

Name: PuneTravelbud
Title: Good landscaping
Review: Good landscaped garden is prepared around NTR memorial. But sad part is only half garden opens at 8  am and rest half opens at 12 pm. So if you want to see entire garden avoid in morning. Nice architecture on NTR memorial.

Name: SaiKumardaram
Title: Good place for Kids and parents to spend in Hyderabad.
Review: It is very good place for Kids and Parents to spend time in Hyderabad. Full of fun and delightful atmosphere.

Name: ravishtandon
Title: A beautiful place
Review: A beautiful garden. It was a wonderful place to visit earlier. It is good still but the old shine has gone. The government needs to revive it. But still, you can spend your evening with family. A cool place in busy Hyderabad.

Name: Devaa
Title: NTR Memorial!!!
Review: Right in the heart of the city on a sprawling garden is located this structure. Lot of people throng this place as it is close to Hussain sagar and has become a must in tourist guide.Toy train ride was nice for children and senior citizens.

Name: Reon Sylvester
Title: Beautiful gardens
Review: It's a vast area of garden and some rides. There is a good collection of bonsai trees and plants which was good to see. There is also a toy train which goes around the garden.

Name: kurukuntla raviteja
Title: NTR GARDEN
Review: NTR garden is located in Hyderabad near hussain Sagar there is playing garden for children's there we can play way games in the garden it is beautiful place to see we can enjoy with family and friends and couples etc defend you can enjoy it

Name: SRC4297
Title: Better place ever in Hyderabad
Review: Better place ever in Hyderabad to visit in the evenings with family, friends or a romantic partner. Rest assured, you'll have a great time. The good thing is, the closing time is 9 PM and I hope this will be enough to have a great evening.

Name: Sumit P
Title: Pay entry fee and shell out for every ride inside
Review: If you are ready to pay entry fee as well as a fee for every ride then you may visit it. Found it quite pricey. The free-stuff inside viz swings, see-saw are broken.

Name: 73prashantha
Title: Good for a one time visit
Review: Nice place for a one time visit. People usually spend half a day here. The toy train is worth a ride.

Name: convwp
Title: Good park to visit
Review: This is good park very near to Hussain Sagar Lake. Good place to visit with kids. Well maintained. Cleaning was great.

Name: Daniel T
Title: Crowds favorite
Review: Ever since it was opened to public, NTR gardens has been a hit for the larger crowds. Weekends the place is fully packed. You have some games to play, fun activities, food joints - all this makes it a good family enjoyment park.Good parking facilities around the park.

Name: Nish0901
Title: Nice Garden
Review: Must visit this garden if you are with kids. The garden was big and beautiful. It is on one side of Hussain Sagar Lake. Nice structures are built inside.

Name: rockzzM77
Title: Very Nice
Review: NTR park the famous park in Hyderabad city, visited here with my sister and her daughter, park was really nice.

Name: Khyati
Title: Beautiful
Review: This place is very nice to visit for kids plus adults..nice place to play for kids with good rides and slides and other play around they have .

Name: ramakrishnabanoth3
Title: Park with amazing view
Review: In memory of great leader NTR,all can have a view of this place .Can have fun with kids and friends in free time.

Name: Dilip kumar
Title: Best place to roam on roads
Review: This place has got its own nature and also lot of games are played here for kids,Must visit when visited to tankbund,

Name: RaF
Title: Overpriced for a noisy  and polluted garden.
Review: Over change  for taking cameras. At the same time people take photos  for free. The people controlling entry; men and women have different  attitudes. Men  were  comparatively  polite.

Name: prajwal212121
Title: nice park
Review: the garden is beautiful. the main attractions are the train and the water slide. there is a small botanical garden were you can find many kinds plants

Name: sravan s
Title: picnic place
Review: it is a small park which is around 36 acres. it is near to hussain sagar lake. it is a famiy picnic place and childrens can enjoy lot.

Name: ARUN63512
Title: NICE GARDEN
Review: A nice garden on the NTR marg, opposite LUMBINI GARDEN and the lake, nice to spend the evening. Well maintained.

Name: Shubh16
Title: Beauty of green
Review: The best part of a garden is peace that is in this garden............ The morning view of this garden is best in Hyderabad..................And some amazing enjoying side that ghost colony, whiling chair etc.Best part of this garden is for yogo or meditetion this is perfect partner in our lifeI'm in 19 so all the teen ageers are crazy to itself have a fun side in Hyderabad.........................

Name: shivaraikod
Title: ICONIC Garden
Review: The samadhi of Senior NTR is here and this garden is in the memory of this great Telugu actor and ex-EM of erstwhile united AP.

Name: SSSUUUNNNNNNYYY
Title: Good
Review: Visited with family n kids. It is at necklace road. nice and beautiful garden with a toy train and kids loved it.

Name: rajendra p
Title: Nice graden with N T R ghat.
Review: Fully crowded people. Starting of neklese road from here. Must visit in evening for more fun & entertainment.

Name: idea614354
Title: Park for fresh air
Review: NTR gardens a must visit for every one who comes hyderabad to visit, a good place for a  evening walk,

Name: nick_singh17
Title: Beautiful park.
Review: I liked it. Such green neat and clean park in the city near Hussein sagar lake. Park has a toy train and many different swings/games/ride. It was nice time pass for me

Name: Trending T
Title: Best place for Fun
Review: This place i have visited almost for many times and also got good fun whenever i visited this place and also you will get ample limited time to have fun.

Name: Abhilash K
Title: Good park
Review: It is named after the late cm of Andhra Pradesh Nandamuri Taraka ramarao. This is the place we can find his samadhi

Name: anshu119
Title: Nice Garden
Review: This is a nice garden very close to the Hussain Sagar Lake. Lots of greenery and lots of activities to be found over here. The NT Rama Rao memorial is quite unique. However, it is like most of the gardens in other cities. It is only worth having a look at if you have time to spare.

Name: Mazar sayed
Title: Picnic spot
Review: Spread across an area of 36 acres, NTR Gardens present a soothing atmosphere and refreshing setting to spend some time. The Garden offers various kinds of recreational options as well. Some of these are boat ride, Japanese garden, Roaring Cascade, a Fountain, etc. A mini train on a single track takes the visitors all around the garden making your visit all the more enjoyable.

Name: JainManoJ
Title: Enjoy the toy train in beautiful greenery.
Review: The most beautiful part of this park is toy train. You can enjoy with your family. Although there is 3D show and virtual world in a small plane , but not so good.

Name: rashinr2
Title: lovely garden
Review: would prefer after 4pm . big garden n rides but if u r going to ramoji then no need to rides. take train inside for covering the whole garden. then walk around n click pics!!!

Name: Karthik Dasu
Title: reasonly good one
Review: It is one of the better places to visit in Hyderabad.The greenary is quite good, Please do visit only if you have spare time.

Name: Sudarshan Dhaveji(the veggie)
Title: NTR garden
Review: This is a very big garden and also an old one. People come to take photo shoots as well. Good place to spend an evening.

Name: misshotelreviewer
Title: Give it a miss!
Review: Unless you are residing in Hyderabad, it is best to give the gardens a miss. It is like any other garden in a city with rides for kids, food stalls and couples looking to pass their time. If you are traveling with a child, you might want to spend some time here but it is not a must visit when in Hyderabad. It is a simple garden which has become a part of every itinerary and it is unnecessary. Unless you have too many days on hand and a lot of time to kill, skip the gardens.

Name: Srinivasarao K
Title: Very good place weekend relaxation
Review: This is one of the must place you should visit in your Hyderabad trip mostly for the people who like water games...

Name: Mani0726
Title: Emtertainment
Review: should visit along with family inorder to enjoy, if there are childrens in the family they will have  good timepass

Name: deepa v
Title: Nice park
Review: Place to go with kids.There are many rides for kids,food stalls and park for people to sit and relax in summers.Kids will love the place.

Name: Jitendra C
Title: Good place as a garden visit
Review: Garden is well maintained with a train to take a round trip to garden.Don't expect anything in rides or games zone.

Name: njydlife
Title: Good park
Review: Very nice park with mini train ride for children. Also has green lawns and play areas that exite kids

Name: utkarshsharma2912
Title: NTR garden is huge and Beautiful
Review: This is the best garden i have ever seen in my life, clan and beauty of this garden attract most of the tourist, all i wanna say i love this place.

Name: Nimmagadda D
Title: garden
Review: this is similar garden but it has some extra features like gaming some circus stunts will goes on i hope ,ost of the people will likes it  but not i

Name: jmodi1981
Title: Good Garden
Review: One of the very good and nice garden to see. Our group has enjoyed some very good moments with good memory.

Name: Ajitku
Title: Garden
Review: It is a famous garden. A large number of tourists visit this place daily. The decorations of the tree are amazing.

Name: Sumitkumar_13
Title: Clean
Review: NTR Garden is very well maintained and a peaceful place to relax once you are tired after a days trip

Name: 702jiteshk
Title: garden is very nice.
Review: garden is very good. there are diffrenet type of flowers and trees. at this garden. the kids and adult will love it.

Name: Makarand_Sadavarte
Title: It's really nice place, well maintained, must visit
Review: It's really nice place, well maintained, there is lots of things for kids to do, it is good for kid's and families as well.Things to do like Freefall, toy train, water slide, and other things.You will get some fast food stalls near to garden area, there is some food stalls I garden as well.

Name: Andrew D
Title: Quirky!
Review: At first, I thought this would be a subpar museum but it gets interesting very fast. There are many wacky vehicles such as stilletto cars, toilet cars, sofa cars! I would say spend about 45-60 minutes there.

Name: Jayavel D
Title: Nice Place
Review: Had visited the Car museum in Hyderabad. Very great place and the work done by Owner with the world record.

Name: Kiran
Title: Very bad
Review: It is very bad experience with the supervisors. They are very rude even on kids. They dont even wear the masks.Not allowing even to touch.. the way convey rule  is very very bad. Wash rooms very durty.This is private museum. The founder may be started with positive side. But the waste people are monitoring and they degrading the value of it. Entry ticket cost also high.

Name: nms01
Title: FUN FUN FUN!
Review: Omg! So much fun visiting a car museum which has cars in every possible shape and size and object! There are cars in the shape of a bed, a ladies handbag, a bat, a lipstick and even a CoronaVirus. There are so many clicking opportunities with interactive displays too! Loved it.. for a fun day out in the city!

Name: Kaushik G
Title: Amazing experience
Review: We had visited Sudha Cars Museum which is located close to the Zoo during our sightseeing in Hyderabad. Entrance tickets are priced at 50 rupees per person and another 50 rupees for taking pictures using mobile phone or camera. The place has a large collection of unique cars in variety of shapes and sizes. We saw cars shaped like large football, pencil, cricket bat, cake, Shiva lingam, insects and what not. We had not visited any such Museum before and it was an amazing experience.

Name: Ankur R
Title: Not worth it!
Review: The concept of a car museum is good but here they simply added wheels to any random shape. No mind applied if it is worth it or not. if you are a car enthusiast, definitely it's not the right place, but kids may enjoy it.

Name: Rahul S
Title: Very nice  old cars
Review: Very well maintained  & too much old  cars  in different  different  ways. So much attractive  for who  interested  in cars.

Name: Mittal28
Title: Awesome
Review: Please do visit once..its very nice..waste out of best they make from car and bike..very nice..fish spa is also there..

Name: Aravind D
Title: Nice place less maintenance
Review: The museum was great 2 years back, but now they are not being maintained. It is all with dirt and should have been cleaned.

Name: anandshivraj
Title: Amazing and innovative place!
Review: Amazing and outstanding place to see unique collection of hand made cars along with bikes and scooters models too. This place is covered with very eye catching colorful cars consisting of Cake Car, Shoe Car, Bag car, Bed Car, Insect car, Lotus car, Snooker car, eraser car etc. All these cars are operational and they are designed and built within short period of time. Kids will like this place very much and the one more advantage of this place is it is very near to Zoo park so if you happen to plan this place you can plan both this place as well as Zoo Park too. There are few bikes, scooters which are big in size and one can climb them and take some cool snaps. Ticket prices are also very nominal for Adults Rs. 60/- per head and kids above 3 years are charged too. Mobile and Camera ticket is must and they are charged at Rs. 60/-

Name: Bela
Title: Art in machines
Review: Must visit Reaching d place is a bit cumbersome Hats off to his imagination All working models Parking available Washrooms available

Name: Nikhil Shah
Title: CREATIVITY AT ITS PEAK!
Review: No other place will you get to see this! Something very different. The owner himself is also present here many times. Must go with small children.

Name: Nirmala Gokhale
Title: Nice innovations
Review: We dropped in at a wrong time.  It was raining and the water had logged inside the museum just outside the last shed.  The creations were really amazing.  This museum had featured in OMG-Yeh Mera India which attracted me to see the creations while staying in Hyderabad.  It was very unique experience.

Name: NIL_MODI
Title: Modifications at its best
Review: This udha Cars Museum has a collection of modified cars. Cars are beautifully modified and kept there for viewing. Nice place.

Name: Bulbul
Title: One of its kind
Review: Surprisingly, this museum is not a part of most of the itineraries for Hyderabad. The museum is one of its kind and displays cars designed in various shapes. Mr. K. Sudhakar, a  Guinness world record holder for designing the largest tricycle, has designed all these cars.' Ripley's Believe It or Not!' has also featured the museum on their show. I was amazed to look at the level of imagination that genius has.Unfortunately, the maintenance of the museum is poor.These cars are just not mere designs. All these innovative designed cars are operational and are often brought out of the museum for roadshows where people can see them being driven.

Name: amitthecreator
Title: Sudha Cars Museum
Review: Sudha Cars Museum is an interesting and unique place to visit; the first of its kind, not only in India but also in the world, it is a handmade car museum. This unique museum in Hyderabad has its theme around vintage cars and creative vehicles.

Name: Ravindra V
Title: One of its kind
Review: Has great collection of customized cars, bikes and cycles. It also has very old cars and bikes from world war time as well. This kind of museum is one of its kind in India. Some maintenance is required. Kids will like it. There are some cars placed near entrance which kids can try. Entry ticket is 50 INR per head and 50 INR for camera.

Name: Daniel T
Title: Worth a visit
Review: If you love creativity, then this place is worth a visit. You'll be surprised with the wide range of art at display. Kids will find it more amusing, than adults.You'll find larger than life replicas of objects we come across in daily life.Overall its a nice experience.

Name: ShvRm_Traveller
Title: Unique and interesting
Review: Sudha Car Museum is probably one of its kind museum in India. It is a Car museum per say, but the visitors find very few displays which can be classified as Cars in a classical sort of way. The Museum houses all sorts of model which are powered by engines transforming them into Automobiles.The Museum appears very interesting initially, however, when the visitor sees the same concept being used for most of the displays, the interest recedes. There are not many genuine vehicles from yester years on display.The place had many foot falls during out visit. visitors have buy entry tickets, but the amenities for the visitors such as, washrooms were very dirty.Overall, the place is unique and may be visited once.

Name: SRIKAKOLAPU
Title: crazy
Review: This museum has a unique crazy set of cars on display made by one passionate guy it seems and he has lot of creativity to create those

Name: GoWrong
Title: Whacky Weird Wonderful
Review: This guy must be one crazy inventor to have built all those amazing models. You can find cars which looking like shoes to dinosaurs. There is a big cycle here which is size to two storied building, and then there is one bike which must be barely 10 cm in heights. Absolutely crazy place

Name: mnrkrishnan
Title: Recognised by Guness book of record
Review: Sudha Cars Museum is an automobile museum located in Hyderabad, India. The museum displays "crazy cars" that resemble everyday objects like pen, Shoe, Billiard Table, FootBall, Burger and also Big type M/Cycles, Double decor Buses for movie shooting. These cars are designed and made by Kanyaboyina Sudhakar (known mainly as K. Sudhakar or K. Sudhakar Yadav) who started it as his hobby in his school days and opened the dedicated museum in 2010.  This museum is worth to see when you are in Hyderabad.  K.Sudhakar is a Guness World Record Holder. He has also been recognized by Repleys Believe it or Not.

Name: Mukta2016
Title: Sudha Cars Museum
Review: Sudha Cars museum is a interesting kind of museum where one man has turned his passion for different types of cars into a visual treat for the visitors. Our kids really enjoyed this place with different models of vintage cars were on display.

Name: Poonam S
Title: Great innovative museum of cars
Review: Very clever man who has invented these cute cars. Excellent innovation. Must visit area, in fact much better than the traditional historic places !

Name: Mandira P
Title: One of its' kind
Review: Really need to appreciate the efforts and the innovation of this guy, enjoyable for all age groups, small food stall also available, in case visiting wth kids.

Name: shivaraikod
Title: Vintage cars
Review: I always saw the vintage cars in the movies and this was the time when i had the first hand experience to feel these vintage cars so closely.

Name: Chetu1087
Title: Something differently amazing
Review: Quite a different experience with this attraction and something weird also. So much different theme based car seen which you can't even think of. Good place to visit.

Name: Devaa
Title: A one of a kind museum!!!
Review: A must visit for automobile lovers. The hand made modified 4 wheeler and 2 wheeler is a delight to watch. So beautifully crafted by hand and displayed. Its a one person effort and should not be missed.

Name: SRC4297
Title: Unique Museum
Review: A very unique display of modified cars and bikes. Very interesting. Shows how much heart Mr. Sudha has put into his work.

Name: Prashanth Narva
Title: Amazing automobile museum
Review: Been here with kids, it's an amazing experience for the kids, my son loved it... The  cars on display  are handmade

Name: samita p
Title: Sudhacars Museum
Review: If you don't visit it you miss it.The creativity in using spare parts of old automobiles in creating magnificent, unique cars is worth taking note of. The creator and his creation goes beyond your imagination. The models of ladoo car,cricket bat car,double bed car,....ganpati caretc.etc is what you can see here. And amazing thing is most of them are moving cars. In a recent visit with my school kids we were all thrilled to see so many variables. We were doubly privileged to have met the creator himself there.His unique office is something we loved the most. It's a Zara hatke...museum  experience. Must take your kids especially boys.

Name: mahavir
Title: Best wacky car museum
Review: It is really best whacky car museum. O was thrilled to see so many wacky cars like hemet car, camera car, and etc. It would be helpful id there is a slope like something so that physically challenged person can also really enjoy.

Name: Saket K
Title: worth watching. one of its kind
Review: worth watching. one of its kind. few models are really amazing. overall worth spending some time. recommended to plan visit along with Nehru zoological park as it is very nearby

Name: Twinkie09
Title: Fun car museum.
Review: This was a fun quick museum to see.  Great creativity to see all the different cars Sudha has created.  Can't believe they are all functional.  Fun place for big and young kids.

Name: Farheen
Title: UNIQUE &GUINESS WORD RECORD- CAR MUSEUM
Review: Full of entertainment..joy..technical & mechanical knowledge....students must visit for such an ideal place...i had visited with my friends and from entry to exit i used to do my mouth open  ..as WOWWWWW..

Name: Arun V
Title: Good car collection
Review: Hats-off to sudha & company for maintenance of this much car collections.It is worthless for car lovers.only need maximum 30 minutes to cover.

Name: Abhilash K
Title: Great monuments
Review: We can found very old cars here and even I loved the place which is very good to visit with my friends...I love cars

Name: Rajesh_in
Title: Interesting collection of Modified cars
Review: I happened to visit Sudha Cars Museum during my visit to Hyderabad this time and was pleasantly surprised to see this car museum. There are 154 modified cars ,in different shapes and as indicated by the museum they are all in working condition. Very interesting to see the passion and creativity in creating such innovative designs.

Name: Meghaa R
Title: Amazing and interesting
Review: This car museum is really very amazing and interesting, it's fun to see all different types of cars with its different sizes and shapes, should really visit this place once and enjoy

Name: DrAtri
Title: Wow
Review: A wonderful place. This place deserves to be a wonder of the world. Exciting to think how can one man achieve such a collection of marvels for enjoyment of all. Strongly recommend to everyone

Name: PsinghIndia09
Title: The beauty of Sudha cars-Hyderabad
Review: A must explore place and museum here. Sudha cars is internationally acclaimed. Must visit for children. variety of car modifications, designers.

Name: swapnali v
Title: Crazy cars
Review: Thought of creating cars of different shape is very unique. Innovative, crazy cars. Loved it. You can see car of shapes-helmet, sofa, lipstick, compact, kite, computer, shivling, balls. You have many vintage cars and world war II vehicles there.

Name: Anand M
Title: Just Brilliant
Review: This is a must visit - The creativity is just tooo good .Each & every car/vehicle has a theme & also very nicely done.Kids & Adults will have a nice time .... Fish Spa also inside ... relaxing experience .

Name: Sumitkumar_13
Title: Interesting
Review: Sudha Cars Museum provides rare opportunity to see imaginative cars. All type of car shapes are available here for clicking photos.

Name: 702jiteshk
Title: different types of cars
Review: there are various type of cars . there is the entry for it. here you will find different types of car . its in a genius book of world records for different types of unbelievable cars.

Name: Sumeet I
Title: Appreciate creativity
Review: The way the cars are made is awesome.Most appreciable is the art of converting any shape into car or vehicle.Though it's small one and you can watch the whole museum in less than  30 minutes the creativity in making different wacky cars is awesome.

Name: cbk2911
Title: Awesome Museum
Review: In case you are a car lover, you must visit this museum to see all possible more than 150 options available such as sofa, cup and soccer, pen, book, bat etc in which care are made. The tricycle & jeep kept outside are the picture perfect spots.

Name: KVS17
Title: must visit for car lovers
Review: this is something different from i have seen, the cars are made in different shapes or of all the things which we cannot imagine can become into a car. its a must visit place

Name: Kirantp
Title: Will be interesting for  Creative people
Review: Parking is free.Ticket charge was approx 50 INR.Need to take separate ticket for Taking pics.The founder's hobby turned to a museum is an opportunity for people to experience the various levels people can do for their passion.Amazing creativity and efforts  in building motorable items from book,pen,balls,shoes and what not.Also a small collection of Vintage cars.The Display is inside a Warehouse and is hot inside,not air-conditioned.So won't suggest during Summer time or noon time.Can complete the tour in 1 hour.

Name: kkaushik2015
Title: good for kids
Review: must visit place .....ripley BION....GWR....place...take kids with you and even for adults and elderly people this place is good....washroom available.....they charge separately for photo camera ( even cell cam)

Name: LadyRider
Title: Creative cars by a single man! Inspiring!
Review: This is so inspiring to see a man who devoted his life to his passion! So many unique vehicles in 1 place created by 1 man - the most inspiring museum in my life so far! Probably you need to be an open minded vehicle lover to enjoy the place, though if you are - you will be in love with this museum. I admire Mr. Sudha, and I wish more and more people in the world can have opportunity to follow own passion in life and create that cool and crazy stuff, breaking the limits and motivating others!Thanks Mr. Sudha! :)

Name: Hemaushu K
Title: Wonderful
Review: This museum have awesome cars and bikes.there are old buses and auto rickrows which are gone by time.there are cars made in shape of cups,camera and toilet etc.

Name: Vivek G
Title: Superb and unique Museum
Review: Really felt proud to have such a museum of over 500 working cars in different peculiar shapes in India. The idea is really awesome. They have all sorts of day to day things like lipstick, Purse, Shoe etc etc in the form of a working car. The have some old original vehicles used in WWII as well as luxurious cars like Rolce Royce. Honoured to meet the Curator Mr Sudhakar there. He is a very humble man. A MUST VISIT

Name: sudeshrele
Title: Best Car Museum Ever seen
Review: We were awestruck after visiting this museum wherein the visiting charges are very economical to see wonderful cars made in saucer & cup, pen, sofa set. There are more than 100 models worth seeing. Triple cycle is such a huge one & amusement for all of us.

Name: clausen d
Title: Car museum
Review: Be prepared to be fascinated by the car creations. Not a normal car museum like we would generally associate, but houses creations of different kinds of cars such as cup-car, christmas tree car, bed-car, etc which are all workable. Go just for seeing the creativity and inventiveness.

Name: Parag S
Title: Good place to visit to see cars of different shapes
Review: Nice place to visit if you are fond of watching cars of different shapes. The place also has some old collection of vehicles. Children enjoy watching cars of various shapes like cake, bat, etc.

Name: kartik1402
Title: unique & incredible
Review: one man's hobby, imagination &skill has manifested into sudha car museum. its quite an interesting place, where you'll get to see a vehicle made in form of daily object. there are some vintage cars too. it should take half an hour to 45 minutes to go around the place and see the exhibits. this place is very close to nehru zoo, one can combine visits to both the places.

Name: RamMeher
Title: Sheer waste of time
Review: I visited Sudha Car museum on Jan 15 2018 reading the reviews on trip advisor . I was hoping to spend 2 to 3 hours there and packed lunch . The ticket price was 50 Rs and they charged even for my 4 year old daughter full ticket price . You will finish the entire car museum in 30 minutes . The space is not big to have lunch there . The employees are trying to sell their CD priced at 100 Rs . Unfortunately it was Monday and the Zoo was closed . Overall don't visit it unless you are a car enthusiast.

Name: ghanshyamb2017
Title: Good place to visit
Review: Visited this place last month. And many diiFerent types of vehicles. Never seen such type in india. Best place to visit if u area a vehicle lover. The biggest tricycle in the world is the best one to see which has won the guiness world record. It is huge. Such a museum is one of its kind.

Name: Dipesh B
Title: Best hand made car museum. Kids enjoy
Review: This museum has numerous cars that are hand made, in different shapes, sizes and engines. All are working models. They have a good collection of World War II vehicles. It is an interesting place to appriciate the creativity. Kids enjoy the place.

Name: Rayomand P
Title: Amazing...Must Visit
Review: This place is a real gem hidden though a bit far from the city centre. It is highly recommended as you would not be disappointed. It is not over crowded like the other over hyped tourist attractions in the old city. The staff is friendly and polite. Would love to visit again whenever I am in Hyderabad and also recommend it to friends if they are visiting Hyderabad.

Name: MaheshKhopkar
Title: Sudha Car Museum
Review: The ultimate museum of its kind. Everyone can enjoy various types of car models from different decades. Museum having bike collection from early 19th century. Cars of different shape and sizes are very nice.

Name: TrravvelIndia
Title: Not a Museum.... But a has a Different car collections
Review: Let me tell you it is not a museum with vintage cars. There are few vintage car models.But majorly this has car museum has cars with different models like computer, bat, eraser, sharpener, ball etc. All cars are working conditions.Visit only if you have spare time can also be skipped.

Name: KMMAHAVADI
Title: intrested person
Review: one should have time, interest, money, courage to run such place. nice collections and creations here.

Name: clfurn
Title: As a lover of cars, this isn't really a car museum
Review: I was a little disappointed.  Basically he fabricates a fairly detailed object and puts a small gas powered engine in it with a steering wheel. I view it as more campy than real car museum.  I was a good activity to kill 2 1/2 hours.

Name: Bimal0401
Title: Some thing different to have it.
Review: The Sudha Cars Museum is place with wonder where one will find cars in different models, shapes etc. The neat and clean Museum is must visit to witness the mind blowing creation in automobile field. The Museum is must visit by all the age group especially small children.

Name: hemang m
Title: A treat for Car Lovers
Review: This place is a real treat for all the car lovers. From outside it seems to be a small cramped place, but once you go in & backside, boy o boy, you'll take back your words.So many different types of cars, its just unthinkable about how someone can be so creative to make so many types of cars.Double decker car, vintage car, cars in the shape of a football, lord shiva car, shoe car, cake car, cricket ball car, PC Car, Laddoo car, Camera Car, Burger Car, Cup & Saucer car etc etc, the list is endless.Awesome is an under statement for this place.Take your time to visit this place, as its simply mind-blowing. PS: Just like other places in Hyd, even here there are camera charges.In a nutshell:Can it be recommended - Hell Yes !Child & Adult Friendly - CertainlyWorth a 2nd visit - AbsolutelyAccessible from the city - YesStaff - Friendly, co-operative.Entry Fee - Affordable & mainly, worth the price paid

Name: Footprints727663
Title: Big Museum
Review: I went to Sudha Cars Museum. Sudha Cars Museum is located at Bahadurpura about 6 km from center of Hyderabad. It was established by Mr. Sudhakar, who was interested in motors from his schooling. This museum is first and only handmade Wacky Car museum in the World and has also achieved Guinness World Record for making the Largest Tricycle in the World. It is great place to go.

Name: lovetravelonly
Title: Car Museum
Review: A typical museum for car and a big treat for car lovers. Many cars which are in running condition. A variety of shapes and sizes of cars seen. There are some huge car models at the entrance. A big wow slips off our mouth when we enter.

Name: bujji16
Title: must see in hyderabad
Review: had heard about this . so made sure we visited.we had the pleasure of meeting Mr. sudhakar . he explained in length about his achievements

Name: menonCGN
Title: A misnomer!
Review: I went there expecting to see vintage cars and vehicles of historical significance; but what the 'museum' had was crudely built replicas and some vehicles like a 1950 model Fiat! It is not a museum at all. I felt it as just a junk yard. Hence the choice of title for this review. My advice to the enthusiasts of automobiles or vintage vehicles; please do not waste your time and money by visiting this place while you are in Hyderabad.

Name: Santanu D
Title: Definitely Visit. Its Awesome :)
Review: I planned to visit this place and thought that few vintage cars will be there, but what I see was great. There are a lot of cars in working condition of different shapes and sizes totally unexpected. We spent around 3 hr to see all cars . there are 3 big halls accommodating more than 300 cars. All are working and maintained well. The entry ticket is 50 and for camera another 50INR . So Its a must visit place. Thanks

Name: avenkat2016
Title: lots of different shaped "cars"
Review: tourist spot. visit only if you have young kids who like cars. funny to see attenders trying to upsell and hawk dvds at this location. basically a museum made up of one mans hobby.

Name: Nikhil Vashisht
Title: Wow is the word for Mr. Sudha-Car !
Review: Amazingly awesome place, with a loads of unique/crazy cars. The designs varies from Brinjal, Handbag, Sofa, Bed, Lipstick, Helmet, Cup-Saucer etc. All cars are drive-able and the best part is the huge car installed at the gate. Enjoyed it to the fullest

Name: Thakkarmeister
Title: Fun place for the kids
Review: Our 4 year old enjoyed a lot. Lots of cars which are supposedly in running condition and come in a variety of shapes and sizes. Think in terms of Coputer shaped car, tennis ballo shaped car, Cup and Saucer shaped car...etc. There are some huge car models at the entrance that the children can climb into and play and take pictures. There is a small canteen on site serving water, soft drinks and chips. Worth the Rs 50 entry. We enjoyed just looking at the excitement of our son.

Name: sharmasanjeev2017
Title: Good place for kids who love cars or automobiles
Review: Really nice display of working models of all sorts of cars.. that one can imagine. our kid just loved it.We reached little late beyond 6 when they close but they were kind enough to accommodate for kid sake.

Name: Suresh B
Title: Not too great
Review: It's a private collection of cars in different shapes and sizes such as cricket bat, burger etc. All the cars are working models but you cannot drive them of course. They are shown working in a car event which is conducted once in two years. Nothing much to see unless you are a car enthusiast but it is close to zoo hence both the visits can be clubbed. It will take you about 30-45 minutes to see the museum. It is open from 9.30 AM to 6.30 PM and the ticket is priced at Rs. 50 for everyone over 3 years. if you want to click pictures then that costs extra.

Name: Chandrasekar R
Title: Skills of an Individual
Review: As a part of One-day city tour organized by Royal Travels, visited this Cars Museum. Car lovers may like this place very much but for others, it does not look very great!

Name: Pramod N
Title: Innovative Car Designs
Review: It great for children to watch innovative car designs made of many things. and hats off to the makers as well. only they should reduce the fees.

Name: Jimmy B
Title: unexpected museum, worth a visit
Review: In Hyderabad, tourists may feel there is not much to do,  and this museum doens't come first in the suggestions.It's a mistake because it is very interesting to see how genious is the owner to build such strange "cars".Suitable for children:

Name: BhautikVVaidya
Title: A very unique palace having beautiful art made with cars
Review: If you like automobiles you should see Sudha Cars Museum at Hyderabad. It has unique ways of exhibiting cars made in shapes of pencils, pens, erasers, cups and other funny objects and, believe it or not, they all work! They are shown working in a car event. But you cannot take pictures because taking cameras is charged extra (more than the ticket of a person), which is not worth. There is even the biggest tricycle in the world (noted in the Guinness book of world records). There is also a huge car that is over two stories tall! It only takes about one hour to complete.

Name: debashreen2018
Title: Nice experience
Review: We went to Hyderabad for medical check up. Got one day free and so went for local sightseeing. Sudha cars muesum is a unique place. Never seen such kind of cars. Good place to roam around and click some pictures of unique car designs like shoe car ,cake car, pencil car and laddu car with Ganesha.

Name: Jamila N
Title: Super car museum
Review: This is a must visit for kids and adults both. It comes on the way to the zoo. It has a collection of all different types of cars and that to in working condition.

Name: Martin Short
Title: Good for car fans
Review: It seems most of the cars in this museum if you can call it that were made by the owner and not originals, but saying that was an enjoyable few minutes as it isnt a large place. Cant say it is a must place to go but okay.

Name: James K
Title: Excellent Attraction
Review: Most enjoyable visit to Hyderabad's best Car Museum and saw some really beautiful old and vintage Cars.  We met the owner of this museum at an event and were glad to take him up on his recommendation to visit the facility.  We were welcomed with great Indian hospitality.  Thank you so much.

Name: Lalbahadur
Title: unique place
Review: One of its kind and unique. Lots of Modified cars and running condition vehicle of different shapes like pen, bat, cup, flower, bed, house, football, cricket ball, cake etc etc. There are many interesting cars to see which i didnt found anywhere. Nice collection. A must visit of hyderabad.

Name: BRKanth
Title: Man made new Machine Mesuem
Review: Best place to see some hand crafted Cars with in the city limits. Good to visit along with Kids as they love them. Most of the vehicles are working.

Name: Rahul B
Title: amazing
Review: the collection of cars were amazing. most of them also work. kids will love it . could not see the biggest car from inside as there was some repair work going on

Name: Hiral Amodia
Title: This is one place that fascinated us the most among all the places that we visited at Hyderabad.
Review: Charminar, Golkonda, Hussain Sagar, Ramoji, Biryani, Haleem, Samosa, Irani Chaai, Osmania Biscits, Karachi Bakey, Shopping… Like any other traveler, these were on our list of activities to be done at Hyderabad. But we were so fortunate that a friend suggested us to visit Sudhar Cars Museum and we obeyed him.This is one place that fascinated us the most among all the places that we visited at Hyderabad.About:Sudha Cars Museum is the first and only handmade Wacky Car Museum in the World. It is the brainchild of Mr. K. Sudhakar, a Guinness World Record Holder for making the Largest Tricycle in theWorld. Sudha Cars Museum location is highly accessible and is located very near to The Char Minar. Majority of the people there know the location and Google Maps is also accurate with its location.Sudha Cars Museum is the first and only handmade Wacky Car Museum in the World. It is the brainchild of Mr. K. Sudhakar, a Guinness World Record Holder for making the Largest Tricycle in theWorld. Sudha Cars Museum location is highly accessible and is located very near to The Char Minar. Majority of the people there know the location and Google Maps is also accurate with its location.Said this, it is not just another Car Museum displaying cars of different types and makes or vintage and sports cars.Your imagination will blow out by knowing that this is a huge museum that contains vehicle attractions in below categories:a). Whacky Cars/Vehicles: Handmade vehicles in shape of Burger, Pencil, Computer, Double Bed, Cricket Bat, Lipstick, Sofa Set, Toilet Seat … and what not. Leave yourself astonished at the sight of these creations of Mr K. Sudhakar which he has made by himself in his workshop. And the best part is that all these cars are in working condition. b). Vintage & Restored Cars/Vehicles: You will be able to see some exciting Vintage and Restored cars like – Fiat, Rolls Royce, Hindustan Motors, Moris etc. This will give a glimpse into the interesting cars of the past. c). Bikes and Cycles:Mr K Sudhakar holds are Guiness Records for making the Largets Tricycle in the World. Here you will be able to see cycles and tricycles in different shapes. Also you will see some adrenaline pumping bike modifications.d). Other: You will also be able to see some exciting stuffs like – Double Decker bus, toy train and toy cars, Modified electric cars, Bike-Cars and much more.All this exciting fun is at a humble 50 Rs entree fees for adults.I am intentionally keeping a small write-up for this post, as the pics will do a better justice.More about Sudha Cars Museum images & on their website.

Name: Arushi K
Title: One time watch, nothing much
Review: There is various design of car but it does not seems that interesting. Kids might find it little interesting but not for adult. Waste of money.

Name: Ambati K
Title: Super
Review: In this musem we can see a lot a cars from first cars there are a huge cars like vintage,benz......etc

Name: Rajesh358
Title: It is worthless to visit as cars are too much far and no space to take pic.
Review: Price is high compare to other museum. All executives are unprofessional.You can't even touch the car and you can watch far from 10 feet ,even don't have much space to take good photographs. dust is all around and no proper cooling and space.  Even you can see in better way on internet pic. I will say that is full of wastage of time and money and effort. You will came to know ,after watching it personally.

Name: Sudha G
Title: Best for Kinds
Review: There are almost every model of vehicles viz vintage cars, every type of vehicles in the miniature of fruits, vegetables etc.  They are providing CD and books for the visitors @Rs.100 & 150 each.

Name: PrabalDas
Title: Sooooo Many Cars.....
Review: A must see for the tourists especially children. There are lots of cars in different shapes & sizes like, cricket bat, tea cup, bed, pen and many more. Don't miss it.

Name: Bhrt
Title: Amazing Place!
Review: An amazing display of the master creation of the world record holders master creation in the making of any i mean any kind of vehicle. He has made vehicle in the shape of ball,bat, condom,house etc..,. He has also made a three floor high tricycle and also there is this funky sitting bench made up of shock absorbers in this museum for public seating. A must visit if your visiting hyderabad on a tour.

Name: VipinSaini
Title: Very Unique and Amazing Place to Visit if You Love Cars
Review: Sudha Cars Museum is Nice Place to visit and Know the Creativity Level with The cars. Very Unique Concept. Amazing. Must Visit Once.

Name: san_vai
Title: passion rulled here
Review: good inspiration for someone who wants to do something different, how passion can mould  your life. worth giving some time. mostly Automotive modification.

Name: Ashish Sabnis
Title: One of its kind
Review: Sudha cars museum is totally unique. I haven't heard of such a museum at least in India. U can feel the passion of Mr.Sudhakar as you go around in the museum. Leisure viewing will take an hour. It's very close to the zoo and approx 2km from Chowmahalla palace. Kids, adults all will enjoy this museum visit.

Name: PK Das
Title: Unique Museum
Review: Innovation is the word comes in mind after visiting this place. The innovator of this museum has turned everything he likes into a car that too tested & certified. Thats why imagination & Innovation has no limit if have that guts too do it.Great place to visit without fail.

Name: jessicas1301
Title: Hidden jem of Hyderabad!
Review: This place is certainly a hidden jem of Hyderabad! The customized cars are beautiful! Each is unique and well crafted. They are real cars, working condition, made in several shapes and sizes - cricket bat, ball, computer, sandal, lipstick, purse, etc. A place not to miss, especially if you have children and teens.

Name: Riddhiman Roy
Title: Very serene temple
Review: The Universal Temple of Sri Ramakrishna is such an amazing place to spend a day. The atmosphere is so spiritual and calm. Ideal for meditation and worship.

Name: arinds
Title: Wonderful and peaceful place
Review: I had visited this place multiple times, a great place to get peace and spiritual tranquility. A great place

Name: Kaushik G
Title: Very peaceful ambiance
Review: Ramakrishna Math is located right opposite Indira Park and we had visited the same during our sightseeing in Hyderabad. We liked the peaceful atmosphere of the place. We had to keep our shoes in the shoe stand before entering the temple which is dedicated to Lord Ramakrishna, Sarada Ma, Swami Vivekananda. People were sitting in the big hall and meditating at the top floor while devotional music was going on in the ground floor of the temple- it was very peaceful ambiance.

Name: Veer2468
Title: Peaceful temple
Review: This is a really peaceful temple to visit in Hyderabad. The temple is centrally located. Very divine place to visit.

Name: Colonel Anupam Purohit 2014
Title: Temple Of Peace and Tranquility
Review: Centrally Located and easy to access,this  Holy Place has an ambience of serenity  and devotion.Besides it's spiritual significance, 'The Math' is dedicated to the Field of Education with their Institution for Foreign Languages where students of all age groups have an opportunity to learn English,French,German,Spanish etc.Spend some time to meditate in the Prayer Hall to  experience solace and peace of mind.

Name: prudhvi
Title: Very peaceful place
Review: Very peaceful place located in the centre of the city.Nearer to the tank bund.A wide variety of books are sold about swamy vivekananda.Motivational quotes books ,charts are sold here.Inside the temple it is very peaceful.It is well maintained by the organisation.A must place to visit if you are planning to visit tank bund

Name: BRL RAO
Title: Magnanimity of the place
Review: This place is an heavenly place and who enters into it feel some vibrations of the greatness of Sri Ramakrishna Paramhansa and his disciple Sri Swami Vivekananda. Its a worth experience

Name: debasis d
Title: If you need peace of mind visit this place
Review: This place is absolutely unique. It’s in Domaliguda. You can visit the small shop where Swami Vivekananda and Ramkrishna books are sold . The best place is the Prayers room on the first floor. You have to remove your shoes before entering . Just take your place . Sit there. There is no sound . Pin drop silence. You sit for hours there and forget all your troubles . Peace is everywhere and you just feel it.

Name: sree143in
Title: Peaceful Place
Review: Sri Ramakrishna Math is a very peaceful place with a lot of people visits here. but no disturbance to any others.

Name: Lokesh1981
Title: Cultural heritage of Hyderabad
Review: One of the iconic & spiritual cultural heritage of Hyderabad, situated near Indira park & snow house, very close to Hussain Sagar, neatly maintained, one of the branch of Ramakrishna math Belur, peaceful place, They conduct many useful courses life personal management, foreign language courses etc, they conduct many cultural functions and social welfare events, Durgapuja celebration during Navratri is one of the flagship events of this society,Personal suggestion: They have some regular morning & evening classes on personal management, I have seen personally many people benefiting from those courses, it brings phenomenal & breakthrough changes in personal attributes, one may give a try if needed !!!!!!

Name: Sounak Poddar
Title: Ramakrishna Math
Review: Being a student Ramakrishna Mission, it was quite unavoidable for me to not to visit this place in Hyderabad. My sister, Brother-in-law and I visited this place during this Durga Puja and to be honest, it was my sister's idea actually so we had to tag along with her. During Durga Puja, this place looks different, although I have not visited this place before, i can tell that from experience.

Name: Shuddho G
Title: Peaceful and amazing during Durga Puja
Review: I have been here on a normal day and during Durga Puja.While its serene and peaceful on a regular day the enviornment changes to being electrifying during Durga Puja.

Name: BhaskarVVB
Title: Durga Puja pandal
Review: Great 70+ years old Durga Puja pandal in the running in the city. One of the best in town. Authentic Bengali idol, worthwhile to visit with family. Traffic can be a challenge, watch out for relatively free roads to get to the destination. Shubho Bijaya!

Name: darbha
Title: Great place for learning and meditation
Review: very peaceful place for meditation and learning on leadership and personality development as taught by vivekananda

Name: NEMMARAPARAMESWARAN
Title: Nice place for Meditation
Review: Really the visit to this place is religious and lot of social activities are happening like Medical check up at minimum charges which is very help full to poor people

Name: sivalenkasridhar
Title: Very Peaceful place
Review: Should visit to experience the silence in the meditation halls and the passion with which the Matt is maintained

Name: RajeshKota
Title: Place for personal excellence
Review: Ramakrishna Math has been a popular institution for personal excellence catering trainings in multiple languages (Indian and foreign), personality development, spiritual alignment, community services and many more human developmental aspects. A great place to discipline one's self and get onto righteous path.

Name: TravelEnthusiast
Title: The Best math that inspires and improves the lives of Lakhs of youth
Review: This is one of the best maths that I have ever visited in my life. They have many programs to develop personality, spoken skills and yoga. You must definitely be a student here at least once in your life. There are yoga classes, meditation programmes,bhajans conducted everyday. You must not miss the prayer here. Because the prayer opens many new opportunities and improves the creativity in your life.So please do visit this place and find the difference and become a devotee of these swamijis.

Name: karthikakavya
Title: Divine & Spiritual Aura
