Review: in this place you can listen and get motivated with speech of very experienced speech gives also this place has a lot of peaceful environment further there are lots of inspiring and aspiring books that one can change into a good way .overall it's a very good place if you want to have some decent time knowing yourself and improving your in peace and everything .

Name: Vikram
Title: Visit with friend to experience the spiritual aura
Review: The Math is in the midst of the city and yet has some quiet and peaceful character. The staff tend to be vernacular and don't help with those who cannot speak Telugu. They sell books and other wares related to the Mission and teachings. My hope of getting some quiet peaceful time to connect with my God was not fulfilled as they seemed to have some functions. I was sad. I was told that functions happen most days.

Name: reubenranjanfern2017
Title: Nice and peaceful location.
Review: Peace, Serene and calmness define this place. One can meditate or exercise here. This is a public place.

Name: Mukta2016
Title: Sri Ramakrishna Math
Review: Sri Ram Krishna Math in Hyderabad is centrally located near the NT Rama Rao Park. The Math like other Ramakrishna Maths in India is a peaceful place with well maintained lawns and gardens. The place offers courses in Various traditional subjects and is also a good place for meditation.

Name: Srinsiri
Title: Do meditation here
Review: Place is very calm amongst the lush green public park opposite. Do your meditation and yoga. There are many who will help you

Name: Srijata H M
Title: Peaceful
Review: This is on of the most tranquil places in Hyderabad. One can meditate and forget the daily grind. They offer foreign language classes and and a wholesome experience of goddess Kali's abode.

Name: gkshyd
Title: My RK math visit in Kolkata
Review: A must visit place by the side of hoogly river.Also called as Belum Math.Maintained clean and green.The museum and the exbits associated with the life of Ramakrishna parama hamsa, Vivekananda and Sarada matha are excellent.The big main shrine of RKP is very very devotional and One can have the holy meditation.I suggest to travel by motor boat/launch from Howrah railway station to RK math and then go to Dkshineswar mandir on the other side of river in the evening to night where we can enjoy boat journey as well as beautiful illuminated Howrah bridge or Ravindra Sethu.Launch journey is dam cheap as well as time saving in the busy Kolkata city roads of jamming.Dakshineswar Mandir is also a must bist shrine.

Name: Dilip kumar
Title: Peaceful place
Review: This place will make your mind peace and fill it with lots of coolness.Takes all your memories to good and you will feel better.

Name: k7591
Title: library cum cultural place
Review: Calm lawn with a good library.Opposite to indira park. Good to spend time in evenings after a stroll in the park.

Name: YatriForever
Title: Quest for Gyana ( Universal Knowledge)
Review: I was here to listen to a discourse. Am so glad I came. Meditating here is so calming. Visiting here is a great way to initiate the youth into the journey of knowledge about the great culture of this nation. It's so important for Hyderabad !I would put this on must visit list of Hyderabad, irrespective of the spiritual inclination and quest.Date of experience: February 2019

Name: Allahari Giridhar
Title: Peaceful place
Review: This place is located centre of the city. Nice place to go alone. Reaching this place is very simple.  It very near to NTR Park. Indira park and Tank Bund Hussain sagar lake. One of the place which every tourist should visit.

Name: crsarma
Title: A peaceful place for meditation and spiritual interaction in mddle of Hyderabad
Review: This is a Math (Monastery) peaceful and with spiritual ambience. The Shrine is awesome and attached is a book store with home publications and others. There is a school of Human Excellence where lots of languages national and international are taught. Its a must visit and I do enjoy visiting this place and meditating/reminiscing.One would certainly love this place irrespective of cast creed and religion

Name: siva j
Title: Serene and great spiritual experience
Review: Must visit if you wish to run away from your daily routine and experience a serene and spiritual place.Meditation hall will be pretty peaceful, can buy books and other stuff related to spirituality. They have free spoken english classes running as well.Very calm, soothing, green surroundings, which makes you feel sad to leave the place at the end of the day.

Name: SRIKAKOLAPU
Title: nice
Review: Cant rate this place and its spiritiual placeof hyderabad with calmness all over.They teach foreign languages

Name: Daniel T
Title: Recognizable place in Hyderabad
Review: Anyone living around the heart of Hyd city will surely know about this place. From  yoga classes, to foreign language tutions this place offers wide variety of courses to youth.Kids also have summer coaching classes here.

Name: Sumit S
Title: Peace and solace
Review: It is not a tourist spot as such. you must visit this place if you want to learn and follow there way of living

Name: uconsultgroup
Title: RK mutt,Hyderabad for youth
Review: Sree Ramakrishna mutt,is centrally located.The youth activities of personality development,yoga programmes are acclaimed by the youth.The spiritual programmes and health services for the public are dedicated.

Name: Dr P V L
Title: Seen better days
Review: Used to be a quiet place or meditation and breathing some fresh air right in the centre of city. However, more recently there is great empasis on courses and hence crowds of people whether they believe in those values or no.

Name: MUKKU S M R S
Title: Vivekananda Math
Review: Sri Ramakrishna Math is one of the Most peaceful places in the city Hyderabad. It has great views to see in side of the Math.

Name: venkat k
Title: Very good trust
Review: I visited this place for my dental problem and got treated well. Good place for people who want learn languages.

Name: Dinesh_cbe
Title: Spiritual
Review: This ashram is filled with positivity and one can feel the serenity all over here. They conduct language classes for mere fees. Lectures are useful for living a peaceful life. Cleanliness is excellent.

Name: ranjeeth kumar ... a
Title: Knowledge bowl
Review: Peace n tranquility of ashram and knowledge we gain is awesome. Love to visit again n again. Specially spoken English course is the best

Name: LAL KISHORE K
Title: SPIRITUAL ABODE ,SRI RAMAKRISHNA MATH, HYDERABAD
Review: This is a spiritual place for meditation,peace and tranquility.One can do meditation in complete silence in the meditation hall.Prayers are made at fixed timings .This is a worthy place to visit in Hyderabad. This is located ,opposite to Indira park on the lower tank bund road .

Name: SoloMTraveler
Title: Good for learning Foreign Languages and Yoga classes
Review: I came to know this place when I want to learn any foreign language. They provide teaching very less (assume almost free) cost. Very neat, calm and disciplined organization.

Name: dilip Tk
Title: Peaceful place
Review: Have been here for a yoga course ! Whole place is very peaceful and with good vibes around. Best part is the way they maintained cleanliness was much appreciated

Name: Trending T
Title: Famous for classes
Review: This place has got its uniquess and calmness where you can make yourself comfortable and feel like heaven and also makes your visit trustworthy.

Name: Devaa
Title: A place to rest oneself in midst of crowd!!!
Review: A nice calm and quite place opposite Indira park. People who would like to know the teaching of Ramakrishna and Vivekananda this is the right place.Like the peaceful nature of the place.

Name: Naveena C K
Title: Great place
Review: One of the best places in Hyderabad for learning esp for Youth. Human excellence center, Gita Bhavan, large prayer hall, and regular lectures make this place a must visit.

Name: Purna67
Title: A place to seek solace
Review: Situated right on the main road yet the place is so calm & quiet that worshipers can meditate. The main mandir has a bronze statue of Sri Ramakrishna, photographs of Sri Sri Sarada Maa, Swami Vivekananda& other sanyasis of the Ramakrishna order.Visited the place during durga puja & the experience is beyond words

Name: deepa v
Title: Peaceful
Review: It's a very peaceful place where one can meditate,learn courses in yoga English and spend some time in peace...

Name: Sourabh D
Title: Peaceful and well managed
Review: Huge premise; Treasure of books and literature on Vivekananda and Ramakrishna Paramhansa.Never expected such a place in the heart of the city. Definitely worth a visit or more, for the spiritually inclined.

Name: panii2015
Title: Service Oriented
Review: Nice place to mediate and this is the place for Seva. Its place for  spiritual and humanity. and best educational institute who can learn English and foreign languages.  You can find excellent support and kind from the devotees here.

Name: srinath18
Title: Peaceful location
Review: One of the most peaceful math in Hyderabad ie ramakrishna math...people will spend here silently some students will learn English speaking courses here .totally ramakrsihna math is very decent and devotional place in Hyderabad

Name: Sunil G
Title: Best place for meditation
Review: Its a Best place for meditation and one can forget all their hardships and sorrows. Pin drop silence is maintained.

Name: chandrasekhar g
Title: Good for learning center
Review: Located in indira park road.RTC buses facility is available.They provide spoken English, personality development and yoga

Name: Sreekanth M
Title: Very nice place for Meditation.
Review: Very nice place to introduce Hindu religion to children. Very great collection of books to buy. Conducts interesting seminars.

Name: Vivek G
Title: A peaceful Place
Review: The place is very peaceful. It was raining heavily when I visited this place. The place is having a temple inside, and many conventions are held here

Name: Ganesh N
Title: Sri Ramakrishna Math
Review: good place u can learn lot of things i went to there for free spoken english class pleasant nature and good people

Name: srk-rk
Title: Excellent Institution
Review: Ramakrishna Math is an excellent institution. It offers guidance for good and purposeful life. There is an excellent temple to pray and meditate. For knowledge seekers there is  good library and  book store. Students can learn languages such as sanskrit, english and foreign languages like German etc.at very low fees. There is a health center catering to poor. The Math runs an excellent summer camp for children and young adults teaching them discipline and good values. An excellent institution doing great service.

Name: nisithmandla
Title: one of the best institutions every student will benefit from it for a lifetime
Review: best institute with good library and staff . one can learn languages from general english to foreign languages like german etc., fees for the courses is very nominal . so one of the best institute for students.

Name: Vadigi C
Title: temple visit
Review: there is some classes are going on general public courses like yoga, meditation,Human resources  & youth empowerment etc

Name: rishitha g
Title: place to learn about life
Review: Ramakrishna math is the place where you can know many things about life.There we can find many books in the library. we can learn different languages by attending the classes.

Name: Nimmagadda D
Title: language instuite
Review: if are willing to learn the language this the best place to learn the language as per my opinion  i did my diplomain german thee its quite great experience

Name: Sumitkumar_13
Title: Peaceful
Review: Sri Ramakrishna Math is peaceful and extremely well maintained. You can meditate here in tranquility.

Name: parusharouthud
Title: A peace full location with high moral values.
Review: The Ramakrishna math is having good meditation hall for all aged people. Many training cources for communication skills for all aged are available. Highly religious and compitative lectures are delivered. The location in infront of Lord Ganesh temple and near Indira park. It is surrounded by number of coaching centers.

Name: vinitasaraf2015
Title: Divine Blessings
Review: Teachings of Swami Vivekanand and Ramakrishna Parmahansa are preached here. Tis place is very cal and serene

Name: dchakri87
Title: Spiritual Centre
Review: Ramakrishna Math,Hyderabad has a beautiful temple dedicated to Bhagawan Shri Ramakrishna Paramahamsa. It is a Universal temple, people from all walks of life irrespective of caste,creed,sex, nationality converge to participate in Discourses, Bhajans, Aarthis and Meditation,Worship etc. The shrine is open from 5.00a.m. to 12.00 noon and again from4.00p.m. to 8.30.p.m.It is a non-govt organisation dedicated to the services of God and is entirely dependent on donations from the public which are exempt from Income Tax under Sec.80G of I.T.Act of i961.    There are weekly discourses and a Library which is named after Swamy Vivekananda. It has 2 sections,General & Childrens sectionThe General section has 18000 titles & good collection of spiritual discourses on CdsThere is a free reading room. Another feature is Anna Danam(freelunch is provided for about 150-200 persons daily). There is Balanarayana seva in which milk with bournvita is given to 60-70 poor children along with breakfast daily.Children are taught Personality development and given free tutions upto class Xth.There is Vivekanand Institute of spoken languages(English,French,German,Spanish,Japanese and sanskrit). Vivekananda health centre is there where Doctors come twice or thrice a week to see the patients in their respective specializations. An Xray and pathological unit also is there.This also is free of cost.It is an excellent organisation . Anyone can go and do honaray work there according to the guidelines of the Institute.It is situated opposite Indira park and is easily accessible by all means of transport.It is an important landmark and an Institute par excellence.

Name: Naveena C K
Title: Best place for Youth
Review: This is one of the topmost places for youth to be in. The Math has a beautiful exhibition, a Gita Mandir and a Human Excellence Center for the Youth where they can learn so many skills.

Name: Lalita T
Title: This place screams of discipline
Review: I have taken a  short language course here and admire the dedication of the trust members for all their service activities reached out to the public.  The premisesitself are interesting with notice boards and program schedules stuck all over for the students as well as the devotees.  Visitor behaviour is checked to maintain the discipline in the math.

Name: Santosh goud
Title: Great place to learn
Review: had a devotional experience here and the instructors good at guiding. best place to get some knowledge about our culture and ethics

Name: nishit
Title: Decent cam place
Review: The place is decent and serene.They teach languages and are very obedient on timing and other features.

Name: Suryamoni A
Title: devotional place
Review: *it is very near to indra park!*here u can learn different foreign languages(spanish,french,german,english,japanese etc)*here there is a primary health center...  they treat the people free of cost... nd medicines disturbuted are subisidized... it is also having diaganostic center(it is having very less prices)ecg,xray,blood test urine test etc.

Name: pjanil1968
Title: Very good place
Review: Very good place for who are interested in knowing more about Swami Vivekananda and Sri Ramakrishna Paramhamsa. Very calm and quiet atmosphere. Great library with lot of religious books

Name: Girish G
Title: Matha
Review: It was very good....very religious...clean and tidy...good spot for friends and family....must visit spot

Name: Ganeshbabu C
Title: ramakrishna math
Review: Hyderabad is famous for spiritual love and divinity thru many good institutions like rama krishna math.Here there is big library of swami vivekananda glory and life.youth will be given many training programmes to build goo charecter and career.Its a pious place witha lot of greenary all around, so calm and peaceful.ganesbabu chebolu,hyderabad

Name: BRKanth
Title: Peaceful and powerful place
Review: This is the best place to meditate and attend few mythological lessons. I heard they will also arrange classes on Yoga and meditation.

Name: Venkatesh M
Title: Vivekananda Institute of Human Excellence (VIHE) Programme
Review: I have been atteneded classess like how to overcome fear of failure & Personality Development course, that programe is very nice and i can say that this kind of programes most useful for all kind of people,once you atteneded you will get to know the change before and after classes.awasome motivational speeches by many legends. Following are the programs offered by the institute: 01) Communication Skills02) The Art of Public Speaking (students and professionals)03) Mind Management Techniques04) Yogasanas05) Value Oriention Programme for Students06) Joy of Meditation  - Theory & Practice07) Personality Development Course08) Steps to Build Self Confidence09) How to Over Come Fear of Failure10) Leadership Qualities11) Tabla12) Stress Management13) Drawing & Painting14) Devotional Music - (Vocal) Carnatic15) Parents Motivation Course	16) Vivekananda Bala Vikas Programme- Summer Camp for Children17) Value Oriention Programme for Youth	18) Personality Development workshop for IX and X Class Students19) Special One-day Conventions For Professional Groups Like Doctors, Nurses, Engineers etc.	20) Value Orientation Programme for Teachers21) Value Orientation Programme for Government/ Corporate Employees	22) Special Orientation Programmes for Rural Groups23) Residential Youth Camp	24) Youth Convention for Boys and Girls

Name: Sriram R
Title: PEACEFUL & RIGHT DESTINY FOR EVERYONE
Review: The Math is for the people who are interested to have a peaceful space with calm, serenity, divinity. This is the place with more greenery which pumps quality oxygen levels to everyone. Good for Meditation, enhancing skills in different arenas for youth, good to learn yoga and more for spirituality. Located  centrally and has access for most. It is a place meant for all who maintains some good discipline. Must visit this place once in their lifetime.

Name: Sourav S
Title: Ramkrishna Math
Review: Its a ritual for us to visit the local ramkrishmna math, wherever we go. The serenity makes your day with the evening arti, is a must.

Name: Shubhalaxmi
Title: A serene , enlightening experience.....
Review: THis place is quite specious, lot of spiritual activities are undertaken here... It has huge library, book- shop and a community hall for lectures etc...Vivekananda institute for human excellence  is in the same vicinity and connected with the youth- especially down trodden youth- for their over all development. One can visit this place at aarati time - around 7 pm- the experience is great. The local people visit in great numbers during this period...The Mandir on 1st floor has Bhagvan Ramakrishna Deo  in black - quite unique sculpture than any other Ramakrishna Math Centre.....The cleanliness, the quiatitude is commendable  even though people come in great numbers....

Name: sudha966
Title: Sri Ramakrishna Math
Review: a very neat and well maintained place.  calm and silence every where.  many language classes are conducted here.   also many discourses, yoga classes are undertaken.

Name: anithaaravamuthan
Title: Knowledgeable place!!!
Review: Its a very knowledgeable and learning place for all ages. Spoken english class is very famous. Wonderful place.

Name: yojanaredd
Title: A place of discipline
Review: You can learn lot of courses here like meditation, music and languages. Fees are low and affordable to every one.

Name: kiranfortravel
Title: Truly mesmerizing and enlightening
Review: We are lucky to stay close to such a wonderful place. It is a must for eeveryone to get enrolled and have a visit to this place at least once.

Name: TADAKAMADLA A
Title: Knowledge learning place
Review: RK Math is very famous place for learning good things. Spoken english classes is very famous and the books in the math are very useful for humans.

Name: KGSAnil
Title: Place of Knowledge
Review: Hai this is located in Lower Tank Bund and opposite to Indira Park. Here we can find a big library and a hospital which provide free service and also many personality developments classes to students at a nominal prices. Also we can find a book stall where we can find many books of Swami Vivekananda and other mythology books at a very low price.

Name: Praveen H
Title: Epitome of Peace
Review: Shri Ramakrishna Math is the best place for Peace Lovers. One gets to see the cultural Heritage of Hinduism and also the Nuances of Mahabharat carved on Walls, the best place to know about the Positive Vibes in Life, This will surely make your nerves relaxing..

Name: lankavignesh
Title: calm skills
Review: it is a good place for skills and a lot to learn from this sri ramakrishna math and it is very calm atmosphere.

Name: santosh2ind
Title: Ramakrishna math
Review: It was constructed by swami vivekanandha by the memorial of it's guru ramakrishna paramahamsa.it is famous for spirtuvalilty .

Name: shirishasantosh
Title: Ramakrishna math
Review: This is constructed bu vivekanadha for his guru ramakrishna paramahamsa.this is very good place is in hyd

Name: Gowthamcivilion
Title: For a calm Mind!
Review: This is place for doing Meditation. This place is well maintained. Place for Disciples of Sri ramakrishna.  They provide several development programs, guest lectures and other activities.

Name: challasundararao
Title: Experience calmness amidst busy city
Review: A place to meditate, a place to relax, a place to equip knowledge and in a nutshell this place is all in one place. Several valuable activities for self development, guest lectures by renowned speakers are being organised on continuous basis. Equipped with all infrastructure facilities and are open to all. Opined as a must visit place.

Name: jaggu536
Title: school of skills
Review: here we can finds many coachings and its very affordable for poor students to get join into the courses. i suggest students to join and grap more skills

Name: jainneha
Title: Ramakrishna math .
Review: This is a very beautiful and peaceful place .original is in Kolkata.but here is it more clean and nice .

Name: rabindra_mukherjee
Title: Calm atmosphere
Review: You will find that you are in Belurmath. Everything happens on time. They are very punctual on time. Many people visit this place everyday. There is a nice bengali canteen just outside the Math.

Name: Santosh K
Title: Very Peaceful place in the midst of city
Review: A very calm and serene place with temple, library, book stall and an institute offering training in foreign languages.

Name: nagesh1955
Title: Visit of Nice place
Review: It is very peace full place in Hyderabad. They will provide hospitality also at free of cost. The location is very good. The service also very nice. They will provide good atmosphere for peace of mind

Name: superb114
Title: Place for a peace of mind
Review: The place for very peaceful and there are some any books available if your disturbed then be there you can have a peaceful mind.

Name: SuvodipMoitra
Title: Peaceful
Review: Its indeed a very peaceful place near tank bund. It houses a temple sort of atmosphere for worshipping Ramkrishna, Sarada Devi & Vivekananda. It has a big ground also. Found it very calm & quite. During evening aarti, its a must GO.

Name: Ravi K
Title: Peace and spiritual place
Review: Its a good and great place in Hyderabad for peace and spiritual. its a full of greenery place.  So many books available. spending time in prayer hall is very happy

Name: Shivalinga G
Title: Hyderabad Spiritual society
Review: One of the Spiritual society of Hyderabad Here in air also you can Swamy Vivekananda wordsVery discipline staffFree medical checkups  in evening timeFree food every day lunch timeSpoken English @less cost but some selection criteria is there for thatSo many books available here in library Every time they are offering  seminars with inspired people Meditation classes offering every time If you go here you can cover many other places like indira park , Lumbini park , birlatemple ...Most preferable with children

Name: Bhargav C
Title: place of peace and tranquility
Review: They organize various language class and also classes for development of children and youth. This place is bubbling with activity and I frequently visit the place. You can also buy books of religious importance and also...

Name: Saumya P
Title: Excellent nature trail
Review: Excellent place for evening walk. Saw a lot of peacocks and other birds. Rain started. Then it occurred to me that a few shaded resting places could have worked in this place.

Name: Ashwin Vemuri
Title: KBR National Park
Review: Our Daily GoTo Walking Park, Beautiful Peacocks Welcoming Us Always, Paid Walking Area Has Well Maintained Walkways and Secured Paths. See a Lot of Friends, VVIPs and alike getting their Health in Place.

Name: TravelbuggIndia
Title: KBR National Park
Review: Wonderful place to go visit for a morning or evening walk. It is in the heart of the city and has lush greens. It is huge park and it is good source of oxygen.

Name: Kaushik G
Title: Green sprawling Park
Review: We had visited KBR National Park during our sightseeing in Hyderabad. The Park is open for entrance till 9.30 in the morning and we had reached 5 minutes late when the counter was closed but the guy was very helpful and allowed us in. Tickets are priced at 25 rupees per person. This place is huge with so many varieties of trees and pathway to walk around. We saw many peacocks which was a great visual treat and some other types of birds but didn't see any animals like porcupines, pangolins, wild boar which resides here.

Name: Vikas Singh
Title: National park in midst of Concrete jungle
Review: The well maintained national park has two walking trails- One inside the park for which you pay a fee and one outside which is free. The walking trail outside the park boundary is better and longer. It passes through well landscaped hilly terrain and well maintained rock scapes. I have always preferred walking outside because the trail inside tends to get too crowded and is too small.

Name: jainms
Title: Big Park
Review: KBR Park is very large and evening times is good here to spend with a lenghy walk and  can see peacocks around the park. kids also can enjoy here.

Name: Rahul S
Title: Good one
Review: Very nice maintained  & all animals  we see  .better  time  to go  early  to saw animals  nearest  .better  car service  by zoo

Name: sree143in
Title: good for walk
Review: KBR national park is very famous place for evening time spends for any age people. it is a very good place with lot of trees and plants.

Name: kenrickdias
Title: Massive Green Mass
Review: This is a wonderfull place to unwind or begin ur day.It is lungs of Hyderabad.Very peacefull place to take ur kids or have a jog or walk.

Name: Silpa
Title: Horrible experience
Review: It was my first experience and I hope it should be my last Experience. Inside the park there were no lights as it was first time I have taken entry ticket at 6pm after going inside with 20 mins complete park was in darkness. As its national park I have come know few people saw snakes during day time. I lost interest on the park and we came out from park immediately in that scary darkness. The management should atleast arrange minimum facility.

Name: Prashanth
Title: well maintained park
Review: My son calls it as a peacock park as you can spot so many peacock / peafowls through out the park. very well maintained and thoroughly enjoyed our trip to it.

Name: jainms
Title: Good place & walking
Review: Located in center of the city, Morning walk and evening walk preferred. I have seen lot many come here for this. You can see Peacocks while walking around.

Name: Vikas Singh
Title: Beautiful walking Track
Review: Few cities in India have such a beautiful walking track. A well maintained track of 3.5 kms , one way, takes you thru a well maintained garden on both sides in a natural rock setting. Some parts make you walk to quite a high elevation, and you frequently come across peacocks. The free track outside is much better than the smaller, crowded , paid track inside.

Name: balkivinod
Title: Good for morning walk
Review: Now park has come into centre of the city due to growth of Hyderabad in last 20 years. The park used by walkers and joggers in the morning. You can have quite a walk during evening and morning.

Name: shailesh n
Title: Beautiful park with peacocks around
Review: a must visit park for early risers and people who would love to have brisk walks..children can enjoy the occasional company of peacocks around as well..

Name: Pavan K
Title: Good Place for a long walk
Review: Nearly around 4km of area with lots of birds , it would be pleasure to walk/jog round the park. Good for morning walks , but parking is a problem especially during peak hours

Name: Vikram
Title: One of the last lung spaces in Hyderabad
Review: I visited this park to enjoy the connect with nature. The walking path is beautiful and you see most of the walkers enjoying their morning walk amidst the green surroundings (with a few animals) and fresh air. The noise of the main roads around the park don't trouble most times. I hope the government doesn't concretize this green lung space.

Name: rohit706
Title: greenary in the city
Review: Lush greenery all around and would love ti visit in the mornings. Good for morning walk with family .

Name: anandka4151
Title: The Jungle Trail
Review: KBR National park is jungle within the city. Its a paradise for walkers and a adventure/ fun for a new comer or for tourist . Anybody needs to have an experience of a true jungle trail then one must visit this park . However its open through out the day but one must visit between 5am to 6am in morning to have a true experience.

Name: Srinsiri
Title: Happy Environment
Review: Visit anytime of the day. You will find calm, peace, and happy people around. You can spot some peahens, peacocks if you spend some long time

Name: TravellingReddy
Title: Massive green space in the heart of new age city - Cyberabad
Review: This is the much needed lung space for the vast city that lacks green cover. Spread on a massive land area this is the place where the whos who of city go for morning walk..

Name: Prada
Title: Walk or Jog with green hills and Rocky stones
Review: We had the good fortune to stay with our school friend and his designer wife in Jubilee Hills between 26th. feb. & 3rd. March. The pleasant weather of Hyd during this visit encouraged us to enjoy the fresh clean green KBR National Park.

Name: YatriForever
Title: Conservation of nature !
Review: I happened to be staying in Jubilee hills , closer to the park. Used to go for daily morning walk years ago.  Am so pleased to see that the park is being preserved so well. It is one of the good examples of conservation. It is a delight to walk and breath the fresh, pristine Oxygen ! Must enjoy this!

Name: SRIKAKOLAPU
Title: awesome park
Review: Parks like these provide the much needed oxygen and relief for the people in the polluted city of Hyderabad and lot of people come here for walking in the morning

Name: SoloMTraveler
Title: A part for Morning and Evening Walk/Jogging
Review: Biggest park for walkers/Joggers in the city located Banjarahills/Jubileehills. There is outside path along the park where most people do their activity. If you want go inside there is a nominal fee.

Name: Dinesh_cbe
Title: Beautiful
Review: This park is so greenish and very close to nature. Located in the main part of the city, this is a paradise for walkers, joggers and people who spend time peacefully. Well maintained.

Name: rsraghavan6
Title: Good place
Review: A very beautiful and scenic park in the middle of the city, yet very close to the nature. A very long track for running, jogging or walking. Lot of greenery which offers fresh oxygen to breathe, quite a change from the city's polluted air. This park has several kids zones where children can play around, along with swings, slides, see saw etc. Entry ticket is of 20 Rs for adults. If you are lucky, you can see a lot of celebrities jogging around sometimes.

Name: Vishal S
Title: Situated in the middle of the city, full of peacocks
Review: It is rare to have entire National park in the middle of modern indian cities.Went there for morning walk. Timings are 6-9 in the morning and 4-6.30 in the evening. Park entry ticket will cost 25 rupees. Car parking space is available alongside of main road. Inside the park, you will find many peacocks. Children will definitely enjoy.There are also open gyms inside the park.

Name: Mohan
Title: Best park
Review: Its a big park with huge trees I had gone to their at morning and stayed there till 6 pm by seeing the scenery

Name: dssrinivas2004
Title: Nice place for Morning / Evening walks
Review: Good place for morning / evening walk. At times, you will get chance to come across celebrities. If I am not wrong, the park is spread across 300 + acres of land. The park has different types of plants and birds. Nearest landmarks are TDP Party house and LV Prasad Eye Hospital. Entry fee for KBR Park is ₹25 for adults and ₹10 for children. It opens @ 5:00 till 10:00 AM in the morning and in the evening it opens @ 4:00 PM. Also try to visit Shri Jagannath Temple which is very much near to this park

Name: deepa v
Title: Park
Review: The place is best for morning walk.The fresh air and greenery around early in the morning makes one rejuvenated for the whole day...

Name: akash n
Title: Lungs of the City
Review: Good for a morning walk, good track for running. Cool place to hang out with friends in the laps of Nature

Name: Dilip kumar
Title: Best for jogging
Review: this place has got very wide nature and many celebrities will visit this place in the mornings.well known for its ambience.

Name: Myth2004
Title: An oasis in Hyderabad
Review: I have been going to KBR park for 14 years now. Its an amazing treasure that Hyderabad has - not just the calmness and the fresh air all that greenery provides - but also the safety and the amazing birds and local plants. A walk in KBR is bound to rejuvenate you no matter what your spirits are.

Name: Kainath
Title: Best Walking Park
Review: If you planning to loose weight and don't know how- Then 101% you shall loose weight if you go for a brisk walk daily to KBR Park. Along with walk your diet is also necessary... But this place in morning is ideal, with the fresh breeze. You will also get to see a lot of Peacock as well and all this will really brighten up your entire day...

Name: mdviquaruddin
Title: weekend masti
Review: one of the famous park in the city which is located on the busy area of jubilee hills.good place for morning and eveing walk for all everyone including kids. neat place for kids to play all kinds of outdoor games during day time . it is also one of the good places where greeenary exists where everyone will love to enjoy the day with family and friends.

Name: Daniel T
Title: Get surprised with the number of morning walkers here
Review: For a busy population of Hyderabad, this place is a gentle reminder of how to stay fit with morning walk & exercises.This park particularly is too famous for its morning walkers.There is separate parking space designated for morning & evening walking timings.Hundreds of people come here daily. If lucky you'll spot peacocks here.Nice park to stay fit and close to nature.

Name: Rojasireesha
Title: Very good Park for Walking and Jogging.
Review: This park is located in Jubilee Hills, the main entrance is opposite to telugu desam party office.This park has lot of greenery and well maintained. It is good place to relax  and breathe fresh air. Entry fees is there 25 rs for adult and 10 rs for children. Lot of people come here for walking and Jogging. You can walk inside the park and outside the park also.You can see lots of peacocks and peahens are there.Must Visit !!!

Name: niya27
Title: Big Garden
Review: It is a big garden in the middle of Hyderabad city. There is specific timing when it is open. There is a way where you can do brisk walking. If you are fortunate, you can see peacocks and some other rare birds.

Name: shivaraikod
Title: Greenery all around
Review: Located in the city center , this is boon to the city with greenery all around. The lush greenery with fresh air is soothing.

Name: Rajivglobaltraveller
Title: A national park in the middle of Hyderabad
Review: This national park is located at the middly of City and is named after the former chief minister Kasu Brahmananda Reddy.KBR National Park boasts of rich flora and fauna which is accompanied by a refreshing environment that is ideal of relaxing. There are around 600 varied species of trees and plants trees in the park. The park has equally rich fauna. It has around 140 species of avian fauna along with 20 species of reptiles and 20 species of mammals. There are around 15 different species of butterflies as well.

Name: ajith k
Title: "lungs of hyderabad"
Review: Its  green and serene surroundings with peacocks dancing around is a awesome experience.The flooring inside the park is red soil,beneficial for regular joggers. If you are travelling by 4 wheeler u may experience parking difficulties.

Name: Keshav Rao Devulapally
Title: 350 acres of Deccan forest in the middle of concrete jungle
Review: Once a hunting ground with a royal lodge for Nizams, it is now converted into a national park after Govt took over the land under Land Ceiling Acts. Unfortunately the forest department which maintains it bought plants and trees which are not native. By senseless additional of buildings and Open Gyms some of the original character is lost. Nevertheless it is a big attractions for thousands of walkers . One can see peacocks in abundance and occasional snakes. There is an entry fee of Rs 25 which is rather steep in India rates.

Name: saravanangandhi2
Title: Nice but  maintenance required...
Review: Its a nice park , short visit there..good time pass, only need to maintain extra care in this park...

Name: Trending T
Title: Very popular park in hyderabad
Review: This place has very good number of plants and is suitable for any age grouped people.This place will also good for morning walk.Mostly celebrities will visit this place

Name: madhu_pvl
Title: Birds watching
Review: KBR Park is in heart of the city with good walking tracks both inner and outer. Mornings walks are pleasant but noisy. Few walkers talk very loudly which is very annoying. Otherwise a good place for walking. Peacocks are a highlight of this park.

Name: Abhilash K
Title: Nice nature
Review: It is filled with the Great nature and I have a great experience here and I took lot of pics there in the park

Name: TravelingGypsy0508
Title: One of the best parks in Hyderabad
Review: Best for long strolls or a jog. You will see a lot of people visiting KBR over weekends. Early mornings and evenings can be a bit crowded. Maintenance is really good.

Name: Ganesh N
Title: KBR National Park
Review: nice park  every day will go there for walking nice place so many people will come and enjoyed and doing excercise

Name: Karthik Dasu
Title: Best park in Hyderabad
Review: It is one of the best parks in Hyderabad to sway away from the pollution and sound.The maintenance is good.

Name: idea614354
Title: Nice Park
Review: This is a nice park, a lot of good parks in hyderabad like lumbini, sanjeevaih and many more. like this in hyderabad.

Name: Devaa
Title: A lung space!!!
Review: This is a park located in the heart of Jubilee Hills and Banjara Hills. Its a huge park which has a nearly 5 km walk around for joggers and morning walkers. There is an entry fee to enter the park in the day time. Inside there are peacock,deer ,snakes and some other variety of animals.

Name: PsinghIndia09
Title: The largets park-KBR -beautiful
Review: Its soulful and beautiful Park in jubilee hills of Hyderabad. Its very long park with cleanliness. I went with my fiancee to explore it, and we loved it. we kept walking and walking, talking and talking. It touches your heart. Must visit .

Name: Santosh1959
Title: Ideal place for walkers
Review: It is the ideal and safe place for early morning and evening walkers. There is a police during the open hours. You can walk inside by purchasing a tickets or walk outside for free. You can see lot of peacocks if you walk inside.

Name: lsmkw
Title: Limited hours - check first
Review: Very close to #1 temple so I walked over...to find the Park closed.  Hours are 4:30 am - 9:00 am and 4:30 pm to 9:00 pm. I walked around it and saw a lot of people working to maintain it (weeding or cutting down overgrowth, watering, etc.) and encountered peacocks along the way.  It promises to be a wonderful place to visit...I wish I had been there earlier.

Name: Sumitkumar_13
Title: Nice park
Review: This park has lot of greenery and is good place to relax in the evening. You can come here with kids and they can have a good time here

Name: naiduks24
Title: A great park for morning walkers
Review: This part is located in Jubilee Hills, the main entrance is opposite to telugu desam office, we entered the park to have a look, covered with thick green and well maintained.

Name: shobbyv
Title: Little forest between concrete jungle
Review: One of the only few places with lush greenery in the city. Provides refreshing views with peacocks and peahens roaming freely in the park. Park opens only for few hours in the morning and evening, but it is full of regulars whom come for their daily walks/runs.

Name: 702jiteshk
Title: nice for kids
Review: its very nice for the kids to visit this place to see the animals . every kids will love this place.

Name: parusharouthud
Title: Location of morning walk.
Review: The park is filled with many morning walkers of different age group along with peacocks in park. In almost in heart of Hyderabad city a good maintained park for the highly busy soft ware people.

Name: EktaTraveller
Title: Nice huge park
Review: Fit for daily walks and full of people looking at improving their fitness. Had a good time seeing peacocks and peahens here. Also, bought mulberries from outside the park.

Name: cbk2911
Title: Excellent national park
Review: Its not such a huge national park and one can use battery car service to roam inside national park to see few animals.

Name: pb5026
Title: Lungs of Hyderabad
Review: Great place for morning walk. Real jungle in the midst of a concrete one. Good place for birding. Ideal for a family day outing.

Name: Travellove1025
Title: Very well maintained park
Review: Visited this park in early morning for a walk. The park is very large and very neatly maintained. A breathe of fresh air amid the traffic and pollution of Hyderabad. One can spot beautiful peacocks along the walking trail

Name: vikramdevvarma
Title: It is a family physician to us. Our regular regular morning or evening walks happen here. The kids love the place.
Review: There is so much flora and fauna here. It is like a oxygen tank in the midst of concrete jungle. There is a proper muddy trail for walking and running. Grassy lawns and benches are there to relax and exercise. It is not a regular park where you see young couple romancing like rest of the hyderabad parks. Complete park is fitted with cctv cameras and security guards are always alert to stop any sort of bad activities. Strict opening and closing times of 5.00AM to 9.00AM and 3.00PM to 6.00PM. Kids will enjoy a lot during a walk with parents. There are so many kinds of birds and trees and plants are there. Especially the park is like a conservatory home for peacocks. If anyone comes to Hyderabad, they should put an alarm to wake up early and go for a walk here.

Name: Rahul S Khatri
Title: OXYGEN for HiTech City
Review: This place is very Good for Jogging in Eve and morning. The park has Free Jogging trail outside along side the Park, and Rs 10 pass to jog inside the Park which has Toilet facilities.

Name: raman p
Title: Best park or forest in main city
Review: Take a morning or evening walk the best park in the twin cities. You can walk for a stretch of 4 kms inside and 5km outside the park. Inside required entry fees for Rs 25 per head. You will see so many peacocks. As per the research and sampling there are close to 400+ peacocks in the park. Outside the main gate you will see best of vegetable juices or leafy juices are available from 6 am to 8 am typically. Might be late closing or opening of the shop based on the day’s weather. Inside the park has less elevation and whereas outside the park has higher elevation. There are good parking spaces if you come early to the park in the early morning or early evening. Close to the main gate on left side there are good amount of small shops who sell other vegetable juices or wheat grass juice,  ragi or jowar shake, ragi laddoo, fresh vegetables n fruits, etc

Name: Neelam G
Title: Beautiful , peaceful,  national park  Hyderabad
Review: Heaven for morning walk,track surrounded is natural flora & fana , track is well maintained,dust free atmosphere  with plenty of peacock making walk more pleasant,around 5 km track is  enjoyable ,loved to be there

Name: Madhavi74
Title: Enjoyed alot
Review: The KBR National Park is located in jubliee hills, hyderabad.good place for morning and evening walks. Entry ticket is there. Not very crowded.

Name: Sobha K
Title: A paradise for morning walkers
Review: It's a heaven for walkers. Early morning it's every enjoyable as you can hear the sounds made by different birds. In particular you can see peacocks walking on the walkway and pecking. It's worth a walk at this place.

Name: hingarajiya s
Title: Very Nice Location
Review: This is a very well maintained park. A good experience and few birds and the Peafowls are abundant. Entry ticket is there. in this National park good toilets inside and drinking water.

Name: Veer2468
Title: Good place for morning walks
Review: This is a good place for morning and evening walks. Entry ticket is there. Not very crowded. Calm place to visit.

Name: lovetravelonly
Title: National Biological Park
Review: This is a place where real forest can be felt by heart. It is managed by Forest officials and a dedicated team of veterinary doctors. A fabulous green cover conservation against the human exploitation. Many peacocks and peafowls have a reside here with many other reptiles and mammals.

Name: YatriForever
Title: Such a refreshing walk !
Review: This is a very well maintained park. Extremely popular with  joggers or walkers of all age and all ranges of fitness, it offers something for everyone. I was staying in one of those roads in Banjara Hills close to KBR, so it was wonderful to catch up my morning walk here.

Name: higghligght shiva
Title: Its a biggest park in hyderabad
Review: when i was gone to kbr it looks very beautiful place . fullof greenery in rainy season must visit. many peacocks and different types of birds r there to see we enjoyed a lot. u can take pics overthere entry tkt is 25rs, inside u cannot take cameras only mobile.in rainy season u cant hide anyway, no way 2 sit so take umbrella are rain jacket all facilities r there beautiful nature in rainy season everybody can breath a fresh air in this park u can walk /jog/do yogas or u can play games etc.

Name: Divya N
Title: Good place for jogging and playing
Review: Good place for joggers, good gardens and maintenance. Been here with a group of friends for small get together. The park greenery and nice for playing outdoor games.

Name: Neha S
Title: Perfect place for a walk
Review: Would you like to go for a walk without the pollution and noise of the city? Well the place is KBR park. Though it is situated amidst of the most crowded place, this place will give a feel of forest. Top of that you will be able to see many birds peacock and porcupines and other animals. When I went first time, it started drizzling and I saw peacocks dancing and it made my day.The park is very clean and serene. Toilets facility is also there.This park has many gates. So you need to find the nearest one to your place. The only issue is traffic and parking.

Name: Krishna Sandeep Siram
Title: Nice place to visit early hours
Review: This place offers nice track for jogging and walking..If we visit this place early hours we can meet celebrities at this place

Name: Arvind Kumar Yerram
Title: Joggers paradise
Review: This is the place if we are planning to jog amidst the lush greenery and exotic hurbs. We might even be lucky to bump into a celebrity as every celebrity throngs this place for a healthy jog.  Parking is a challenge and entire stretch of the road gets occupied with the parked cars. Birds of various breed adore the place and their sounds is a music to the ears.

Name: EnigmaticIndia
Title: Nice location
Review: We have been in Hyderabad for many years and never ventured into this place till recently, when some of us decided to experience this.While it's a national park, it's unlike any of the others you would visit within the country as one will find a lot of people walking, jogging taking photos.Nice trails have been laidout and the entry fees is around 25 INR. There are good toilets inside and drinking water. Well it was a good experience and did spot few birds and the Peafowls are abundant.

Name: samvarth
Title: Saving hyderabad with its trees
Review: This park is definitely saving Hyderabad with its trees.Its pretty huge and hundreds of people including celebrities do walking in this park.

Name: pjanil1968
Title: Very nice park
Review: KBR National park is one of the best tourist spots in Hyderabad. Ideal for those who like morning or evening walks in the heart of city but away from all noises of city. Excellent atmosphere.

Name: Im O
Title: Kbr national park
Review: Kbr national park is good place to connect with nature.in this park jave many type of flower and fauna and many wild animal also ..best to go with kids

Name: Md M
Title: As they say Jungle in Concrete Jungle.
Review: A fabulous green cover conservated against the human exploitation and greed for excess land. A place where real forest can be felt. I have been here for case study for my Bachelors assignment and got to have a look into insights. Managed by Forest officials and a dedicated team of veterinary doctors to look for our national bird. More than 400 peacocks and peafowls have a reside here with many other reptiles and mammals. A few extinct species of birds are also found here. A great place for nature lovers.The pics uploaded were taken with the consent of Forest officials and permission was also obtained for this.

Name: nikhil0210
Title: Cool Walk
Review: Take a walk outside or inside and its always cool. Local people will flock it in morning and evening. Enjoy.

Name: Gaurav R
Title: Walking park
Review: I visited park as an adventure in banjara hills. When I started I thought " wow, it's been great here will see so many natural things as after all it's national park. At the end when I end seeing park I was concluded it's best park for walking only. Foreigner and other people used to come here for walking only. I'll advice when you plan for KBR National park at the same time plan for Jagan nath temple. It's near by only.

Name: BRKanth
Title: Morning walker destination
Review: I would say this is one of the best and high profile people's morning walk destination for everyone.

Name: Violeta N
Title: Nice walk
Review: Park is very nice and peaceful. We spent like 2h walking around. I would like that there are more tables with names of trees and plants.

Name: raman p
Title: Joggers Paradise
Review: In the center of the city, you cant ask for more when you have a place like KBR park. Its a joggers paradise, so serene and green around you feel like you are in a tropical forest. You will see peakcock, birds and if lucky some animals too. But a great place to jog full circle of 5K km, the second boundary which is a parallel track to the  park as you need not pay any money. If you go inside the park, you have to pay 20 INR and spend going around 4km stretch.

Name: Surya T
Title: Nice place for a jog
Review: Whenever I wanted to go for a run I would pick up my bike and head to KBR Park. It's one of best places in Hyderabad(in terms of nature/greenery). You can actually feel the breeze of cold air kissing your cheeks in evenings even in hot summer. There's one outer path of the park which free to use, another is inside for which you pay a small amount of 10 INR.

Name: anu42
Title: Very big park in the heart of the city!
Review: The KBR park is very huge and spreads across the major jubilee hills area. When we cross this park, you can feel the cool breeze instantly even int the hot summers due to the nice vegetation in this area. It is very relaxing to go for a stroll inthis park on weekends.

Name: MR_F00DIE
Title: Pathways made rocky!
Review: In a bid to replace the soil due to erosion, the management has carelessly  laid stony gravel instead of soil on all the paths. It is more of treak now, as lot of tiny gravel make walking/running a pain, rather than pleasure.

Name: Jikuza
Title: Best park in Hyderabad
Review: There is an entry fee. It is located in Jubilee hills- banjara hills, the prime location of Hyderabad. I went there for a run and crossed it in my path many time. It is a huge park.

Name: shivaraikod
Title: Greenery all around
Review: This park is full of greenery all around in the heart of the city and good for morning and evening walk. I had been here in the evening to breathe some fresh air.

Name: Pulkita
Title: too crowded by 7
Review: if u want to come here for a run or a walk you better come before 5. by seven this place is thronging with walkers and runners. its a beautiful outdoor escape in the middle of the city.. probably the lungs of hyderabad. nice birds you can hear and see. the path is well made and has good incline and all. its a ticketed entry and one place u must visit if you are in hyderabad and a nature lover.. but go before 6 for sure.

Name: PavRao
Title: Excellent
Review: An excellent place in the heart of Hyderabad. Great place to walk and exercise. The outer path is free and very good. The inner paths which are paid give you more access to the National park. Cool even in summer. Wonderful nature in the city and a must visit on a regular basis

Name: clementbenj
Title: A Walk To Remember Right in the Heart of Hyderabad
Review: Who could ever imagine a pristine natural park right in the center of the busy roads of Hyderabad? This was one big surprise the first time I had the opportunity to visit KBR park. From the outside it is very hard to imagine how peaceful the interiors are, because all around you are surrounded by the noise and movement of traffice, the people, the vehicles, the hot weather, the humidity and so many other pressures. But once you enter inside, you are transported into a world that has remained pure and calm inspite of all that happens outside. The quietness can surprise you along with a few majestic peacocks that call out and walk across your path. The lush grass in specific areas is temptingly inviting and you will be inspired watching the many elderly gentlemen taking a walk and doing stretches. All in all, it's an absolute MUST Visit to get away from the pressure of the outside world. The more often you visit, the more therapeutic you will feel.

Name: eeebvr
Title: Walk Walk and more walk
Review: This place is best for evening and morning walk both for exercise or relaxation with friends. Peacocks will be seen here and there. we can walk inside the park or in the walkway surrounding it. a must place to be seen who love walking

Name: Shailendra
Title: Green lungs of Hyderabad
Review: KBR National park is one of the largest parks in Hyderabad and a joggers and morning walkers paradise. The park has National Park status. The park is home to good number of birds and butterfies and some snake as well.

Name: Rajashekhar K
Title: One of the largest parks within the city
Review: One of the largest parks within the city KBR National Park is a Southern tropical deciduous forest and the last vestigial representative of the endemic flora of Hyderabad region, with over 100 species of birds, 20 species of reptiles and 15 species of butterflies.

Name: Aantharya
Title: Good but needs lot of improvements.
Review: Quality is low compared to the price they are charging. The automated answering phone mentions ticket prices that are not accurate. On the phone the price mentioned was around 1000 rupees for adult and 800 rupees for kid, but there when we went it was higher. Locker facility is good they charge 300 rupees for that and 100 rupees out of that is refundable.  The swimming suits are available for reasonable price. I saw many roadside vendors selling swimming dresses just outside wonderla. I presume wonderla might have reduced their clothing price because of serious competition from them. Even then they did not have good collection of all sizes. You would end up buying what ever is available in your size. They also do not encourage exchange if the size does not fit.we reached there at 12 noon and by the time we got everything in place it was 1.30pm, so I feel it would be better idea to reach there by 10.30am itself so that you can get started soon and make the most of the time you get.Changing stations were good. But very small not comfortable for aged people or specially abled people. I guess it was just 2 feet by 2 feet with a curtain. The toilets looked clean but smelled very bad. Only one Indian type toilet was available. The lady at the dressing shop told me my dress is ok for pools as it was made of nylon. but there the guards did not allow me inside the pool as  it was long top.Even though they had marked right end as kids and ladies only, men were also there and none of the guards bothered. we went for lunch at 3pm and not all items were available.  But food was good.Not all the pools were open. The pirate theme pool was closed. So do not promise kids any particular ride before visiting. They usually keep half things operating. So overall we had fun and would visit again.

Name: Mounika
Title: Very poor
Review: Recoil and twinflip trex was not working. Very poor customer service. We tried to call the numbers provided in the website to check whether recoil is functioning are not. We came with family and all are very upset. They should mention that somewhere or atleast reduce the ticket price.

Name: Raghu
Title: Great experience and great Staff
Review: Had to wonderla on my Birthday on 16th Nov 2021. It was a pleasent day for us.. We really enjoyed the rides and shows (though we did not cover all).. After finshing the tour after coming back home we realized we forgot our mobile there. When i went next day to check the Security team and PR team were obideint to unerstand my concern and called few people to check if they got anything in found & lost.. Immediately got the confromation that the mobile was in there.. The Facilities staff identified and handed over to the respective team.. They really finished the formalitlies in less than 5 mins and handed over our mobile.. A bigh thanks to Facilites team, Security and PR team for the quick action.. As said it was really nice exeperience for us on my B'day.

Name: krishnamani i
Title: Nice place with no covid rules ,
Review: Neatly maintained.Signboards at important places to guide people.Good restrooms , areas to change, locker facilities etc.Lot of rides, water sports , reasonable cafeteria , all at a decent price .  The huge dissatisfaction was not adherence to covid appropriate behaviour. People were crammed up in a room for the short movie shows, no social distancing at all, people without masks were allowed to enter ( there were many such people ). On asking the security personnel , they said we can’t do anything.On weekends , with huge rush, and no protocols for preventing people who are not adhering to masks or social distancing , it’s the right place for rise in covid cases , considering lot of kids come there . Overall wouldn’t rate it high.

Name: bobbili s
Title: Worst experience twice
Review: I have a bad experience twice ..1st time when I visited no roller coaster and second time also same, and very poor service I visited on 16th April 2021 .. no games ..rain disco everytime same repeated bledy songs , and in waves and rain disco and few slidings they have allowed with cotton t shirt . But in few they are saying we will not allow anywhere with cotton ..then how come in waves they allowed and in rain dance also they allowed . Wasted our money not allowing and limited slides only ..and dashing cars also they have not allowed in cotton t shirt .. what is the problem .. iam suggesting you all don't go for wonderla and don't waste your money .. I will give zero ratings

Name: Abby
Title: Not worth for kids below 10
Review: For copying u need brains too. Ht restrictions are imposed for buying tkts but half rides cannot be done coz of et or ht by the kids

Name: Sharath
Title: 🤗Nice 🤗
Review: This was an amazing experience we had at wonderla .Hyderabad  , and we had a good guidence . Thank you "Sharath" you helped us so much .😍😍

Name: Shiva T
Title: Had a fun n trilling day.....
Review: I came at 1.00 pm had a friendly communication with staff members (AHMED) , n gud experience in MI ride n RECOIL. Maverick trilling rides " A PLACE TO BE VISIT MUST N SHOULD"..........

Name: Reddy, Chandhra
Title: Sorry to write this review based my yesterday (24-01-2021) visit. This is weekend visit experience
Review: Sorry to write this review based my yesterday (24-01-2021) visit. This is weekend visit experience.I visited Wonderla Hyderabad first time with Family (4 people) based on the good reviews and mainly because of 699/- offer, but got a very very bad experience. I am not able to imagine how this reputed organization is leaving public to fight themselves.  Specifically at ROLLER COASTER  ride. I hope most of the people visit to enjoy this ride, the standard time was mentioned as 90minutes. for us it took around 2 hours. That's fine as crowd is huge and its acceptable.But how the people were at queue was unimaginable, I though its like we are in local Theaters, were people were fight for movie ticket and jump queue line. The same happened here and management / staff were just simple standing their and not controlling the crowd. All the security staff are living dead people, no one are active (May be management were not paying them write salary).I had a good learning, don't believe on brand name. I compared Wonderla with Jalvihar (found Jalvihar far better in managing crowd)

Name: Aijazzain
Title: Support staff done brilliant job..
Review: The favourite part was their SUPPORT AND HELP in the time of need.. must be appreciated and admired..  at a time when it's overcrowded to 2-3 times of its capacity and crowd is making situation like chaos, they have understood the concern and responded very well to the situation and provided amazing support and help..  I RECOMMEND EVERYONE TO MUST VISIT WONDERLA PARK AND RESORTS.. 🥰🥰😘😘😘😊🤩🤩🤩👍👍👍🇮🇳🇮🇳🇮🇳🇮🇳..

Title: No security for family
Review: group of muslim community chanting Pakistan zindabad and akbaruddin zindabad, I scared and just walk away from the place ,worried about the protection of my family and will not recommend to any one to visit wonderla because of poor management and security concerns

Title: Roller Coaster never works

Name: Mahesh
Title: Wonderla Review
Review: Theam park is great. All of the rides in theam park and water park anazing. The only development is required in online meal tokens. It feels that once you buy that you are stuck at no where. At point I felt that I am at some public gathering where food is offered free of cost. Do not by meal tokens and apart from that this is great place to visit in family or group.

Name: Vemuri sasank
Title: Food and swiping machine issue
Review: No proper food is there for the visitors and swiping machine not worked properly in any shop and response from food court people is very worst. Food should be proper and tasty and

Name: Hruthik Chandra
Title: It’s amazing and awesome
Review: I have visited with my friends,it’s very beautiful place and I loved it so much But I was disappointed so much because their is no RECOIL Ride😞 ,they said that it’s in repairI visited woderla only for roller coaster because in Hyderabad it’s only the place,I was so disappointed ☹️ but I will try to visit again

Name: Akillchowdary
Title: Wonderla amusement park
Review: Visited Wonderla last week.It was really a wonderful experience of visiting this park.The park is really awesome with variety of rides.Water rides of the amusement park is just awesome.The thrilling rides like twinflip monster and spacegun was my favourite part.There is a lot of rides that are available for family invluding small children.The park is having a environmental friendly atmosphere.The water used in pools were super hygene.The urinatory and food facilities available inside the park.The ticket fare is best for this experience.Promise, it will be a great experience for everyone.

Name: Seenu D
Review: For tickets the criteria was 80 cm, however for most of the activities kids below less than 120 cms were restricted. The danger is understood, however the ticketing policy shall be also in the line of the same. roller coaster did not work for entire day. two or three other rides were also not available. Moreover it could be made more kid friednly. Owners need to think in that line.

Name: Wonderla Parks and Resort
Review:
Hi Priya,

We regret the inconvenience you faced because of the unavailability of some rides. As a part of our safety measures, we do a daily maintenance check of each of our rides before the park opens. In case of maintenance issues, the ride is temporarily closed down till the issue is sorted and this gets published near the cash counter as a notice. However, we have forwarded your feedback to the concerned departments. At Wonderla, the satisfaction and comfort of our visitors is of paramount importance. We are consistently adapting new ways to provide the best experiences to our guests at the park, and we assure you that you will witness a significant difference upon your next visit.

Best Regards,
Head of Marketing

Name: Murali krishna

Name: Thevedaa
Review: Excellent fun at wonderla and have experienced amazing rides present there mainly recoil and mission interstellar. Wonderla Rides are using high standard safety measures that no one worry about thier safety. Hyderabad wonderla is some what small when compared to Bangalore visitor who've already visited Bangalore wonderla won't satisfy much. But at the end of the day it is a excellent place.
