Name: AmitG17
Title: Not that much worth...!!
Review: We visited in afternoon time for slot of 5.30 PM. Ticket price was ₹600 for adult and ₹450 for kids over 2.5 years. You will get equipments like jacket, shoes, gloves , socks etc from the staff there, but sometimes they are very oversized.. They have kept it well with snow games, dance etc but considering ticket prices, it is not that worth really! It's overpriced place.. but if you've never been to any snow place in India, then it can be a good place to enjoy it

Name: Krishna Sandeep Siram
Title: Good But Over Priced
Review: Best place for experiencing snow and ice in summer for fun But limited time is permitted. Litlle bit overpriced but good.

Name: sivaprasadsahu
Title: Weekend Visit to Snow World
Review: Just casually we were roaming around necklace road seeing the decorations of Republic Day when we came across Snow World. This was a place which she wanted to go long back but as we stay in Lingampally don't come this side often, so thought to give it a whirl. The snow world didn't dissapoint us, the inside was freezing and I guess it would be 2-3 degrees. The snow was quite clean on the floor. Not much to do inside apart from clicking pics and going on the snow slide. I would recommend to go in larger groups to enjoy as there is a mini volley ball area, and a DJ floor too. This place would be great for kids too. The jackets were good but the gloves were really thin and the gum boots were too large so the snow was going inside from the top. Should add more games or attractions inside.The other attractions that came with the packahe was the Living Dead (Scary House) which was a completely joke if u ask me but then again it costs 30/ head so mehhh... Then there is the Rain forest which is also below okayish.... Amd at last there is the Kaleddo which is essentially the Mirror Maze which was around average as the area was not so big that you would puzzle out, the mirrors were also a little dusty so one could figure out the way.Overall worth to go once. Package is 500/head if only Snow world and 600/  head for all the things that I mentioned above.

Name: Eshita Shah
Title: Funtime in Hyderabad
Review: I went there with kids and they had a lot of fun in the snow playing with various activities.Go here if there are kids with you.

Name: srinivas m
Title: Not upto to the expectations
Review: The hall was small and not too many games we cannot play ,only hand ball and slide,shoes bit skiddy ,would have provided with anti skid shoes

Name: sunil
Title: Hill station for Hyderabad people
Review: I have visited the snow world to have some chill experiences.It is of great  experience specially to those who have never visited any hill station.

Title: Fun in snow
Review: Ok but snacks and drinks are horrible inside.And don't buy 600/- tkt , only mirror house is good, rain forest and haunted house waste , .It's waste of time.Also no proper warm clothes provided entering the snow chamber.Snow is fun, worth one time visit.

Title: So so
Review: It's timepass attraction. Crowd is not very good. Hygiene could be an issue as you need to wear boots, gloves and jackets worn by many people. Inside is in dilapidated state and requires a fresh quote of paint and maintenance. There's a nearby attraction called Kallido which is in illusion of mirrors...we liked that attraction more.

Review: One of the Best Snow World in India.... Its a Independent Snow World, unlike Snow world in MALL. Kids will surely enjoy... 500 for Adults & 350 for KIds .. Unlimited MMasti

Review: if you want to experience snow fall and really low temperature, you can plan visit to snow world Though tickets charges are on higher side (Rs500 per hour per adult), you may consider to visit as childrens will love the ambience inside the snow room. However, we left room within half hour due to extreme cold. Though not much to do inside snow room (slide is there & some photo ops). One may go there, if having spare time & missing snow.

Review: Snow world is good but others like living dead and rain forest is worst and waste of money. even child are not scared while inside living dead which is scary zone.

Overall it is a nice place to visit with kids or group of friends.

They do allow camera inside with a charge of rs50 but cell phone r not allowed inside. We have slides which I enjoyed the most, dance floor to enjoy dance, ball to play around. It also offer tea , coffee inside but u need to pay extra for it. Beside snow , we also have bhoot bungalow for additional fun. Should visit once with your family to add a new page to your book of life

Title: Good place to visit in summer
Review: It's an awesome place to visit in summer as we can enjoy there in complete ICE, but the thing is can't stay more than an hour

Name: suresh n
Title: The Cryo Zone is one of the most popular sections.
Review: Snow world With the fame of being the first ever snow themed park in India, Snow World is a place which you must visit when in Hyderabad. Developed by the Ocean Park Multi Tech Limited (OPML), it is spread over an impressive area of 17,000 square feet.Located at the Lower Tank Bund Road, this theme-park is easily accessible. Apart from playing with the snow, which is made up of mineral water, you can also try sports such as ice skating, ice boarding, snow slides with bumping-car and toboggan rides.The Cryo Zone is one of the most popular sections. It presents a natural landscape with igloos, simulated polar bears and penguins and alpine trees

Name: Sree K
Title: Cold storage
Review: We went for the first slot at 11 am..s I could see a big cold storage with ice on floor.. the staffs inside doesn’t even bother to look at us ...no guidances nothing not at all neat.. a very bad experience for us

Name: Sudarshan Dhaveji(the veggie)
Title: Snow world
Review: This is a good place to go to when you want to hang out with your friends and family. You will have good fun here and enjoy for sure.

Name: GKChaitanya
Title: Chilling Experience....
Review: Great place to experience the low temperature weather with snow fall. Children will have very good time playing in snow. Some rides and playing stuff is available inside the snow world.Small cafeteria available to serve hot soup and ice creams inside snow world.Snow world will provide winter gear for wearing inside the play area. Maintained nicely and systematically, very good place to hang out with family.

Name: Soumya Ranjan Satpathy
Title: Feel chill even in summer
Review: The area is shielded and temperature maintained inside is below zero.They provide you speciall cloth to enter the park to prvent from chilling.Inside you can dance to the tune of music,fall on the slide,play volley ball,experience artificial snow fall etc.overall experience is good.Go in summer, you will enjoy more as ouside is very hot.

Name: Debasis
Title: Enter into the world of snow
Review: The snow world is one of the major tourist destination in Hyderabad, but it is average only.Snowfall was not upto the mark. Hot food options can be increased.It is highly priced too, 500 per adult and 300 for kids.Jacket and gloves could have been better.

Name: deepa v
Title: Cool
Review: The place is too good to go with kids.You can beat the heat with the snow.They give suits to wear and gloves.Must visit in hyd in summers.

Name: PsinghIndia09
Title: Snow in Heat-Snow world-Must visit
Review: Hyderabad having snow in it. A must place to visit this snow world with adults, kids. Its Mussorie in Hyderabad this summer . Explore it and have fun. I loved with my friends throwing snow at each other.

Name: savvyuec
Title: Get your expectation right before visiting
Review: The actual venue is a large room with frozen snow on the ground and with a few large models (not made of snow) like the igloo, a snow man, yeti etc. There is slide ride that you can take. There is NO ARTIFICIAL SNOW FALL. For what they call a show is basically turning on the music and a large water sprayer. For all this they charge 500/- per head for Adults and 300/- for children. Photography: You are not allowed to carry your cell phones inside. You can however carry camera on payment of 50/-. There is photographer inside who charges Rs 100/- for every click and is in a rush to just click and get done with it. Also you need to wait for upto 30 mins assuming you get bored and leave out early as this guy can only give prints once the show slot ends.  Experience: If you have seen a snow fall or snow in your life YOU MAY WANT TO GIVE THIS PLACE a PASS. The place is a absolute waste of time and it may be a harassing experience because of the crowd for you and your family as you need to wait in a queue for up to 45 mins to get in after the ticket purchase. Total not worth the time or the money (except for a kid seeing frozen ice for the first time).Also in my opinion is it avoidable if you have a toddler. Kids in the age group of 3 to 9 years may enjoy playing in the ice and someone who is seeing snow for the first time.We got out of the place within 25 mins.Logistics: - Parking is free.- You can take off your shoes inside and deposit at a counter as family in a bag which they will give you.- They also give a pair of socks, snow boots, jacket and gloves. Smaller sized stuff is available for kids although they fit may not be good.

Name: SoniJose
Title: Good
Review: Enjoyed the chill. Children will definitely be thrilled. worth  to visit even though little bit expensive.

Name: Lalitha G
Title: Awesome place to visit.
Review: its a very nice place to visit with children. here children will enjoy like any thing.ticket cost bit more like for adult its 500rs. here will get street food as well and slot timings will be there. last slot is 8 to 9pm.

Name: 702jiteshk
Title: a must visit for every kid and adult
Review: snow world is very nice place for kids and adults. its allowed from 2 years of age kids  upto any age. but not for heart patience as its very very chilled out there. they provide us all costume needed. hand glows, tracks , jackets socks and shoes. which are of very low quality. but once we go in its a beautiful place for playing in chilled temperature. we can go in out for few minutes also as there is too chilling in . so those who wants to go out they can go out and come in once again.[ not fully out].

Name: Anish Kumar
Title: 3 star
Review: Playing with ice is fun.. basketball , volleyball , ice slides , Rain forest Dead living Kalledo One time watchable

Name: Ravindra V
Title: Experience snow in Hyderabad
Review: If you want to experience snow in Hyderabad then this is the only place. You can play with the snow. There is a ride where you will do slide down in the snow. It will be crowded during weekends and there will be lot of waiting time.

Name: Veer2468
Title: Good for time pass!
Review: This is good to visit one time. Entry is on high side and too much waiting would be there. Rest of the things were good.

Name: ManojChhablani
Title: snowy snowy
Review: One of its kind snow park, enjoy in snow and forget about scorching heat of Hyderabad during summers. Play around have fun.

Name: Vivek G
Title: Cold of North in Down South
Review: Wow ! It was amazing ! I visited there in January 2018! The place is a must-see for adventure lovers. Its a family oriented place. They provide you the Jackets, Gloves, Boots etc for -5 Deg ! Although its not enough for the freezing cold inside, yet it serves the purpose to some extent. The rides are high point but a bit crowded in the beginning. The soup/ Tea shop inside the place is great!

Name: sudeshrele
Title: Biggest Snow Theme park in the world
Review: We visited this approx 17000sq feet snow themed park in the world. It offers a splendid snow fall experience thru' out the year. There are various rides which kids can enjoy.

Name: ganesh a
Title: Nice
Review: Nice Experience.,It was full of chilled ice and thunder,Enjoyed it.However Entry fee is slightly high.

Name: Indrajit R
Title: Really Nice
Review: WE were at the place on December 25, 2017. My God, you have to see the crowd !!! We thought we will never be able to reach the door in time. But to my utter surprise, we reached the entrance door in just 13 minute - such a organised place - and above all the law abiding, docile people. There was no breaking of line, no tramping of foot - nothing. The place inside is amazing - they have 1 hour slot for each group - and in that 1 hour you will feel like freezing. They spread ice mechanically once in this 1 hour period and you will get a small feeling of snow blizzard. They have rides inside. Also, they serve hot soups inside - nice to have. Once you are out, they have nice outlets for snacks / soups / tea / coffee.Above all, I am amazed at what an effective infrastructure they have created - so much so in that crowd, they manage everything almost picture perfect - hats off to the management and mainly to local people

Name: Chandu C
Title: Not so good
Review: As the snow world is good but the problem is that it's smelling too much and u cannot stay inside for long time so I recommend u not to go there better

Name: devbajaj
Title: Poorly maintained, very average place
Review: We went to this place on Dec 27, 2017.4 adults and 3 children.This place has 4 sections and here's my rating for them-1. Rain Forest- AVOID, waste of money and time. They've tried to create a dingy and scary rain forest experience which is actually pathetic2. Living Dead- AVOID, waste of money3. Kalledo - AVOID, waste of money4. Snow world- 45 minutes of being in an overcrowded room with snow on the floor, and a couple of rides. Snow was dirty. Getting in the snow world room will have you experience a stampede like situation so beware if you have small kids with you.Ticket prices we paid for combo of all 4 sections-Adult- 600 per personChildren- 400 per childTotal = 3700Sorry! No pictures. Mobiles are not allowed inside.

Name: smandal2858
Title: Snow World
Review: Visit snow world Dec'17. It is situated beside Hussain Sagar Lake Tank bund road. Experience is average. They provided gloves, shocks, jacket and shoe. But things are not clean. I got shoe with water in it. Huge public in a small place. Behavior of staff needs improvement. Cost is very high.

Name: Rajeev  K
Title: Snow World
Review: Good to visit with family and friends, specially kids.All can enjoy and play with snow and have fun.There are professional photographers inside who can click your photo for reasonable charge, same can be collected when you exit.Winter clothes are provided at the venue.

Name: TrravvelIndia
Title: Kids love this place
Review: One hour time in the snow world is definitely worthy. Would like you to avoid additional attractions like Mirror maze, Horror World & Rainforest.But Snow world is good enjoyment for the family.

Name: claritalewis
Title: First visit in Snow
Review: It was an awesome place to experience. Enjoyed every moment throwing the snow around. We visit during Diwali vacation. They also have lot of other options

Name: Vinay Y
Title: Fun place to experience snow!
Review: This is a fun place to experience snow in Hyderabad. As someone who grew up in the Northeast USA (who now lives in Los Angeles, California, USA), seeing snow wasn't a huge thrill for me, but my wife and son have never seen snow or played in snow (since it doesn't snow in Los Angeles). It was organized and they provided all the jackets, boots, mittens, etc. It's a nice place to play in the snow and experience what it's like to live in a winter place.Since I grew up in a place where it snows nearly 5 months of the year, I can expertly say this was a good representation of how it feels like to experience snow and snow like cold weather.They only let people into the snow chamber at certain time slots (presumably to keep the place cold) and you cannot take cell phones or cameras with you; they want to sell you their photos.Just be careful with young children as many of the people throw snowballs and play a little rough in the snow, so young kids can get hit with snow or knocked down.

Name: hemang m
Title: Good place but bit expensive & way way too over crowded
Review: Snow WorldAnother delayed review. Went here with my family in 1st week of November. My 82 yr old grandma wanted to come with us as well but everyone including ticket staff at the venue, the official agency from where we booked the online tickets said sadly, she won't be allowed inside. We really wanted her to come with us [fyi still does everything on her own without needing any assistance] but the staff told us god forbid if anything wrong happens it would be our responsibility as the temparature inside is -5 degees, hence to be on a safer side she decided to wait outsideShe happily agreed to sit in the common lobby, so we all went in. We went for the late evening batch. Every batch lasts around roughly an hour. The premises are big enough. They have rock climbing, snow rides, basketball games, snow dance etc. It's really freezing inside so make sure you put your gear properly. My 30 month old daughter got really scared after someone by mistake & in pure fun threw some ice on her, hence my wife and I took turns to look after her just outside the exit.Pros:1) Extremely helpful Staff [talking about the ones sitting at the gear counters]2) The gear provided is washed / cleaned in warm water & only then given to the forthcoming batch.3) Allotted time of approx 1 Hour is just enough to enjoy the place.Cons:1) Expensive Ticket prices. @ 500 Rs for Adults is definately steep.2) We had 2 school groups in our batch who were COMPLETE NUISANCE. [Wish I could have noted their details to report it to their management]. Constantly yelling, pushing everyone & anyone before entering inside [hey I know everyone goes there to enjoy but enjoying at the expense of pushing, shoving others makes NO SENSE]. Security staff controls no one outside the main area, they are just least bothered.3) Snow World Management just fills up people like anything, literally anything. There should definately be a limit of allowing the visitors inside.Overall, one can surely visit the place when in Hyd but make sure you check the timings and the crowd. PS: Just like other places, there is a 30-40 Rs Digi Cam fees.

Name: SamJose
Title: Good place to take your family and friends .
Review: Good experience with the place , but the snow is a bit dirty and crowded . But overall good place to spend time and kids will love it .

Name: passepartout2014
Title: NIce place for kids to experience snow
Review: It is quite small but kids will enjoy the snow. There is a snowboarding slide and  a merry go round.The session lasts for 1 hour which includes a snowfall. People can leave in between if they get too cold or uncomfortable. Jackets, boots, gloves, socks are provided. I was a little worried about whether they will be clean or not but they were.There is a garbage unit right next to Snow World so if you have to spend time at the outside waiting area you will have to bear the unpleasant stench.

Name: DrVijayPalwe
Title: Good place
Review: Its a wonder to creat such an amazing snow world in the hot Hyderabadi weather. Good place, needs better maintainance

Name: Laxmikant P
Title: Snow Savari
Review: Snow world is artificially created a place which is covered with snow, this place is attraction for all age group, there are few slide made up of snow which is really great to have fun. It is located next to tank bund road and it gives u a chilling experience before entering they provide u with big boots,winter coats. It's more than enough to spend 1 hour there.

Name: Rajani K
Title: Artificial world of snow
Review: This is an artificial world of snow. Several sheets of ice and snow cover the area. Special warm clothes need to be rented to go there.   It's more than enough to spend 1 hour there. There are rein deers/jingle bells music being played occasionally. Also, there is  ice skating and also you can play by throwing snow on each other.

Name: utkarshsharma2912
Title: Snow world attraction for all age group.
Review: If by any chance you are in Hyderabad city, then this the place you should visit, Snow world is artificially created a place which is covered with snow, this place is attraction for all age group, there are few slide made up of snow which is really great to have fun.

Name: Shabbu T
Title: Snow world
Review: It is located next to tank bund road and it gives u a chilling experience before entering they provide u with big boots,winter coats n hat and as u enter u cam see slides igloo made with ice

Name: FoodieYogiKrishna
Title: Snow in city of Biryanis !
Review: A few years back had visited this snow world and had come back disappointed. But this time around better experience and hence the review. The facility itself looks very very old and lack of maintenance shows. Learnt that  crowd is very low except on holidays. Kids really loved the sight and feel of snow. It will be very slippery and utmost care has to be taken to not trip and hurt one self. Worth only for the snow world entry and not all the others (scary house etc.. ). My samsung s6 crashed and all the pics are lost :( . i had pictured the ticket to keep track of the prices too !!

Name: Ritesh J
Title: An experience to have while in Hyderabad
Review: We have been to this place with our family friends and kids. The place is just fun to go if you haven't been to any place with real snow. They give gloves, shoes and jacket to wear. They have a standard size and you just need to wear it before entering the main chamber. Don't expect the gloves to clean though. I didn't find them hygienic and washed hands thoroughly once out. Once inside you understand how it is to be in snow for even around 30 mins. The time passes quickly inside. You have a small shop inside selling tea, coffee and sweet corn. Apart from that they have a snow laden slide and many other activities. In case if someone feels too cold then they have an exist which opens every few minutes and one can go out for sometime. It is advisable to go in a group so that you can enjoy with your own group. You might want to take a package which gives you opportunity to visit mirror maze and haunted house. They are not that great but  it's fun.

Name: avenkat2016
Title: kids loved it
Review: more shaved ice than fluffy snow, but kids enjoyed it nonetheless. it is cold inside, and chaotic. avoid going during holidays, you will have a bunch of college kids in there too. they have a fun ramp to slide down on, kids love it , parents who accompany them, not so much.

Name: Giri P
Title: Very poorly managed venue
Review: Snow world falls way short of fun experience.i went by the positive reviews only to find the theme park in a pathetic state. The living dead and the rain forest were a joke. Irritating sounds with no hint of adventure or fear. Waste of time and money.The snow drome was overcrowded. They make u wear the snow gear and wait for 30 min in an enclosed area. A small area where there shouldnt be more than 20 people..they cram it with 100+ . Crowd manners are pathetic in our country. There was scary stampede to enter the snow drome once the gate was opened. Interiors were discoloured and depressing.dirty snow and noisy snow generators. Food was costly and tasteless. The tomato soup worth 50 bucks inside the snow drome was served in flimsy paper cups which just tore off with weight of soup.Overall it was very poorly managed profit making venture.

Name: Asish P
Title: A small place with snow
Review: Its fun to be inside for about 45 minutes in snow. But the ticket price of Rs.500 per adult is on higher side

Name: pjanil1968
Title: Superb expereince
Review: It is a wonderful experience to climb down through the snow. Also we can play volleyball etc on the snow. Cover your body properly with the warm cloths which they give

Name: Prasobh K
Title: Experience snowy chill @ Snow world
Review: Snow world in Hyderabad is a unique experience for those wanting to see and play in snow at chilling temperatures !! The cost is quiet high @ Rs.500/- for a time period of one hour in the snow world. They provide all necessary clothing including jackets, shoes, socks, gloves, etc. You have to leave mobiles outside. The entry is timed at intervals of 90 minutes - so check the timings before you reach the place since you do not want to be waiting for long time. Once you are in the snow world it takes some time to get used to the -5 C temp. One can play in the snow, there are balls and otehr stuff. There is also a steep slide on ice and adults/ older kids can do it. They also do some snow fall and play music for dance. Go to snow world to enjoy the chill !!

Name: sravan
Title: Snow world
Review: This is the place where we can feel that we are in some snow fall countries.We have pay money to enter inside. suite,glouses and shoes are given before entering to snow fall area

Name: Nandita T
Review: Fun=Snow WorldIf you love to blast your world with fun, this is the perfect place you are required to visit.

Name: Thakkarmeister
Title: Unique experience for Children and maybe adults
Review: The kids love it!! As an adult, If you have not experienced snow often in your life then its a fun place. The entry is a little steep at Rs 500. The time limit is 45 minutes. Clean protective clothing is provided including socks, shoes and gloves. No phones or electronic equipment is allowed inside so be sure to keep it in the car. I am not so sure if lockers are available. There is snow slide inside which most seemed to enjoy.

Name: anil k
Title: Snowy
Review: Best recreation place in Hyderabad irrespective of all ages. There are offer packages for entry tickets. Located near Indira Park. Feels like we are in a snow island with everywhere covered with snow and snow fall.temperature inside the Snow World varies from 0 to 5 degree Celsius. Its offer visitors with an experience of snow clad hill station with snow falling from above and amazing landscapes.Games like Snow volley Ball, Snow Merry-Go-Round, snow basket ball and to do things are ice skating, ice boarding, snow slides with bumping-car, toboggan rides, etc. There is a cryo zone with igloos and Alpine trees.

Name: wajiha a
Title: Beautiful snow worĺď
Review: This is good place for fun and enjoyment wid family and friends.. they have created aritifcal snow you can enjoy... wid slides affortable place and enjoyable place ...

Name: Mohd Naseer A
Title: Beautiful place
Review: Great place for fun n enjoyment..there iz a dance floor ,snow slide n ice .. its good place to enjoy with family n frndz

Name: Imran khan
Title: Feel like hill station in hot Hyderabad...
Review: This is a good amusement park for fun and enjoyment. You can enjoy artificial snow and few games. The temperature is really chilling inside. It provides that feeling of hill station in hot Hyderabad that is also in just Rs. 500 so deserves a good clap.

Name: Im O
Title: Snow world
Review: Snow world is amazing place here have real snow..you can play with it or make some fun with.nice to visit with friend

Name: dr ganapathi bhat
Title: "Typical mall"
Review: In Hyderabad's prime locality, Banjara Hills. Went there when we stayed in the Hyatt Place, right opposite to the mall. Can't say a " must visit" mall, but it's good. A typical mall with all types of items.  Will need about two hours to cover the place.  Now, the crowd is not much. Can go with family. Good parking space.

Name: Rahul
Title: Gvk one mall customer care number (7602471926
Review: 1st Floor, Road No. 1, Banjara Hills, Hyderabad 500034 India gvk one mall customer care number//7602471926

Name: Primal Survivor
Title: One of the better malls
Review: Just another mall / shopping plaza.Crowd is better than Forum mall , City Centre & Galleria Location is good with ample basement parking .Hard rock cafe is most often visited.Quiet a few indian & foreign brand stores are located but no woodland or hi design . Review 3.5/5Recommendation Yes 👍

Name: Ushaa S
Title: good
Review: nice mall with all the facilities . food court is good and the theater is also very nice. recommend to everybody. the location is also good

Name: Vikas Singh
Title: Less crowded
Review: The best thing about this mall is that it is less crowded than the other malls. Hence you can move around in peace and comfort. The food court has nice options. The Crossword book store is the best amongst the three Cross word stores in the city. You will find almost all major brands being sold here. On festive occasions they deck up the mall quite well.

Name: Karishma Tanna
Title: All the big brands under one roof
Review: From MAC to forever new you got it all under one roof. Clubbed with a dope food court and so many options to choose from, GVK is the place to be.

Name: Alia M
Title: Don't miss these atores
Review: If you're ever in Banjara hills, don't forget to stop by the GVK mall. You absolutely have to checkout these stores:1) chumbak - handmade authentice indian house items, accessories, clothea, bags, phone cases, fragrances and beauty products. I got beautiful cushion covers that I absolutely love! 2) paparazzi - souvenir shop at reasonable prices (cheaper than the airport and better variety). I recommend the handmade notebooks.Starbucks lovers: theres a branch in the mall, try their sandwiches as well.

Name: Ashwin Vemuri
Title: GVK One Mall
Review: Best Mall in Best Location with Best Stores for All Day Shopping with Eateries, Pubs, Cinema with Family

Name: Rakesh
Title: Best place to hangout in Hyderabad
Review: Very good mall in center of the city. Aquarium is the main attractive to thing in the mall.. huge food court and many shopping outlets are available. Number of outlets available is more than any other malls in the city. Great asset to GVK brand name.

Name: rihab k
Title: Banjara hills
Review: The place is fine and full of varieties shops and crowded.I like the mall , because it has cinema inside and many small restaurants.

Name: Vikas Singh
Title: Good food court- Feastivities
Review: The best thing about this mall is the spacious food court so that you do not have to worry about table. There are good food options stretching right from Chinese to North Indian to down South. Also good options for tea and coffee

Name: rashmi j
Title: good for a quick tour
Review: It is  a good mall for a quick tour. Or in case you are out for meetings and want to grab a  quick bite. its usually empty on a weekday

Name: Anita Pradhan
Title: A decent mall
Review: This mall once used to be the best mall in Hyderabad but it has lost all its charm now.  The central aquarium which was its usp has lost its significance. The food court is decent with not that many options in comparison to other malls. The place is a bit crowded but a decent place to hangout and go for shopping.

Name: beyondtravel
Title: Not cool anymore
Review: The once happening mall seems loosing out on options, maintenance, parking etc. Food court is good, the central aquarium is a saving grace

Name: mka003
Title: Big mall
Review: A big mall at Banjara Hills but not the biggest in Hyderabad. Inorbit mall in electronic city is much bigger and better.

Name: Santkal
Title: Nive place
Review: Had been to this mall during my visit to hyderabad and found this place very nice aa there are so many varieties to eat food and also shopping.

Name: Shreyansh
Title: Burger King
Review: I just had Chicken Wopper in burger king , it was pathetic . The quality of food was not good , cheese wopper doesn't have cheese in it. And just beside the burger king there is a Momo stall which is also sell poor quality. The momo we expected it was not upto the mark. Location is wonderful.

Name: ShvRm_Traveller
Title: Nothing out of ordinary
Review: The GVK One Mall is not any different from similar malls at other locations. The Mall is multistory with most well known fashion brands having their outlets here. Visited the place during the evening on a weekday. The place had relatively fewer visitors, compared to other malls of similar type.It was also difficult get a public transport from the mall when we left, later.It may be a popular place to shop among the locals, however, the tourist may consider to skip this place, if they do not have any specific branded items on their shopping list.

Name: EaterNGo
Title: Just to Sit
Review: nothing much can do here,mostly the outlet selling traditional dress,for ladies perhaps its good place,but i think when i am here, most of outlet is empty..or maybe i went on wrong timing?

Name: balkivinod
Title: Nothing special about it
Review: Usual mall with various brands on clothing and other accessories. The food court is also not anything special to write about it. Can have see through during leisure time and is located at prime location in B hills which is the main attraction.

Name: 40familyof4
Title: Clean mall
Review: This is a clean mall in Banjara Hills. Open design, clean floors and friendly staff. Good for shopping on a hot day.

Name: PrickelyPear
Title: Average mall, basic stores, TERRIBLE food court
Review: If you are looking to get some basic things, and not looking for much else, this place is your place.  The mall is VERY basic and is very quiet.  not much going on and not a lot of people.  The stores are very basic stores and nothing too flash.... you can go to Fabindia or Chumbuck or Soles.... but this is not a high end mall.  It is still ok, but not what I expected.  The food court leaves a LOT to be desired.  A few fast food stalls and that is it.  Compared to other malls in the area, I would not bother going to this one unless it has something specific you need....

Name: karthikakavya
Title: Huge
Review: this place is almost the same as hyderabad central mall lots of variety things you'll get cost is not less but some are affordable & some are very expensive one has to be full wallet person to buy a few things here

Name: raahgir
Title: Good mall for variety of brand shops, food outlets, multiplex, video game parlours etc
Review: It is a good mall with lot of branded outlets and lot of restaurants and food shops in the food court. The mall is usually very crowded on weekends and parking may take some time.

Name: Santosh Kumar
Title: Recommended place in banjara hills
Review: Had been to this mall during my visit to Banjara hills for my official work and found this mall very awesome especially in terms of food stalls and seating arrangement.So definately recommended for everyone.

Name: KASI VENKOBA RAO
Title: Crazy Shopping Mall
Review: GVK One is a very big shopping mall located in Banjara Hills Road No.1, Hyderabad, in the state of Telangana.  It consists of Seven floors with an area of about 3.50 lakhs sq ft.It was opened about 10 years back and has gained an important land mark in the twin cities of Hyderabad and Secunderabad. The mall has both National and International branded stores, of which Shoppers Stop occupies a major area in three levels. Garments, watches, travel suit cases, cosmetics, and what not, one can get everything under one roof.The mall has six screen INOX multiplex theaters for entertainment. Ample car parking in addition to valet parking is available.. Restaurants/ eateries are available for a family to spend a full day here. Children have a full time entertainment in the mall.

Name: UrbanTravelLady
Title: Grand Mall
Review: Visited this Mall couple of times. Great Ambience, Nice Food court. It has INOX movie theatre on fourth floor. Everything from Shoppers Stop, Crossword, Mustard, Soch, Maanyavar Mebaz etc. You just can't help buying. The window displays are very enticing. The Pizza hut here has a nice tradition of letting you get a slice of pizza instead of a whole pizza. Reminded me of USA. The ground floor entry has a Aquarium which is very attractive. Mall is sparkling clean so also the rest rooms. It is located in Banjara Hills in the heart of the city. Only three words for this place Entertainment! Entertainment! Entertainment.

Name: SreejithSreekumar
Title: Average mall by Bangalore or other metro standards
Review: An average sized mall with sufficient shopping options. Shops are therefore smaller than what I had expected. As an example a prominent book store was quarter of size compared to what they have at Bangalore or even Cochin. Food court had limited options and less seating.

Name: vinodkhedkar
Title: Best Mall in Hyderabad
Review: This is a very big and nice mall located at Banjara Hills in Hyderabad. Three storey malls comprising of numerous shops selling branded goods.Food court is also having good dining options.

Name: David
Title: Foody
Review: It is worth coming and having a look atleast at the aquarium and shops there are good enough to get you everything you need there.

Name: francis n
Title: Beautiful place
Review: Went there for both shopping and movie...Loved the cleanliness the Aquarium there was too very big and beautiful.

Name: ramakrishnabanoth3
Title: Mall with everything.
Review: One of the mall in Hyderabad in Banjara hills.Good and tidy place.Can do all the shopping and go to restaurant.Everything is available inside it.Chill .

Name: Murali3770
Title: Elegant
Review: This mall in Hyderabad is there from a long time. Maintenance is very good, regular modifications keep it up-to-date. Parking is very good. Good brand outlets like Nautica, M&S etc. Inox movies are crowd pullers.

Name: srk-rk
Title: Decent Mall
Review: GVK Mall is a decent mall with food court, play zone, movies and stores. Many of the big brands have stores in the mall. It is a good place to spend time with family and friends.

Name: SvenProescher
Title: Small but nice
Review: As all bigger shopping malls in Hyderabad are almost like any mall in the world, the GVK is different in terms of the fbb shop where you can buy more local clothing at an average price range. The much larger Inorbit Mall or Hyderabad Mall are all about international brands and there is not difference to a mall in Melbourne, Paris or Rome. So I would recommend the GVK even it's 1/3 of the other malls.

Name: Dhruv M
Title: Please renovate the interior.
Review: This is a good mall, and has been amongst the top ones in the city. However, it is loosing its charm as it gets old. It needs a renovation on the interior if it wants to compete with other malls in the city like Inorbit and Forum. It looks lackluster, dull and run-down in comparison to the others mentioned. This place is good for people looking buy clothes - especially Indian Wear and has a good cinema hall.

Name: Meghaa R
Title: Refresh yourself
Review: The GVK mall is very good for roaming around and having fun with family or friends or couples, you will find variety of branded stores in there to explore and types of all cusinine to relish

Name: sravan
Title: Gvk mall
Review: This is the place where, all top dress brand showrooms are available. This is best place for shopping.

Name: Priyobroto
Title: Overhyped
Review: Went with my wife, didnt found anything amazing rather all were very average but super costly. Cold coffee was pathetic but price was skyrocketing.Cafecoffeday makes same thing in lesser price

Name: sudha r
Title: Nice mall
Review: A great place to shop around and spend your weekends. You have got a variety of shops to shop around for books, clothes and electronics. The kids love the aquarium out there located centrally. I specially love their food court that serves a variety of cuisine and is a great place to have your Sunday Brunch. To top it they also have a multiplex along with a 4D movie theatre.

Name: Erik Takla
Title: Good Mall
Review: Good mall with international standard. Plenty of shops over several floors. A number of international shops as well as local in different price ranges. Hard Rock Cafe in “same” building if you want a drink or a light snack but also a number of places to eat

Name: KINISJ
Title: mall is low key and not at all a bustling and happening place
Review: with lot of aspirations we visited this mall after travelling in a local bus for an hour to reach this place. entrance is lack luster. there are only 2 or three floors and we saw only a few  people hanging around. the lighting of the mall is uninviting and dull.may be there are shops selling international brands . we did not notice.we were asking ourselves "is there s better and bigger mall in hyderabad?not sure!!

Name: mahmoodkanji
Title: Shopping you enjoy doing
Review: Amazing mall, with great shops for every occasion, perfumery and food, A place a woman needs to be taken.

Name: umesh s
Title: Best places for shopping
Review: Best place for shopping & for watching movies. Nice collection of products an trusted ones. Good service an reasonable rates

Name: visithra
Title: nice mall
Review: nice mall, with brands like shoppers stop, fabindia, crosswords. i especially like their food court, the food is quite tasty

Name: Shri Krishan Kansal
Title: Nice place to shop
Review: Being near to our hotel Taj Krishana and in the centre of city on Banjara Hills we found it easily accessible. It houses all the major brands at one place with food court  and all other which a best Mall can have.

Name: Gaurab2017
Title: Best Mall Of Hyderabad
Review: Known for its huge aquarium. Notedly one of the best mall of hyderabad with INOX at top. Some top restaurants like hardrock, starbucks etc are part of it. Great Shopping Avenue indeed!

Name: bose_rima
Title: Large mall in Banjara Hills
Review: The mall is centrally located and is quite popular. There are a number of brands, food and movie options.

Name: nikhil0210
Title: Good Mall
Review: Centrally placed in city this is happenning with shops food court and good movie theatres. Parking ample.

Name: rabhola
Title: Beautiful Mall
Review: The mall is located on the main Banjara Hills area. Very crowded and offers variety of shopping avenues. Malls are sign of advancement and progress of any city – this mall adds status to image of the city. In the city of crowded roadside shops (which thrive in Charminar area) this mall stands out prominently. Dr. Rajesh BholaSpiritual Writer & Columnist

Name: RajeshP
Title: Good place to hang out
Review: It’s a pretty decent mall in an upscale area and very well maintained. It’s has some good brand shops and a huge food court on the top floor which is usually packed on a weekend. Has decent selection of food choices. There is an aquarium at the entrance which is quite popular among visitors and a place for photo opp. Also has a multiplex and Hard Rock Cafe.

Name: Anil Sharma
Title: Happening place
Review: Good mall with lots of brands under one roof. Shoppers stop, Hard Rock Cafe is Plus point of the mall.

Name: PRASAD C
Title: One Stop shop
Review: Everything you will get here . you can enjoy every thing. food courts, spa ,shopping zones, mobile stores, pub . every thing you will get in this mall

Name: drn85
Title: Gvk one mall.. good place to enjoy the leisure time
Review: Gvk one mall is located in tha banjara hills is a reasonably big mall. I visited this place close to the dussera festival time which made the mall well decorated and good to see. This mall has got adequate parking space and online taxis are also available from here. Inox cinemas had made their presence here and tickets can be purchased from the ground floor. Almost all famous brands are having their outlets here and the big food court is something worth to visit. Burger king, kfc , cream stone are some of the attractions there. Altogether it's a good place to spend our leisure once you are in Hyderabad.

Name: Anand R
Title: Anand
Review: Centrally located mall . Most of the international brands available . Should add electronics outlets , a bank and exchange house which will be convenient for tourist . Cleanliness maintained

Name: Prabir D
Title: Nice mall.
Review: The mall is quite good. It is in the heart of the city. There is lot off store where u can buy n compare . The food zone in the top floor is also very good.

Name: ReetaKarki
Title: Mall tour
Review: The mall hosts quite a good brands for shopping and good number of restaurants and snacks counter too.

Name: Nana L
Title: GVK Mall
Review: A nice place in uptown Banjara Hills. Retail outlets of all top brands are available here. The Food Court in the third floor and the Fun Zone in the top floor are a do not miss!

Name: Jamila N
Title: Good mall with attractive festive decorations
Review: This mall has some cool interiors and also it is one of the few malls which decorates in various festivals and it is fun to be there.

Name: Pawan Naulakha
Title: Only If you want to rest
Review: This is a slow and old mall located in such a high huzz buzz city of the nawabs.High on expectations but low on delivery.

Name: Amazing_Neo
Title: Great place for a movie / evening
Review: A pleasant place for shopping, meal, movie and a good time. Most of them meet up here as groups and spend quality time with each other.

Name: erkartika
Title: Super mall to spend nice tyme with frnds...
Review: We can spend nice time having fun with friends... All brands are available for shopping... Nice place to hangout before going to movie...

Name: PROF.HARAGOPAL MATHSYARAJA
Title: Tasty coffee
Review: One of the Starbucks coffee shop in Hyderabad famous for American snacks and Coffee (Cappuccino). Good location and coffee though expensive.

Name: annejang
Title: Popular mall at a great location
Review: The mall is known for the cool crowds it attracts. There are nice places to chill and grab some food. There is even a hard rock cafe adjacent to it apart from the food court. There are many shopping outlets as well. There is an interesting center piece- An aquarium!

Name: rohanpillai1
Title: Sophisticated but posh
Review: The mall is well situated in the posh localities of the city of Hyderabad, well connected by public transport. It is a small facility but has nearly all the possible foreign brands. Worth visiting if you want to spend some time in Hyderabad.

Name: Jikuza
Title: Great location, great brands
Review: This is one of the premier and posh malls in Hyderabad. It has a great collection of shopping outlets including chains such as Shoppers Stop. The restaurants are also great.

Name: irenevff
Title: small but wonderful mall...
Review: we were searching for souvenir items to bring back home in this mall and we almost lost hope had it not been for the open seats of starbucks. i was already feeling tired and decided to make a quickstop and rest my aching legs when suddenly this novelty store (popparazzi) turned on a light bulb in my head. i bought all the items i needed which i know would make my family, relatives and friends happy. thank you GVK mall for housing that one reliable store.

Name: SandeshJonnala
Title: Had a good time
Review: It's a good place to shop and watch movies have a food And chill out. Usually here some kind of activities will be taken care to make fun.

Name: zap r
Title: One of the best in Hyderabad.
Review: 1.  This is one of the best shopping malls in the city.2.  Location is good, in the heart of the city.3.  Quite an expensive place for shopping.4.  Many International brand outlets available.5.  Food court, fun zone for kids,Fish aquarium, Spa, cinema etc...6.  Hard rock cafe is one of the best , evenings are great. Though quite expensive.7.  Can spend some good time on hot summer days.

Name: Pushpendra M
Title: GOOD
Review: It is good mall for everyone. You can spend lot of time when you come with manys persons, Please visit.

Name: RAVI K
Title: Good for passing time
Review: GVK One is a shopping mall located in Banjara Hills,Good for passing time. Hard Rock Cafe and Inox are the main attractions here. They also organize fun activities. Good for visiting with your children and family.

Name: rangudu
Title: Nice mall
Review: It is a good mall and you can spend lot of time when you are coming in a group. You have nice long space to sit and you can order variety of foods. It is a must go place when you are from non local person.

Name: The_Nath_Family
Title: The best of brands available for shopping in Hyderabad
Review: Very conveniently located, with the best brands available, this is undoubtedly the best shopping mall in Hyderabad. There are quality crowd at this venue (which is a definite plus), and the Hard Rock café is next door. The interiors of the mall are striking and well maintained. Few top brand food chains (Starbucks, KFC, BK, Subway, etc.) are as well as the INOX multiplex. Convenient place hours with friends and/or family.

Name: Ravindra V
Title: Ok find of mall
Review: This is a small mall. Not many shops but only good thing is there is Inox theater. This mall is easy to find and is on Banjara hills road number 1. City center mall is nearby.

Name: Raj K
Title: mall is really good
Review: mall is very big,good for family visit and has many well known brands,it has a game place and is a lot of fun

Name: madhuonly
Title: excellent mall
Review: one mall having many shops and full of entirtenment place to drink ,shop, play, rest, movies, enjoy, time pass, all we can have in this mall all in one .

Name: Akash_Bamania
Title: Average mall with an amazing Aquarium
Review: It's an good mall, with many major brands and good outlets,  the aquarium at the center is amazing, it really has some very beautiful fishes.

Name: Yasserimran
Title: Convenient and Centrally located - also has INOX
Review: It's probably the one of best malls in the city... Central location, has most good brands, big food court. With the multiplex, it's a great place to catch up with friends for a movie and some shopping. Women get a priority parking. They also have  'Khan Saab' restaurant which serves good avadhi (north Indian) food. Only negative is getting in and out of the mall in the evenings is a bit difficult due to heavy traffic on Rd no. 1.

Name: Seemahooda
Title: Awesome place,everything for everyone
Review: Awesome place,everything for everyone one in one place... Good food and music..if u r an ice cream lover try new combination at cocoa cream...I loved everybit of time I spent there..

Name: Sree p
Title: Great place
Review: Awesome place if you want to go for a movie,  shop,  eat,  roam etc.... Shopping at its best with lots of options

Name: sravan s
Title: shopping and enjoying
Review: hey, the place is good for shopping and parties. it takes almost  days to rome entire mall.many events also been conducting here.. njoyed lot with family.

Name: Repala S
Title: GOOD LOCATION FOR GATHERING.....
Review: Good place for shopping with family and have some food at the food court. It is one of the greatest, cutting edge shopping center in Hyderabad. Its resemble a remote shopping center. The aquarium in the ground floor is excellent .

Name: vipulagrawal1
Title: Very good food court,Aquarim at enterence is unique
Review: I liked the setting of the mall specially cylindrical aquarium on Ground floor reception. Kids as well as adults take photos and view it. Food court has very good variety and outlets. Should visit if you have time.

Name: Aditya A
Title: best mall
Review: one of the best mall in hyderabad as well as in India ..the best thing of this mall is that it is suitable for each and everyone and it is at the centre of the city

Name: Dinkar P
Title: Good compact mall
Review: Good compact mall with very good inox theatres.We went during Christmas time and it was well decked up with good activities for kids.It has the best economical brands and hence you can finish all your shopping at one go.Hard rock cafe is also present in this mall so you can combine your shopping spree with a good party towards the night.Has got good parking space considering that the mall is not built in a very large square feet area.

Name: AI_2013
Title: Best mall in Hyderabad
Review: Love this mall.. great shopping and dining options and a wonderful Spa and Hair Salon. Great place to spend a few hours shopping, eating and relaxing.

Name: SamWorld
Title: Biggest in Hyderabad
Review: Very big mall with all type of brands... Clothes, accessories, food, gadgets, Starbucks, hard rock cafe... If you visit this mall you dont have to visit any other mall in Hyderabad... Well designed... And good place for hangout!!

Name: BinodMishra
Title: Good one
Review: We were there and roamed almost entire mall . Nice ambiance and accessibility . Almost all brands are there so easy reach .

Name: RamySafwat
Title: Good for souvenirs and general shopping
Review: Clean and just to the point, i like this mall vs the others in town as it doesn't confuse you with many shops selling same thing and have several souvenirs shops and Tommy kids. Its my preferred mall in town, just missing Lacoste to be perfect

Name: Georgio Valentino Rayala
Title: Great Mall
Review: Inspite of all the new malls that have opened up,this mall continues to be one of the best mall in Hyderabad.This mall not only has a good collection of International Brands but also has a good multiplex,fun zone,restaurants like Khaansaab and Hardrock cafe etc and also it's located in the Center of city.

Name: antaryami2016
Title: One stop for all international brands
Review: This place hosts a lot of international brands as well as internationally famous national brands. This a very good place for shopping. It does have a INOX & food court. So if you're looking for some fun on weekends especially evenings this is a great place!

Name: stantp1916
Title: Very nice mall
Review: Very nice mall, though not very big in size. There was a lovely aquarium in the first floor. Hosts almost all big brands as well as small ones too. We ate in the food court. Food court is not very big but has variety of food.

Name: Travelcalm
Title: GVK one mall
Review: Overwhelmingly too much of international brand shops one next to each other. Nothing unique unless you have a requirement to visit a particular brand shop

Name: Prasad B
Title: Good place for relishing weekends:-)
Review: Nice architecture...State of art facilities and infrastructure.Presence of INOX is an add on one over the same.

Name: Sanjaymit
Title: Un clean restrooms neat food court
Review: I visit this mall and watch all movies in its multiplex. I and my family usually enjoy quality time in its food court ( 3 rd floor) after movies and hence use rest room on this floor. But they are really unhygienic and unclean. A foul smell is a part of this rest room ( ladies) . It even doesn't have paper napkins to use after hand wash. The cleaners there are always busy in chatting n dressing themselves . I request concern authorities to rectify the matter which definitely is bringing bad name to entire mall.

Name: SKYLA S
Title: Good mall
Review: This is one of the good malls in the Hyderabad City.  Shopping - Good Branded Stores, Multiplex Screens, Good Choise of food. As the mall is located in a prime location and Movie screens are located in the 5th Floor you can expect the crowd through out the day. The mall is ideal for shopping/window shopping.

Name: Abdul
Title: Shopping and dining Spree
Review: I been there last week, my favourites brands are there and also many eating joint's i like to be there again.

Name: Satish R
Title: Good mall
Review: Awesome place to find decent brands and has ample parking too.Well laid mall where all shops are easily locatable.

Name: Rimjhim B
Title: All under one roof
Review: This is one of the best malls in the Hyderabad City. There are shopping outlets of almost all major brands , food outlets with delicious food and movie screens. Basically the mall has everything under one roof to make your weekend.

Name: SuvodipMoitra
Title: Good Mall
Review: Its a decent/good mall. But too far away from Hitec City/ Gachibowli area. It has a good brand presence, a hard rock cafe, shoppers stop, pubs, restaurants & a INOX. Good for people staying in Banjara Hills area.

Name: Ravi
Title: They should have forbearance
Review: Temple is excellent and very clean, no doubt about that, and i have visited lot of times, but the pandits behavior in temple will be always impolite and insulting.

Name: Kasi  Venkoba R
Title: Pride of Hyderabad
Review: Though I have  visited this temple many times earlier, the present visit is an importance one as the visit was on Vaikunta Ekadasi day which comes once in a year. On this auspicious day the entry into the temple will be from Uttara Dwaram, meaning from North entrance.  The temple is fully decorated with different flowers, fruits etc giving a great Look.The Utsava Moorthy of Lord Vishnu and Goddess Lakshmi is kept outside the sanctorium and poojais performed there.  A big crowd is seen standing in the queues since morning to have a Darshan of Goddess Mahalakshmi and Lord Vishnu.Another attraction in the temple is erecting Mirror Mahal inside the temple which is so beautiful to admire.  A must visit temple in Hyderabad and it has become the Pride of Hyderabad

Name: panii2015
Title: Namo Lakshmi Namo Namaha
Review: All the lakshmi temples on one place. Very neat clean maintenance. Widely available parking area. Very calm and spiritual place in city. Every one should visit this. Should appreciate the maintenance of the committee.

Name: CuriousTraveller
Title: Most beautiful and peaceful temple
Review: It is the most beautiful and peaceful city. We always used to visit this temple to take presence. There is a lot of development in the temple.You must take your family especially with parents.

Name: Kumar
Title: Temple visit
Review: Temple is clean. Deities alankaram are beautiful and give calmness&satisfaction of visiting. Your wishes will be fulfilled.

Name: sree143in
Title: must visit
Review: One the Good and very famous temple in hyd is Asthalakshmi tempel. goddess lakshmi in this tempel will give blessings to all.

Name: Manu
Title: Best Lakshmi Devi temple in Hyderabad
Review: I am a regular visitor to Ashta Lakshmi temple in Hyderabad. Its maintnance is admirable and we see all 8 avatars of Lakshmi Devi. But in 2019 it has raised ticket prices drastically. Last year(2018) I spent Rs.101 for Vahana Pooja(T/W) on Dussehra but in 2019 it is increased to Rs 251 and more over poojari who performed vahanapooja demanded Rs.101 and servents Rs. 50. Poojari shouted at a man who gave him Rs. 50 as he didnt give 101 and insulted him throwing that Rs. 50 to a Cleaner. My point is people go to temple with a peaceful mind to get the blessings of godess and the Priest. But if a priest behaves with devotees like this it hurt them a lot and creates negetive impression on it's commercial side. On top of it this Priest had pan masala also. I would ask management to look into it and protect people religious sentiments especially on special occations. Regards,Manohar

Name: idea614354
Title: Laxmi amma
Review: This temple is very famous with astha lakshmi ammavari darshan, very familiar with local people also.

Name: GLOBALSEAS
Title: 6 godess temple
Review: only temple with 6 goddesses in Hyderabad called astalakshmi temple , well maintained and nice place to visit for peaceful time

Name: Shabeshan
Title: Great Temple
Review: one the best and clean temple in hyderabad. the santity and the divine blessings are the great in the temple. one should try to visit it.

Name: PROF.HARAGOPAL MATHSYARAJA
Title: Nice place.
Review: These days very many religious activities take pace here along with social activities at this temple dedicated to ASTA LAKSHMI (Goddess of wealth in eight forms).Its closed from noon till 4pm. avoid  festival days when there is heavy rush.

Name: MSR
Title: Ashtalakshmi Temple, Green Hills colony, HYB
Review: One of the famous religious places in Hyderabad and very familiar in Dilshuknagar and LB nagar locale. A well organized temple with beautiful temple premises, organized shopping complex and neat roads around. Even parking and a open air-theater opposite to this temple where several religious events are at common sight very often. This temple is located is densely populated residential area but well organized. Consequent to introduction of Hyderabad Metro Rail network, this temple is having walk-able distance from Chaitanyapuri Metro station on LB nagar- Miyapur stretch.

Name: rockzzM77
Title: Very nice
Review: Very nice temple, neet and clean place, temple of Maa Lakshmi, must visit whenever you are in Hyderabad.

Name: deepa v
Title: Temple
Review: Temple is dedicated to goddess Lakshmi with her eight forms. It's neat clean and well maintained..Must visit in hyd

Name: srinath18
Title: Jai ambe maata
Review: Located at main road from dilsukhnagar to lbnagar area one of the most old temple in Hyderabad..Jai ambe maata ki jai

Name: Dilip kumar
Title: Must visit place
Review: This place has got its best natured and best peaceful place to step in and have a peaceful mind and its calmness.

Name: venkatakarthik
Title: clean temple but avoid going in the afternoon
Review: must visit temple in hyderabad but for me it took me more than 2 hours to get there from my location and i suggest you avoid going in the afternoon on a sunny day unless you have some special rituals such as special pooja, or an offering because the sun could easily heat up the marbles and you cant wear footwear inside the temple so it's gonna burn your foot so keep this in mind

Name: RajaSekar M
Title: Clean Temple and Darshan is awesome
Review: Ashtalakshmi temples is simple and very clean. Rush free for darshan. Bought laddus and puliyodhara at affordable price. Peaceful place for people to burst their stress. Note: Coconuts needs to be cracked by yourself in the below before going upstairs.

Name: Tapas_Baripada
Title: Nice temple
Review: It is a nice temple with very good parking facility. The main deities are Narayana and Adi Lakshmi. Other seven form of Lakshmi, viz. Santana, Gaja, Dhana, Dhanya, Vijaya, Aishwarya, Veera are on the peripheri. There is also a Ganesha idol at the entrance. Prasad of pulihara and laddu, available at the prasad counter are good. There is a lift for senior citizens as the temple is on the first floor.

Name: idea614354
Title: amma krupa
Review: this a very famous temple in hyderabad, good place to visit, powerful god believes all here. a lot of people visits

Name: idea614354
Title: all lakshmi's
Review: Temple a peaceful place good construction, nice architecture take amma vari darshan and blessing at here.

Name: PROF.HARAGOPAL MATHSYARAJA
Title: Good
Review: This is one of the noted temples dedicated to  goddess laksmi  near LB Nagar area. Recently this has become a center for religious , community and social  activities.

Name: Srinivas S
Title: Peaceful temple
Review: At one place, you get to get to visit and pray Astalakshmi. Temple is peaceful and nice ambiance. It's one of the famous Astalakshmi temples in Hyderabad.

Name: Manish K
Title: Nice peaceful temple to visit
Review: The Ashtalakshmi temple is dedicated to eight forms of the Goddess Lakshmi and is a popular religious centre in the eastern part of Hyderabad. The place offers good parking facilities.Though a small complex, it is nonetheless a peaceful place, where one can visit and spend some quiet moments in prayer. The prasadam given is delicious and one must partake of it. The temple is closed during the afternoon hours and is open during the morning and evening, so one needs to find out the timings before paying it a visit.

Name: Sumitkumar_13
Title: Holy shrine
Review: Asthalakshmi Temple provides a tranquil environment to pray and worship. The premises is very neatly maintained.

Name: rishitha g
Title: Temple review
Review: One of the Best temple's in hyderabad to visit.bathukamma,navarathri,brahmothsavam are celebrated very well.here you can have world's best pulihora prasadam:)

Name: KASI VENKOBA RAO
Title: One of its Kind in the State
Review: Ashta Lakshmi Temple, located at Vasavi colony, Kothapet, between Dilsukhnagar & L B Nagar is one of its kind in the state of Telangana. The main deity is Mahalakshmi sametha Srimannarayana, This is located on a small hill top.As we enter the temple, we climb a few steps to reach Lord Vinayaka and after taking blessing from this Lord, we proceed to the main temple. At the centre, we witness Goddess Mahalakshmi along with Srimannarayana. Within this we find the other seven Lakshmi, making it in all Ashta lakshmi.The temple follows Agamana sastra and is under the control of Sri Kanchi Kamakoti Peetham. The temple has a separate Managing committee headed by its Chairman.The annual Brahmotsavam is celebrated in a grand scale in the month of Vaisakha, April/ May. Thousands of devotees from all over twin cities and other places visit tis temple during this period. Annadanam is done during these seven days both in the afternoon and night.Goddess Lakshmi is crowned with Golden saree and Lord Srimannarayana with Golden Dhoti on all important festival days and during the Brahmotsavam. Its a feast to the eyes to grace the Deities decorated in Golden saree and dhoti.Recently the temple has introduced Sahasra Deepa alankaran which is celebrated every Friday at 7.00 PM. Every friday, anna prasadam is distributed to the devotees.The Management is doing wonderful services to the temple by introducing many Pooja and other devotional programs. The devotees are ever increasing for every festival occassion to have darshan of Mahalakshmi and to get blessed.

Name: KASI VENKOBA RAO
Title: Beautifully Decorated on Vaikunta Ekadasi
Review: Asthalakshmi Temple located at Vasavi colony, between Dilsukhnagar and L B Nagar, Hyderabad is one of its kind in twin cites. The main deity is Lord Srimannarayana and His consort Goddess Mahalakshmi, surrounded by other seven deities namely. Santana Lakshmi, Gaja Lakshmi, Dhana Lakshmi, Dhaanya Lakshmi, Ishwarya lakshmi, Vijaya Lakshmi and Veera Lakshmi, thus making it  Asthalakshmi temple.This temple is on a small hillock, gives a valiant look. The management has made many improvements for the benefit of devotees. A lift is now provided for disabled and senior citizens. They have recently introduced Sahasra Deepa Alankarana Seva on every Friday at 7.00 PM. It is a feast to to eyes to witness this seva.The temple is offering Anna Danam from 12.30 pm to 2.30 pm on every Friday. Hundreds of devotees come and enjoy the food which is so tasty.I visited this temple on 29th December 2017 which happened to be Vaikunta Ekadasi. Elaborate arrangements were made for this auspicious day where the Uttara Dwaram was opened and entree to the temple is from this door. This is a special occasion. The entire temple is decorated with flowers. The main deity Lord Srimannarayana is donned with Golden Dhoti and Goddess Mahalakshmi with Golden Saree. It was really a feast to the eyes to see such a beautiful decoration.

Name: PROF.HARAGOPAL MATHSYARAJA
Title: WORTH VISITING
Review: ASHTA LAKSHMI,  Eight forms of goddess Lakshmi (Goddess of wealth) situated in Kothapeta, Near Vijayawada highway is very famous for its socio religious activities which are regularly organised.

Name: koteswararao
Title: vvgood temple
Review: this is Vv good temple which is in Hyderabad   on top of a small  hill  all puja is good  to all devi structures

Name: pjanil1968
Title: Very good temple
Review: Well maintained temple. Lakshmi temple with eight different forms of goddess Lakshmi. Cool and calm place.  Divine place.

Name: Gaurab2017
Title: Nice Temple
Review: It is situated in Kothapet,Dilshuknagar,Hyderabad. More Super Market is one of the landmark if u want to go there. You will see a big kaman and need to walk for 5 minutes.It is a temple of 8 Lakshmies called Ashtalakshmi.At entrance there will be 30 steps,after that Ganesh temple appears.In main an idol of Sridevi,Bhudevi sametha Lakshmi Narayana is in middle of these 8 Lakshmi idols,which are very beautiful.Kumkum Archana is actually being preferred. Do visit this temple with family.

Name: guddu1954
Title: nicely maintained temple
Review: The temple is ideally located in vasavi colony kothapet,on an inner road but easily identifiable.It has smaller temples of eight goddesses of wealth,within its vast premises.

Name: GayathriSharma
Title: Peaceful Location
Review: It is situated in Kothapet,Dilshuknagar,Hyderabad.It is a temple of 8 Lakshmies called Ashtalakshmi.At entrance there will be 30 steps,after that Ganesh temple appears.In main an idol of Sridevi,Bhudevi sametha Lakshmi Narayana is in middle of these 8 Lakshmi idols,which are very beautiful.Kumkum Archana is prefferable here.Goshala is opposite to main temple.

Name: RachanaR18
Title: Unique temple with all the Lakshmis
Review: This is a well-known and cute little temple. One can take darshan of Lord Vishnu and Lakshmi and all around them, the ashta lakshmis are seated. The Ganpati here is grand and beautiful too.

Name: RachanaR18
Title: One of the two temples to have all the 8 Lakshmis
Review: Only Chennai and Hyderabad have temples with all the 8 Lakshmis. It is a small temple, but well-maintained. Generally crowded on Sundays, it is a must visit while at Hyderabad.

Name: GLOBALSEAS
Title: 8 lakshmi temple
Review: asthalakshmi temple is with 8 goddesses the best temple in Hyderabad for maatha pooja to darshan all 8 goddesses .

Name: vlsvas
Title: Visit to Ashtalakshmi Temple, Kothapet, Dilsukh Nagar, Hyderabad
Review: Ashtalakshmi Temple is very famous temple of Goddess Lakshmi Maa, is located between Dilsukh Nagar and LB Nagar. At this temple we can observe eight forms of Goddess Lakshmi: Adilakshmi, Aishwaryalakshmi, Santanalakshmi, Dhanalakshmi, Dhanyalakshmi, Gajalakshmi, Vijayalakshmi, and Varalakshmi.  with small inner temples. This temple is maintained neat, peaceful and has a good premises with wide area for parking, prasada distribution.Ashtalakshmi temple was modelled based on the one at Chennai.The Rajagopuram of this temple is intricately carved with beautiful designs that catches the eyes of the visitors. Kalyana Mandapam (Marriage hall) also built near to the temple Durga Navratri is the most celebrated festival in this temple.It is a good peaceful place to visit by every one to blessed by Maa Lakshmi.

Name: rockzzM77
Title: Temple of Ma Lakshmi
Review: This is the temple of Ma lakshmi, this temple is very beautiful and well maintained. Nice place to visit.

Name: Sravan Kumar K
Title: Ashta Lakshmi ammavari temple
Review: This temple is located in Dilsukhnagar, Hyderabad. It is good temple to visit. This temple is having Lord Srimannarayana and Ashta Lakshmi ammavaru... the garbha gudi is surrounded by 8 Lakhmi devi temples... Adi Lakshmi, Dhana Lakshmi, Dhanya Lakshmi, Gaja Lakshmi,, Santana Lakshmi, Dhairya Lakshmi, Vijaya Lakshmi, Vidya Lakshmi.The bad experience was the management... We visited on first Friday of Shravana madam... Which is an auspicious month for ladies. There was a huge crowd, but the queue is not been managed properly... It is a wide queue and people had to push each other during darshan. Otherwise it is a good temple to have a peace of mind.

Name: PROF.HARAGOPAL MATHSYARAJA
Title: Well maintained.
Review: Worth visiting and spending some time here famous for its spirituality dedicated to GODDESS LAKSHMI.

Name: PROF.HARAGOPAL MATHSYARAJA

Name: BRKanth
Title: Best Lakshmi Temple in City
Review: Could see all godess Lakshmi's here. Neatly maintained and well planned construction. Ample parking place opp to temple.

Name: Veer2468
Title: Famous Temple
Review: This is a very famous temple in Hyderabad. Very peaceful when you go there. Gets little crowded on weekends.

Name: vijayagopal
Title: Unique temple
Review: One of the few temples ul find with ashta laxmis. A very well maintained temple with peaceful ambience. A must visit.

Name: sudha966
Title: Ashtalakshmi temple
Review: It is near kothapet.  very neatly maintained in a residential colony.  A peaceful atmosphere.  feel peaceful and happy when we visit this temple

Name: Manish K
Title: Good and clean place of worship
Review: The Ashtalakshmi Temple is dedicated to eight forms of Goddess Lakshmi and is very popular among devotees and visitors alike. A nice temple, with eye-catching carvings and very tasty prasadam, it is a nice place to spend some quiet moments in prayer. This temple has very good facilities for parking, but what really stood out for me was how spotlessly clean it was kept by the management. Do take note of the opening and closing times before visiting as it's closed during the afternoon.

Name: nagesh1955
Title: review of temle
Review: very big and famous temple in dilsuknagar to nagole road, the god is very famous, it is one of the famours

Name: nagesh1955
Title: review of asthalakashmi temple
Review: The one and only big Asthalakshmi temple in hyderabad and its near to diluskunagar. Very famous temple

Name: annejang
Title: A quiet spiritual place
Review: The temple is very popular among the local devotees here. Laxmi, the goddess of prosperity and her 8 different incarnations are worshiped here. Each incarnation in charge of different blessing ranging from money to fertility The temple is filled with many devotees calmly worshiping and praying for their inner most desires. The temple has a small pool with turtles and beautiful ornate mandalas. One must remove shoes before entering the temple and once can buy delicious prasad for very minimal amount.

Name: anithaaravamuthan
Title: Nice temple!!!
Review: The temple is famous for goddess lakshmi and temple had sannidanams of 8 different lakshmi. Dress restriction is there in the temple. The goddess is very powerful and worthy visit on friday.

Name: BRKanth
Title: Best Lakshmi Temple's in Hyd
Review: This is one of the best Lakshmi temple in Hyderabad. I am a regular visitor to this place and especially during Navratri festival.

Name: Siddhartha C
Title: Nice temple, peaceful place
Review: Amazing temple with ample parking.Not commercialised and retains the spiritual aspect.Well maintained and clean.Note - during festival times, the queue would be long with wait of around 1 hour.

Name: yojanaredd
Title: place of spirituality
Review: the temple is famous for goddess lakshmi which people believe it as very powerfull and there is a dress restriction in this temple you have to wear only traditional dresses with dupatta

Name: lankavignesh
Title: 8 lakshmi temple
Review: it is one of the best peaceful temple where it contains 8 different types of lakshmi.i recommend to visit this temple on friday.

Name: bhogavillifamily
Title: Friday visit of this temple is really a holy soulness
Review: The temple is well organized and well maintained and the prasad particular don't miss when visiting this temple.Be blessed

Name: santosh2ind
Title: Ashtalakshmi temple
Review: astalakshmi temple is very beautiful and powerfull temple in hyderabad.every one have to visit this temple at least once.

Name: kmegha911
Title: Goddess Lakshmi Temple
Review: Ashat lakshmi temple is dedicated to eight forms of Sri Lakshmi who are the symbols of power,health and wealth.The idols of Lakshmi in eight different postures are installed in the chief gopuram of the temple.All the idols inside the chief gopuram are decorated with jewels made of gold and pearl.

Name: chandrasg
Title: 8 forms of wealth and prosperity
Review: you can have a good darshan of goddess lakshmi in all of her 8 forms in this temple. you can feel very much blessed when you go there. early morning is very peaceful and no rush.

Name: mayuriams
Title: 8 types of lakshmi's
Review: Adi Lakshmi (Sanskrit: आदि लक्ष्मी, Ādi Lakṣmī, "Primeval Lakshmi") or Maha Lakshmi (Sanskrit: महा लक्ष्मी, Mahā Lakṣmī, "Great Lakshmi") : an ancient form of Lakshmi[3] and incarnation of Lakshmi as daughter of the sage Bhrigu.[2]Dhana Lakshmi (Sanskrit: धन लक्ष्मी, Dhana Lakṣmī, "Money Lakshmi"): for money and gold [3]Dhanya Lakshmi (Sanskrit: धान्य लक्ष्मी, Dhǎnya Lakṣmī, "Lakshmi as goddess of grain"): Giver of agricultural wealth.[3]Gaja Lakshmi (Sanskrit: गज लक्ष्मी, Gaja Lakṣmī, "Elephant Lakshmi"): Giver of animal wealth, like cattle and elephants.[3] Swami Chidananda interprets Gaja Lakshmi as giver of power of royalty.[4] According to Hindu mythology, Gaja Lakshmi brought back the wealth lost by Indra (king of demi-gods) from the ocean.[2] Vasudha Narayanan interpret the name as "one who is worshipped by elephants".[1]Santana Lakshmi (Sanskrit: सन्तान लक्ष्मी, Santāna Lakṣmī, "Progeny Lakshmi"): Bestower of offspring[3]Veera Lakshmi (Sanskrit: वीर लक्ष्मी, vīra lakṣmī, "Valourous Lakshmi") or Dhairya Lakshmi (Sanskrit: धैर्य लक्ष्मी, Dhairya Lakṣmī, "Courage Lakshmi"): Bestower of valour in battles[3] and courage and strength for overcoming difficulties in life.[2]Vijaya Lakshmi (Sanskrit: विजय लक्ष्मी, Vijaya Lakṣmī, "Victorious Lakshmi") or Jaya Lakshmi (Sanskrit: जय लक्ष्मी, Jaya Lakṣmī, "Victorious Lakshmi"):[4] Giver of victory, not only in battles[3] but also in conquering hurdles in order to beget success.[2]Vidya Lakshmi (Sanskrit: विद्या लक्ष्मी, Vidyā Lakṣmī, "Knowledge Lakshmi"): the bestower of knowledge of arts and sciences[4]In some Ashta Lakshmi lists, other forms of Lakshmi are included:Aishwarya Lakshmi (Sanskrit: ऐश्वर्य लक्ष्मी, "Prosperity Lakshmi") : Goddess of riches[3]Saubhagya (Sanskrit: सौभग्य लक्ष्मी , "Giver of good Fortune") : Giver of prosperity in general.[4]Rajya Lakshmi (Sanskrit: राज्य लक्ष्मी, Rājya Lakṣmī, "Royal Lakshmi"): "She who blesses rulers (with secular power)"[5]Vara Lakshmi (Sanskrit: वर लक्ष्मी, Vara Lakṣmī, "Boon Lakshmi"): "The lady who bestows beautiful Boons".[5]

Name: LAWDOC_LAWOFFICE
Title: Very powerful temple - All your wishes fullfills
Review: I visit this temple quite often. This temple is very powerful as the name of the Godess are "Asta (8) Laxmi Temples" all your wishes get fullfilled when you visit. I had my first office in Green Hills Colony in the year 2001 by the grace of this god now I am well settelled in life with good family, health and happiness without looking back :-)
