If you are lucky you might see some bikers doing amazing stunts- it seems it is a practice place for these guys(usually at morning time). Keep something to eat, as there are not any option to buy something to eat.

Name: None I
Title: Quite Peaceful place
Review: This lake is housed in the centre of Hyderabad city.  It is smaller than Hussain Sagar Lake. This lake is the source of water for Hyderabad city.  Since we visited during the rainy season, this lake had abundant water. But it usually dries up during the Summer season.  One can visit the lake during morning or evening and enjoy a stroll around the lake.

Name: pinaki50
Title: Soothing calm waters
Review: We were just finishing our Golkonda fort visit when our guide mentioned about Osman sagar lake n said that as it was only about 10 km from Golkonda fort we should have a look. So a 20 - 25 minute drive brought us to this vast lake. It is a lake basically formed because of a barrage on a river called Musa and has been constructed a long time ago. There is a very nominal entry ticket and a pretty big building on the side. The lake looked ideal for boating but we couldn't see any boats around. Serene surroundings compared to the city bustle.

Name: richa t
Title: Peacfeul and Must visit for Solitude seekers
Review: this is a nice and peaceful place, not very crowded. If you are a solitude seekers.. This is youe place

Name: Somashekhar N
Title: Large water body, Awkward smelly
Review: This is a average kind of lake with lot of unnavigable areas. This could do with a lot of better management to improve the experience for those visiting it.

Name: anithaaravamuthan
Title: Photographic view!!!
Review: The View was excellent and very natural near to the lake side view. We had a very nice time with our family in the evening.

Name: Gugan_Ilango
Title: Beautiful lake for photography
Review: Osman sagar lake is the a great place for good HDR photo at early morning and must visit to have good walk

Name: Anupama
Title: on the way to golkonda fort
Review: did not really visit it as i had already visited hussain sagar lake. however it is on the way to golkonda fort

Name: tandonmani
Title: Natural lake side view
Review: If you are a nature lover and wants to spend quality time with your friends and family it's a place to visit. Many eatery options are there along with steamer ride give you a pleasant experience to be here in Hyderabad.

Name: mainhole07
Title: Sagar Kinaare
Review: We use to spend many times over there just park your vehicles and walking with nearly having awesome experience.

Name: udaykanth11
Title: Worthy evening escape
Review: These days there is a tall grill on the actual bund so getting sunset pics is not so easy. Yet, it makes for a nice drive to reach the place and you can enjoy the sunset colors if you plan it right.

Name: Veeresh k
Title: Superb location..
Review: Once we gathered at Sagar lake... We had a great time... It was very peaceful and calm.. it damn too looking good...

Name: lankavignesh
Title: good gathering spot
Review: it one of the best place for gathering of friends.the location is also very beautiful and it is very peaceful and a good place to enjoy

Name: AVEMEADOWS Vagamon
Title: The lake is beautiful and big
Review: The walk around the lake is good and you can sit and enjoy some breeze. The view is good and spent some time around it

Name: santosh2ind
Title: Osman sagar lake
Review: This lake is also called gandipet lake. it was constructed by meer osman ali khan. this is beautiful lake.

Name: kmegha911
Title: Peaceful and Beautiful Spot
Review: The lake is surrounded by beautiful views and greenery.You will often see picknickers lounging around,eating out of large picnic hampers or playing cards here.Small vendors also selling delicious food near the lake.

Name: BRKanth
Title: Famous Gandipet
Review: Popular place during summer play. Not much water earlier but now there is some bcz of rains. Somewhat crowded during week ends.

Name: jainneha
Title: Osman sagar
Review: It is a beautiful lake in middle of twin cities of Hyderabad and Secunderabad.there are Parks around there . A nice and refreshing place

Name: nagesh1955
Title: Visit of gandipet
Review: Very big water area in the city, all the IT employees will gather here in the weekends, very good place to see

Name: AnjanManda
Title: Lovely lake
Review: Osman Ali Khan,the last Nizam of Hyderabad built the Dam on Musi river in 1920,hence called the Osmansagar .But it is popular as Gandipet.The lake used to be major drinking water source of twin cities.The lake area is around 48 square kilometres.Public transport is available to the attraction ,which is around 24 kms from Hyderabad.It is the perfect weekend getaway for the Hyderabadis.Green lush surroundings and cool breeze from the lake is perfect setting for picnic.On weekends place is too crowded.Ocean park and Chilukuri Balaji temple are nearby attractions

Name: Rajesh k
Title: Enjoy a morning walk
Review: This time due to heavy rains in Hyderabad city, we got a chance to see Osman Sagar lake filled with water.  This lake is located in the middle of Hyderabad, within the hustle and bustle of the large city.  The best time to visit this is morning time during with air pollution and city traffic noise is minimum.  There are land scaped gardens near the lake where one could enjoy a morning walk or simply spend quality time watching the lake.

Name: Ravin K
Title: nice drive in the evenings
Review: ist a nice drive in the evenings. worth checking if u are in the area. not worth a special drive as such

Name: Veer2468
Title: Nice view
Review: This lake offers a nice view. We cannot go till the lake. We can just take a walk along he road. Not bad to visit.

Name: shivaraikod
Title: Hang out in Oct -Dec
Review: This place would be for a half day visit where we can enjoy the breeze and is one of the future reservoirs of twin cities. Eateries are a bit scare here which may be incresed as more ppl flock considering it as a leisure place to hang out.

Name: Nishant M
Title: Nice place for a half day visit
Review: Went to this place with my friends. Well, its not that worth visiting, but if you have enough time with you, you might want to spare may be 2 hours for this place.

Name: Rimjhim B
Title: Lake in the center of the city
Review: This lake is located in the center of Hyderabad city.  It is a medium sized lake and not as big as the Hussain Sagar Lake. This lake provides water to Hyderabad city. This lake has low water levels and also dries up during certain parts of the year.  There are parks with beautiful lawns near this lake. It could be visited during the morning hours to enjoy fresh air and take a morning walk.

Name: Sumit S
Title: Ornament of Hederabad/Secendrabad
Review: This waterbody is big relief to the city. It is very nice to have a walk in the morning or evening. Enjoy food near the lake have some water sports.

Name: priteshkulkarni
Title: just Another Lake in City
Review: Osman Sagar Lake is another Lake from Hyderabad city. It is small Lake as compare to Hussain Sagar Lake. Good to visit only if you have extra time in Hyderabad else you can skip it.

Name: Sai R
Title: Serene lake
Review: It is a nice place to visit for a couple of hours after a Serene drive, especially in the monsoons. Ideal time to visit is either sunrise or sunset. The lake has dried up over last couple of years and not much water these days.

Name: spgoyalmnit
Title: Must visit in the Morning
Review: Reach there early morning for best experience. Before visit make sure lake has good amount of water.There is one garden downside so you can experience it from close.

Name: Azeez K
Title: Nice memories
Review: Visited so many times with family and friends, njoyed some good quality time with friends and family.

Name: ST_INDIA
Title: Good lake but can be maintained more
Review: Its a very big and Good lake but can be maintained more like the Hussain Sagar. The options here are far less than the Hussain Sagar. Still you can enjoy the view from certain points.

Name: rupak19602016
Title: Just imagine a huge lake in the city center!
Review: This is a huge lake right in the middle of the city. The surrounding pavements and parks around this huge lake are clean and well maintained by the municipality. The people are careful and don't throw litter into the lake. This lake has great utility in providing water to the huge twin metropolis of Hyderabad and Secundrabad. This artificially built lake is a standing example of good governance on the part of the Qutabshahi dynasty that ruled this kingdom for decades.

Name: Beach170
Title: it was good to see it was nice place with friends
Review: only 120and 220 bus number available it is to see the place is nice and no water falls of osman sagar lake we cannot see the bridge of water flowing only somw water is available there rock garden and  Dwaraka garden is there

Name: HOD H
Title: it was good to see it was nice place with friends
Review: only 120 no bus and 220 no bus available for gandipet lake or osman sagar lake dwaraka garden and rock garden was available there is no bridge for water flow

Name: SUMIT KUMAR G
Title: Osman Sagar
Review: Did not like that much.. It is not as clean as it used to be. Good for some weekend timepass for 1-2 hours.

Name: Michael Anbumani
Title: Beautiful Garden Lake
Review: Wow! it's a wonderful drive round the lake & garden experience we have had. This is the first time we are in Hyderabad & it's was a great experience to visit so many attraction in a short time. Our driver was an experience guy who took us round the lake & explained t us many new things around this area.Very refreshing visit.

Name: edwardseco
Title: Any visitor to Hyderabad will drive by this lake
Review: This is a striking lake that inevitably visitors drive and perhaps take for granted. Its a nice stroll and has boating at the club. The ASI museum is a hidden gem nearby in the park and shouldn't be missed.

Name: Chandrapc
Title: nice place
Review: from gandipet we had been to this place visited in rainy reason so it is having water also surroundings trees are there suddenly it was drizzling we went under the tree and had thrill spent some time it is peaceful and lovely breezes most relaxation will be there in our busy life

Name: SuvodipMoitra
Title: Nice place to go for a evening trip
Review: About 15 mins drive from Gachibowli. Good place to go & enjoy summer breeze in the summer evenings 530-630pm, see the sunset & come back.

Name: Hanif C
Title: Huge Lake in middle of City
Review: The lake is really huge and located in the middle of the city very next to secundrabad, lake it self has great view and too many birds around it.

Name: Anil_aak4
Title: Nice place to be with yourself
Review: Best time to visit would be Jan-feb. Its a quite enormous place with park adjacent to it.You would not miss to note the British dam technology.Nice place to be with yourself and spend some time in peace.

Name: IpsitaPal
Title: Serene and beautiful
Review: I love this lake as its away from the hustle of the city and offers a peaceful retreat. Park your car near the entrance and eat some yummy fried fish in the evening. Or simply pack a picnic and enjoy it under the shade of a tree.

Name: kvjayco
Title: A place to spend sometime away from city
Review: Osman sagar lake, one of the sources of drinking water to the Hyderabad city is a nice place to spend the evenings on the laek front, and in the months of Jan/Feb, we can see some good birds. The Agricultural Univ and other research centers are located close to this lake.

Name: Girish S
Title: I thought it was an ocean .. no no , it is a lake
Review: I wondered if it was a sea , but no it is only a lake , so huge , go by the ring road to have a huge breathtaking view of this lake . One of the few lakes that provide water to hyderabad.

Name: Sarah E
Title: Stinky and Foul
Review: What a shame that such beauty would be marred by the foul stench of refuge that pours into this lake.  The smell is very off putting indeed.  I am sure it is a marvel but one has no time to admire this when you are trying to hold your breadth.  Hyderabad, do something about this.

Name: DRSSDASH
Title: Mir Osman Alikhan Lake
Review: Built in the year 1920 on River Musi by Mir Osman Ali Khan.Now the main source of drinking water to the city of Hyderabad. The gardens surrounding the lakes are famous for picnic spot.

Name: Kunal Nagda
Title: Nice place
Review: Could be visited once, Many be with family and friends ideal for spending couple of hours, good for killing time

Name: vibha123
Title: Osman sagar reminds me of VIzag beachline...
Review: OSman sagar is very peaceful however now polluted very badly...there are corporates who work as volunteers as part of CSR to clean Osman sagar..When you just want to break out from your life/day at work/home....best is to drive till Osman sagar and spend sometime with water...peace and fresh and then get back with energy you need to fight the battle of life...

Name: sudmaha
Title: Was a good place.
Review: In the past few years the water of the lake not left. some where in the middle there is some water left, so people go with their families. nothing special now.

Name: DebashishS
Title: Natural Lake
Review: Beautiful lake, feels very good to be at in the evenings. There is a park attached to it which is open till 5 pm and can be used as picnic spot.

Name: Lucky M
Title: For a early morning drive
Review: A beautiful serene lake. Nothing much to do though! Just to enjoy cool breeze with a bunch of friends. One can enjoy a nice drive to the place too as it is in outskirts of the city!

Name: 85Mohan
Title: Losing its sheen day by day
Review: Years ago, this used to be a picnic spot. Because of urbanization and less rains, the area has become dry. Finally, this is one of the two places from where Hyderabad receives water. So, I have high regards for this area. Today we see this place as spot for college students to bunk and enjoy.

Name: Naganna Travel and Food Expert
Title: Nice Place....
Review: Nice and Good hangout place.... one would feel great while driving on this Gandipet lake.... small garden is also available to see.... nice to sit over their with some snacks....

Name: Suraj P
Title: Excellent
Review: Drive on the Gandipet Lake's road is really beautiful. Nice weather & there is a garden too to hang out with friends.

Name: seedhunter
Title: Nice place to chill
Review: It is also known as Gandipet lake. Located approx 15 km from Hitech City, it is a place where you can spend some time with friends and family. A small garden is also there.

Name: Global-Bhatakanti
Title: Hyderabad Science museum, a thing to do for anyone above 6 year old
Review: Science museum suitable for age group 6 and above. Personal experience is children below 6 doesn't understood much of what's showcased. Min suggested time to spend and require to see most things is 1 hr. Ticket price is INR 150 for all above 3 yr old. They should lower the children fee. Parking available in the premises but difficult to find on weekends and public holidays. On display is 160 milion dinosaur skeleton found in Telengana. Outside public premises has many antique idols and statues. Planetarium is right besides science museum.

Name: Ravindra V
Title: Lot to learn and explore
Review: Lot to learn for people of any age group. There are so many science experiments. There are other exhibits related to dinosaurs, Antarctica, submerged Dwaraka etc. Photography and videography are not allowed within the buildings.

Name: Gurus49
Title: Interesting Exhibits
Review: An evenly spaced out area divided by different areas and interests. too bad the Dinosaur section was not accessible by wheelchair.

Name: anuj1401
Title: Nice
Review: Kids really liked the things on Ground floor and third floor… planetarium show was also nice… sit close to the guy who is operating the projector to get the best view… food items are not allowed inside…

Name: Kaushik G
Title: Good experience
Review: During our holiday in Hyderabad, we had visited the Birla Science Center which is located in the same complex as Birla Planetarium. Entrance tickets are priced at 100 rupees per person. There are 4 levels: Level-0 has the dolls Museum and other collections, Level-1 has different exhibits showcasing different principles of physics including optical illusion, Level-2 showcases the submerged city of Dwarka and more attractions, Level-3 houses a giant skeleton of a dinosaur which was excavated in this region. It was a great experience visiting this place.

Name: panii2015
Title: Good for Kids
Review: Its very good for Kids especially who is interested in science and physics. And its museum also. Should have leisure time to spent here.

Name: OMKAR PAGADALA
Title: Outstanding
Review: A very skill full experience. There are some games which will work on formulas. We can some knowledge by visiting the centre.

Name: alpsbt27
Title: best place
Review: if you are technical person and want to know something new then i must stay you need to visit this science center. its a really good place and techno lover place.

Name: Abhishek807
Title: Perfect for KIds
Review: One of the Best Timepass for Kids... Perfect for Them... Should take your kids for this wonderful journey

Name: parasuraman s
Title: Thought provoking for any child.
Review: Take jumbo ticket and visit complete science centre (planetarium, art gallery and all four floors of science centre including dinosaurium. You need around 5 hours. You need to schedule based on the language you prefer for the planetarium show.When you visit science centre, don't miss -3 floor where they have many physics activities.Very informative for kids and it will be definitely thought provoking for any child.

Name: Pagadalasiddhartha
Title: Good
Review: Best place to visit Good to go to this place Every one likes the place I n My friends enjoyed a lot...

Name: jainms
Title: OK Museum
Review: Good to visit once this center and best time is evening and it is located very near to birla mandir on way...

Name: Shanti Swaroop K
Title: Must visit place for children
Review: Birla science center tries to inculcate the scientific temper amongst the young kids and gives them a sneak peek into the world of science especially the astronomy stuff. Every month a new astronomy science documentary is showed that gives insights into the universe that we are a part of.

Name: NIL_MODI
Title: One Time Visit
Review: Birla Science Center is very near to Birla temple and have in same campus of planetarium. 3 floor science center. explains the science concepts very easily and in a game type environment. kids will definitely gets interest in it. one visit is ok.

Name: SRIKAKOLAPU
Title: superb
Review: This is one place where there are lot of science phenomena explained in museum and its a must visit place for kids

Name: idea614354
Title: nice science center
Review: Birla science center is located near birla mandir. best time to visit is evening or late evening.good to see all

Name: Alok B
Title: Needs Improvement
Review: The place has much potential but there's nothing extra ordinary. I think the management can do much better

Name: Usha65
Title: Science between four walls.
Review: A nice and interesting place for all ages. Particularly teen age students enjoy. There is a good display of objects and often we can see school children visiting this place in groups.

Name: Vids63
Title: Very Informative and Knowledgable
Review: Lot of things to see in science museum. They have kept lot of science gadgets, experiments. You need to have ample time to go through all and understand the experiments which surely add knowledge to your intellect.

Name: vinodkhedkar
Title: World of Science
Review: This is a very fantastic place for science lovers. You get a lot of information about the scientific world. There are various types of scientific experiments are kept on display. Nice place especially for students.

Name: Deepak Warrier
Title: the place to ignite your mind
Review: a very good place for the budding scientists...in fact, those who have a scientific bent of mind can have a good time at this place...if you want to enjoy the show at planetarium, reach the place early..say 45 minutes.....

Name: Daniel T
Title: Worth a visit as a school kid
Review: Birla Science centre is a place which makes kids more inquisitive. All schools kids should make a visit here to see the artefacts in display.They have preserved some old times stuff which are very difficult to experience these days.

Name: Sourabh D
Title: Basic to High end Science for everyone
Review: Absolutely a must. Reasonably priced tickets, convenient timings and a very good range of shows, museum artefacts; academic and scientific programs; a planetarium, Arts Musem, 3D science shows for kids.

Name: 73prashantha
Title: Good for one time visit
Review: Not as good as Vishweshwarraya museum in Blore. They repeat the same stuff over and over again.Worth visiting once.

Name: venkatakarthik
Title: I really like the collections and historical things
Review: great education for younger children to know our culture and lifestyle of our ancestors, highly recommend you take your child there

Name: muthukrish2000
Title: Science Center
Review: This is located near to Birla Mandir.Nice place with more science, art, Dinosarium. You can see big dinosaur Skelton in 3rd Level. Including basement there are 4 levels. You can visit this place when visiting Birla Timing. But only till 5pm.

Name: guddu1954
Title: A must visit place
Review: People have been visiting Birla temple but they are just not aware that there is a museum just close to the temple.It has a wide collection of Nizam era and provides a lot of information about Nizam .

Name: Manohar M
Title: Scientific
Review: Great place especially the planetarium was an eye catching where one cannot resist wondering with time travel.The best place one should visit

Name: deepa v
Title: Knowledgeble
Review: Nice place to be with kids.there are shows in different languages hindi Telugu and english at different time slots.The evolution is showed..dinasaur era and all..must visit for kids above 6years.

Name: Nimmagadda D
Title: i love this
Review: hep   this the first science centre i  visited with great practical experience you can  get  from here trust me you can get a great experience vistit this place

Name: Gowrish P
Title: Great place for children. But can do better.
Review: Birla Science Center and Planetarium are in the same complex. There is a separate listing for Planetarium. This is a review of the Science Center only.BSC is one of those places that every city needs and I am sure that was the intent of this as well. However, I can see that BSC could do more to keep up with the times. That said, this place is still a good place to spend half a day, including if you have children, say in primary and middle school.Location: Set atop a hillock, BSC boasts of some of the best views atleast to on three sides. You go up through a narrow hill to find the main gate to the left. There's *paid parking* inside the gates.*The ticket counter* is right by the parking lot and pick up all your tickets beforehand. *Suggested itinerary* is to visit the Planetarium and then go to the BSC. That way you can visit the BSC without anxiety of the show time of the Planetarium.What to do: These are the key venues here*Interactive Science Center at the reception or Ground level *Archeological Exhibits at Level -1. This level also has the Nirmala Birla personal collection section.*Remote Sensing and IEEE exhibits at Level 1*Dinosaurim at Level 2*Interactive center is where children will enjoy the most. It shows with hands on experience how some fundamental principles of physics, mostly, work. Some exhibits were not working or in poor condition. Signages were missing in a few places.*Archeological collection is worth the visit. It traces thousands of years of cultural and art history - war implements, household and occupational tools, scriptures, a good collection of South India mythological sculptures and paintings, coins and other miscellaneous artifacts. Do not miss the *Room Royale* that houses some of the rarest and most expensive item of interest including an ornate carpet, one guard told us, runs into hundreds of crores in value. There are no descriptive signages for anything. They are labeled, but do not tell much. BSC could consider providing audio tours for the exhibits to provide appropriate context.*Remote Sensing and IEEE* floor has some computer based and model based learning around how RS technology is applied  to the field of archeology and agriculture. Some models of advanced physics concepts are displayed here. E.g. How Raman Effect is used in Oncology.*Dinosaurim* is interesting too. The full scale skeleton of Sauropod makes for a good exhibit. The artifacts, here, were found in the neighborhood of Hyderabad I.e in Adilabad. *The guards are intrusive* about not taking pictures, while there really was no signage on this floor prohibiting pictures. One should wonder why this should be even prohibited. This is a nuisance.All in all this good place to spend indoors, in summer.Some additional pointers for BSC management:* You have a grand reception counter, but it was not at all manned. There is nothing useful there even if someone were present. Can some information and brochures be put up here?* What is the use of a Pearl Shop for a souvenir shop? This is a an example of where BSC could keep up with the times. There's  much opportunity lost for marketing BSC here.

Name: Mitali S
Title: Kids loved the Science Museum (v interactive)
Review: Do go here if u have kids above 6, this place actually allows you to see the results of few science theories.Its a  very interactive museum where kids can physically see the reactions of certain science principles.You can skip the planetarium and dinosorium (as they call it) nothing exciting and new

Name: Mayank Dwivedi
Title: Nice Idea, outdated execution, zero maintenance
Review: I visited this based on the top destination in Hyderabad online, and me being a science geek.The centre is in a deplorable condition. Zero maintenance. Some exhibits are falling apart, or already gone.Most of the displays are outdated, even the staff don't seem to care about them.The science museum could have so much more potential to become a centre that excites young individuals to pursue science, and instigate excitement about the same. Science museums across the world use much better technologies, display fonts and methods, interactive science displays, right lighting & positioning etc.Audio tours, guided tours, merchandise selling etc. can add additional revenue to the science centre (which can be used hopefully for maintenance / upgrade).I sincerely hope this centre gets a much needed renovation, and gets updated on the modern advancements in science. - Mayank

Name: Pradeepk79
Title: A good Science Centre spoilt due to complete neglect.
Review: I went to this place with great expectation. Even though lot of interesting items are there, Half of them is not working or damaged. The whole area is in absolute neglect with people scribbling all over the wall and display pieces. A thorough Disappointment.

Name: Sudha2410
Title: Good
Review: Children can enjoy the science museum more. They can also enjoy the dinosaur skeleton. I love the ivory carving and the royal enclosure.

Name: Kirannelli
Title: Science at par
Review: Best place for school children as well as adults which likes science. Lot of interesting sciyobjects to see. Total 4 Floors for different sections.must visit.

Name: smandal2858
Title: Birla Science Center
Review: Science center museum has 4 levels, i .e  four floor. Zero level for Dolls & archaeology, second for Inter art science Section, third for dwarka and Antarctica, four for Dinosaurium.

Name: kartik1402
Title: history, art, science and more
Review: here you get to visit the art gallery (some brilliant paintings), see several sculptures, archaeological findings etc. also on display are some rare carpets, studded with precious stones. the science exhibition area is an interesting place for kids. in the dinosaurium, there is just one exhibit, which was underwhelming. the planetarium area has science shows and 3D universe view, but kids under age 4 are not allowed inside.

Name: Usha H
Title: Nice place for kids
Review: To know small tricky things about science for kids it's an great place. With an dinosaur museum along is very brilliant idea. The museum also has an collection of antique piece artifacts by the birla family.

Name: Kinnera A
Title: Nice to know about Space
Review: I was here a few months ago and it was nice to recollect all that I have learnt in my schooldays by seing the catchy visuals. The science center has things related to Space, history and dinosaurs which creates interest for kids and they will love it. However, the canteen is in bad state with nothing available to eat. We had to walk back all the way disappointed when we needed something to eat.

Name: umapathi68
Title: Excellent place for science freeks
Review: Birla Scince center has multiple attractions one among that is planetarium and they have a nice show about space and chandrayan.  must see place

Name: lovetravelonly
Title: Science center
Review: Objects related to history, science, space and dinosaurs are found here. Idols made before 1000 years are also found here. The most unique part is the history section. Historical lovers will love it to visit.

Name: TTDh
Title: Average science museum
Review: When we visited, the place was undergoing some renovation.There are several exhibits around mechanics/energy/space themes. There also is a museum with several collectibles like carpets and crystals and procaeline items.The main attraction hear though is the fossils and the place has a exhibit of a full dinosaur. The exhibits hear give a good idea of what is found in India.If you have a school going kid, worth a visit, will need 3 hours.

Name: avenkat2016
Title: very good for kids
Review: even with limited resources, they have managed to put together a nice collection of experiments and phenomena for kids to understand and explore. great for kids under 13, who are into science. the degree of hands on interaction ensures kids learn and enjoy science more, rather than having fancy things behind glass cases.

Name: koteswararao
Title: hill restarent
Review: good  restaurant for picnic tour  and friend party  and family picnic and evening tour  enjoy with children

Name: shivaraikod
Title: Good old science center
Review: Been here with my spouse where we came to know about a lot of things but i feel it can have some technical aspects as i on few occasions felt boring.

Name: Shyamis
Title: OK place
Review: Not as good as the other science centers in the country. The ground floor is the best, followed by the doll exhibition and archeology section. The first floor is not as good, especially for young children. The dinosaur is good but not too much to see.

Name: sandeep g
Title: historic
Review: you find good collection of historic antique items here , good to know how things are used in the old ages ..

Name: rockzzM77
Title: Interesting place
Review: This museum is interesting place to visit with kids, family and friends.They have huge collection.Must visit.

Name: BhautikVVaidya
Title: A must see location in Hyderabad.
Review: This science center is one of its kind. It has objects related to history, science, space and dinosaurs. The trip is definitely worth the money. The most unique part is the history section in which there are idols that are older than 1000 years! The ground floor had many experiments, which show the workings of scientific principles in a practical sense. The 1st floor had models of the part of Antarctica which is controlled by India and had the model of the sunken city of Dwarka (very informative). The 2nd level had the bones and information on Dinosaurs and other animals that lived with the dinosaurs. The museum has a lot to show and see so it could be completed in about 3 hours. We have visited many Science Museums, and we can surely say that the history and Dinosaur section is better than those at most places.

Name: ramchabi
Title: Education can be fun
Review: With kids this is a great place to visit. Kids can do hands on experience. The icing is dinosaur skeleton. If u have kids go here for sure.

Name: VYR306
Title: Our history
Review: It one of the nice place to know about our history and their living style. It is located near Birla Mandir.

Name: MrH0rnet
Title: Best science and art place to visit
Review: This place has 5 sub category to visit1. Planetarium: Amazing experience , specially for students and science enthusiast. Well explanation and 360° screen are like you are sitting under clear sky. Though , I felt explanation can be made little easier fir understanding of school children.2. 3D movie about solar and space facts:Great for young school children knowing already and having watched many 3 movies it felt boating. 3. Art Galary : perhaps biggest one I hva visited so far. Spread on 3 floors, most people just visit modern art Galary and miss the best part. In front of art Galary there is huge series of art, Specially we liked painting by Iqbal Hussain on Indian Mythology and history . Amazing details. I wish I could take photos but it wasn't allowed.4.Dianasorium: Huge skeleton of Dianasour found near Hyderabad and information are gear. Touching 200 million old fossil is just a great experience.5.Science Museum with live experiments: this is just a unique experience of day to day life physics. Huge learning for any student. There is IEEE experiments to hands on too. This must for any student to visit.Overall, in 200 per head, this is most fun place in Hyderabad so far.

Name: Varun Pursnani
Title: Most important and logical topics explained easily
Review: My cousin and I came here for a short visit as we were late for planetarium and surprisingly it was so good from inside that we continued our tour for a much longer time.For science, mathematics, astronomy etc. different different topics each concept was explained very nicely and creatively.Overall it was a very enjoyable and worth our time!!

Name: Praveen K
Title: place which always feels new and excites me since childhood
Review: this was a place one would love to visit again and again... a beautiul view of teh city and the assembly and the tankbund. a nice center for science related activities.

Name: Rajani B
Title: One of the finest place for science enthusiast
Review: The Birla Science museum is one of the finest in India. The museum has natural history gallery, planetarium and an Archaelogical and Fine arts gallery. You get to see fossils of Dinosaurs, archaelogical pieces collected from hyderabad and also from across states and learn a lot about the universe. The organisation of the exhibits and the live science experiments are simply awesome.

Name: ramasamy s
Title: knowledgable place for children
Review: dinosorium is very good and the museum gives better view and enjoyable pleasure to both adult and children. can spend 1 hour here

Name: gani1997
Title: Ancestors place
Review: its having all ancient tools and culture of the people together. If you are a history and science lover it will be help ful for you ever.

Name: Rao1940497
Title: Worth visiting.
Review: This famous Birla astronomical centre is highly popular with students and others too, quite educative, worth to have a rich experience of virtual solar systems.

Name: CaptainBasu
Title: Great potential, poor maintenance
Review: The place is a storehouse of some greatly intriguing science objects. However, it is very poorly maintained. The planetarium is small but the explanations were clear. Remember to bring lots of water on a summer day. Though not too big, you will need to walk up and down a number of stairs.Suggest climb right up to the planetarium first (shows in English starts at 1130) walking your way down thru the galleries on different levels to reach the science museum at the ground level. There is a separate ticket for the Planetarium which includes the 3D show, and separate ones for the rest of the place. The entry prices kept changing based on God knows what. It was RS.60 on Monday when we arrived, but came up to RS.80 by Wednesday when we actually visited.The science section needs serious maintenance, many gizmos are either inoperative or totally absent.  The Planetarium offers some interesting shows along with the 3D theatre of the seven wonders of Solar system. Expect to spend three hours at leisure.

Name: Memoirs-Sachin
Title: Informative place
Review: The Birla Science museum is a collection of artifacts, models & memorabilia. The tour is very informative. The exhibits are spread across 4 floors & takes about 1-2 hours to visit. It is located very close to the Birla Mandir & can be clubbed in a single visit.

Name: Dipubose
Title: very interesting day activity for families with kids under age of 15
Review: Generally missed by most but is a great day activity especially if you have little adults< age less 14 years.It is over 4 floors ,each having different themes- Science(real interactive exhibits around various science principles which kids can have hands on & they will enjoy),Dinosaureum level 4 & lower level with archeological stuff & level 3 as science & space history.Star attraction is Actual dinosuar skeletal exhibit recovered from AP .Entry fee is 80 / head but you can combine this with Birla  Planetorium for 150 combo ticket.you could probably spend 2-3 hours here & ample parking is availalble at campus.

Name: bharadwaj8008
Title: Best science museum
Review: This is one of the finest places at Hyderabad this is a Hindu worship temple, but attracts all sorts of communities and tourist. One can see whole Hyderabad from Top of this Mandir nice location.

Name: Gugan_Ilango
Title: History of the region
Review: Birala science centre is one place where you can find the history of the region under one roof. a must visit to understand rich culture and history of the region

Name: Veer2468
Title: Visit with children!
Review: It is a nice and education place to visit with children. Children will enjoy in this place. I found the entry and parking charges expensive.

Name: itspriyanka
Title: Nice place, can be maintained better
Review: We went on a weekday when school kids were there for picnic. The experiments were good. Our 6 yr old son enjoyed the ones he understood. Some of them were for older kids. Some machines were not working. The dinasorium was good too, with real fossils / bones and real skeleton. We did not visit the doll museum and anthropology section though...And if you are visiting around lunch and do not have your own vehicle, make sure you pack some lunch. Food is allowed inside the museum. There are only some small shacks outside which serve snacks.

Name: nitin m
Title: Nice place for children
Review: Children will enjoy the place.  Science experiments, astronomy, etc are all there. On the top floor there is a skeleton of dinosaur

Name: rosemaryJobin
Title: Fun place to be with kids - Learn science through experiments
Review: Good place to take your kids for a visit, They can learn science through experiments. Better suited for kids above 10 year. Kids will also enjoy the Dinosaurium.  It is very crowded during weekends and holidays. I have visited the science center multiple times during the last 10 years - The observation from the recent visit is - the maintanence is bad, many of the interactive instruments do not work, but the ticket price has gone up considerably. It is 80 per head now and if you combine Planetarium and 3D universe, it is 150 per head.

Name: BRKanth
Title: Young / Kids should visit this Center
Review: If anyone want to learn science with real / live experiment, should visit this place. Especially crowded during holidays.

Name: eeebvr
Title: Can become kid and have fun
Review: Worthful place which offers many artifacts and the different floors take to different experiences. one can  see toys from different countries, armory, ancient relics dinosar replica in dinosarium.....etc., Can spend a day easily

Name: RkRoadie
Title: Treasure for children.
Review: Birla Science Centre is one time visit place in Hyderabad tour if you are accompained with kids. The way to science centre goes through steep slopes with lot of jaywalkers on it as the same road goes to Birla Temple as well. Parking  charges are Rs. 30 for 4 hours. Combined ticket rate is Rs. 75 / head (includes entrance, Room Royale, Dolls & Archaelogy Gallery, Interactive Science Section, Dwarka, Antartica, NRSA, IEEE, Dinosaurium) and again Rs.75/head (includes Planetarium, 3D Universe). Camera is Free. But need to deposit in locker while entering Room RoyaleDinosaurium is having huge skelton of Dinosaur which kids will definitely enjoy. Planetraium show and 3D Universe is a must watch. Cons :- Feels like ticket is on higher side.

Name: Sumit S
Title: A must visit in Hyderabad
Review: If you have a free weekend you must definitely visit this place. Specially for the teens. You have lots to do and can easily spend a day

Name: Dolly
Title: Excellent Science's Theater for really Good Education Knowledge Exhibition theater Room enjoyed the Way its was exhibit
Review: Good yo visit near Birla Mandir Temple of Balaji build up with White marble really very good Maintain still look's fresh feel just construct done appreciate to temple staff & Management

Name: ChhayaHyd
Title: Average - good for one time visit
Review: Went there with my 5 yr old son, I was as excited as him. Big place, though needs some maintanence. There are no fans/ac inside so feels quite stuffy - pls the light is also less.  Local junta comes a lot because ticket pricess are low. Dinasorium is a waste. ..they should have some working moveing models.

Name: Amazing_Neo
Title: An amazing experience for all
Review: Great collection of science articles and interactive demos that allure young and old. The equipment kept there is really fab and makes everyone wanna try them out. You can easily spend >3 hours there. The 3D show for underwater life is also good.

Name: Sushant K
Title: Nice Collections
Review: Birla Science Centre is really good place, this is my first trip to Hyderabad. And I really like their archeological section.

Name: 640sameerp
Title: Worst Science centre of India
Review: Been to India's almost all science centres, but Hyderabad's Science centre is poorest.No interactive games, poor condition, Boring activities and no fun.For me, Kolkata's science centre is best in India.Do not waste time here. Not at all recommended!

Name: SSSUUUNNNNNNYYY
Title: Great place to visit
Review: Birla science centre is a good place to visit with family and kids. It also has 3D theater here. Birla mandir is also very adjacenet.

Name: lonetraveler1
Title: We had budgeted for an hour, spent over 3
Review: This place is like a one stop treasure trove for children. The one star that is missing from the rating is for air conditioning. Otherwise, its a perfect place to spend the day with children. They will spend the day discovering, learning, experimenting and watching. At the end of 3 hours, we were still not done. The Nirmala Birla Dolls Museum , then the Archeology museum, where we really saw the grandeur of our past - stone age, iron age, pottery meticulously preserved, terracotta animal figurines that reminded me of Harappa valley pottery figurines.  Then there was Indian painting, Philately, Numismatics, Art. It was 2 hours before the children exited just the basement floor. Then we went to the science experience center, where children play with specially created learning toys. You can easily put kids there for 90 minutes and forget about them. After that it was time for the observatory in the planetarium next door, so off we went. We could see Mars (nothing impressive) and Jupiter(we saw the stripes of Jupiter and the 4 moons of Jupiter). It was awesome! Then we came back to the Dinosaurium. It has a full skeleton of a large dinosaur, one preserved egg fossil, and some bone fossils. Its an awe inspiring skeleton. The building is basic, but that skeleton.. is something!! We missed the space and Antartica Diorama, but we have seen that earlier. MOre than anything else, this visit got me thinking about private museums in the country. This was absolutely fantastic.

Name: CuriousTraveller
Title: Its an awesome water sports experience.
Review: I had been to Ocean Park several times. Every time its a great experience. We palnned to go early in the morning. So that we have more time to enjoy water sports. Its a great experience and also its a very fun place with lot of physical exercise. Because to slide in the water sports we have to climb 2 stairs. So it was lot of exercise for our body to climb. We enjoyed entire day. It is also a great exercise for us and lot of fun. We also enjoyed the ropeway but Water sliding is the best of all.

Name: Rohit Bandil
Title: Good park and worth of Money.
Review: I have went with my family, my mom, dad, brother and aunt and her daughter. I was confused between Wondala and this park before going. I was thinking this park wont be good and we wont be having much fun there. I would like to say this park is worth for the money and as I went with family this park was sufficient for them.Even most of ride here my family member could not able to do it because they got tired and ride was a bit difficult. It has numerous of water rides and I hope it will like everyone.We have enjoyed alot and at the end I thought it was a good decision to go there in a budget.It has difficult and easy water ridesI and non water ride too.  would suggest you to carry you own nylon(Swimming cloth) because they will charge 100rs for each person.It would be good if you go on a weekend or any festival time because you will get more people there after all fun will only come if people are more. Charges: Adult 450/- Child(More than 2.6 Inc.) 350/-Overall I would like to say It is good park and you will enjoy with your family.

Name: sree143in
Title: Time pass
Review: Ocean park a best place for time pass with kids and family, mechanical rides water pools and more for entertainment.

Name: Mohan
Title: Best place
Review: It is aplace of water games and fun you enjoys alot there without any dissatisfaction its my assurity

Name: Dilip kumar
Title: FUn filled
Review: This place has got lots of variety of games to be played and well timepased with friends and can make you healthy.

Name: karthikakavya
Title: Good
Review: Visited this place with buddies. ticket entry costs around 300rs . very large area to roam .and need to have lot of energy as well some extra money to spend on other rides, food, articles. swimming dresses are given on rent based on usage time else have to get own Nylon clothes for water rides and pools.

Name: rsraghavan6
Title: Good
Review: We went here with kids and ladies. I liked this place very much and very good place for kids. There are enough pools, sliders for kids to hangout. Along with water games kids play area is also there which is good. Can not compare this with wonderla but this is very good in this price range.  Cost is reasonable and location is very much connected to the city. Food is not good here.

Name: Kernal S
Title: Paisa Vasul
Review: Good place away from the city, both water and other games are good. But its old but have updated service. Can enjoy a lot with friends and family. people who are fond of playing this place for them.

Name: SRIKAKOLAPU
Title: One of the oldest parks
Review: One of the oldest water parks which is pretty good and food over there is slightly on the higher side

Name: ramakrishnabanoth3
Title: Fun zone with crazy friends
Review: Water world ,where you can enjoy a lot with friends and family.Its a little out of mid-city but it's worth to go and have fun .

Name: deepa v
Title: Nice place
Review: It's an old water park ...It has many water rides .Not only children but people of all age groups will enjoy..

Name: idea614354
Title: Little bit costly
Review: Entry little bit costly for every one, but all rides are free inside, we can enjoy a lot types raids, pools, drives and many more.

Name: mdviquaruddin
Title: sumer time
Review: ii had great fun when i visited to oceam park with my family.the best time to travel is during summer season to enjoy the water rides and beat the heat.they provide many rides at reasonable less prices and it is a good place for all aged people.

Name: Anamika K
Title: Enjoyed thrilling water ride
Review: Park is located 20 km from Hyderabad... Own vehicle is better.. Many buses from Mehdipatnam bus depot are available.. Park has thrilling water rides, rope way, rain dance, play garden, giant wheel many more fun rides.

Name: sushma m
Title: Weekend
Review: I have visited with my friends and we have enjoyed alot..we had fun charging a low price for tickets..

Name: Chahar Ajay Kumar
Title: Water world
Review: Place to have the time fun along with family or friends. Photogenic locations ,rides and number of water slides to have fun on. Rain dance is the special part of it with all grooving dj songs to dance on

Name: sandeep g
Title: good fun
Review: you will full fun fun , visit here with your family or friend to enjoy the water sports .. good time fun

Name: Gaurab2017
Title: Superb Hangout Place for Team
Review: Been there to enjoy water and team outing. Many water games available including rides and all. Wave format in pool is available.Must watch location if you have a big team and want to go out somewhere to have some quality time spent.

Name: tamizh1974
Title: Worth the money but have some other places better than this.
Review: We went with family and kids. Swimming pool is fully packed. Wave generation was good.All water rides are not available for kids. They have ladies and kids pool. But not sure about the status of that. Garden and kids play area was nice. Had almost five to six rides for kids.Other than water slide, you can have two rides for Adults at Free and rest three running rides like (Rope Car, Bumping Cars etc.,) are charged.But worth the money of Rs.400 for one whole day enjoyment.Overall good place.

Name: Tariq Kabeer M
Title: old property ill maintained
Review: Had been to ocean park recently  .The property is small & ill maintained especially the Toilets & bath rooms ,old taps ,unpolished stones as surface even in changing rooms.The staff is semi literate & does have care free attitude towards customers.Food is reasonably good.Greenery is less & the games are just ok.

Name: Shiva D
Title: visiting place
Review: i  felt quit ok not very much intersting at this place because it is very good so many years back and the rides have to be increased here ....

Name: S R
Title: Entertainment for all
Review: Entertainment for all crowed with more people n group fun for children with various rides and swimming pool. Children will love it in summer especially.

Name: rambha b
Title: Entertainment for people of all age groups
Review: This is an amusement park located about 20 Kilometers away from the centre of Hyderabad city.  It has rides to keep people of all age groups busy. Both dry rides and water rides are available.  Super loop, water slider, kiddie pool, wave pool etc. were very enjoyable.  We ran out of time. We were not able to enjoy all rides.

Name: Rajani B
Title: Disappointing !!!
Review: Visited this over the weekend in the hope of beating some heat.  It was very crowded. There was big queues at each ride. Most of our time was wasted waiting in the queue.  Some of the rides were out of order and needed repair. We could only enjoy the wave pool and the swimming pool.

Name: eeebvr
Title: It was good when i am kid
Review: Crowded with more people on weekends and this made impossible to get any ride. all rides are old and giving blisters (small swellings) and sad part is we find them once we are out of water. it is not as it used to be

Name: sandeep g
Title: fun
Review: good place to have fun with children specially when you visit with family will have more fun on weekends

Name: shivaraikod
Title: Summer delight
Review: The summer in twin cities takes a toll and this is one of the places to hang out and beat the heat with family by outing in water activities

Name: preetkirtan
Title: Team outing
Review: When we went inside ocean park it was terrible as many rides were not working properly, n water in the pool was very stinky....suggest the staff to take care of the property n maintain cleanliness...

Name: Sreeramulu y
Title: Maintenance not good
Review: Many rides not working when we visited or it was under maintenance. So we spent more time on water only.

Name: Uday M
Title: Only Fun
Review: Ocean Park is fun park for children with various rides and swimming pools. It also offers snacks / tea to refresh after tiring pool exercise. Children will love it in summer specially.

Name: yojanaredd
Title: Day out
Review: It is good for kids to visit .it will have many water rides,outside food is not allowed you will get food inside

Name: mainhole07
Title: Fun Park
Review: Good for kids because adults' can enjoy anywhere with biryani, tea or shopping but your kids needs fun places where they can enjoy sometime and enjoy their childhood.

Name: khan418waleed
Title: ocean park
Review: its amazing place for fun with couples i enjoyed a lot.... with my friends again you can visit to ocean park

Name: raghavendra r
Title: Oldest theme park in hyderabad
Review: Situated near gandipet,this was the only theme/water park in hyderabad  6-8 years ago.The park is fun to visit with kids.Covers good rides and water activities.Need to do a little more maintainence i guess.But altogether visit it atleast once in the summer time.

Name: Repala S
Title: THEME PARK & GAMES.....
Review: Ocean Park is situated at Gandipet just 15 kms from Hyderabad andoffers a mix of Water Rides and Amusement Rides for all age groups. The place is easily accessible by buses and also through autos etc.

Name: santosh2ind
Title: Ocean park
Review: This is very wonderful park in hyderabad. childrens are very enjoyed in this park . i went this park so many times.

Name: kmegha911
Title: Must Visit Theme park
Review: The park is divided into two sections,amusement park,water rides and offer entertainment and enjoyment for all age groups.Water rides offered include Pendulum,Tornado,Aqua Snake,Aqua glide etc.

Name: krishna p
Title: Water games park
Review: This is located at gandipet near to CBIT engineering college a well known best college of hyderabad this is the good place to enjoy water games and swimming pools and nice place to enjoy with family and friends and kids here there is lots of fun and enjoyment on weekends

Name: BRKanth
Title: Play in Water
Review: Visited this place with Kids, some of the rides were not working. Overall we could visit this place once. Nothing great compared to Wonderla.

Name: Rajesh k
Title: Enjoy the joyous rides
Review: Ocean Park is a theme park located close to Osman Sagar in Hyderabad.  This park includes an Amusement Park and a Water Park. The water park offers several water rides like Aqua Snake, Splash, Pendulum etc.  The amusement park has several rides which are very entertaining and quite enjoyable.  Roller coasters rides are also available here.  This place is for people across all age groups. For kids, ladies and men there are separate water pools. Some rides are kids specific rides.

Name: Lav Dwivedi
Title: Good attraction with greener fields
Review: This place is good for a hot day's visit. There are sides and pools here to enjoy a sunny day. There is wave pool and rain dance spot here. Many rides and swingers. Less option of food so you should come with a tummy full. Overall picturesque and good for a day's visit.

Name: V V S Ganesh N
Title: Old one with poor maintenance
Review: Ocean Park at Gandipet is an Old one with poor maintenance.toolong from city and not easily accessible by public transportation.

Name: Saiprasad_2804
Title: Place to beat the summer Heat
Review: This water park located in the outskirts of hyderabad is a great place to beat the summer heat.you can always enjoy any kind of visit family,friends.

Name: imran1269
Title: Picnic
Review: Nice place to visit with family and can enjoy many water rides and rain dance. Sky cab is available. We can visit many a times here

Name: Sriman S
Title: Good Place
Review: Really a place worthy to be visit . The place Is good for all age people though more for young ones .

Name: pasunuri k
Title: Water games
Review: Had a great time with family members there are several water games and can have a nice time and there are several other water parks which are much far better than this i say.

Name: bkumar123
Title: Fun with Water Games
Review: Good place to enjoy variety of water games. Got a chance to visit this park many a times. Its great outing for kids specially during the summer season. We need to bring our own nylon swimming costumes. However its also available on sale for gents and on sale / rent for ladies. The food / snacks available is not so good but there is no other option, as outside food is not allowed here.

Name: chanakya a
Title: Water park
Review: Gets lot of water games where you can get unlimited entertainment, Can enjoy with friends ,families.You will get the feeling as you are in ocean when you get into the water waves, rain dance is the other attractive part for the ocean park, Best place to.visit in hyd

Name: superb114
Title: Good one
Review: Good place to visit with a bunch of friends but apart from this there a other places were you can much more fun.Totally had a great time

Name: Amazing_Neo
Title: A great place to chill in summers
Review: Been here with a couple of friends and had a great time here.The water rides are good and the place is nicely maintained.

Name: ronitsingla
Title: Great amusement park
Review: It is very good place for family picnic . Loved all rides .But water rides are the best ones.Prices are also reasonable .

Name: Naresh_Kharat
Title: Good weekend trip ( better n cheap alternative to wonderla)
Review: 20 kms away from Hyderabad situated in gandipet region.1. Good place to hang out with family2. Alcohol is also available (so many advertising flex)3. 350/adult and 230/child below 4 ft 6" 4. Water rides are cool which are free with rickets5. Paid rides like super loop and sky cabs, breakdance, etc also cool6. Food is also average not much expensive7. Prefer wearing polyester or nylon T-shirt m 3/4 then u don't need any costume which is compulsory for wave pool n few water rides.8. Out side food is not allowed but seem many people having their tiffin at park lawn.9. Garden for kids is really nice10 even adults can take advantage of that n reincarnate their childhood ;)11. Make sure u eat only after u take water rides else u might suffer from omitting 12. City cabs like ola uber take much more charges since this place is outside city limit so they charge heavily. Make sure this before u take a cab.13. U can directly take bus from mehdipatnam n same while returning14. Locker and mobile deposit facility is available15. Drinking water (tap) available there is not trustworthy so get ur own or buy one such.

Name: Aliabh
Title: Review
Review: It's an joyful amusement park .very good place for picnic  .And there very very intresting and tragic slides and many number of rides .The best part of it the rain dance .It is a very nice place for picnic with friends ,family .

Name: 85Mohan
Title: Distant from city but worth visit
Review: This is very old amusment park in Hyderabad but still maintained very well. Kids and young children will surely enjoy this place. Now a days, many eateries / restaurants have come up nearby.

Name: bharadwaj8008
Title: A good place.
Review: Ocean park is the good place for the thrill seekers it is accompanied with various slides for swimming and many other mechanical games are also present.

Name: Ravi_Prithyani
Title: Average Experience!!
Review: Ocean Park is good for those who want to enjoy both water park and amusement park. However, if you are only looking for water park Jalvihar is better option. Ocean park is too messy when it comes to lockers and change room and most of the showers would not work. The food is average and not worth the price. The entry ticket only includes water park charges and for amusement park you have to pay for each ride, though the price is economic for these rides.

Name: Suresh R
Title: i played a lot in this ocean park during my childhood
Review: in my childhood this place we went for 2 times during my school..our school  principal taken out with a 60 students

Name: Manikandan1987
Title: Water sports at Ocean Park
Review: Visited Ocean Park on last sunday along with friends, and had a great fun. Played most of the water slides and experienced the wave pool & rain dance. Great place to visit during this summer to reduce our body heat :). Separate pool also available for ladies. Only thing which i didnt liked is expensive and less quality food at food courts.

Name: Avinash N
Title: Good place to visit
Review: You can njoy there..food is available but dont know how it would be..350 per adult looks bit costlier for what they provide

Name: rkkoya
Title: Good Outing
Review: Ocean Park is good for water sports lovers. It can be reached by all modes of transport. Has good parking space too.

Name: Nishant Ujjwal
Title: Average Park with average cleanliness and average rides.
Review: Don't expect too much from this water park. It got basic rides only and all are not working some are under maintenance always. Their are only two waterparks in hyderabad one is jalvihar and the second one is ocean Park. This is better than jalvihar. If you have been to some very good water parks than this will be disappointing for you.  cleanliness is not their.  Mainly school crowd will be their. Toilets  and changing rooms are in very pathetic and unhygienic condition. Some rides are also their you can also enjoy them. All over its an average water park if you don't have anything to do on weekend and you are waterpark freak than you can pay a visit otherwise I will not suggest. The ticket cost is 350 rupees per head excluding locker charges costume charges. You can take your own costumes but they should be of nylon only. Word of caution is that always  take sufficient cash over their with you as that place is in isolated location and no ATM is their within 5Km of area. Moreover the ocean Park authorities are not accepting any card only cash.  I didn't understood what is this stupidity.

Name: Harshith358
Title: Biggest Water Park of the City
Review: This park is located in the outskirts of the city. This park is full of fun and water rides. Its a heaven for the children. Its one of the best parks in hyderabad

Name: kspvrma
Title: Kids favorite day-out...water theme park
Review: Ocean Park, situated very near to CBIT college and Gandipet, is one of the oldest theme/amusement parks of Hyderabad. Though the maintenance is not at par excellence, the park is okay with a budget price :) This is a good place to spend a summer day - thanks to that water slides, rain dance floor and pools.

Name: mahesh k
Title: The best water park in HYD
Review: This place is little far from Hyderabad. It offers a great water ride experience, with so many thrill and adventure rides. The waves are too much fun to play with. Family and friends can visit. reach morning to enjoy max.

Name: Kashyap Kocherlakota
Title: Not so Great!
Review: This place, I shall say was once upon a time a sensation. every child's dream to enjoy those water sports and rides. But as time passed, they stop its maintenance and it lost all its charm. I'm disappointed.

Name: vishal n
Title: It kind of needs renovation.
Review: I visited this place once but was disappointed when reached there. Not a single good ride and water rides were just ok. Not a good experience at all.

Name: Juweria B
Title: Very nice place to play in water
Review: It was very nice but some maintainence should also be there other than this every thing was very nice. Especially I like the rain dance which was very awsm I like that the most

Name: seedhunter
Title: Just ok
Review: Ocean park is located near Gandipet (Osman Sagar Lake) and Golkond Resort. Although lot of water activities are there, but maintenance is an issue. Highly crowded on weekend.

Name: dikshit_umk
Title: Ocean Park
Review: This is most visited place by school children in there Picnic / Excursion day.Because of its varieties of Water Games.It is best to visit in Summer Season to get more Water Sports and also on weekends for Special Treats.

Name: madabushi
Title: IN bad shape:Good facility for kids and excellent water sports, but needs real total manitenance
Review: Ocean park as we visited 10 years back was far better and clean Than now.   Now some of the rides are not working.   Overall There needs to be a good maintenance schedule, lest the whole park will be lost with no visitors or by the curse of the visitors.Water in the pool needs to be cleaned.   As at entry itself ticket cost is slightly more, many rides are free inside.  There are some more ride and shows with charges, But did not venture in to them.   Bumping car was ok, especially kids will enjoy very much.  Wave pool is  fine as it was before, and enjoyable.  Kids enjoyed well.   no food is permitted to carry  inside. Food and snacks and hot and cool drinks are available inside for purchase Some pf them are ok.Better to go on weekdays to avoid overcrowd.

Name: urenig
Title: Very crowded
Review: Very very crowded during summer and not maintained well. The locker room n bathrooms are not that good, neither is the food canteen. Since it is away from the city not much option of eating anywhere else esp. when u are spending the entire day! The water games are kind of OK.

Name: Purandhar
Title: Good
Review: Nice place but they need to work on there maintenance. The wave pool has a lot of dead flies in the water. The water slides are really fun. I recommend going on a weekday if you can as it is less crowded. The food is average. The last thing I say is if you are under 5 feet there are very few rides you can do.

Name: Syed Ahmed Nizami
Title: " Hangout @ Ocean Park "
Review: Visited with Friends for an day outing due to hot temperature, it was an amazing experience  with cool water in the pool with waves and different water rides and dry rides. Charges are also moderate

Name: testingtest1
Title: Pathetic place. Please avoid
Review: Poor pathetic place. Do yourself a favor and avoid going here. Very basic park. Amenities are horrible. They call it as a water park but so little water. And its so dirty. Also the worst crowd I have ever seen. Rides are in a pathetic condition.,food available inside is ok. Would not risk taking children and getting some infections. Too many mosquitoes. Cannot even stand in a place for 10 second. Don't go. You have been clearly informed.

Name: rajvchins
Title: Good outing for a weekend
Review: I went there on a Saturday afternoon about 3 - 3.30 pm ... Overall experience was very good. My expectation was not quite much other than hoping water will be clean. The slides 6-7 of them are amazing fun although you can do them only twice as much. Overall park is clean and water is also clean. Only not very good part of the ladies and kids pool only but fortunately it's a solo area so men cannot really complain about that. There was food around the area, kids naked and diapers around but that didn't throw the experience off since my wife only went there and immediately came back. They can do some more work on the changing area too.The best part is the rides are there are all free and easily you can get them on it without waiting which makes it worth after a day in the pool.

Name: Robin A
Title: Fun with some group
Review: Good to visit in scoring sun to get relief in water rides.Can be good with group of families or for team outing.Nice hang out place. Music and food is good.

Name: sanjay v
Title: beat the heat for sure
Review: I know there are very few options near Hyderabad where you can actually beat the heat and Ocean park is still playing the same role. I firstly visited the place 6 years back and heard a lot of negative things since then so couldn't dare to go again but last weekend I somehow convinced my family to give it a try and can you imagine.....we were not able to cover all the facilities because we left pool very late. Wave pool was just amazing and they are still maintaining it so guys don't think much and give it a try and I'm sure you will be amazed. However don't expect much on food part but still there are lot of options to try like South Indian, packaged food. I personally suggest not to try Chinese as it tasted bad with lot of oil so try Dosas, Idli etc.Below point may help you more to decide1: Its just 12 KM from Gachibowly OOR circle so very near to visit and better to reach by 11 AM as you will get ample amount of time to enjoy the wave pool.2: Waves are active for 3 times a day and timings are displayed there so be there to enjoy the amazing waves. I call it best family day so kids also enjoy upto fullest3: Entry fee is 250 for adult and 230 for kid below 4 feet. I believe this is the least entry fee with almost all free water slides/rides. You may have to pay extra for bumping car.......yes you can enjoy bumping cars and more. We enjoyed a lot on colliding on bumping cars.4: Better to come out of the pool by 5:00 PM so you get extra time to roam there while sunset and capture some memories. Good greenery at entry gate and near cafeteria.5: Clean water to enjoy the pool and you can rent the arm bands and swimming rings. However balls are not allowed to play inside to protect others safetyHowever its very old water park of Hyderabad but still maintained. I could see just 1 ride not working which is possible anywhere. I still rate it higher because we have very less options like this.Hit like if I helped a bit in deciding a good weekend. Happy summers :)

Name: tricksee2
Title: Good for team outings, but not amazingly awesome
Review: I didn't have as much fun with friends as I was expecting to, but I'd say worth a visit. Anything you buy inside is slightly on the expensive side, but it has some decent water sports.I'd say it's better to go with officemates and colleagues on team outings for a few hours, it is designed to be fun that way. I wouldn't visit again on my own budget, but it is worth a one time see.

Name: Aditya_Banerjee
Title: Decent amusement option for the family
Review: Ocean Park is a decent place to hangout with your family. This park has a wide variety of water games. People of all age groups can enjoy the rides.

Name: Sanjeev K
Title: Team outing
Review: We had a good time during our team outing at this place by indulging in water sports. Overall worth spending 5 hours to gel well with teams.

Name: BharatKumarKondru
Title: Fun for Kids
Review: This month we have visited this place. Really superb place for weekend with family and friends. But i found food is costly some what and taste is not upto the mark. Kids will enjoy like anything............

Name: knrmak
Title: Nice place to hang over for whole day with family & friends
Review: Good place to go as group with family and friends. Have both water rides and dry rides.Charges are also moderate. 350 for adults & 200 for kids. Charges are as per height.Food is also available and is OK (don't expect much).Swim costumes are available on rent and they charge Rs.100.There are some small shops outside the park who sell the swim wear for mens for Rs.80/-, so better to buy instead of renting in the park.

Name: Subhendu P
Title: Horrible
Review: Dont go... God promise... Its terrified, horrible and most of the rides are not at all safe... Out of few which are in working condition..... Food quality also needs to be improved.... You will get bored after few hours....

Name: hyderabadtours
Title: Fun place for kids
Review: Ocan park is a good excursion for families visiting hyderabad wit kids, good water slides and arifical wave pool. kids will enjoy the various water rides

Name: anjaliHyderabad
Title: Entertainment for children
Review: ok its good to visit in summer with family and especially for children.some r enjoying rides,rain dance is attractive for adults maintenance to be improved. some more ridings to be incuded for to control crowd.

Name: rkirans
Title: Not so great place. But worth a visit.
Review: The water rides are good and has variety. But the pool is not large like jalvihar. The food quality needs to be looked at. Given that location is far from city. Also some of non water rides r not working properly.

Name: anushree lahoti
Title: perfect for 4-5 hours of fun and frolic :)
Review: I had taken my office staff for picnic to ocean park. The water rides were thrilling enough ... the water was maintained well (if u see ocean park from the outside, u wont have much expectations before stepping in :P ).. the land/dry rides do not function at all ! hence, one is limited to only water rides. it is fun if u go with a big group... :) the shower dance plays great music....and the dolby sound is also good.. the wave pool was fun! overall, this place is recommended.. do not expect high fi stuff (like wonderla).. hence costumes are given on rent. they are clean and nice.. the changing room is just basic. although the ocean park gives u a old world feel, it still works for people looking for some fun... the food is okayish!! carry extra money inside, since there are carnival games like, shoot the darts, bungee jump, ride the bull, cricket etc which is not included in the park entry.

Name: vjofvizag
Title: Must visit in Hyderabad
Review: Has good rides, best place to be with Kids...But poorly maintained and doesn't have good food facilities...

Name: Sree1972
Title: Nice water rides but costly and horrible food
Review: The water rides in ocean park are very good. The area meant only for women is absolutely fantastic. The water falling from the water bucket is a thrilling experience. We have visited many theme parks but this is special bcoz it is one of the earliest theme parks in Hyderabad. The circle ride is awesome as at one point of time we are upside down. The other rides are also good but now their condition needs to be revamped. The food within the premises is costly and horrible in taste. We had to survive on packed foods like chips etc.

Name: RohitDassani
Title: Dont waste your money
Review: The place is old and most of the rides are under maintenance. Most of the rides are for small kids and there is little for adults. The water rides are ok but the whole setup is shabby. Most of the staff are always on break or plug-in mode. There us very little on the foods menu. The worst part is the changing area. The bathroom are really bad and smells sick. Please do not go there and waste your precious money.

Name: PavalikaV
Title: Lovely view
Review: Food: excellent; ambiance: superb; view: amazing....rest is all taken care with the right mood and food....................worth a try...................................................................................

Name: 997amr
Title: nice times
Review: I spent a very nice times with my kids they liked it too much even i did

Name: chilukur
Title: Amazing summer with ocean park
Review: Hi friends, This is pavan from hyderabad. I am big fan of ocean park.I visit this place every year in summer with friends and we enjoy a lot with swimming dancing and all

Name: Fernweh
Title: Don't miss this beautiful art when in Hyderabad
Review: This place is very beautiful. The art in lime and mortar is sadly neglected and forgotten. The navigation to this place can be a bit difficult but once you reach the area near the tombs, locals will help you. Google Maps worked for me. Also, one can book uber or ola till here. The place is safe for solo visitors, the elderly, or couples. I visited this place alone and as a solo female visitor, I felt very safe. A family stays nearby and they willingly tell the place's history. Its high time that this place is protected and restored. A visit to Hyderabad is incomplete if this place is missed.

Name: Christopher F
Title: Located in a dangerous neighborhood. I do not recommend for solo or couple’s.
Review: The first thing that I want to say is that this historical site is located in a very poor and what appeared to be a very dangerous neighborhood. The road leading to the site is a dirt road and not properly displayed on the Uber drives GPS. The Uber driver asked me if I wanted to walk the 100 additional meters to the site but the neighborhood looked dangerous enough that I requested he both drive me to the front and wait until I exited the site. I was hounded by young men as soon as I left the Uber for tours and for money and the young man what time to tell me the tourist we’re not safe in the neighborhood. Long story short I took a quick look at the site got back in the Uber and left immediately. I would not recommend the side to any of my friends nor family and if they decided to go I would recommend that they take as many people as possible as not to be alone. As most if not all historic sites in Hyderabad this one is poorly maintained too. The cobblestone sidewalks are all loose and uneven, the grass and greenery is overgrown and trash all over. All that being said the tombs were beautiful and intricately carved

Name: 53Ruta_R
Title: difficult to find
Review: It is easy to get lost finding Paigah Tombs as they are located in a maze of alleys. Blink and you could miss the entrance as it is hidden behind a tree on a quiet street. Once found, and you enter, a different world is present. The lime and mortar tombs are over 200 years old.

Name: Vikas Singh
Title: Don't come back without visiting this architectural jewel.
Review: The word Paigah, which means pomp and rank in Persian, was a title given by the second Nizam of Hyderabad to Nawab Abul Fateh Taig Jung Bahadur, founder of the Paigah family. Fiercely loyal to the Nizams, the powerful Paigah nobility maintained their own private army and the local police and courts had no jurisdiction over them or their property. Their necropolis in Hyderabad has intricate stucco work, reminiscent of the World heritage sites of Alhambra palace in Granada and Alcazar palace in Seville, SpainThe tombs are enclosed in carved screens and canopies of lime and mortar. The stucco reliefs closely resemble Byzantine art while the Moorish influences can be seen on arabesques details stucco reliefs and the domes. These tombs represent an eclectic mix of the Mughal, Persian, Moorish, Byzantine, Rajasthani and Deccani style of architecture which are unparalleled in India. Ornate trellises, beautifully carved pillars intricate lattice work and embellished domes surround the mini mausoleums. Some of the tombs are enclosed in Chaukhandis entered through ornate wooden doors made of mahogany, teak or rosewood. Entry is free and so is photography. Plan to spend at least two hours if you want to fully appreciate the architecture. Most tourists are not even aware of this gem and hence you may find yourself to be the only tourist here!

Name: Susmith S
Title: Explore
