The trust needs definitely needs more support to sustain itself, this being a private entity and funds are obtained from the visitor  tickets purchased and supposedly from the the grants of the former Nizami princess visiting this place from abroad at regular intervals to inspect its upkeep.

Name: koteswararao
Title: mueum   oldof history
Review: this is museum old but gold  show the history and old articleeed some improvements    this is not maintained ed properly

Name: Footprints727663
Title: Amazing
Review: I went to Nizam Museum. The Nizam Museum in Hyderabad is well known for its rich and varied collection of artifacts. The collection basically comprises mementoes and gifts which were given to the last Nizam to mark a celebration of the silver jubilee. It is great place to go.

Name: menonCGN
Title: Nizam era in miniature models
Review: The largest and most valuable private museum! A must visit place for people who are interested in the history of Hyderabad. The exquisitely made artifacts and miniature models reveals the skill of the craftsmen of the era. But I am unable to understand why they charge for taking photographs. In my view the photos taken by the visitors, some of which may be published, adds to the fame of the place which will attract more visitors. I have been to Vatican Museum in Rome, one of the famous museums in the world, where they allow to photograph anything a visitor wants to.Though the exhibit's historical value and importance is indisputable, the premises is an eyesore! The compound was filled with filth and wild growth. One couldn't go near a washroom there as it was broken and leaky. I left the place feeling sorry and wondering when this place will be made attractive!

Name: lovetravelonly
Title: Museum of Nizams
Review: This museum offers original replica which ismade of silver  of almost all the structures the Nizams made. We can see many golden scissors used by the Nizams. There are  Bowels & Masonry Trowels made of gold to see. We can see the posh lifestyle of the Nizams.

Name: pjanil1968
Title: Lot of historical artifacts
Review: Must visit if you are interested to learn about Nizam era or the history of Hyderabad. Wonderful collection of artifacts. Liked the place a lot

Name: avenkat2016
Title: nice collection of gold/silver artifacts
Review: all items used by nizams, as well as their wardrobe. mostly gifts given during jubilee. lots of gold and silver.hire a guide for 200 rs or less.

Name: Shailendra
Title: Not maintained properly
Review: The Nizam palace unlike other prominent museums in Hyderabad like Salar Jung and Chowmahlla palace is not maintained well. The wall paint is peeling out at several places and is in dire need of restoration. Over and above this camera fee of Rs. 150 is exorbitant compared to the maintenance.

Name: Lekha
Title: Indias richest private museum
Review: First of all it's having really rich gold antique things...most of having gifts from out of India to Nizam... for photography u have to pay more...it's unique things are manually lift, golden throne, world's longest walk-in wardrobe, exquisite caskets and models.. city's golden miniature, car's golden pandaan, walking stick with jwels, and many more....all is valuable trip....

Name: travel w
Title: worth watchig to experience luxury
Review: basically is nizams palce you can find all sort of things from his era & infact about his lifestyle & living. Tip: you can see world first lift also.

Name: NayanKothari
Title: historical place
Review: good museum having old things used by the HEH Nizam. specially the room containing the clothes must be seen, huge room with walk in wardrobes. not in a great shape but must visit to see the old history of nizams.

Name: Pramod N
Title: Good Museum
Review: the Museum is Good consisting of Dresses used by the Kings and nice place to buy some souvenirs for your friends and relatives.

Name: BRKanth
Title: Museum near Charminar
Review: This is another historical place to be seen while visiting Charminar. We could see all old sculpture etc. Check to see when it is closed. I think it is on Friday, not sure.

Name: Payal G
Title: Must visit
Review: This museum is not as aggressively promoted as the Salar Jung museum but is a bigger treasure trove of Nizam's valuables. If not for the gold and silver and a set of the world's largest Basra pearls go for the most unique wardrobe in the world - it's the largest one ever and several flats can be easily fit into it. The museum also houses a rare elevator (though tourists can't get into it). It's located in an old palace. If going by cab/uber watch out for signs as the GPS is misleading. Locals were generally unaware of this place so best to remember that it's just behind the children's hospital. The museum rooms are quite basic and can do with some sprucing up. Remember to take tickets for cameras at the entrance itself. However, the lighting inside is not conducive for photos so it can be skipped. Some of the staff are great guides - which we took as without the stories most of the fun is gone. Our guide Hyder Hussain was from a family of one of the Nizam's old retainers and hence was quite knowledgeable about the exhibits without being pushy. We paid around ₹200 to him.

Name: PrabalDas
Title: Better than Salar Jung Museum
Review: You would have a glimpse of the lifestyle of the Nizams. The museum offers original replica (made of silver) of almost all the structures the Nizams made in Hyderabad. you can find many golden scissors used by the Nizams to inaugurate the Buildings including the Bowels & Masonry Trowels made of gold used in Foundation stone Lying ceremony. There are many more. It's a hidden treasure. Don't forget to take a guide (Rs. 100) who would explain u in detail.

Name: Sourav S
Title: The Purani Haveli
Review: Nizam museum is one such place which you need to visit just for the sake of history. Decently maintained though.

Name: 1matkustaa
Title: Great exhibits
Review: Those of you in love with historic artifacts should never miss this museum, the time spend here is worth the effort

Name: Rajashekhar K
Title: The museum exhibits the gifts and mementos presented to the last Nizam
Review: he stately Purani Haveli, the palace acquired around the year 1750 by the second Nizam, is now converted into a museum with a fascinating collection. The museum exhibits the gifts and mementos presented to the last Nizam on the occasion of the silver jubilee celebrations in 1937. A 1930 Rolls Royce, Packard and a Mark V Jaguar are among the vintage cars displayed. There is an interesting collection of models made in silver of all the prominent buildings of the city and citations in Urdu about H.E.H. Mir Osman Ali Khan, gold burnished wooden throne used for the silver jubilee celebrations, gold tiffin box inlaid with diamonds, and a gold model of Jubilee Pavilion.

Name: PK Das
Title: Poorly managed museum
Review: Nizams were famous for their lavious lifestyle full of gold & diamonds whereas when you reach at this place after first glimpse you will forced to rethink whether the story of Nizams which read in books were true? Nevertheless once you enter you will confirm yourself that the story read was true ONLY. LOT of things made of GOLD & DIAMONDS on display. We were so tired due to hot temperature outside miss to take ticket for photography inside but didn't have stamina to go back for it.

Name: Dipubose
Title: Avoidable
Review: Old palace of Nzams- called purani haveli - past its prime & can be easily avoided.Hardly anything on display & poorly maintained,most of the stuff moved to Chowmahal palace(new palace of izams) near Charminar.Entry fee 80 per head & Limited parking availalbe however you will find it difficult to locate & is at teh dead end of bylane besides princess esra childrens hosptial.

Name: Gugan_Ilango
Title: Royal Life style of Nizam
Review: Nizam museum is a beautiful museum which shows the true royal life style of the nizam. a very small and a clean museum

Name: Sara O
Title: Worth seeing
Review: The Purani Haveli offers a good idea of what life in 18th and 19th c. was like for the Nizam of Hyderabad.

Name: A P
Title: Visit to Nizam Museum
Review: A visit to the Nizam Museum will take you to the colonial era where Nizams ruled with utmost respect from the British and also by the people of Hyderabad.  A must place to see the majestic of Nizams.  Lot of things to see.

Name: Rashmi Gersappa
Title: Gives a glimpse of Nizamshahi
Review: If time permits, one should definitely visit this museum. Although it's not an official museum of Hyderabad and is situated in an old haveli of the grandson of the last Nizam, the artifacts are truly awe-inspiring. Although they all belong to one person, mostly garnered during one ocassion, the silver-jubilee celebration, it is definitely an impressive collection. For example the golden lunchbox carried by the Nizam during hunting or the vast corridor that acted as the Nizam's wardrobe housing a dress for each of the days of the year, never to be repeated again. Do hire a guide on the spot for a good explanation!

Name: Venkat_Mumbai
Title: Nizam's Museum
Review: The Nizam’s Museum is situated within Purani Haveli, A part of this beautiful place has been converted into a museum that showcases gifts and mementos presented to Nizam.  It is not crowded.  There are guides who charge Rs 100., and brief in details on the collection. The  museum is not as big as Salar Jung museum. The entire museum can be covered in 30 minutes. Felt that the ticket is steeply priced as well as for cameras.  Personally i feel that much can be done.  The place feels off.  Our ola driver as well as certain localities with whom we enquired, redirected us to SalarJung Museum.  The Google Maps too shows a wrong location.If you search as PURANI HAVELI, the location is correct however, route map takes you to the back of the same.

Name: Krupali S
Title: very nice historical palace /museum
Review: The palace which was now converted in museum have fascinating collection of royal things. Must show the vintage cars models which are amazing. Also the silver , gold and diamond made models are worth to see.

Name: RaviKotla
Title: Best historical information center
Review: Excellent historical information center especially have to visit for watch & statue. maintenance wise its good

Name: JakubWrobel
Title: See the personal collection of the Nizam
Review: Totally worth the visit. This place is full of magnificent possessions from the personal collection of once the richest man in the world.

Name: PankajKumarSingh
Title: Very nice place to know about the History of NIZAM. Good historic place to visit.
Review: Very nice place to know about the History of NIZAM. Good historic place to visit. It will give information about whole Nizam culture and their time with their every things they used that time.

Name: Moumita86
Title: Nizam Museum- Original Museum of the Nizams
Review: We all visit Salarjung Museum, but this one the original Museum of Nizam has the entry ticket highest of all, but its worth it.It has the world's longest dressing room,and an extra ordinary collections of all items used by Nizams of then time.good to see, and a must watch

Name: kmegha911
Title: Heritage Museum
Review: Some of the items exhibited at the Nizam's museum are glass inlay paintings of Nizam VII.gold burnished wooden throne used for the silver jubilee celebrations.There was also a collection of models of all landmark buildings of Hyderabad made in silver.Vintage cars are also displayed here.

Name: Gopakumar1981
Title: A bit expensive
Review: The musuem is not as big as Salar Jung museum. The entire museum can be covered in 30-40 minutes.The ticket is priced at Rs:80 per adult which I believe is a bit expensive considering there are not many art collections. It is not crowded and you do have guides who charge you Rs:100.

Name: RCR1000
Title: History of Hyderabad in Nizam rule
Review: An unofficial guide took us around & gave us a good perspective of the Nizam's rule. A small part of the Nizam's treasure is displayed as the major part is in Delhi. The visit was interesting - you need 1- 1 1/2 hours to visit. The lavish life style of the Nizam is exemplified by the multiple closet changing room!!

Name: PavalikaV
Title: Well maintained
Review: This is surprisingly a well maintained place with Nizams collection in well categorized areas...but government can do better in terms of overall maintenance of the Purani Haveli and also provide better directions to and from main spots such as Charminar

Name: Nevil2014
Title: Treasure without a
Review: What collection of Royal Artefacts/Paintining/Photos  and Nizams rate palace collections ...mindblowing ... Underrated place but a must see to have a peek into the life of the Great Nizam. Ambience is very poor -its like a old building housing all these treasures...no painted walls ...no proper lighting ..

Name: ashrun2016
Title: old is good
Review: Many things see and learn about the history. the building is really old but when see inside is interesting.

Name: jainneha
Title: Nizam museum
Review: Very nice museum . It's a collection of a single man . Really interesting and mind blowing collection . A statue of lady with a veil , women bending and man behind . Worth the money and time . A must .

Name: Rajesh k
Title: Luxurious private collection of the NIzams
Review: Nizam Museum is located in Purani Haveli which is the palace where the Nizams resided. This palace is now converted into a museum.  The items on displays in this museum are mostly the gifts presented to the Nizams and some of the luxury items used by them.  We saw daggers, cups, throne, ward robes, jewel box etc used by Nizams which were studded with diamonds and other precious stones.  Other attractive displays included glass inlay paintings and wooden throne polished with gold.  This place provides a lot of information on the Nizams who ruled Hyderabad for a considerable time and also about their luxurious life style.

Name: Debsankar P
Title: Wonderful
Review: Wow! The collection of Jewellery, Stones , and many other historical samples from Nizam Kingdom . It's just awesome . You will find the old heritage of India .

Name: Jasmina S
Title: Good place
Review: If you r in Hyderabad for two to four days, then mustGo to this place.You can spend 2 to3, hours don't compare with other Like salarjung museum.But this museum   Show's ----- Nizam's lifestyle.Vintage cars are also displayed there.Minimum fees / good to see.

Name: SundarRam54
Title: Good Museum of Nizam Era of Hyderabad
Review: The museum is housed in one of the 3 wings of this U-shaped building, called Purani Haveli. It was used by the Early Nizams whose successors later shifted to a New Palace and hence the name Purani Haveli. The museum has an entry fee of Rs80. The museum has very interesting photos and objects of art relating to Nizam Era. The museum also has maps showing the evolution of Hyderabad city over centuries. Highlights are Nizam's wardrobe room, Semi mechanical lift used by Nizams etc. The Museum needs better maintenance, since exhibits are quite valuable.

Name: Eapen T
Title: What a useless place?
Review: Poorly maintained. Should be completely scrapped. The fees charged is exorbitant when compared to Salar Jung. Nothing much to see also. Total waste of time. Do not go there even if someone offers a free visit.

Name: Ranieri L
Title: A wonderful place
Review: I live in India since 2015, I haven't so much time to be a tourist, but when I had a Sunday free I went immediately to visit this fantastic musem, whre you can find some important examples of India's art. I think that this country is very important in the history of our world and visiting this museum can help you to understand it better.

Name: srmanjunath
Title: Good place and well maintained
Review: The place is well maintained and nice collection of artefacts.I was disappointed to see that the jewellery collections are no longer in the museum. Understand that they were moved to RBI for safety reasons. While I had seen them two decades ago, family was not lucky to see the jewellery collection.

Name: tari1982
Title: loved it
Review: you have to visit this museum if you have one thing to do in hyderabad, its got a great collection and will give a glimps into the royal life of the nizams

Name: Sumit S
Title: Fantastic
Review: Every traveller should this museum. There are different sections in this museum but one should definitely visit the clock and the statue of veiled Rebeca.

Name: s1chakraborty
Title: Good Collection
Review: Very few people visit this place. The collection of gold, silver and diamonds are awesome. The collection of vintage cars is also fantastic.

Name: Kaushik G
Title: Not a tourist attraction
Review: We had visited Lotus Pond during our sightseeing in Hyderabad but the place remains closed between 10 am to 4 PM. We did not find any lotus flowers blooming in the small lake and there was nothing much to see or do here.

Name: NIL_MODI
Title: peaceful place
Review: Lotus Pond is a peaceful place. Much quite to feel relaxation. garden and lake is there, enough care is taken by authorities to take rest at regular interval.

Name: Vikas Singh
Title: A Hidden gem
Review: Even though the pond is not very clean the garden is not visited by many and so you can have a nice leisurely stroll enjoying the birds chirping and greenery all around. There are benches at regular intervals where you can sit and read a book in peace. A small garden but nevertheless a hidden gem.

Name: TE K
Title: Joy
Review: I visited this place with my friends. The view of this hotel is very beautiful. The pond is clear no chaos in the pond. The main attraction of this place is the lake.

Name: SRIKAKOLAPU
Title: amazing
Review: Its known for the surroundings and calmness.In the midst of the city but its decently maintained and good to go here at sun rise

Name: Daniel T
Title: Decent water-body to spend time at
Review: Its famous for its quite surroundings. There is no chaos around this pond, this makes the place quite & a good choice for anyone wanting to spend time in solitude.

Name: bhratmodi500
Title: Good oriental choices
Review: This restaurant is nice and very elegant ... love the interior but the main attraction is the choices of food ..ahh and the tast was also really good ...love this place

Name: Vikranth R
Title: good view
Review: Peaceful area where we can refresh our mind by viewing the climate over their, and visiting with friends may create more fun.

Name: jmodi1981
Title: Nice pond
Review: Very nice pond available in the hyderabad. we were passing by this place and we enjoyed the good time here.

Name: Durga Vara Pras... N
Title: Nice Park
Review: It is nice park in Jubilee Hills area which is covered with lush greenery in Rainy season. Always peaceful to visit this place.

Name: aviditor
Title: Nice Ambience
Review: Small but good place to hangout and for walking. Quiet. Nice Ambience. Don't miss out the triangle shape house.

Name: rambha b
Title: Recreational place in the center of the city
Review: The lotus pond is located in the centre of a park in the Banjara hills. The park is very green and the different color of lotus within the pond is very beautiful. Visiting this place gives a rejuvenating experience. It's a nice place to visit during the morning or evening for recreational purposes.

Name: shivaraikod
Title: Relax and meditate
Review: Though called Lotus pond there aren't any lotus however the place is green, calm, peaceful and good for morning walk to inhale fresh air.

Name: Subrahmanyam G
Title: Nice place to spend Sunrise and sunset
Review: You love this place and spend time here. It is in the middle of concrete jungle and you feel the peace in sunrise and sunset time. The only bad thing is park will open 6pm

Name: vipul6112
Title: Camera is not allowed
Review: Nice calm place for morning walk. Open 6-10 in morning and few hours in evening. You won't find any lotus. :D. Less crowded. You can relax meditate..Although it is clean..pond needs more maintenance and cleanliness.

Name: shamstaab
Title: Scenic beauty
Review: A beautiful garden with pond as the main attraction. A very well maintained place with greenery all around & fresh air. But only open for few hours morning & evening.

Name: MR_F00DIE
Title: Paradise in Hyderabad
Review: An ideal place for a stroll early morning or in the evenings. Very serene. Its a pity they dont allow photography (for reasons best known to them!!)

Name: Yasserimran
Title: Picturesque lake in Banjara hills
Review: You will be pleasantly surprised to spot a beautiful lake preserved at its natural best; with walk way around it!  Best time to visit is morning!  2-3 rounds around it will give you a fresh start to the day... Professional cameras and plastic bags are not allowed for environmental reasons..

Name: Rajib Ghosh
Title: Not A Tourist Destination
Review: Lotuses neither grow in this pond not it is shaped like one. Its a misnomer. Nestled in area between Banjara Hills and Jubilee Hills, the Lotus pond is a water body surrounded by residential and commercial buildings.The pond itself is fenced with wire and does not allow stepping in and resting ones feet in the cold water. Being surrounded by political big-wigs and commercial offices, the narrow road around the lake is a traffic circus that is best avoided by one and all.

Name: kmegha911
Title: Excellent Greenery and Must visit for Photographer
Review: The shimmering pond is filled with fish.The self sustaining ecosystem plays hosts to a variety of species of birds near the lake.The undulating and sometimes uneven track makes for a grueling work-out for early morning joggers.Photographers must visit this wonderful place.

Name: mayuriams
Title: LOTUS POND was become other TANKBUND
Review: LOTUS POND was become other tank bund , water was not good and full flys , its located her to hitech cith

Name: Rajesh k
Title: Beauty of Mother Nature within the heart of the city
Review: Lotus pond is a beautiful park located in Banjara hills.  This is a park with a pond in the middle of the park.  The pond is full of fishes and has other aquatic creatures like crabs, tortoises and molluscs.  The entire park is very beautifully landscaped and has flowering plants.  Several beautiful birds are spotted near the pond, making it an awesome place for photography.  Overall, the pond is a very nice place to enjoy cool breeze during a morning or evening walk.

Name: aldinanthonyambosta
Title: Needs Maintenance
Review: It is a beautiful location. Unfortunately of late it is not maintained well and is gradually turning into a dump yard and a joint where individuals get to see loads of puppy love.

Name: Shailendra
Title: Good park with pond
Review: Lotus Pond is a park with lake in MLA colony. The pond has fishes, crab and tortoises. It is said good place for walk and sunset view.

Name: Erum M
Title: Beautiful place
Review: I like the hotelNeat and clean With good food awesome place amazing staff good welcomeManager is too good and friendly Near by lotus park amazing place for walk Homely environment

Name: SunilTiwari1987
Title: Average place
Review: There is nothing much to see and the water level is low.But the park is good.Here one can spend quality time with his or her partner.

Name: EmmanuelMurray
Title: Lovely Place
Review: The Lotus Pond is a lovely place to just stroll around in the evenings. Lots of street food is available to quench your appetite. Working at a place nearby, my choice is to have andhra meal with chicken curry at a mobile stall. Very tasty & economical.

Name: Sravan Vadde
Title: scary
Review: I've been to this park a couple of times. the last time i went here, i saw a snake right in the middle of the track and that was the last time i went there.

Name: Anurag V
Title: Pond with a lotus view
Review: the place looks very beautiful with lotus flower.The place is nice for a family trip and is having a great view at sunset.

Name: DavAnn M
Title: Best Chinese food!
Review: So we had always gone to a different place but after trying Lotus Pond, we only go here!  The chicken is always perfect and tender, never rubbery, tough or overcooked like other places that make it ahead of time.  Good prices and a vast menu.  Also very good at carry out!

Name: Sachin Kanna
Title: Not Bad
Review: Okay type place. Water level is low. Park is a bit good. Visited for office purpose. Overall average place to see.

Name: Wasim B
Title: I live near by
Review: I live in the same area as this pond I have grown along with it.. The plants and flowers give you soothing and calm feeling but sadly the water crisis has left the pond dry... It wad an oasis in the middle of a concrete jungle but sadly now it has very sad feeling too it well the hope has not turned to despair yet hopefully it rains hard this season and LOTUS Pond can restore it's old glory never the less still a calm place in the midst of all the noise and pollution... Have a visit

Name: Suresh R
Title: Good place to Relax and watching nature like Flowers,Fishes and trees
Review: my home is nearest to this park ...we will visit once in a monthand here Fishes are Awesome to watch andhere some of the Animals are their  Fishes,Crabs,Ducks,Snakes and crane birds

Name: Nainakhan1302
Title: I liked it!!
Review: I always to go this pond with my friends. Its a lovely place. Quite and calm. Can spend quality time with your partner.

Name: KriChaRed
Title: A tiny pond hidden in midst of concrete jungle
Review: This is a tiny lake hidden deep inside a residential colony. Well, not so deep that you would get lost finding it It is easily accessible. A good place when you would like spend some time beside a water body without much of travel.Beware, you make really close contact with the floral and fauna around

Name: outside o
Title: Nice spot if you're in the area, to me it is not a destination.
Review: Nice spot to relax and walk around the pond.  Security guards keeping food, drinks, cameras, and ballyhoo outside the gates.  This place is only open in the wee hours (It think) and between 4-6 pm.  I am constantly frustrated by the closed hours of public parks.  You can walk around the pond in about 15-20 minutes, we usually stretch it to about 45 by letting our toddler toddle, and stopping to check out the turtles/fish/crabs which are easily seen en mass from the path directly opposite the main gait.  There is also a small wooded section off to the left of the main path with several covered pavilions.  We wandered through once or twice and it was mostly teenage boys carving their names into tree trunks while taking turns looking out for the guides and a couple of couples getting frisky in the shadows.  Looked like the pavilions  would be good for some morning exercises or yoga.  We never felt the least bit threatened in this area, but it is somewhat removed from the main trail and most of the people.  Overall, I visit this park once or twice a week due to proximity, would visit it more if it were open during the day.  Also, any birders, there is usually anywhere from 4-10 species of wading and water birds visible in the pond.

Name: occlusion_vikas
Title: nothing much to talk about
Review: this place is not to standards of what the G.H.M.C talks about but much cleaner than other parks in the city . not very easily reached unless u have ur own transport , hardly find lotus there but a nice place to have a morning walk though. cannot totally blame the authorities but the park users too they lack basic civic sense .

Name: rajah369
Title: Small Oasis in middle of the City
Review: Kids will love the place watch birds , fish and quiet place to relax , walk and kill some time. do not go after dark too many masquitos.

Name: Rach R
Title: Unwind...
Review: This place is good to spend time wit friends and family, it is also good for relaxing or maybe even your morning and evening walks ! It is also maintained very well, since I went in the evening I am aware it opens a 4 pm, and the guards are very particular about the rules !

Name: Sachin Jha
Title: Spend Evening with kids.
Review: We go to the pond once in a while on weekends. Pond has fishes and well maintained pathway around it. Pathway looks natural from distance even though it is made of artificial raw materials. Pond has surrounding bushes and trees which has lot of birds including ducks. Main attraction of pond are fishes and tortoises in it which can be seen with naked eyes as they come on water surface. Fishes which live school make appear number of fishes at one place. Best time to visit late afternoon. Park closes early evening for entrance.

Name: Renji Varghese T
Title: Nice atmosphere
Review: Nice place if your soul needs some fresh air and want to just keep out yourself from the busy city . Nice place to take a walk with your family.

Name: vksariyu
Title: Good place to visit once
Review: Very nice and clean place to visit once. Have a nice walk through the lane beside the pond.Kids will enjoy this place.

Name: anindras
Title: Worth visit once
Review: - There is some greenery there in the middle of the city.- Also some water.- Nothing else.- If you live nearby, then you may visit there ofter to spend some time. Otherwise it's worth just 1 visit.

Name: vkmsivaprasad
Title: visit lotus pond
Review: It is near to my office. Place maintenance is good and entry also free. Daily so many members will come to walk and enjoy the fresh air.

Name: SRINIWAAS S
Title: The spot usually used to attract nature lovers, bird watchers, photographers and morning walkers
Review: The pond is spread over around 10-12 acres and is encircled by lush green trees, colourful gardens and a beautiful 1-1/5 km concrete pathway with breaks in between of green patches and muddy ones too.

Name: Harshith358
Title: Nice place to spend some time in peace
Review: A good place to find some peace. This place is less popular that other places in the city. As a result it has less crowd. The location of this pond is also a surprise.

Name: abMximb63
Title: Nature's gift
Review: Its a lovely place to be. you can spend your evening and you will fell like you are in heaven. Such is the calmness over there.

Name: Rajesh1965
Title: Peaceful Place !
Review: #NAME?

Name: slayer_prashanth
Title: A cool pond inside a colony
Review: A very nice and calm place inside a posh area like jubliee hills. The environment there calms a tensed mind. A really cool spot for a hangout with friends, kids and parents.

Name: SagarRahurkar
Title: Hidden gem in the city of Hyderabad
Review: Nice place for a walk or a quite date. Can not believe that such a place exists in the busy city. Major plus point is ample parking place near and one of the most clean public places in India.

Name: Amazing_Neo
Title: Good place for an evening walk
Review: Its a nice peaceful place for a walk in the evenings. Its a well maintained garden that attracts many   people both young and old.

Name: MARGDARSHI
Title: A Sudden Beauty Find In a Dense City
Review: We were just going past the Jubillee hills & i suddenly remembered visiting a beauty spot here a long time back.So decided to take my family to a round of this beautiful oasis amidst the hustle bustle of Hyderabad.The name is a misnomer as it is a small park with a path of about a km with a lovely lotus pond inside it.There are also some lovely species of birds like pied kingfisher,white wagtail,sun birds & little egret etc.This place we found as a little treasure but it is subject to limited viewing times of 6 to 10 am & 4 to 8 pm in the evening.It is better go early as the lighting is not good & the area is quite dark.We also left regretfully after spending only a little time, with the approaching darkness with the hope of coming back again.Worth a visit.

Name: Ravi K
Title: Peace full for walking
Review: this is a natural pond there is a limited time for visiting. morning and evening walkers they can take their health walk. in this pond fises are very size but here no permission for fishing

Name: Karan K
Title: An Escape into the Calm
Review: not quite an easy place to find, but once there, rest assured that you wouldnt come out of it any time soon, its got an amazing jogging track which runs around a beautiful lotus filled pond- hence the name - its got ups and downs and stairs and stretches, over all a very pleasing experience, just make sure u go in broad say light, cause once the sun goes down, its all dark here..likes - very natural, a rare view in the heart of the city, a photogenic locationdislikes - no proper lighting in and around the pond in the evening times, claimed to be a bit spooky at night,,,

Name: pawanbindal
Title: Best place in hyderabad
Review: Easily the best place in hyderabad. Not crowded. Check the timings, only evening and mornings. A nice lake with some good birds to see.

Name: kransg
Title: Nice place for a short walk
Review: This place is well maintained and good for a short walk. opened for few hours, typically early mornings and evenings...quite and peaceful. photography encouraged here 😊. Check timings before going to this place.

Name: higghligght shiva
Title: its like a nature place
Review: I This place is for couples  i have gone wit my friend on correct timings inside no crowd at evening  v r  going 2 the hut its beautiful place 2 take photos & wooden beam chairs to sit   entirely surroundings full of trees  in middle the view of water lotus pond  at corner v see huge bunch of  fishes, very rare small tortoise at last v saw 3 ducks  its very nice if u go near they come with u & beat with mouth be careful with whatever .

Name: gayathrimoksha
Title: Wonderful Place
Review: I could never forget this place!! The only park in Hyd where you can see greenery and cleanliness.It's not much crowdy.. very peaceful and strict timings!

Name: diksha k
Title: Refreshing
Review: Very clean and well maintained place. Good to go for morning or evening strolls. However I didn't see a single lotus there yet I liked the place a lot. It's good to spend some time close to nature.

Name: m k B
Title: LOTUS POND
Review: Lotus Pond is a small water body Inside MLA Colony, Jubilee Hills, Hyderabad, India. The pond is surrounded by lush green flora and a 1.2 kilometer path.Lotus Pond is home to more than 20 species of birds. A few of them are Pied Kingfisher, White Wagtail, Common Moorhen, Little Grebe, sunbirds, Common Coot, and Little Egret.The pond is maintained by the Municipal Corporation of Hyderabad(MCH).The Lotus Pond was conceived to be an Eco-conservation project bringing natural elements into the concept of the project without disturbing the ecosystem and conserving the natural rocks and pond.

Name: Vishal J
Title: Peaceful
Review: Nice peaceful and clean place.....Good place for having a walk with your partnerThey should extend the evening timing a bit more....

Name: dranirbandasgupta665
Title: Nice to visit
Review: Nice to visit in the evening and great place to experience. Depending on your interest and nature attachment, but it is a good place to visit in reality.

Name: vibha123
Title: Most serene place in Hyderabad
Review: This place is probably the most serene place in Hyderabad. And very well maintained too. Only issue is the timings at this place. It is closed in the afternoons. Also check out the small fish in the pond... :)i couldnt believe i was in hyderabad for a long time looking at the beautiful site infront of us...we were a group of friends and after a good lunch we decided to visit lotus pond as we had heard a lot about fishes and the place as such from one of our friends who used to work close to this place.i was watching swans, turtoise, fishes in water and i could see them till it got evening  from afternoon....such a beautiful place ....site is out of the world...breath taking views and feeling is just awesome that we are not in hyderabad....A must visit place.

Name: Joseph
Title: Serene
Review: This place is probably the most serene place in Hyderabad. And very well maintained too. Only issue is the timings at this place. It is closed in the afternoons. Also check out the small fish in the pond... :)

Name: Gamya T
Title: Peaceful place for a pleasant walk
Review: What to expect: 1. Serene location. 2. Walkway around a pool 3. If you get unlucky, you might see a snake or two :(But overall experience is good.

Name: hiteshgoldeneye
Title: Not well maintained - waste of time
Review: Went there one evening after reading some good reviews in TripAdvisor however was disappointed to find that the site is nothing but another wasted opportunity. The pond is not well maintained, despite there being fishes in it, they are hardly visible since the water is probably dirty. There is no fencing on the pond and can be risky if you go with a child.

Name: praveenkamath
Title: Beautiful
Review: Had been there for photography, a lovely place amidst all the chaos of the city. To relax, to refresh and to click.Best part was that the ducks walk with you on thw walkway :)

Name: Chandresh P
Title: Lovely place
Review: Away from the rumble and bumble of the city. We could see lot of fish(all sizes), a very colorful small bird, one turtle and two tortoises! Turtle was a colorful one. Would like to go again. Recommended for a visit! Best to visit early morning as I am told. I was there around 7 am. Unlike KBR park and many other parks, this is a zero fee excellent place! You have to be careful with children though as the place does not have boundary for the pond at several places. There was a thela(pushcart) 100 meters away from entrance that had idlis and puri-sabji on the menu. Absolutely tasty and highly recommended as well!

Name: DileepMalipeddi
Title: One touch of nature :)
Review: Discovered it very lately :( . Well i have visited this place in the early morning around 6.15AM or so , The first thing that attracted me as soon as i enter this place is the cuckoo sound that i can hear and echos of it over the place . The place is not crowdy , hardly i can find 4 to 5 people during that time who came over there  for a morning walk , and i can see the relief and refreshment on their face from this busy life and this roaring city of traffic . Never knew that such place can even exist in the middle of city . The place is so beautiful that one can lost in the beauty of nature for a while , The pond is full of fishes and you can sit idle starring at them . The park is very well maintained and full of greenery . I can not see any lotuses though it was named as lotus pond :p may be i have expected them in wrong season :) . Worth visiting .If you are a deep thinker and need some time relax and

Name: khanjan Antani
Title: Lovely place..
Review: You may not fill that you are in the middle of the city. LOVELY PLACE to hang around. Good for joggers and walkers (Lovers too..Please read with spirit) Nature is very close to you. But very stringent timing of the garden. 6 am to 9 am and 3pm to 6 pm. If you are alone then you must be prepare to argu with guard to carry camera. WORTH PLACE FOR PHOTOGRAPHY...

Name: SirishaAchanta
Title: Paradise in midst of chaos of a city!
Review: We discovered it too late is all I repent.Its the best maintained park in Hyderabad and most well-kept. Its beautiful and picturesque is an understatement. you feel that it isnt a part of Hyderabad at all. Once you are inside the park, its an instant cheap vacation while staying within the city itself. Its an instant stress buster for me.

Name: casperkamal
Title: Definitely be here...to discover yourself
Review: You will be surprised to see that such a place exists in the heart of the city. A walk here will push all the stress out and help you gain inner piece. Be here definitely once at least if you live in hyderabad but keep in mind the timings it is open only in the early mornings till 8 and in the evenings from 4.30 p.m to 6.30 p.m. Your literally chased after that :)The monumental(fun intended) jagan's house is just facing this pond.

Name: Vedaant R
Title: Not maintained well
Review: Lotus Pond - Hyderabad Lake places.Lotus Pond is a modest water body located on Banjara Hills in Hyderabad. The pond is enclosed by luxuriant green flora; ...The pond is maintained by the Municipal Corporation of Hyderabad(MCH). The Lotus Pond was conceived to be an Eco-conservation project bringing natural ... But it like other goverment place which not maintained well.

Name: Kaushik G
Title: Big Park on Hussain Sagar Lake
Review: This is a large well maintained beautiful park located on the banks of the vast Hussain Sagar Lake and we had visited the same during our holiday in Hyderabad. We purchased entrance tickets for 20 rupees per person. Inside the park, we visited the rose garden which has wide variety of roses in different colors. We walked around the paved walkway visiting the Sanjeevaiah memorial, Butterfly garden, national flag and also got a great view of the Hussain Sagar Lake.

Name: panii2015
Title: Best place for Morning walk
Review: Its best place to go for morning walk. Not suitable to go in the evenings. Parking is available opposite side.

Name: Vikas Singh
Title: Nicely maintained parks
Review: This is one of the few nicely maintained parks in Hyderabad. Though it tends to get crowded later in the day, it is best visited in the morning. The park opens at 5.30 am and till 8.30 morning walkers come. You can stroll around, sit on one of the benches or exercise with regulars... it is good fun. For some reason cameras are allowed on hefty payment of Rs.1000 but you are allowed to shoot with your mobile. So be prepared to pay this huge sum if you must carry your camera. Entry fee other wise is just Rs.5.

Name: NIL_MODI
Title: very beautiful
Review: Sanjeeviah Park is a very beautiful park. nicely maintained. good to pass the time in evening with family. good option for very short outing.

Name: Shailendra
Title: Beautiful park with view of National flag
Review: Sanjeevaih Park is next to the Hussain sagar lake in Hyderabad. It gives you a nice view of the famous gigantic National flag of India.Good place to visit with kids.

Name: Ravindra V
Title: Family and children's park now
Review: Best part of the park is Sanjeevaiah memorial garden. It is maintained very well. There is children's park, rose garden, rock garden etc. You can see national park from various locations in the park. This park requires children to enter and couples are not allowed. Rose garden will be good in the season. There is only one small food option that too it has only badam milk, chips  and ice creams. Since the park is huge, better to go in the morning itself. Park closes around 6 PM.Best part of the park is Sanjeevaiah memorial garden. It is maintained very well. There is children's park, rose garden, rock garden etc. You can see national park from various locations in the park. This park requires children to enter and couples are not allowed. Rose garden will be good in the season. There is only one small food option that too it has only badam milk, chips  and ice creams. Since the park is huge, better to go in the morning itself. Park closes around 6 PM.

Name: Satyajit
Title: Thrill of Morning walk
Review: What could have been a routine morning walk turned into an ecstasy ... The lovely climate , rains , greenery , and the watching the hoisting of the  India's biggest and largest tricolour in Hyderabad. The flag stands tall at 88 metres on the banks of Hussain Sagar Lake in Sanjeevaiah Park. The gigantic flag measures 108 by 72 feet. It is two feet short of being the tallest flag.The steel pipes used to construct the country's tallest flag post were specially ordered from Kolkata. Due to the huge size of the flag, the flag was unfurled with the help of a motorized mechanism. The flag weighs over 65 kilos. The Telangana government spent close to Rs 3 Crore.

Name: jainms
Title: Good park
Review: Great place to spend time here with family trip. Very large park and located near Hussain sagar lake. can spend some fun time here too.

Name: TravellingReddy
Title: Also considered Lovers Park for its lush bushes
Review: This is a pretty old park which got famous for its expanse area and adjoining hussain sagar lake. Due to its location many love pairs end up here to spend intimate times and go unnoticed

Name: Usha65
Title: Nice park in Hyderabad
Review: In the heart of city, among st the tall concrete jungle, it is a boon for the walkers. It is also a good place to relax and spend time with family. But of late it has become a place for the meetings of lovers and is causing disturbance to the families.

Name: Daniel T
Title: Childhood favorite
Review: When this park opened up way back in 2000's, it was a fun place to spend time with family. It still holds the charm given the renovation work done. But the area around the park is not safe after sunset or late nights.Park is good for spending time. Kids will like the greenery. The India flag is the latest attraction to visit this park.

Name: 338skt
Title: good for walkiing
Review: it is and garden cum walking areas with plenty of small gardens in between and lovely place to spend some leisure time and have fun

Name: Dilip kumar
Title: ambience park
Review: Great park to have fun and enjoy the nature and also the ambience at the park is very awesome and is unforgettable.

Name: venkatakarthik
Title: spend some quality time with your family here
Review: the greenery is the pleasant sight for our sour eyes staring at a computer all day long, you certainly need to take a break from your work life and visit park in the weekends especially in the evenings

Name: SRIKAKOLAPU
Title: nice family park
Review: Can spend your time here since it has lush green ambience.Its clean.Must see the national flag here.There is a battery car inside which will be helpful if you have kids

Name: Sunil G
Title: Beautiful well maintained park in city
Review: Nice and Beautiful park with good improvements recently. Butterfly garden was very beautiful. Biggest Indian National Flag is here.

Name: idea614354
Title: park
Review: park at near at hussain sagar necklace road, plesent place to spend evenings with kids and family and friends.

Name: MAMU9647
Title: An ideal place for all Age groups
Review: It is a good place and located close to the Husainsagar lake.It is ideal for all age groups and has a good collection of flowers and plants.However when it rains at odd times ,there is no proper place for one to take shelter.For parking though there is a parking lot, but there is no shade and hence for teenagers on bikes there is no respite.

Name: Karthik Dasu
Title: Better parks in city
Review: It is one of the decent parks in the city.The maintenance is pretty decent.A very decent place to visit.

Name: Lalitha G
Title: Nice park
Review: its nice park. as a family we went and enjoyed a lot. my kids also enjoyed very well. on weekends, park will be bit busy.

Name: jmodi1981
Title: Good Park
Review: Nice park near by necklace road. It is very important to spent some good time here with your friends. Kids will enjoy the place.

Name: prudhvithoran3
Title: Not good for families
Review: the park is good and peace but the thing is as its in tank bund area more couples visit the park regularly so it'll not be good to take your kids there the parks full of greenary and is preffered for couples

Name: faisalwaris786
Title: Sanjeeviah Park
Review: Every time i use to come with my family on sunday, to spend some time with my family, the park is very clean.

Name: TravelbuggIndia
Title: Sanjeeviah
Review: Sanjeeviah Park is situated in the heart of Hyderabad city, Neclace road. Beautiful place for an evening stroll.

Name: slayer_prashanth
Title: A beautiful greenery
Review: Well this place is just another green cover within the city that gives a fresh feel and inculcates peace of mind just by walking in the place. Though not as great as compared to other green places far from the city but it can be a great place as it is the nearest to anyone staying in the city.It gives a proper view of the Hussain Sagar lake and the Buddha statue at the center of it. Best time to visit is the rainy and the winter season.

Name: Veer2468
Title: Good place for weekend
Review: This is an excellent place to visit on weekend with family. You can play badminton. Carry some food. Nice greenery.

Name: lovetravelonly
Title: Clean Green park
Review: A very good place for jogging and running peoples. The place is very neat and clean. The environment is very greeny and cool. It is the best place to relax. Monthly passes to regular walkers and joggers are also available.

Name: debarshi d
Title: nice
Review: I went to this place with my family ...Very nice park.. Its near Hussain sagar..We took a speed boat at Hussain sagar..

Name: nishit
Title: Good for couples
Review: An open garden where lots of couples flog the place with their PDA. Not a place for long duration....

Name: Manish K
Title: Ordinary place to visit, but do not miss the National Flag
Review: Sanjeeviah Park is located on the northern side of the Hussain Sagar Lake in Hyderabad. A large park, it attracts a number of people looking to spend some quiet moments away from the noise of the city.The best way to reach the park is by the neighbouring MMTS railway station, bearing the same name. The entrance fees is Rs. 20 for an adult. The park has a memorial to former Andhra Pradesh Chief Minister, Damodaram Sanjeeviah. It also has a butterfly park (but no butterflies) and a rose garden (where roses were still being planted), when I visited.The main attraction, however, is the giant national flag, which is the second tallest in India. When fully unfurled, it is a sight to see and can be seen from a significant distance. This is the best things about this park, else one can give it a miss.

Name: pjanil1968
Title: Calm place
Review: i saw lot of young couple around the place on the weekend. Lot of greenery. Nice place for a morning or evening walk

Name: Nikhil P
Title: popular with young couple
Review: Located near Necklace road, this park has lots of greenry and is easily accessible.  One can  find the park thronged by young couples  indulging in Public display of affection  (PDA) over here.

Name: Srinivas G
Title: a peaceful place away from the crowd
Review: this is a nice park near tank bund / necklace road. location is slightly far from the crowded places but peaceful. oflate, there has been a lot of neglect on the upkeep of the place ... otherwise perfect to spend a few hours with nature

Name: Gaurab2017
Title: Dont Visit this park - Unless you want to see lovers flocking around
Review: Been to this park very recently on Aug 15. Leave aside Independence Day, it was a place to show your independence at liberty. Very Embarrasing.Reachable via Necklace Road.

Name: Shailendra
Title: Good park with greenery
Review: Sanjeeviah park is a good park with greenery and play area for children and is also home to lovebirds.Avoid weekend crowds.

Name: DEVENDRA KUMAR S
Title: Visiting
Review: best place and mind fresh place in hyderabad in one most of garden.Railway Station is near any one can easily visit.

Name: KrishanSubudhi
Title: Vast and beautiful
Review: Very good park and maintained well. A must visit for every Hyderabadi. Good for couples, picnic and family. Best time to visit will be early morning. Provides good background for capturing pics.People parked on nearby roadside which was not an issue. Local train station is also walkable.

Name: BRKanth
Title: Another Planned Park for Nature loving people
Review: This is another park within the heart of the city. Better to spend time with family and kids for evening / morning time.

Name: Jikuza
Title: Best park in Hyderabad
Review: This is the best park in Hyderabad. It is a very big park with a few amusement spots. It is a great park to spend time with family and loved ones. It is lush green.

Name: renu_73
Title: Excellent place to spend a few hours peacefully.
Review: A park for the entire family to spend the days at leisure.Well maintained and clean park.You have the biggest Indian Flag hoisted at one corner of this park.You have a whole lot of greenery and place for the children to run around and enjoy.Well maintained canteens for refreshments.

Name: Debasis
Title: Nice park
Review: Its a nice park, well maintained. Evening is the peak time when it is full with local people. I spent some time to get fresh air.

Name: clementbenj
Title: Get out to Get Away from it all
Review: Sanjeeviah Park is a nature lovers best choice on any day.The sheer expanse of the place, the lavish greenery, the sprawling tank bund surroundings, offer a spectacle thats incomparable to many. Low entrance fees means it welcomes one and all. The beauty is enhances because of the hardworking maintenance crew who keep the entire premises spic and span throughout. Awesome Delight to get some fresh air, get rejuvenated and restart life in the city.

Name: gani1997
Title: Cool Garden
Review: Best place to go when ever you feel stressed or tired. The weather is so cool and its covered with green every where. I suggest you to go and visit this place if you are near to it,you wont forget that feeling again.

Name: Rohit RC
Title: Second tallest Indian flag in this park!
Review: The Sanjeevaiah park hosts the second tallest Indian National Flag. The height of the flag post is 291 feet and the dimensions of the flag are 72 feet x 108 feet. This flag was unfurled on 2 June 2016 (Telangana state formation day) by the Chief Minister of Telangana, Mr. K. Chandrashekar Rao.Sanjeevaiah Park is built on 92 acres along the banks of Hussain Sagar lake. The park is named after Damodaram Sanjivayya, an ex Chief Minister of Andhra Pradesh.The park hosts a whole lot of cultural parties by private groups and societies. A lot of families get together in this park for a potluck and get-togethers. The park is lush green and well maintained and is wheelchair friendly.

Name: shivaraikod
Title: Decent greenery all around
Review: I had been here to kill time as my brother had an interview near by and is at a walkable distance from necklace road mmts station. The park is decent with greenery all around.

Name: Repala S
Title: Recommend a visit
Review: It is a huge park, lots of area to sit. A beautiful park, where you can sit, play, sleep or do whatever you want, sometimes events are also organized here. It is huge and has nice green lawns to sit.This park is quite good but some improvement is needed. Hope it will be made better soon.

Name: shirishasantosh
Title: sanjeeviah park
Review: This park is very beautiful park in hyd. recently in this park one big indian flog was setted. this park is very nice to see.

Name: Gowthamcivilion
Title: For Birthday celebration!
Review: Its always open and very nice place to celebrate friend's bday. Which is in the main road, Parking facility is available.

Name: V V S Ganesh N
Title: Biiiiiiiiiiiiiiiig Park with Lake View
Review: Sanjeevaiah park is aBiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiig Park with Lake View located in banks of Hussian sagar.its is the only park in hyderbad with Railway station with in.The Mjor attraction inside sanjeevaiah park is Rose Gardens and Biggest Flag recently inagurated.its good for bird watchers also.

Name: joyienjoy
Title: A park to walk around
Review: A medium sized park, with green grassy patch, a place where people can relax, move along the swings, sit on the grass and have a wonderful evening.

Name: nagesh1955
Title: visit of park
Review: Very good park in the city near tank bund, we will have very big place in this park. We can see different type of plants here.

Name: pasunuri k
Title: Nice park
Review: The park is nice to visit along with family and kids can have a great time during the visit crowded in the weekends.

Name: ST_INDIA
Title: Big and beautiful Park
Review: Its a pretty big park near the Hussain Sagar lake and is beautiful too. This is  perfect for a daily exercise as well as the family picnic.

Name: AshishBansal82
Title: Nice place
Review: If you are looking for a place where your family along with kids want to enjoy a nice outing..goahead & visit this park. Its not just a park but a place with lot of other activities to do like train ride, swings etc.

Name: 640sameerp
Title: Hosting India's biggest flag
Review: It's a newly developed park by Chief Minister of Telangana on the occasion of Telengana formation day. It flagged India's biggest flag which cost crore.This flag can be seen from any point around neckless road and around Hussain park.

Name: Chandrapc
Title: lovers park
Review: it is beautiful park with full greeenary, rose garden at the front of hussane sagar it is located. from the park you can view  the lake.it is very big park. kids can play in the front of the park if you go inside you can notice the indecent activities by the youth   security must be watch this.

Name: Saiprasad_2804
Title: good place for evening visit
Review: This place is good to visit in the evenings for spending time but this lacks maintenance as this is not so clean and not good to visit with family.

Name: VYR306
Title: Gardens to Play a Day
Review: It is in budget attraction with full of greenery . It best suits for families with children. Food is also available inside the park with outside prices only. It will nice to play in weekends.

Name: vpas
Title: A park in the middle of the city
Review: This park is abutting the Hussain sagar lake or the Tank Bund. It is popular among morning walkers . There are also a few weekend activities that go like parkour etc.

Name: NilabhTripathy
Title: Nice new park for a lovely evening
Review: its a newly built beautiful park. The park is really big and nice. not overcrowded. can spent a lovely evening with your loved ones.

Name: Praveen K
Title: Beautiful well maintained park on necklace road
Review: A beautiful park on the banks of Hussain sagar, Well maintained greenery all around. Some times this park gets misused by lovers. Good place for kids to enjoy.

Name: Robin A
Title: average park to spend time with kids on weekends
Review: Located to nearby hussain sagar, having some swings as well on weekends.kids will love playing here, and you get some snacks to munch.

Name: Harshith358
Title: Best place for Couples
Review: If you are a couple and want to spend some time together, then this is the place that you are looking for...This is the park where you will see only couples in every nook and corner.

Name: Narasimha Prasad G
Title: Out dated
Review: This park located in necklace road in front of Hussain Sagar,very poor maintenance here and also not updated must not go with families.

Name: sudmaha
Title: Family/Couple Time
Review: A place where you can good time with friends and family. every thing is available here to make you spend good time.

Name: vibha123
Title: Best place to start mornings
Review: This is one of the parks of city that is maintained well for joggers and morning walkers....however with Hyderabad growing like a metro....is taking away the glory of this place...and those who used to cherish this park...will probably move to gym kind of places  and miss fresh air...

Name: travelogue05
Title: Good in an awkward sense
Review: It used to be a good park before--kinda awkward for families though. There are different plants and flowers, and it's a treat to go through 'em. There is a huge cactus plant section (not family friendly) but still go. They are trying hard to maintain, which I appreciate. I also said awkward because some horny people just don't know how to behave in public places. You will find lovers in all positions--which is okay. But if you're with kids, this isn't the place for you.

Name: SRINIWAAS S
Title: Sanjeevaiah Park is located in the heart of Hyderabad,
Review: The name of the park was derived after the name of the former President of India, Sanjeevaiah park is sure to captivate with its natural beauty. The lush greenery and its refreshing environment is sure to rejuvenate Sanjeevaiah Park is considered to be the oldest and the largest park in Hyderabad. It is the perfect place for visitors to relax on the lawn and also enjoy a great family picnic. A separate walk way has been paved for visitors to enjoy strolls or jogs at the park.

Name: Karan K
Title: A great place to go for morning walks
Review: This place has undergone major renovation in the recent years, fro having built a new path that runs all around the hussainsagar lake, to the one that runs right amidst the greens, this place is amazing from the parks to the flowers to the trees, however there still needs a  lot of work to be done. hoping it is done soon to make it a 100%

Name: Ramprasad S
Title: Lovers adda and poor maintenance
Review: Poor maintenance, Lovers adda. Embarrassing to go with Families.It needs to be well maintained, very good location unfortunately no one taking care of its maintenance.

Name: aizawl2015
Title: Excellent place to walk around with kids in the evening
Review: Good place to enjoy nature with family and kids. Grasses were green and well maintained. But the cons would be that it is closed very early evening.

Name: Naganna Travel and Food Expert
Title: Must visit place of Hyderabad...
Review: Its been around from my childhood i have been visiting this place.... its near Neklace road and near to Exhibition way road.... Can walk, jog, sit and do anything and even you can protest here as well.... But i would say most couples come to this place and i hate to come here if i see them most.....

Name: dikshit_umk
Title: Love it !!
Review: Beautiful Place for Weekends Parties.Visit it on weekends to get more fun and also enjoy the Boat Ride available.

Name: wander93
Title: Well maintained
Review: A really well maintained park for chilling out. The park is well maintained with lush green plants.Very accessible from Hussain Sagar lake.Would recommend visiting in the evening.

Name: MARGDARSHI
Title: Among The Best Garden In Plant Diversity
Review: The Sanjeeviah park named after the erstwhile Chief minister of Andhra Pradesh, is a 92 acres of public greenspace in the heart of Hyderabad.My issue with the authorities is the heavy concentration of many gardens all located around the Tank Bund-Lumbini park,NTR gardens & this one instead of dispersing them in various parts  of the congested city.As a matter of fact we finished all the closely located  major attractions-Hussainsagar lake,Buddha Statue,Tank Bund,NTR Gardens,Prasad`s IMAX movies,Lumbini park & this Sanjeeviah Park in one day starting from the early morning to late evening!Stretching along the freeshore of Hussainsagar lake it has a cycad,fragrance,rose,palm & aquatic species gardens.It is unique among all gardens in having the `Pavitra Vanam`ie a garden of only sacred & holy plants from different parts of the country & also of Mexican & African varieties ! It can be considered among the best to have a wide diversity of 25000 to 30000/ of  plants of about 200 species of them. It has nearly 100 types of birds & about 50 types of Butterflies,insects & notably many migratory birds during winter  like Purple Herons,Cranes,spot bills,common cool,cormorants & jacanas.It also has a separate tracks for walks/jogging.It also organises many cultural & public events in its premises.

Name: Aditya_Banerjee
Title: Go there if you are around Hussain Sagar
Review: If you are chilling near around the Hussain Sagar Lake in Hyderabad, take some time out and visit the Sanjeeviah Park. It's a well maintained park where you can enjoy your evening strolls or morning jogs

Name: Krishna Prasad
Title: crowded and not so well maintained
Review: on the shore of hussain sagar lake this is a big park with grass and some rose plantations downside to this park is the smell from the lake and ill maintained lawns

Name: Shah Shailesh Kumar
Title: It's a jogger's Paradise...!
Review: At the onset, let me tell you that it's more for regular visitor than a Tourist.We have been frequenting this Park for morning walk and Jogging for past two years as it's nearby from our locality. Must say that the breath of fresh air, the morning sunrise, the running of squirrels, the various colors of butterfly, the different types of of plants, the lush greenery and the recently added Rose garden...! Well, in a nutshell, it's one of the best place to be for any nature lover, especially in the morning hours. Sundays are full of family crowd in this park but still a fun...there are facility for washroom and water at many places inside the park for convenience of people spending long hours. Lots of Nature Photography enthusiasts will be found wandering inside the park for best shot to capture.The place is situated at the heart of the city on the one side of Hussain Sagar lake and very easily accessible.  Parking facility is also available and people can also get down at local MMTS station adjacent to the park. Eatables are not allowed inside but are available outside the main entrance.Entry fee is nominal for regular visitor with option of Monthly passes.

Name: Hemanthgowdakv
Title: Not a must visit place
Review: Well these kind of parks can be found in every nook and corner of Bengaluru, Chandigarh and Mysuru so please do not get fooled getting in expecting anything spectacular here.. It's definitely not on par with any other tourist park in the country.

Name: Janet S
Title: Good by Hyderabad standards
Review: This became one of our favorite places to walk while staying in Hyderabad because there were a couple areas in the park that actually were lovely, by any international standards...a rare thing in Hyderabad!  Of note is the rose garden, at the entrance, and the rock & desert plant garden in the back corner behind the rose garden.  Both are off limits to normal visitors.  We were told each time we tried to enter "no entry" and a security/gardener lady would come over to usher us out.  Finally, we just pretended not to understand and went wandering through anyway.  The desert area is amazing, with some plants that I had never even seen before.  Well maintained and pristine, without trash!  After the first time, we just continued to not pay attention to the "no entry" and finally they would give up.  After a couple days, they stopped bothering us and we wandered alone through these areas.  The entire park is large and well utilized during the weekends, turning into a huge party place with the resulting trash.  The playground is in deplorable condition, but entrance fee is only Rs 15.

Name: Yash Bagrecha
Title: Great Place to Walk
Review: I've been Here almost every sunday past 3 Years, The weather in the park is always the best Suited for walking , Playing and spending time with your Family.

Name: GreenCarpet11
Title: Lawns of Green lacing the Hussain Sagar
Review: The roads that lead to the park form a necklace as rightly named. It has acres of green and trees sprawled across some 90 acres of land. The park is a hub for people in search of solitude space to spend some time. At the end of the park is a yachting club where sailing is taught by professional instructors for a fee and there are seasons too . In some cases, the yacht can also be taken on rent or hire for a price. Children who learn wind sailing from here have gone for Mumbai Competitions in Sub Junior levels. Time and Money are crucial factors here.The park makes it not a tourist point but a leisurely quiet activity.The park is a place far from the hustle bustle of the raging traffic of the city and a pleasant place to spend time.A tiny entry fee is charged.Parking space is available. Eatables, I did not notice.

Name: Sanjeev_Sharma
Title: Okiee
Review: nothing much to do or sayideal for a lazy time if your are looking for. from the hectic all around activities you can spent some time relaxing here by just lying on the green lawns spread accross

Name: Debojitroy
Title: The atmosphere of the place is worst.
Review: Its a challenge for them who can stand there for more then 30 min. Air and water is so polluted that its difficult to stand there. The park is beautiful,  but the atmosphere makes it worst. The another bad thing is u can't go with your camera. But now a days mobile has more  8 mp  camera. I don't know whats the logic behind this.

Name: Abhishek S
Title: Temple and Water Dam
Review: This temple is one of the 12 jyotirlingas of Lord Shiva from HIndu religion.It is situated near Shirsailam Dam which is worth visiting.You can carry camera but not inside the temple.It also has  good quality food.One can experience the calmness in the environment there.It has 3 types of Darshan depending on the cost and time of the darshan

Name: Devaa
Title: An ancient temple!!!
Review: A place to worship in peace a not to far from Hyderabad. Spread on a huge area this architecturally beautiful temple must be visited and admired. It was not so crowded . Liked the cleanliness of the place.

Name: G.GURU PILLAI
Title: Must visit Temple
Review: I visited this temple with my wife  and we got good memories there.the temple is very neat and maintenance is very great.U can feel the vibration of lord Mallikarjuna.Srisailam is famous for Srisailam Dam & Bhramaramba Mallikarjuna Temple which is dedicated to Lord Shiva. The unique feature of this kshetram is the combination of Jyothirlingam and Mahasakthi (in the form of Bhramarambika) in one campus, which is very rare and only one of its kind. The great religious leader Aadi Sankara is said to have visited this shrine and composed his immortal Sivananda Lahiri here.Srisailam is a perfect combination of temples and scenic spots. Srisailam Dam built over River Krishna is one of the largest dams in South India. Mallikarjuna Swamy Temple, Bhramaramba Devi Temple, Akka Mahadevi Caves, Pathala Ganga, Shikaresvara Temple, Sakshi Ganapathi Temple and Mallela Theertham are the other attractions here.

Name: J Chand
Title: Mallikarjuna swamy... Jyotirlinga
Review: Nice temple. 200 km from Hyderabad. Different queues. Normal queue takes 2 hours in off season and 4 hours on vacation and special days. 300 rupee queue takes short route takes 30 minutes to an hour. 500 rupee queue immediately takes to garbhgruha. Abhishek ti punya possible by paying different payments. Mentioned in website. Cleanliness is maintained. Prasadam can be purchase from counters at different fees as per weigtt of laddu. Self life of prasadam is 15 days.

Name: Footprints727663
Title: Huge Temple
Review: I went to Mallikarjun Temple. The architecture of the ancient Mallikarjun Temple is very beautiful and intricate. The temple has fort like walls, towers and a rich endowment of sculptural work. It is great place to go.

Name: Som00in
Title: Rudrabhishek
Review: I visited the holy place with my friends and guru Ji . There is a direct connecting flight from Lucknow to Hyderabad. We started for Sri Sailam in the morning by road. The route passes through jungle. The place has many good restaurants and hotels . We stayed in Mallikarjuna Sadan. It has all the facilities. You can get north and south Indian food. There are s shops to get the daily need. For rudrabhishek and darshan there is ticket system. This is the only place which has shaktipeeth also. The lingam feels live here. The area and vicinity is very quite and calm. There are stairs going down to patal ganga. One can take a dip there. Enroute you can have fresh fish cooked. The sight of the dam is also worth watching. A must visit place.

Name: sravan
Title: Nice place to visit....
Review: We can have a great day..... Enjoying in summer season will be awesome because of d environment.... No pollution..

Name: Rizu
Title: Religious visit
Review: Temple is beautiful. But management is not good at all. The place is really hot and the exit gate is away from the shoe counter. And will literally end up burning your feet. They have not even laid the carpets properly so that it is convenient for people to walk in the scorching heat. But darshan was really good. This was the only good thing that happened. Inspite of all these difficulties it is a must visit. Is one of the jyotirlinga. And also a shakti peeth.

Name: BRKanth
Title: Best Temple in Nizampet
Review: Been to this place during morning hours and temple is neatly maintained and not much rush. It was a pleasant moment of stay.

Name: S Sewpersad
Title: Well organised
Review: We visited this temple in June after an early morning drive from Hyderabad. Was not too crowded and we all were able to take dharshan comfortably.Well organised and well run.

Name: ravirjy
Title: Spacious temple in nizampet
Review: One of the spacious temple in the nizampet village with big idol and nava graha is also available near to this temple

Name: 609sumanthd
Title: Awsome memories
Review: I visited this temple with my frnds and we got good memories there.the temple is very neat and maintenance is very great

Name: Srikanth_KSLR
Title: Nice and clean temple..
Review: Nice and clean temple.. Two temples- one for Lord Shiva and one for Goddess Parvathi... Very close to Nizampet village..

Name: Hema
Title: Worst
Review: Staff are very rude they wont even allow to touch the playing equipment if your not buying their game card , you can't even try or even touch the gaming stuff unless you pay for them.They are so mean and behaviour is so rudeImax is much better it atleast allows the customers to touch and try before playing and buyingWaste of such staff

Name: Chichuu
Title: Craving for redvelvet and thickshake
Review: Creamstone  & thickshake kosam ma chichu ostundi ready ga petandi ayya babu...2..3mnths nunchiwaiting

Name: jai srikar
Title: Big mall
Review: It was good to see all brands come together at one place....connected to panjagutta metro station. But everything is costly there...especially PVR hall

Name: Niya1315
Title: Big Mall
Review: Next Galleria Mall is connected with Punjagutta Metro Station on the second floor. The mall is big with almost all brands. The food court is on the top floor. Many eating joints are there.

Name: Georgio Valentino Rayala
Title: Mall Directly Connected To Metro
Review: I am a big fan of this mall as it is directly connected to metro and so very easy to get there. Other good thing is that it has a really nice multiplex. Also it has a good collection of restaurants and fast food outlets like bade miyan kebabs, nor-fest dhaba, kfc, mamu, taco bell, burger king, ibaco etc. For shopping you have multiple stores like Shoppers stop, Hamleys, Pantaloons, Big Baazar, Miniso etc.

Name: vamsikrishna
Title: Mall cum  food cum movies cum shopping
Review: I share my wonderful experiences about PVR central mall it is located in Panjagutta Hyderabad.It is one of the nice place to watch the cinemas and good and attractive mall in Hyderabad.In this mall we can find the different categorizes, gadgets and theater in different complexes.The Ambience was very beautiful and good.It is thee very large screen .They provide what are the updated movies in cinema industry and they offer movie tickets with less price and reasonable cost just Rs.150 it is less amount compare to other theaters.In this mall we get the good parking place no need to worry about vehicle parking with good security.Picture quality is very good and coming to sound system is very high quality.Entire theater consists of full ac and they provide good sitting arrangements.Value for products is worthy and reasonable . So I always preferred this theater it is very good for enjoying the movies.

Name: prudhvi
Title: NEW MALL INTO HYDERABAD
Review: This mall is easy to locate, which lies in connection to panjagutta metro.You can directly enter into the mall from panjagutta metro station.This mall looks like a giant ship from outside.Mall is well maintained.There are wide varieties of clothings, gaming zones, what not everything.Dominos,subway ,burger king and many other food stalls are available.Rest rooms are tidy.Best place to enjoy with friends.

Name: Vikas Singh
Title: Poor food court. Many outlets still to open up
Review: The only positive about this mall is that it is never too crowded even though it is next to the metro station. The food court can hardly be called one given a few outlets that at best serve ice creams and Coca cola! The highlight of the mall is Decathlon store. The PVR theater here is quite nice though.

Name: Prudhvi
Title: Good place to visit in free time
Review: The mall has several brand store like pantaloons, max, brand factory and many more. There is a food court to eat. There's a box office to watch cinemas and play zone for kids. Overall it was a good experience.

Name: SMF Abdi
Title: A whole new world
Review: Very nice mall with a lot of premium brands as well as mid range. Nice and spacious. Located in panjagutta. Easily accessible. Parking is ample.

Name: anand887
Title: Lovely Time
Review: Beautiful ❤️ place to visit near Ameerpet we really enjoyed...Must visit.....!!!You will be glad to see people around you and the decor

Name: VijayMadari
Title: Went to movies with family
Review: Nice Place to watch movies. House keeping Dept. Aruna/Raviteja/Anuradha helped my children very well.

Name: Rajesh D
Title: Good place for weekend
Review: It is for all kind of people to shop, dine and play, one place for all kind of enjoyment.PVR cinemas also available to watch favorite movies in once place.

Name: Stay282088
Title: Mall in the shape of a Ship!!
Review: We went to this mall with my six year old girl on her birthday. She very much enjoyed the play area in this mall. Also the food options like chat, ice creams, cakes, etc.,are great. Moreover, the metro is directly linked with skywalk to this mall. Overall a nice experience.

Name: Wilayat
Title: Browsing around
Review: This is brand new mall in irrum manzil near the metro station, their are some new fast food chain added like pizzetto, wafl cafe, dounken monkey, frankee & in the basement their is decathlon store for sports lover

Name: jainms
Title: Very large mall
Review: The construction of the mall is very nice and even the maintenance too. been her for movie and it was good experience.

Name: Georgio Valentino Rayala
Title: Nice Mall With Various Eating Options
Review: This is a nice mall which is directly connected to the metro and has different eating outlets.I love their multiplex and mostly watch movies here. But this time I visited this place to buy a messenger bag as well as eat dinner. I bought a nice messenger bag from Shoppers stop outlet and did have a delicious kebab dinner at Nor-Fest dhaba on the 3 rd floor.

Name: worldcascade
Title: Nice theater, food court and shopping
Review: Galleria mall has nice theatre, well maintained, ample food stalls and shops. The mall is located next to the metro station which make it more accessible. Also, there is ample vehicle parking, so you don't have to worry even during a crowded day.

Name: Madhavi
Title: Convenient Mall
Review: These malls are located besides prominent metro stations. Easy to swing by and get some shopping done without going through the hassle of parking, driving etc. Good selection of shops and food places.

Name: Sailu
Title: NO Surveillance or NO security in the PARKING
Review: We have parked our bike(Royal Enfield red clr) on 18.8.2019 (3.45 to 4.00 PM).
