Review: This is  quite far from the city central.  Very  beautiful temple with statue of   Lord Vishnu as Shesha shayee. The temple has got all the facilities for the  people  like drinking water good parking area

Name: lakjoth
Title: Great place of  devotion to God
Review: This is a  vey nice temple in Shamipet area. The  temple is not within city limits, but  good transport facility is available. The temple has got  all the  basic facilites for the  devotees

Name: rajuashetty
Title: Powerfull Lord Venkateshwara Swamy Temple
Review: Superb temple, with lots of Greenary around very near to Hyderabad area, and good to go with family and kids..

Name: Shubham Mishra
Title: For all the peeps moving into their new houses, this is your go-to place
Review: Do check out the warehouse, it looked like straight out of video game where shootout happens, and your character kills the final boss!

Name: Utkarsh
Title: Definitely Visit but not sure about buying!
Review: IKEA is a fun labyrinth of home furnishing where you can easily spend 2-3 hours from entry to exit. Whenever you visit, just leave your wallet at home cause you will want to buy everything.Pros: A different shopping experience, restaurant was good and fairly reasonable.Cons: Directions/Signage are really lacking, build and quality of their product was nothing great.

Name: R Ramakrishnan
Title: YELLOW BOX Courier service from IKEA is absolutely unprofessional and pathetic.
Review: While the shopping experience at IKEA Hyderabad was a pleasure, our experience with the "Yellow Box" courier service (which operates from the IKEA premises, just after the billing counters) was abysmally poor.While they initially entice you with a "fixed price" deal of Rs 1500 for a consignment of upto 50 Kgs - they add up GST, Insurance, Packing & Handling charges over that - which nearly doubles the amount to be paid. If you speak with Mr Vamshi, Mr Nazeem or MrTeja - they will verbally assure you that the consignment will be delivered in 5-6days.Thereafter, you will not hear from anyone till you call them after a week, upon which you are told that the consignment will be leaving "tomorrow". Two weeks later, upon repeated follow ups - they will give you some Truck Driver's number, who will promise to deliver it within 24 hours - but he wont show up for the next 3-4 days. Meanwhile - no calls will be attended to or messages responded to by YellowBox representatives - so the customer is left hanging without any confirmed information about the fate of the consignment.In short - a TOTALLY PATHETIC experience. I hope the IKEA leadership takes note of this and ensures that  corrective action is put into place. They should take morally take ownership of the vicarious liability that is involved, since YellowBox is operating from within their premises.

Name: Amberlicious
Title: Failed delivery excuses …🤦🏻‍♀️
Review: Ordered products for home delivery. Delivery was due 6th December. Every evening i get an email saying that the delivery has failed. I have called them everyday and even given my husbands number as an alternative contact. No phone calls no delivery…. IKEA has brought its stores to India but not their work culture or customer service.

Name: Christopher F
Title: Just like all the others.
Review: As with all of the IKEA stores this is exactly the same which is why I love to just walk around and feel at home. The one thing I wish they had were the beef Swedish meatballs not a poor chicken facsimile.

Name: Naveen Gd
Title: Pathetic Customer experience
Review: Quite pathetic customer service . Humans may land on Mars before they address minor complaints . It takes at least 25 follow ups to return a product / exchange :(

Name: Amit Khare
Title: Wow just wow
Review: It was an amazing shopping experience. They have loads n loads of amazing stuff. Just so creative . I loved the way the themes and decors were matched. Definitely worth a visit. The restaurant caters for amazing Swede food as well as Indian food. Overall amazing experience

Name: Anil Sharma
Title: Great Shopping experience
Review: Nice place for shopping good options and rates available. Huge place and huge options with lot of good people with lot of support.

Name: beyondtravel
Title: Avoid if not necessary
Review: On a normal day I would have recommended a 5 star just for the way Ikea store is so well organised, the options and product range... However post lockdown the safety norms which are extensive and elaborate have led to long ques as u inevitably have to keep waiting 1.5 hour for car parking and 1 hour to enter.... It's tiring, cumbersome with no facilities whilst u keep waiting. I understand the limit on ppl who can be inside but no information, long ques without water, bathroom are a big no. Click and pick is good if u have a good knowledge on ikea products. Overall avoid till ikea team can handle better.

Name: EkMusafir
Title: Gigantic Furniture Showroom.
Review: The IKEA furniture showroom in Hyderabad is a huge place where you can see and buy furniture and appliances for your house. We visited the place in early March 2020 and were simply astounded by the variety and range of the furniture modules available. It is a one of it’s kind place right from the time you enter. The entrance itself is so mind blowing, we thought we were entering an airport. Every room inside is designed in a unique way, with the pieces of furniture in each room complimenting each other in texture and material, so the entire room gives you a feeling as if a master craftsman has planned and fitted the parts like a pretty jigsaw puzzle. There were many different styles of bedrooms, dining rooms, drawing rooms, modular kitchens and bathrooms, and more. We enjoyed walking through each room marvelling at the various layouts and the furniture in them.In addition you can buy furnishings, utility items and appliances, both small and big, for the house and kitchen. There is ample parking space in the compound, but it becomes crowded during weekends and holidays. At the end of all the browsing we went to the unique restaurant and had a sumptuous dinner.

Name: saradurban
Title: ok store
Review: have been to other ikea branches this one was a bit llimited in options but well laid out not too busy as we went close to close up time good helpful staff

Name: richagoel15
Title: Vast store and good time spent
Review: Even if you do not want to buy anything, you still should visit the IKEA store once.  It is huge and has a very good appeal.  The stuff they have is not at all overpriced but you can easily spend 1-2 hours here by just roaming inside.  There is a restaurant inside incase you are hungry.

Name: Indusman248
Title: Day visit with Spouse during Christmas
Review: IKEA has a great arrival experience of traffic movement/drop off/pick-up. However, they need to control the human traffic as the crowd sometimes spoils the shopping experience - which happened with us.

Name: Ashish Sehgal
Title: IKEA
Review: Nice outlet for furnitures which can solve your purpose with compact and international designs.Still quality is lite and still more options to view.

Name: CuriousTraveller
Title: One stop shop for home furniture
Review: IKEA is one of the best shops in Hyderabad. They have around 400+ stores all over india. They have home dcors that onclude bedsheets, curtains, sofas, chairs, computer tables, shandliers, readymade kitchens, chimneys, refrigerators, carpets,Bedsheets. They also have foodcourt to reload yourself to gain some energy after a tiresome shopping.

Name: Primal Survivor
Title: Concept Home Furnishings
Review: Only store in India & surprisingly not in North India 🤣Over crowded / been there thrice and every time I had to push and jostle my way.Long queues at billing counter .Safe Ample parking though .Good stuff not very reasonable though .On average one tends to spend minimum 3000 to 10,000 Rs But to my dismay many non shoppers /pick pockets / nuisance creators  too come ~ but don't think any way to stop such.Food is average , costly & lacks variety.

Name: Georgio Valentino Rayala
Title: Need Some New Collection
Review: I visited this store last month along with a friend after a while and nothing much changed from my last visit. The crowds have reduced a bit and the collection has become old.I was pleasantly surprised with the lack of queue in the restaurant. The food tasted ok but I think they need to bring in new collection.

Name: Abhijit Naik
Title: Massive Store
Review: Just hearing about IKEA and experiencing it has a huge difference. Had a great experience and loved the way the store is designed. Must see for visitors

Name: ravinaredi
Title: good place for shopping
Review: v visit in recent visit to hyderabad & find it is wonderful plaace to shop for daily uses things. good furnishings articles as well as kitchen articles available at reasonable cost.

Name: Wilayat
Title: Have a look to shop
Review: IKEA hyderabad: is a European multinational  group that designs and sells ready to assemble furniture , kitchen appliances and home accessories

Name: Niyoti
Title: one in itself
Review: So it is a first ever stored open in India. Has very good stuffs and that too budget friendly. Its one in its own. Staff is also very friendly. Buffet is also good. Meat balls is must try.

Name: sumit g
Title: No better place for buying or window shopping such products
Review: Amazing place, best range at bargains and gives complete value for your money. People from outside hyderabad can always buy curios and souvenirs for their family friends even kids, as most of the stuff wont be available anywhere else.

Name: Sheetal S
Title: good home furnishing
Review: good and mid to high range home furniture and utilities here. Perhaps would appreciate if they were made in India stuff than imported so did not buy much here.

Name: jainms
Title: Good Furnishings
Review: I feel Worth buying furniture and household items here, Flexible to use and nominal price charged. Store also very large with many listings.

Name: Georgio Valentino Rayala
Title: First IKEA Store in India
Review: This is the first IKEA store that has opened in India. I visited it when they opened last year in September. It is on par with most of the IKEA stores in other parts of the world. Their pricing is a bit less also compared to their stores in Asia.My only problem with this store is their food quality. I think they need to improve taste of their food as well as introduce dishes like fish n chips etc.

Name: Kagar
Title: Dint find much
Review: Went with great hopes but didn't find much and full of crowd , it's better for anyone to go to ikea on morning sessions only

Name: shyamsandeep
Title: Must visit
Review: This is great place for checking innovative ideas on home improvement and placement of home items , bought so many items , they also have a friendly return policy Food is awesome to

Name: Pranav_F
Title: First in India of its kind store
Review: Very big warehouse with variety of furniture and house hold items, things are available from low prices to high prices, mostly items are manufactured in China. But you will get all the things at one place, its good for office furniture's as well as for home.Food court is available plenty of parking available, avoid weekends as crowd would be there.

Name: misskark7
Title: literally nothing new
Review: availability range of products and cost no much different from regular malls and multiplexes. further too long to get anything. and literally parking is a hell. totally to say one needs to have lots of energy and money to spend and buy there.nothing new or great .it would be out of only one's enthusiasm to go crazy over ikea.

Name: Jeff
Title: Amazing concept and organisation
Review: The first IKEA store in the country is in Hyderabad, and it is totally worth a visit. The store space is huge and it is totally on the lines of thier stores from any other part of the world. The variety of goods and thier inventory is on par with the other stores and the quality, ofcourse the quality is the best part about IKEA right.. The price on the goods is very economical and it is very easy to splurge here without any hassles. If you love shopping you must visit here, if not for shopping atleast for the experience.

Name: veronica_lalwani
Title: Excellent collection and an inventory management case study
Review: Made a visit to the IKEA store and finally got to see the massive collection. Loved how it's organized and also requires the customer to go prepared. Right at the entrance, they give you a brochure and a ✏️ and one has to make a list of what one wants to buy and also use the measuring tape (made of paper) to check if the item you're selecting fits with the measurements from home (that's what I meant by be prepared). Since I traveled from Mumbai, I could only pick knick-knacks (👀 baggage allowance🙆) but if one lives in Hyderabad, there are so many options to choose from, right from chairs to study table and what not! Not to forget mentioning the restaurant experience, which is a new self-service concept In India.

Name: Akmands
Title: Shopping
Review: On our trip to Hyderabad went here on Sunday,  very nice place with big range of shopping options.  Must visit place.

Name: Mamta Rajesh
Title: The store
Review: I have seen IKEA stores in many places and i was interested to see the range available in their India store and compare prices. I was not impressed but neither disappointed as i got what i was looking for. Very spacious.Good parking. Must go only on weekdays in early part of the day to avoid crowd.

Name: Kinggops
Title: Ideal for a newly married couple who want to set up a cosy home!
Review: You can spend one full day at Ikea, Hyderabad. It is ideal for a newly married couple who want to setup a cosy home. This concept is new to India. The quality of furniture is good & prices are competitive. They have a tie up with a transporter - who has a shop in the basement - who will cart it to any place in India - for an additional charge depending on the size,weight & distance of the item. The canteen inside offers  good food at competitive prices.Strongly recommend this place to be visited - if you are coming to Hyderabad. Suggestion for Ikea - More Household Items & Kitchen appliances can be included to make it more appealing to older couples/ Families.

Name: sanaser
Title: An excellent home furnishing outlets in Hyderabad
Review: Swedish home furnishings major IKEA opened its first store in India at Hyderabad city. IKEA store might have opened in Hyderabad last year. It is located in HITEC CITY. We visited the store last Saturday evening. Observed too much crowed over there. We have found there attractive well designed home furnishing all articles in an affordable range. Most products are flat packed, so it is very easy to carry and take them at home. IKEA  has invested Rs. 1,000 crore on the Hyderabad store alone and have a range of around 7,500 products over there. IKEA restaurant in Hyderabad offers a variety of snacks & meals and it houses 1000 Seats, IKEA'S largest.. Our first visit IKEA store at Hyderabad was impressive and enjoyed having light refreshing items with free cold beverage.

Name: Amberlicious
Title: Nightmare kitchen installation
Review: Terrible service, nightmare installation team, no coordination. My installs meant to be completed on 17th March... Payment was made. Only after payment done I was informed that some parts of drawer fronts not available. My installation date was given to someone else... made payment for drawer front on 15th May as I was told it has arrived.  Now I am told it has been sold to someone else.  I have to wait till mid June for next shipment. One of the drawers is badly scratched. I was told they would replace it. It was not done. During pre installation visit, the engineer marked walls where tiles could be put. The work site was completed. Finally, when ikea did show up, I was told the tiles should not have been put. The tap installed on the sink blocks my window from opening. I was told that it would be rectified. Not done yet... Overall, a nightmare. You have imported your products but unfortunately it is the same irresponsible, uncoordinated, lazy, poor work ethics. Huge disappointment. Shall not recommend kitchens to anyone.

Name: Pradeepkumar008
Title: Awesome place for all home owners
Review: The place is well designed and has items for all needs in a house. It is a paradise for new home buyers. One can get all the items needed to set up a new home or even refurbish an existing home.The prices are reasonable. They even have small items that can be picked up to decorate your home. The restaurant has limited food and drinks option, but the food was good.It would take atleast 3 hours to just glance through the entire place. The parking space is huge.

Name: yesarar
Title: A well organised display
Review: It's almost like a conducted tour , all household articles displayed in different sizes of homes.  Good quality and not very expensive. Nice Swedish lunch .

Name: TravellerBlog
Title: No respect to customers. Cop like attitude.
Review: Horrible experience. No respect to customers. Support team is not trained to handle customers. Cop like behavior and insult

Name: S Singh
Title: Amazing stuff out there....
Review: Visited ikea the staff is really helpful place is great and stuff is amazing at a really reasonable rate. Must visit if you are visiting Hyderabad at least have a look.

Name: Drbaiju
Title: great experience
Review: if possible visit this store before purchasing a product for your new or old home...It will really help you how to organize space and have a better home or work area.even if u cant find suitable product u can try their ideas with your local vendor .Its really huge need a  full day to see the complete store .staffs are very helpful .restaurant is clean with  neat food.Lots of models of kitchen , home in display.Market area is amazing with lots of option to buy. JUST VISIT IF YOU ARE CONSTRUCTING A NEW HOME.

Name: TravellingReddy
Title: Massive place for furniture and furnishing
Review: One of the main reasons for me to plan a trip to Hyderabad is to visit this place. Location is strategic and has massive parking space. Focus is more on small nitty gritties required for setting up a home and also the requisite furnishings. I felt the furniture designs need to be more to satisfy Indian mindset. A go to place for people who want to set up a new home

Name: Shashank R Misra
Title: Enourmous and absolutely awesome
Review: the newly opened Ikea store (the first in India) is worth a visit, if only to see what international Retail looks like ....and how far the Indian retail outlets whether it is More or Big Bazaar or Reliance have to go in terms of store design and layout, customer service, the variety of items available .... i doubt if anyone can visit the store and come out without spending a small fortune....even if you went with the specific objective of "looking and window shopping"

Name: Suryanarayana K
Title: A large single brand store for furniture.
Review: Consisting of about 5 lakh sq feet, it consists of two level car parking, 1000 seat restaurant, one floor of displays including model homes, kitchens, bedrooms etc and a floor of self service stock. This is the first store in India for the company. The store has its own app to guide you and to select your purchases. A casual browse will take at least two hours.For anybody building a new house or moving into a new house or renovating, this is a must visit place.Though some products may appear expensive, i felt you cant get them at a cheaper price elsewhere or by getting it made by your carpenter. Ikea is famous for self assembled furniture. Delivery and installation services are also provided at an extra cost.

Name: OMKAR PAGADALA
Title: Mount Opera
Review: I have experienced an amazing climate and the place also very far away from city which helps a lot to keep our mind relax ..... One thing about this visit is that the ticket cost is too costly as far as my opinion is concerned.......

Name: WondererGuy
Title: Water Playtime
Review: I visited Mount Opera Multi-Theme Park Resort with my family for outing.They have variety of water activities.

Name: SRIKAKOLAPU
Title: nice
Review: Have a pool,rain dance,it has gym,spa,sauna,massage inside. Maintenance can be better since there is foul smell at certain places but overall value for money

Name: karthikakavya
Title: okay okay
Review: this place is very suitable for school picnic trips and the two for children aged from nine to sixteen and also this place suggestible for outing with friends teenagers and family and the range of this ticket is also affordable . further it is no more different from other water parks just little affordable and good for get together with friends and family or relatives or to assemble as school groups .

Name: idea614354
Title: Theme Park
Review: this is a best one place for time pass at weekends with family and kids. a lot of fun here for every one.

Name: Karthik Dasu
Title: Decent water park
Review: It is one of the better water parks in the city.The amount of chlorine used in water is pretty high.

Name: subbaraju m
Title: Value for money
Review: For the amount they charge, its an excellent place. Water rides have wave pool, top down slides, rain dance. They have other machine rides like gaint wheel, columbus and many more. Our kids really enjoyed the kids park too. We have even gone for Zip line recently they have introduced on the hill top and its thrilling.

Name: Ravula S
Title: Worst place in hyderabad
Review: I don't even want to give one rating to this but it's not allowing me to write the review until and unless in gave rating. Written as "Mount opera amusement park" but it looks like a school play ground with one swimming pool. Chlorine water used in swimming and rain water. Restaurant looks like a jail where visitors should sit like a prisoners. Very poor maintenance. Don't visit the place and waste your money.

Name: dssrinivas2004
Title: Overall Ok / Average Experience
Review: Visited it on 24th Dec and overall experience was good. To be honest the management have an staff especially their manager (Mr.Prasad) and executive manager (Mr.Prasad).+ve things as listed below:-----------------------------------1. Very friendly staff2. They go beyond their limits to make the customer happy3. Good food. Their lunch buffet and dinner buffet was great. At any cost, they don't compromise with the quality of the food.4. During the check-out time, even if u are late they will not push you (If they don't have any other waiting customer)5. Don't miss their camp fire. Nice experience in chilled weather. Just put a note to them well in advance that u want camp fire and rest of the things will be taken care by their staff.6. 100% secured and safe, which means family members can just walk-in with your kids.7. Kids will enjoy all their rides and water games-ve things are listed below:-----------------------------------1. The water pool games need lot of maintenance work.2. The rooms need lot of maintenance work.3. We are shocked to see a big lizard / frog in our room. Don't know how they happen to check-in out entry fee.. Just kidding... But the lizard and frog which we have seen are too scary.4. The water pools will be under maintenance activity during night hours and the sound is too much while pumping the water out. It will disturb you if u are a sensitive sleeper.Note:-.1 Last but not the least, I heard from the staff that they are under going with huge renovation during this coming summer. If it happens then it can be considered good.2. Keeping all the above mentioned -ve points, i am giving it as 3 rating

Name: safiyasayyed
Title: Good Theam Park!!!!!
Review: I visited with my family arround 10-12 menbers.  Mount Opera Theme park is one of the popular tourist places of Hyderabad offering loads of entertainment and fun to each and everyone. Best place to spend summer holidays with family in opera water games are really cool and the water waves are too good.Each an every thing is good but one thing is far from the city.

Name: Mohd S
Title: Place  Good
Review: We staff went there for picnic  place is okay but crowded and also not reasonable compare to facility available

Name: Shiva D
Title: weekend fun
Review: its very very famous in hyderabad whis is located at outscuts of hyd every 1 can visit with there family on weekends

Name: Nagendra Kiran ... M
Title: Mount Opera Theme Park Hyderabad
Review: Mount Opera Theme Park Hyderabad: Located at a distance of approximately 38 kms from the main city, Mount Opera Theme park is one of the popular tourist places of Hyderabad offering loads of entertainment and fun to each and everyone. Situated on the Hyderabad-Vijayawada National Highway, the Mount Opera theme park is just 4 kms away from the popular Ramoji Film City.

Name: Navash P
Title: awesome amusement  park.
Review: mount opera is one of the best all in one amusement park in Hyderabad along with resort inside.the whole family, friends  enjoy each and every moments .nice place nice water rides and electric rides and much more.

Name: S R
Title: Summer good enjoyment
Review: Best place to spend summer holidays with family in opera water games are really cool and the water waves are too good.

Name: mahendra t
Title: awesome amusement park in hyderabad
Review: one of the best all in one amusement park in Hyderabad along with resort inside.the whole family, friends, and relatives can enjoy each and every moment here.water rides and electric rides and much more...are they to make you all thrill.

Name: iamlucky2017
Title: Mount Opera Multi-Theme Park Resort
Review: Mount Opera Multi-Theme Park Resort is a popular weekend getaway located in the outskirts of the city, on the Hyderabad-Vijayawada National Highway. its good see

Name: ravi b
Title: good enjoyment
Review: nice place to the refreshment. the eminities are very good here,, nice place the summer vacation also, but one thing is far from the city.

Name: ccwd w
Title: Summer Place
Review: The best place to spend summer weekend with friends and family in mount opera,the water games are really cool and the water waves are specially good.

Name: vlsvas
Title: My trip to Opera
Review: I would say Mount Opera is one of the most refreshing spot for every age group and everyone can spend their time joyously.

Name: Ganesh V
Title: rain dance
Review: excellent trip with family members & Friends & Colleges rain dance games music lunch & much more simple superb

Name: nickky_30
Title: I Enjoyed Summer vacation
Review: I had lot of enjoyed with my friends its beautiful  summer vacation point thanks to Mount Opera Resort

Name: shivaraikod
Title: Good to beat heat
Review: It was a refreshing experience here with water all around with  family to beat this scorching summer heat.

Name: RAVI K
Title: Its a good place to hangout with your bunch of friends
Review: Its a good place to hangout with your bunch of friends. Usually the place is crowded. The rides are good for that price. You can hire swimming costumes which are available at nominal rates. View from the top is good.

Name: emmanuelamrcl
Title: Needs to Improve
Review: I have been there with friends it took quite a time to reach from my location ECIL, though we have spent decent time much amusement themes were not present some of the rides were similar to Jal Vihar/Ocean Park or other water park resorts. The water rides are not that great and could be better maintained and improved. Back 4-5 years ago this use to be a good place for one day outing and also a tourist attraction. Think that some improvements have to be made

Name: sandeep g
Title: good water sports
Review: you will find a decent and good entertainment here , especially children will love to be here ,good worth a visit

Name: santosh2ind
Title: Mount pera park
Review: This is very good place in hyderabad. every one should enjoy in this park .a specially childs are very enjoy.

Name: nagesh1955
Title: visit of water games
Review: Very big place to enjoy with familly and friends, we can get lot of excitement over here. Lot of fun games available.

Name: V V S Ganesh N
Title: Not so worthul
Review: Mount Opera in Hyderabad is not so worthful.its old rides and half damaged attaractions over there made my trip pain ful and distrubed.

Name: shivareddy2209
Title: good park for entertainment
Review: it is a place where u can enjoy a lot with friends or family.it has swimming pools and has rain dance too

Name: rajesh r
Title: water park
Review: similar to OCEAN PARK, water games are ok but not damn good. transportation is difficult as it is far away from hyderabad city

Name: rkkoya
Title: Watery
Review: Mount Opera is one of the best Water Sports destination around the city. The sporting items are very safe and enjoyable.

Name: Amazing_Neo
Title: Great place Great food.
Review: Took my team for an outing here and they had a great great time.The rides are not that great and could be better maintained. The water rides, rain dance and the waves pool is a real joy. People spend most of the time in the water and this does justice.The buffet meal here is also tummy filling and has a great variety. Thanks Mt.Opera staff for making it an awesome experience.

Name: BRKanth
Title: Place to enjoy with Kids
Review: We have been to this place with family during a working day and it was a great experience as there was not much rush.

Name: mirzaabbasalibaig
Title: Excellent place for lover's
Review: I really love Mount Opera will go again there with my girl friend. I went with my girl friend we have enjoyed there a lot much.

Name: bharadwaj8008
Title: one of the best
Review: it is one of the best place for the thrill seekers one can surely regret to go there because there are many things to do there starting from mechanical games to swimming.

Name: kaushik r
Title: Terrible !!
Review: At some time about 5 years ago this use to be a nice picnic spot for a one day outing. The place which is known for its wave pool is now in a horrible condition. Maintenance is very bad. Not even worth a visit. A swimming pool near your home is far better than this.

Name: Annesha A
Title: Bad Experience
Review: Only water park is working properly others are out of service .No guidelines. No proper instruction. Very poor experience.

Name: Robin A
Title: Although old property, but good place of group of people
Review: Nice hang out place for one day outing.good for cor[porates as well. pool , rides and other activities are good.

Name: Karan K
Title: Something is better than Nothing types place.
Review: Here stands the Mount opera, one of the oldest running places in Hyd, however, Hyd still lacks the presence of an awesome water park !! God knows when in the world will we get one, however, this plays a role of the OK-OK types of water park in hyd, has a wave pool, 3 to 4 slides which rip the skin off ur back when u slide over them, so its a pity !! there is no sun shade over the pools so be prepared to be SUPER tanned !!Good - an excuse of a water park, some wat funbad - no sun shade over pools, slides are too bad and rip ur skin off the back, not too much of a good crowd

Name: Ravi K
Title: cool and amazing place
Review: I visited with my friends. its very cool place. its very good place for both kids and adults.excellent facilities and excellent food and ambience

Name: Akumar11
Title: Amazing place to visit with your family
Review: I visited with my family. The children had great fun in the wave pool. Will visit again. Better to go early to enjoy all the rides.

Name: Sudheer P
Title: Just for First timers
Review: This place is just for first timers, if you have visited any adventure parks you definitely feel bored. No matter what it is. Even the food available here is not good, avoid it if possible.

Name: kalyan4595
Title: good for once a year
Review: you will enjoy the place for the first time you visit and get bored easily..the prices are are a little high and food is definitely a matter of issue and the water world ....hmmm..ok for once.

Name: Nikhil Mede
Title: Mount Opera - Mountain Opera
Review: I have been visiting this place since 2007 and I still love this place because it's a good place to stay and have hangout with friends and family member's This place have lots of entertainment with loads of gaming zone with water games etc If u visit this every one feels the same as me have great holiday and enjoyment 😊😀

Name: Krishna D
Title: Short visit OK
Review: Not a great place to enjoy the whole day but a half day during summer can be planned at this place.  Maintenance not really at par as they named it water world.  The cost of the entry is too high with less facilities.  Can be maintained well with better staff otherwise this will be no more attraction in the future time.  I'm sure It has no charisma to get back it's visitors second time.  Krishna Duvvuri Abu Dhabi UAE

Name: Shruti M
Title: AVOID
Review: Not worth the money we spend on the tickets. 390/- entry+rides. Need to pay extra for the rides in the "water park". Poorly maintained park.     The water world is another story. None of us dared to enter the water.     The so called restaurants given in their website were nowhere in sight. Only one restaurant "Dolphin" was open. Unclean. No food available other than a non-veg biryani and it's vegetarian counterpart.      Toilets look bad enough from outside. The weather in Hyderabad and the poor quality of this park makes a horrible combination.      Though we intended to, there was no way could we spend a whole day there.       If you are expecting a world class theme park, you'll get disappointed.

Name: chands2u
Title: Nice place for Day outing
Review: We went a group of friends about 10 members. we enjoyed  a lot in swimming pool and the rides.Food was tasty.

Name: Lyndonjohn P
Title: Horrible place - badly maintained
Review: This is one of the worst place I've been to in hyderabad. I won't how they can even run a place like this. Do n't go by Internet pictures. Bad service,  DIRTY and total waste.Rides not safe or not working. Poor serviceBad foodDirty waterOverall bad idea to visit this place.

Name: Mohammed R
Title: Worst place
Review: men and women have to share same locker facility and to add on for changing there is only a curtain which divides mens wash room and ladies changing room. No room freshers are used all you can smell is toilet and I was worried about the hygiene.  It's a really bad place to visit and you might end up in hospital for cheap maintenance of waves and slides.

Name: DinakarKadali
Title: Theme park with bad maintenance
Review: Most of the facilities in the theme park are not functional. few rides which are operational are giant wheel, and Mary go round.Food served in the restaurant is also not upto standard. the same menu is served for dinner and lunch.

Name: Iknallev
Title: Horrible Experience
Review: It was a family re-union after so many years and We just wanted a nice family time out for 8 of us (that include kids, grand parents) and my nephew suggested this place as he heard about it about two years back from a friend of his. It only took 15 min into the park for us to realise what a terrible choice we had made.As we bought tickets, they started explaining about mechanical rides and water rides and we were like "dude, give us the map of the park". And they don't have a map. And there were no directions/signs that suggest us where to go. I guess, I may be expecting out of this poorly maintained place (and they call this resort... What a crap?). Out of the four allowed mechanical rides, one is not working (tea cup ride, I guess) and the others are in very bad shape with rusted seats and handles and garbage all around. One ride we had a little fun was "Columbus" but there was not much safety as the operator does not care if everyone on the board is properly secured before he can start and even worse was that he was on cell phone through out the two min ride.It was only 30 min Into the park and we were like "oh god, can you make our day any better?". Then after asking the operator what to do next, we were hesitatingly on our way to the water rides. On our way we noticed "Go Karts" with only one working yet strangely looking car with an extra fee (fee for this junk?) to ride on it and the ride track was seriously a joke. Blaming our selves for seeing such a pathetic place, we entered into this "Crocodile Tummy", the entrance to the water rides. The inside of this tummy was totally in a mess with stones and garbage every where. Don't care if it was going through some repair but the visitors deserve a well maintained place or at the least some directions/signs indicating repairs.The first ride that greeted was the boat ride pond that was full of water weeds and dirty water. Not sure how anyone can dare to think of doing a boat ride on it. Then there were two water slides that were so aged and rusted clearly seen from far. And they were not running. Out of kids curiosity, when we asked the operator as why they were not running... we were told that they would open these rides half-an-hour later as the other water ride (wave pool) is open. And he suggested us to go and enjoy the wave pool ride. Really? We cannot even choose where to go first and have to go with the crowd as they suggest? The roof of the shade shed around these rides and the boat ride was torn apart and looked very ugly.And the wave pool... The statue of the man above and water running out of his mid-riff reminded the kids to visit the rest rooms :). To enter the wave pool, nylon costumes are a must... and well we didn't bring for any of the kids. Kids were like we didn't enjoy any ride so far, let's enjoy at least this one. Then were told we could rent the nylon clothes for Rs. 100. Not bad, we said ... And guess what, the guy inside has a black garbage bag I front of him and any size we ask, he had to bury his inside to dig a matching swim suit and if it does not match what we ask then he has to put it back in and dig again. "Dumbo! Why cannot you arrange them on the hangers per size and that will your and our life easy?"... Crazy! Anyway, there were only about 10/15 suites and all of them are for teen to adult size... too big for our kids aged 8 & 10. Kids were disappointed for not able to make into this one at least. And that's it.... It was just about an hour into the park (please, don't call this a resort, that's insane to make people fall for this crap)... and we were out of here. Then we went to Lumbini Park, which was far far better than this dumb Mount Opera and the entrance fee was 20 times less. We should have read the reviews before we visited.Mount Opera is ridiculously ill-maintained place and it is a crude joke to call this a multi theme park and even a resort. It is such a shame on the management to collect high fees but ignore the basic maintenance, cleanliness and safety. Total waste of money and the time.

Name: adhitya8
Title: one of the best water world park to visit
Review: mount opera , the multi theme park for family , kids , all ages ...i visited with my whole family , (big family) ,pros : big swimming wave pool , go karting and other rides ,          summer is best time to visit ,family package is good cons : all places are not at same places  , you have to follow huge map for instructions ,              parking lot is ok , but entrance is far away from parking , so everything you have to follow map , so you have to walk a long to see each ride or any place while moving around inside the park ,

Name: Colonel Anupam Purohit
Title: Birth Day Bash Results in a Damp Squib!!!
Review: It was a wrong decision to choose Mount Opera to celebrate our Grand Daughter's  B'Day.By virtue of it's ambience,this place has a lot of potential to become one of the best Resorts in the vicinity of Hyderabad,but it needs a great deal of renovation,maintenance and better management.Owing to lack of patronage and very low occupancy,the Management is blatantly fleecing Visitors by indiscriminately high charges on Room Rent,F & B,Entry Fees to the Theme Park (which is already in a dilapidated state)and all other facilities,most of which are non functional.Do not venture since it will be a misadventure!!!!

Name: Mpoojitha
Title: outing with friends
Review: well i say i was not thattt satisfied with this well had fun in rain dancing but they dint put that great music better jalvihar or any other place

Name: sweetpulp2004
Title: Fun Place... For a day outing in Hyderabad
Review: I liked the place a lot, but I would agree to others that it seriously needs a renovation. Many rides are rusted and looks risky. But, when you have a good group of friends to enjoy, you can surely visit this place. It should be one of the cheapest outing.

Name: Usha K
Title: Stay away! avoid like plague
Review: Beware! Stay away from this place. I visited this place on Feb 24,2103. & We did not even to dare to get into water rides, the water was stinky & stagnant. The rides - you can get these at a local fair, nothing great. The rest/wash rooms are a nightmare. The go karting cars were so badly maintained, I felt as if I was driving an Auto. Ditto with bumping cars. There is NOTone single thing I liked about this place. It ruined the day for our family. Infact, we got out of that place in 3 hours and went to JalVihar from there(which was comparatively a great place). The management does not seem to care about the maintanence of this place. Avoid like plague!!

Name: PKrishnaV
Title: Excellent place to njoy with family/friends
Review: I went to this place with my team. It was very good place with lot of mechanical/water rides. There is a restaurant, rain dance and wave pool. wave pool is operated only in particular times for 30 mins. you can either take nylon pool dress or can rent one. The rent cost was ok. I didn't taste in the restaurant  but the prices look normal. Only thing is you have to walk a lot for rides and it can be exhausting to walk on a hot day. So make sure you go on a cloudy day nd u can njoy a lot :)

Name: sumanth1969
Title: cool place to enjoy
Review: Its a cool place to enjoy for both kids and adults. excellent facilities and excellent food and ambience. inshort great hospitality.

Name: Srinivas Kintali
Title: New year bash
Review: Five of our friends went to the resort on new year day.We went through Snap deal coupon which was quite beneficial(300 fee+ 39 snap deal)Food, mechanical rides, water rides, waves in water pool are part of this deal. Everything was quite amusing and entertaining.We enjoyed from 11.30 in the morning till 6.30 in the evening. The environment is quite good with lots of locations where you can take a lot of snaps. The mechanical rides with make sounds but you will still enjoy them overall.Go karting is not very economical(90 Rs for 3 small laps), other paid ride(dashing cars) has got only 3 cars (30 Rs for 3 mins) but you will enjoy it.There is a facility to avail swim clothes at a cost of 20 RS but you have an option to wear your own ones, provided they are nylon.Lockers are hardly available to store your valuable items, so take some small locks with you so that you  yourself can lock your cabinets there.Overall it was a great day for us. Hope this helps.

Name: anilkundra
Title: Mount Opera - Dirty, unclean and callous staff and unsafe
Review: I had taken 300 students to Mount Opera and right from dealing with the ticketing staff it was just a callous behaviour with no one bothering. The entrance is dirty, the entrance roof falling and except the security staff, none appears to be doing his job well. Every ride is in bad shape and the operators so rude with children, its un-imaginable.Since most rides are included in the entry fee, the operators feel they are giving free rides. We had to force them to start rides and their language foul and abusive. I doubt if the safety is monitored regularly ever by any one.Every place is neglected and dirty including the so called restuarent.The water games are so dirty with the entrance to them never having being swept for ages.Flooring in wave pool is broken and the water very unclean n dirty. The changing rooms do not exist and the clothing never cleaned n torn.I think the GHMC and tourism department should check its unclean facility and with draw its licence.

Name: Advisor_878
Title: Mount Opera Wastage of Money
Review: Mount Opera Wastage of Money So Costly in Ticket in 700 rs there is only 4 rides are free & after that we have to purchase tickets for others nd food is also not included in ticket & also lunch is so costly 500 rs for each Person Full Wastage of money I advise to people who read this Review that please do't waste ur money

Name: Dr.I.S.Prasad
Title: Serene
Review: I visited this place many times and stayed there over night on two occasions. It is located away from the city on the Hyderabad-Vijayawada highway on a hillock on the other side of Ramoji Film City.View is scenic and one should opt for the east facing rooms to enjoy the sunrise on the vast open land scape with negligible vegetation/construction.The main attraction in the theme park is the pool with sea wave simulation.

Name: ItzAlok
Title: Good options but...
Review: Went to Mount Opera with family. The place offers large amount of entertaining options for kids and adults. The water section is also very nice. My only concern is the large number of people that share the wave section, makes it a bit "unhygienic".All in all, apart from the small factor mentioned above, I think its OK place to spend time with family.

Name: MD123_12
Title: Terrible experience, awful & junk amusement park, please do not go and waste your money & holiday
Review: Myself and my family had a terrible experience at this place in October 2012. The place was not maintained at all, and stinks like a dump yard. 70 to 80% of the rides did not work, and whatever was working, was in a very bad shape. Swimming pool was full of algae and water appeared to be very dirty. We did not dare venture into the water. The place was full of mosquitoes, and we had skin rashes due to mosquito bites. The staff and manager were very rude when we complained about the lack of maintenance, and they were threatening us with dire consequences. We could not stay for more than one hour and returned thoroughly disappointed not only about the wasteful expenditure and also about a spoilt holiday. Please do not visit this place. There are sevral other better places in Hyderabad.Mohan

Name: SaradaSatapathy
Title: One of the best theme park
Review: I stayed 1 night with my family in a weekend and enjoyed to the fullest. My Kid enjoyed the most in the water front. Food was excellent. Service was littel bit late but manageable.

Name: Shivraaman
Title: Dirty Swimming pool , worst maintained swimming pool. green algae in pool
Review: Everything went wrong. From start to end . No food allowed . Trips and rides were not upto the mark. Water rides were worst. Green algae all over the swimming pool......

Name: Dhirajshah
Title: mount opera sucks. very bad expirience
Review: it was carelessly maintained, sleeping or missing staff, games waters rides 80% not working. unfriendly staff & dirty every where. too bad food to eat.. i spoiled a day of my life in this junk

Name: THEROAMINGSAM
Title: The Cool Picnic
Review: The Place is away from the city, lying in a serene area. The Resort is located on top of a mountain giving an overview of the City of Hyderabad. Night time the view from the Top is beautiful with all the glittering lights of Hyderabad City. To enjoy there is a water park with all types of games. If you want to spend some quite time with your spouse, you can sit on the green grass on the top, and enjoy. A lovely romantic place.

Name: HarikaHyderabad
Title: Not toooo worthy
Review: Not so satisfied and worthy. Entry-Rs.360 for adults which is not so worthy and the staff who was issuing tickets were completely irresponsible.Most of the rides are not exciting.Only water rides are gud but water was not clean.wave pool was completely dirty.No water in washrooms and in shower room.No conveyance facility & very bad maintainence

Name: krishnamentreddi
Title: Excellent place to relax
Review: This is a excellent theme park. It has enough rides to fill a day. Summer is the best time to visit this place. Kids would enjoy it alot especially. I think they have added more rides and watersports from last year. I would recommend to visit at least once. They also have resorts for interested people.

Name: Hisandy
Title: Pathetic maintenance
Review: I strongly advice people to avoid this water park.  The infrastructure is crumbling,  rusted iron everywhere.  Water is not at all hygenic.  Went with family and was disappointed to have chosen this place as weekend getaway.

Name: Poornima M
Title: Mount Opera with Friends
Review: Mount Opera is good, but it is little difficult to climb up the hill, Once we are up, you will definitely enjoy the rides, Rain dance and Go Karting.

Name: digitalldreamzz
Title: a dull theme park
Review: maintenance took a back stage at this resort. none of the rides are maintained properly. nothing new is added since starting of the resort, we can definitely not consider this as a visiting place.

Name: udaypilani
Title: Dont bother if you are looking for anything resembling a great park
Review: People create some monstrosity and pass it off as a theme park. The very essence is missing most of the time

Name: Nipun T
Title: A theme park
Review: Mount Opera, a Multii theme park as the name prescribes its on a Mount I have never visited any there park on a steep mountain.The Giant wheels, columbous and other rides enlarges your breathes as you are above the ground level by virtue.Well engineered on the mountain the only USP...No new rides and special attraction. If you never have been to theme park consider visiting it..... 30 Kms of excess travel.

Name: Rajesh1965
Title: Only Water Park Near Hyderabad
Review: Average quality rides and venue.Can look for updation of the quality of options offered to customers.

Name: nagasathya2000
Title: positives & negatives on Mount Opera
Review: It s to be not just as good as I heard about it. too strict rules and regulations just to cash. and no interesting rides. good for only shootings but if u go with family need to have fun for what you pay. it is indian mentlaity.  they are not allowing kids to play more in water hardly giving only 1 hour and not changing the water frequently also. If they are concerned more about the health of the visitors they should frequently change the water.

Name: satsuv
Title: Ripped off
Review: The water park is horrendous. Algae growing in the paddle pool. Most of the fixtures were rusted and had paint peeling off. Smell of sewage prevalent in the water park. Won't be surprised if we get sick after our visit. Children's park had many of the rides not working and broken. Restaurant was horrible. Worst was the smell of sewage totally present everywhere. Wave pool was a joke. AC in the room was not working right, Staff tried to be helpful - there is only so much you can do when the environment sucks. Lockers were in bad shape. Stray dogs roaming in the resort. One of them was taking a nap by the swimming pool.

Name: skmathur
Title: Good Hospitality
Review: It was a great experiance. Children had a fantastic time enjoyed the thrilling rides specially the bungy jumping, slambob and the merry cups. Water slides and the waves were exciting. Food was tasty and value for money. Overall experiance was Good.

Name: Vishal J
Title: Waste of money
Review: If you are fascinated with the pictures shown in web for mount opera then you are trapped. Mount Opera is worst place to visit. On the name of rides they will provide you only two or three rides. Inside the park buffet provided was taste less and unhygenic. Even there is no good sght seeing. So in conclusion to visit Mount Opera is total waste of money and time.

Name: vvvHyd
Title: AP's Worst theme park - Most Irritating
Review: It was horrible experience where we won't get any rides or service..no value for money.

Name: bjpnr02
Title: worst
Review: most irritating outing i experienced with is ....Mount OperaNo swimming pool...they say its only for cottages.....for water rides u need 2 change dress , where u will not get lockers. u will not get gud food, i found cockroach in the food.....answer for this was ......change the plate..........there was scene where i saw a family is being badly scold by security.......no one could help family......no security if u go wid family its truly unsafe.........its up to 2 go there n get bugged

Name: ArunJoshi
Title: Fantastic New year...
Review: I was there in the Mount Opera with my friends for the new year eve 2009, It was a warm welcome into the hotel, and all the formalities have been finished within 5 minutes, and soon we were in the room. We have been offered Very good wine on the arrival, and mind you, thats complimentary.There was a new year cake and some fruits also complimentary.The room was very clean and neat.and just come out of the room, you have nice mountain views outside.As we were there for the 31st Dec night, we had the opportunity of watching the entertainment programmes from 8pm till 2 am. They had variety of dance shows, mimicry, singing and DJ.The dinner was simply Delicious.and there were fire works at sharp 12 at night, for 15 minutes continuously which made it one to remember.The morning we have been offered the breakfast, Lunchwith many variety of dishes. which were very very tasty.We enjoyed the different kinds of Watersports, and small boat ride. there were some nice fancy things to buy.The staff is very friendly and professional.Everything was in good standards, and I all went perfect with my stay over there.Altogether,  I had a fabulous new year in Mount Opera...

Name: idiot_kissu
Title: Fabulous Hospitality and lots of fun
Review: This place is one of my favorite place in Hyderabad. We had lots of fun here when we went for the office outing. The place is kool and the day we went there was somewhat cloudy which made this place the coolest one.As soon as we reached there, we got welcome drink and light snacks and not only that we got sweat in the AC room after that bcoz we danced a lot as they arranged DJ there itself. Then we wanted to have some rest.. so we played Thambola there.. tickets and the game board was provided by them. That was really good however I lost 100 rs twice. After that we went for some Amusement rides which were small but good. Then we were tired and hungry. We had our lunch which was really tasty. After that we went for the water rides and enjoyed all the rides many times till evening. Now we were tired and wanted to have some rest. We had tea and some snacks near the pool and then we were rushed back to home as it was getting dark. Overall a very good fun we had that day. Regarding Entry tickets and other info, you can contact mount opera guys directly. The contact numbers can be found @http://www.mountopera.com/contact.htmlThe hospitality was very good and they arranged whatever we wanted according to our convenience. We had enough amusement rides and water rides.

Name: DipuKV
Title: Spiritual
Review: I could only visit this place from the outside since it was locked when I reached there late at night. However, the huge & imposing statue of Ramanujacharya (known as Statue of Equality) is breathtaking! The place has a peaceful and spiritual vibe as well!

Name: baburammarch25
Title: Art fan
Review: It can be felt by which having art in nature, art in mood, art in heart then can spend full day time.

Name: Vamsi Rugveda
Title: Visited temple name Divya Saketam
Review: Jai Srimannarayana Ramanuja Sambandha Devotees,This year is Sri Bhagavad Ramanuja 1000 year celebrations time, worldwide devotees come and join with Chinna Jeeyar Swami here. Great visit time!

Name: PROF.HARAGOPAL MATHSYARAJA
Title: Good place.
Review: Located Near international airport, this  Spiritual place is famous for Upcoming   installation SRI RAMANUJA CHARYA  s  high statue .It is the place of SRI CHINNA JEEYAR SWAMY.

Name: Vamsi Rugveda
Title: Attractive place for all
Review: I visited here in this month first week of November! Great place. A huge statue coming up here. That is very nice to see !!!!

Name: vvamsh
Title: Chinnajeeyarswami blessings showering here, go, take your bath in that showers.
Review: Divya Saketam is a beautiful temple near RGIA Airport. friendly located by google maps :) it shows panoramas all type of photos! Very divine place with, sometimes Swamiji also visit temple and give darsan to devotees.Jai Srimannarayana!

Name: Krishna1970
Title: Best place for spirituality
Review: Divya Saketam is situated 20 Kms from shamshabad airport in Muchinthal, Palmakul.  It is a divine & sacred place developed  by Jiyar swamy. The temple consists of there floors and the main temple is Sri Kodanda Rama swamy , in second floor Sri Ranganatha swamy and in third level Sri Maha Vishnu. We had a Great experience to listen Veda mantra chants in such a beautiful environment.  Devotees can  witness the tradition and culture of Hindu dharma. A very big statue of Sri Ramanuja is going to install.         Jai srimannarayana...

Name: Ganeshbabu C
Title: divine fragrance
Review: Paid a visit to divya saketham on sunday for the first time.It`s really a place with divine fragrance.sri sri sri china zeeyar swami varu gave holy darshan after the pooza.He seems to be a walking narayana avatara and with sweet smiles blessed every visitor to the ashram.Swamizi gave prasadam to all the devotees and we attended mantra pushpam at the main temple also.Later we took lunch at the ashram dining hall.The whole atmosphere is with divinity and spiritual fragrance.A memorable trip to divya saketham near hyderabd.     ganeshbabu chebolu

Name: Medagam Praveen
Title: Temple of Lord Vishnu
Review: Divya Saketham is the temple of Sri Vaishnava Sampradayam. Lord Vishnu exists in this temple in three various forms. Sri Paramapadanatha Perumal, Sri Ranganatha Perumal and Sitha Lakshmana sametha Kodanda Ramaswamy. The temple consists of three floors with the lords stated above from top to bottom respectively. This is one of the temples under Jeeyar educational trust. You will know more about Sri Vaishnava sect after visiting this place.

Name: vvamsh
Title: Very nice place
Review: Super. we enjoyed a lot. Very nice constructed temple. close to airportGuys. you should visit this temple, take blessings from priests. it's Dhanurmasam, Very divine month for us.

Name: Azra
Title: Amazing experience
Review: The Distance Education wing of Osmania University has very helpful & cooperative staff. Thanks to them I got my TC & Bonafide  within a day.

Name: GLOBALSEAS
Title: osmania
Review: osmania university is oldest and best university to study all courses ..too big campus ..nice place to pursue studies.

Name: Sena007
Title: One of the good and Old university in South indian state of telangana, hyderabad.
Review: Osmania university which was founded by nizams of hyderabad for educational purposes for the state of former hyd state with urdu medium. Now this prestigeous university has offered all types of course in fileds like engineering, arts,science etc., it is one of the oldest university in whole South india.This university located in a lush green area with peacefull parks.placements in this university are quite good but when we compare with iiiT, iiT, ISB ,UOH hyderabad ou university has to catch up in placements because it's is located in one of the IT city of india called hyderabad as cyberabad where opportunity to get job in IT& ITes is pretty enough.

Name: Trending T
Title: old but gold
Review: thus is one of the oldest universities and still it tops the city in education and it has its separate fan base.

Name: Dilip kumar
Title: Must visit place
Review: This is the biggest university in telangana and has its own importance.This place also got great places to have your studies.

Name: Usha65
Title: One of the oldest place of learning
Review: A beautiful place with huge old buildings having wonderful architecture and a great place for learning every subject on earth. A quick ride through will provide good insight of this great University.

Name: SRIKAKOLAPU
Title: oldest univerisity
Review: Its one of India's oldest university and has produced many fantastic people.Got into controversies in the recent days but quality of education is really good

Name: kheblekar
Title: Great Universty campus
Review: I was surprised to see the vast campus with a huge spread of department s worth seeing and very well maintained.Worth visiting during your stay in Secunderabad

Name: AnjanManda
Title: Education Hub
Review: One of the reputed and old university founded in 1918.It is famous as largest university system in India offering engineering,law,management,arts,science and various courses.It is spread over 1600 acres with vast buildings of Nizam era.The campus has lot of greenary and is  favorite destination of morning walkers.This is not a tourist attraction.

Name: Daniel T
Title: Educational hub with over 100 years of history
Review: Its the famous educational hub in Hyderabad. Famous across India for its 100+ years of history.Within the University campus there is Engineering College, Arts college, Law college and many other courses.Campus has wonderful public parks where people spend time.

Name: TADAKAMADLA A
Title: Educational Hub
Review: The university is famous for studies and the quality of education is very good. The university is located in large area and this is good place to study. The library is very good.

Name: Gugan_Ilango
Title: Osmania University is a beautiful building
Review: Osmania University at Secunderabad have some nice building and is one of the most famous college in town.

Name: tangbot1111
Title: one of the oldest university
Review: osmania university has a history of 100 years. it has it own way of education. i am proud to be  part of this university

Name: PROF.HARAGOPAL MATHSYARAJA
Title: Worth Visiting.
Review: Do not miss to see this university Arts college main building famous for its architecture,built by NIZAMs of Hyderabad. 100 year old.Can see the Library where rare books and manuscripts are available.I studied here in the campus science college 1967-69 (Masters)

Name: Sukhbir K
Title: Amazing trail for a nice long run!
Review: Well, consider this review from a runner's perspective only! I happened to go to OU for a Sunday long run with my group and I swear that was one of my best running routes so far! It has an amazing trail of about 15 km to offer for a long run. The greenery gives you more and more strength to keep running, though i could manage only 15km that day, the experience and the feeling is long lasting!If you go to OU, make sure you run that trail..or at least a walk. You will not regret it.

Name: nagesh1955
Title: visit of osmania
Review: Very big university in hyderabad, we can enjoy lot with nature, 70-80 % of the place is covered with trees.

Name: shivaraikod
Title: Vast area and historical
Review: I had been in Hyd for over a decade and this was my 1st visit which is spread over vast area and one of the old and historical universities of hyderabad

Name: BRKanth
Title: Oldest university in Telangana
Review: Most of the Hyderabadi's will study in this university along with different affiliated collages. One of the best universities in India.

Name: V V S Ganesh N
Title: Education Den
Review: Osmania University in Hyderabd isa Den for Education.Osmania University is one of the biggest and oldest universities in india which is having numerous courses of variuos dispiplines ranging from science to commerce and fine arts as well.

Name: EmmanuelMurray
Title: Iconic
Review: The Osmania University Campus is living history. The wonderful and expansive campus and greenery take you back in time. The buildings are heritage structures that are well preserved. Overall a nice place, but would not in my view qualify as tourist attraction.

Name: koteswararao
Title: old  nizam famous  university
Review: this  old big university  in telangana state  with big  campos with  various dept courses    in and out countries students  are in the university

Name: Shibuvk
Title: Greenary mixed with play atmosphere
Review: I have not studied here but visit here morning and evening for physical activities.have been so familiar with these place.many photogenic spots are here.if you are interested in going to peaceful place for playing,cycling etc,it's the right place for u.it also have a landscape garden,university library and many more to explore

Name: Ravi K
Title: Green university
Review: I am not studied here. if i want to go to vidyanagar from tarnaka i used this way. its very grean. its a lovely compus. its a oldest university

Name: Milad M
Title: My lovely university
Review: As I was studying in this university I loved it. I can't say anything more. Just lovely campus, lovely staff and lovely buildings.

Name: MyOpinonsonhyderabad
Title: Greenery university
Review: Built in the Nizam eraOne of the 3rd oldest university in southern India Early morning walks in the University is pretty popular.Nice huge campus . Lots of greenery around . Cool place The main library was established in 1918 along with the UniversityNew digital library also super Biggest ground for sports personsI am sure that its give good relaxation Entry is freeGood architectural design of arts college Relay its good felling for architectural lovers We can good landscape

Name: Tapas_Baripada
Title: Very nice campus
Review: We have been visiting its campus for the last so many years but were not aware of a trekking like path near the Institute of Public Enterprises. From that circle you can go to the Deer Park that has been abandoned long back. If you are lucky you can see a few peacocks roaming around. There are different paths that you can explore and you can really enjoy your morning or evening walk.

Name: Praveen K
Title: Historic Osmania university
Review: Osmania university is a old university setup by the nizams of hyderabad. The Arts college is a huge building which is artistically built. There is a huge park within the campus. it offers a pleasant walk in the university campus.

Name: Rams R
Title: Morning
Review: Morning walk atmosphere good.good Singht seeing,with my frinds I go there for morning walk,and lot of people are come there to morning walk and

Name: Amazing_Neo
Title: Huge campus with many facilities.
Review: The University has a huge campus with loads of facilities. Can spend loads of time in the campus and has become famous with all the Telangana Andhra split happenings. Do visit the area and can spend an hour checking out the structures and the gardens.

Name: Karan K
Title: Attraction ???? NOT Really ..
Review: its very strange to find this place listed as an attraction, this is just a normal university with normal ppl in fact very recently this place was the center of attraction as it as filled with riots and mob fights due to the agitation during the state partition.!! so there goes the attraction part ;) so there isnt any reason what so ever to consider this place as an attraction or anything close to it wat so ever...no likes abt this  place what so ever

Name: UdhayakumarG
Title: Not for visitors
Review: It is a good University but in tourist perspective, there is nothing for tourists. We can see some university buildings and some trees. There is no reason for the people coming from outside to visit this place, unless you are going to study.

Name: SPillai
Title: A modern mall for expensive shopping
Review: A wide variety of shops - can spend one full day. Most of the prominent brands available. Food options are not of the widwst variety.

Name: Konganapally Laasya
Title: My experience of Sarath city mall
Review: Sarath city mall is the best none of the malls have this kind of facilities I just happen to like the atmosphere and everything At first I stepped into this mall I saw Starbucks me and my cousin started to ask our parents weather we can go and they said yes after that me and my cousins mothers want to go shopping while my uncle took me and my cousins to the gaming zone and first we went to pp karting and it was fun then my uncle took us to tridone and it was fun to later my father join us then we went to the food court and the food was delicious 😋 So my experience was great but I couldn’t see more of that mall hopefully you explore each and every corner of that mall Thank you

Name: Cilaveni A
Title: worest security
Review: worest Helpdesk support no one answered the call when i tried reaching to 040-68218333.i lost my Helmet and security is so careless and they don't even try to look into cameras. worest experience & careless security. if you people don't answer the call why you gave that number to me? make sure to treat customers in a good way.

Name: PKB
Title: Best Mall in Hyderabad
Review: Always love to come back this mall in weekend. Great atmosphere. Many options. One of the huge Mall I ever seen. Try  Food court over there. Superb 👌

Name: Adithya
Title: Excellence
Review: Excellent Items very good,may this should  continue  very good explanation about anything well  👍👍 good

Name: beyondtravel
Title: Back in business
Review: The lockdown seems to have halted bustling city for almost 4 months, but it was great to be back at sarath city mall. Most of shops are open however the crowd is mostly on weekends. With amb cinemas still not functional, it may take some time to get back to new normal. Most of food court restro are back to normal with limited option

Name: PKB
Title: Lovely Place
Review: It was great experience with family in Sarat City Mall, i love kids zone..everything separate. AMB Movie awesome. My kid enjoyed a lot

Name: Arunkumar
Title: Good place for shopping and movies
Review: India's largest capital mall with Wide variety of outlets .I love the screen in this mall(Amb cinema's). Many more things to do apart from shopping,and food court there is also funzone for kids...

Name: beyondtravel
Title: Towards being best
Review: A best in making, one of the biggest mall in region, with ample parking, 2 vivid food court, name it have it shopping options. Only issue is lack of signages and support at mall

Name: Lavanya S
Title: Good experience terrible staff
Review: I took my kids to Sarath City Mall after hearing great things about it. This review is largely about our experience in the 4th floor gaming area. I am writing this review so that parents are cautious to look out themselves for their kids safety and to make management aware of how poorly trained the staff is. I work in customer service and it really baffled me why anyone would be paid money for such poor performance at work. This is what happened.We reached the 4th floor gaming area at around 2 pm on a weekday. It was not crowded at all except for a large group of college kids in some college t shirts. I assumed they were there on some kind of college sponsored visit and didn't think much. The games asked for a card and I couldn't see where I could swipe my debit card. I looked around for staff but only saw the aforementioned college group chatting and playing some of the games. For the water ride, there wasn't even any staff managing it. I told my kids to stay and went walking around to see who could help us. I was shocked to find out that these 'college kids in uniform' were the staff!!To me they had appeared like other customers. Two girls were sitting on some rides and even when we went and stood near them for our turn they did not get off. I asked one of them why aren't they helping us. I also asked to speak to a manager. The manager just apologized. After I expressed my disappointment and told him I would write a review was when a staff member came to help my kids. See second picture.In an age when customer staff is competing with each other to win customers, I found this attitude shocking. Why aren't these kids trained? What are they getting paid for? Except this experience, we really enjoyed the food in the food court and the exceptional service in all the other stores we went to. There is a good bouncy house too on the lower or first level that my kids liked. Advice to families: Go for the rides and watch out yourself for your kids safety. Ask questions. Ensure your kids are safely buckled in. Don't expect to get any help from staff.

Name: chandrasekhar g
Title: Awesome Mall in Hyderabad
Review: One of the biggest mall in hyderabad.Recently visited for shopping.Every time its full of crowd and on weekends huge crowd.Movies,shopping,restraunts,ice cream shops, spar market all available at one place.Free parking.

Name: JYach
Title: Miserable!
Review: I am so sorry ..Usually my reviews are upbeat and pleasantHere is a rare exception...- poor welcome- poorer still security engagement- shabby smelly male bathrooms- poor internal signage to navigate a complicated and confusing mall- so many vacancies- in my view, a mall in search of a strategic letting plan!Sadly, a shadow of what it could be!

Name: Dil
Title: SARATH CITY CAPITAL MALL
Review: The only mall in Hyderabad that's designed from a user's point of view. No parking hassles, no ticket meters with people who's only job is to push a button. Escalators going up and down are not spread out on the opposite sides of a floor. Well segmented shopping areas and the best of all? Two food courts. One at the top floor and one at the ground floor. Everything is super convenient. Easily the best mall in Hyderabad.

Name: Lokesh1981
Title: Iconic mall of Hyderabad
Review: It is Centrally located, closer to Hitech city, you can say probably heart of Hitech Hyderabad, full of young crowds, Situated in Busy locality, iconic landmark and superb attractive exteriors, very big probably biggest among all malls of Hyderabad,Presently free parking facility, variety of stores and having multiplex, one full floor is reserved for gaming zone, full masti place for kids, Good food zone, too attraction is one Turkish outlet and it’s famous Baklawa !!!!!! Sweet dish, simply yummy ....

Name: Prasad B
Title: Excellent service and hospitality!!
Review: Only mall with two food courts and majestic design, It really needs no further explanation while describing about its ambiance.

Name: Srinivas S
Title: Bigger than others
Review: Probably bigger than other malls in Hyderabad, also located at a prime area. You have two food courts, big cinema and needless to say shopping

Name: Sarath City Capital Mall
Title: Brilliant of what's ready so far
Review:
Thanks for your good review. 
Keep visiting the mall.

Name: beyondtravel
Review:
Thanks for your good review. 
Keep visiting the mall.

Name: Sarath City Capital Mall
Review: The mall is yet to open fully but what's ready looks exceptional and a promising upcoming mall. Nice outlets, grand washrooms and spacious parking. My next hub

Thanks for the review.
keep visiting the mall.

Thanks for the review.
keep visiting the mall.

Name: jainms
Title: Water sports
Review: this water sport is good and neatly maintained the water quality, day outing with food and games enjoyed a lot.

Name: LostMySelfTraveling
Title: Kids love to dance in rain and mini slide
Review: It's an awesome place for those who love to dance in the rain and music. Wonderful music. Kids really love the mini slides as it is lot of fun. My kid didn't want to come out of the shower and kept on sliding. It's small and safe for kids. Overall its a great experience for kids 🧒

Name: SRIKAKOLAPU
Title: enjoyable
Review: Its enjoyable over here with DJ and rain dance that is available.Mini slides to enjoy for kids and adults.We have outdoor games as well to play and provision to play indoor games as well

Name: idea614354
Title: musty time
Review: a best time spending time for kids in holidays they will enjoy water rides and mechanical rides. pools also available.

Name: mail2mathews96
Title: Leo Splash
Review: Leo Splash nice place to enjoy the waterpark if we book in group we get in good discounted rate the park is well maintained as well good to enjoy

Name: shivaraikod
Title: Good place to hand out
Review: The place is neat and clean and I along with my colleagues had a wonderful time by splashing out in water all the time.

Name: TADAKAMADLA A
Title: Good Picnic Spot
Review: Leonia is very good place for weekend enjoyment with friends and family. The pool in the resort is very big and maintained neatly.

Name: Sukanya D
Title: Nice water park.
Review: An awesome place for a group of people. The water park is well maintained. There are few rides. I went there wid my colleagues and enjoyed a lot.

Name: Prasad
Title: Enjoyed the place
Review: We have gone to leonia resorts on a Business trip. The place was clean and good. For parties and functions it is a good place. Pool side and gaming movies night parties everything is good here.Enjoyed a lot with coligues.

Name: BRKanth
Title: Well Maintained
Review: Best place for water sports. Pool is well maintained and high end resort. Not much crowded as well...

Name: renu_73
Title: A high end boutique resort.
Review: Went there with the kids for the weekend.It is a high end resort with some exciting stuff for the young crowd.Has a few pools so is not overcrowded.Excellent food,a restaurant with tables in the water where you feet are immersed in water a little above the ankle where you enjoy a peaceful dinner.The crowd is majorly those who come to spend the day, so the evenings are not very crowded and is peaceful.

Name: Sisdahl
Title: Nice, and not crowded
Review: Fair price, clean service and food, and orderly conduct, not like the overcrowded other parks.Remember sunscreen, not availeble.

Name: BharatKumarKondru
Title: Well maintained swimming pool
Review: Very well maintained swimming pool with fun games. Very helpful staff. Well organised activities for kids.

Name: SuvodipMoitra
Title: Family Fun
Review: Went to this place over the weekend to stay at Leonia resort and take a fun bath at the Leo splash. Good for family on a sunny day.

Name: sainarani007
Title: Visit to Lenonia
Review: It is an excellent place to spend and enjoy with family.The Swimming pool is very big and comfortable.It is perfect pool for family. We really had a great time with my family and children.Children enjoyed water slides.If i get time, I will visit again with my family to this perfect atmosphere.

Name: PSRENTERPRISES
Title: lot of enjoyment
Review: nice place to visit.and gameing,movies restarents and viewing is very good.good service provided very good

Name: Sravan Vadde
Title: nice resort
Review: it was drizzling through the day when i was there. the pool is big and it was fun as not many people were there. there were two water slides. other activities were not that fun as the grounds were wet. the lunch buffet was okay with a decent spread.

Name: Anil
Title: not as much as expected though chill n enjoy
Review: well the place is very big spread across entire area with a multiplex in . some water sports , slides but doesn't add charm to it , but interior and maintenance of flora fauna is good and complete good resort to relax . few slides and a swimming pool with rain dance. it was my first visit but it don't charm me . still you can go for it and enjoy with friends

Name: akant k
Title: fun place
