Review: Located inside the Leonia Holistic Destination in Hyderabad, Leo splash is one of India's most popular water theme parks. Assuring people oodles of fun and frolic, this water park attracts visitors from all corners of the state and beyond.

Name: Praveen K
Title: Good resort on outskirts of Hyderabad
Review: a good resort on teh outskirts of hyderabad. a place where a family can relax for a holiday for a day or 2. has entertainment for every age group. Kids love this place.

Name: seedhunter
Title: Good but bit pricy
Review: Located in the Leonia Resort, Leo space has many water sports and activities, which kids and adult both can enjoy. You have to spend >1000 for fetching swim costumes as it nit available on the rent. better to carry yours. maintenance needs to be addressed. Bit away from the city, approx. takes >1 hr drive from Hussainsagar lake.

Name: vijaykrishna1984
Title: good getaway for weekend in hyderabad
Review: Leonia is a very good resort close to Secunderabad . it would be around 40 min drive from Secunderabad. this is one of the best resorts in hyderabad . it has many day actives and lot of sport and games . they have good swimming pool and bars and restaurants . in the lagoon rooms they have private swimming pools and the food is very good . they have a small surfing pool which is fun to try . they even have a spa here . over all i would rate this place 5 of 5 . really like it . good place for a weekend getaway from the city .

Name: Bhushan Sabnis
Title: nice for a day trip
Review: couple of slides, rain dance and big pool... many other activities like bungee jumping for kids. Worth spending time with family and friends for a day!

Name: sanjay v
Title: Was best but turned to horrible
Review: This was the best resort with all amenities and water sports and pool. Management turned this all into a hell where now they just eat up money and never bother about guest's convenience. It was a favorite weekend gateway for corporate, family and other groups but because they are getting good numbers of incomers, services have gone worst now. Food which was really nice before 2013, has gone worst now. Nobody will tell you where to go and their outdoor games are always without gears. Overall this is once nice but now worst place. Management is still sleeping and they never care about you. The person you are dealing before visit may be switching his phone off when you visit. What the hell will you do then?????Visit on your risk

Name: chinna_79
Title: Not price worthy
Review: there will no to guide to tell where to go and what to do. charges 1300 bucks for no reason, we have to buy swim wear(no rental) for about 410+ bucks(extra), in order to get into the pool. if u really want swimming pool and water rides there are very good other places in hyderabad you can visit.

Name: Rajni A
Title: Best place to hang on on weekends
Review: I would be very proud to say that hyderabad is bestowed with so many places worth visit.From religious to historical , From fun to food.....I just love hyderabad. Leonia holistic destination is one of the resorts where one can enjoy a full weekend with their kids splashing in the basking waters.Exellent place..

Name: Krishna Sandeep Siram
Title: Reflection of Hyderabad's Heritage
Review: This tower is very Old and this is near to secunderabad Railway station and its its not a must visit place but we can look at it while passing through the way.Its beauty can be witnessed at Night.

Name: NIL_MODI
Title: have a hlance if passing by
Review: obviously this clock tower is in Secunderabad and near to railway station. historical structure. we had just a glance when we were passing by.

Name: Tarun
Title: Secunderabad Clock Tower
Review: It is situated in Secunderabad and very near to Secunderabad Railway Station. It is in the heart of Secunderabad. As per data available online the construction of it has started in 1860. It is maintained by GHMC. You must glance it when you visit Secunderabad Railway Station.

Name: LostMySelfTraveling
Title: can't forget this clock tower
Review: Can't forget this place,as I was a regular visitor to this place when I was learning computers. It is close to Navketan complex.Its not a great monument but useful for many people in those days where very few people used to have mobile phones. Still remember getting down at the tower from a running bus.

Name: PAGADALA MANJU
Title: Clock tower
Review: This tower is very old and beautiful attraction in the center of the city.It's in the the center of city by connecting for different places

Name: OMKAR PAGADALA
Title: Clock Tower
Review: As it is named as clock tower because a big clock is placed in an big pillar. And it is located in the centre of the road.

Name: amitthecreator
Title: Secunderabad Clock Tower
Review: This tower is on SD road, nearby railway station. Nothing much to do about this, as this is a pretty old one. Clock is, however, working. Nearby areas you can hang around for shopping.Visited February 2015.

Name: jainms
Title: Good one
Review: It's in Secunderabad near paradise junction, Old monument and historical place to visit those who travel Hyderabad for visiting can include this as one of place.

Name: BRKanth
Title: Old monument
Review: This is one of the oldest monument which I have been seeing since childhood. Anyone going towards secbad, could see this clock tower.

Name: SRIKAKOLAPU
Title: heritage place
Review: This is build almost 2 centuries back and considered by UNO as cultural heritage site and good to see these heritage places

Name: Mukta2016
Title: Nice Clock Tower
Review: The Secunderabad Clock tower was built during the colonial times and is presently only a landmark here. We just passed by it when driving by and found it very aesthetic in appearance.

Name: TravellingReddy
Title: A symbol of British Cantonment near Secunderabad junction
Review: This is now a traffic island and can be easily missed. It carries significance of being made to signify the start of cantonment and is in mid of a well maintained park surrounded by trees. Probably can be seen while encircling it

Name: idea614354
Title: clock tower
Review: very old historical clock tower this is. constructd in secunderabad. long back of many years for public use.

Name: SURESH babu
Title: Good
Review: We are very good and happy to see the clock tower in Hyderabad.one of my favorite place I could see again and again

Title: Just a landmark now
Review: Sec'bad clock tower is now well known as a landmark for directions  :) As we zoom past this place, one hardly notices the architecture design and its past importance. It just stands at the junction. Nothing much to see here, just a one-time visit that too driving around this place would do.

Name: Dilip kumar
Title: just visit
Review: this place will be visited by everyone whoever goes to secunderabad.This place is located at the junction to paradise.

Name: deepa v
Title: Landmark
Review: It's a landmark in Secunderabad. Visited or rather passed by it many many times.Near to the railway station.

Name: chandrasekhar g

Review: Very near to secunderabad station.Hospitals are available near to clock tower.RTC bus facility is also available.

Name: TravelingGypsy0508

Review: Good place to visit once. This structure is of historical significance in Secunderabad. Mostly crowded. Take your camera along and click pictures of the tower and surrounding garden.

Name: Karthik Dasu
Title: Decent place
Review: It is decent place to visit in the city of Hyderabad.The place is located very near to the railway station.

Name: Trending T
Title: Visited almost 500-600 times
Review: This place will be visited by everyone and it is nearer to secunderabad. This place is visited by many people and will be crowded by many people everytime.

Name: Devaa
Title: A journey to colonial era!!!
Review: You can never miss this structure in the heart of Secundrabad if you are travelling to and from the station. This beautiful tower is now surrounded by a garden and it would be something to admire more if you are travelling by Metro in a few months time.

Name: AnjanManda
Title: Not a must see
Review: It is a famous land mark of Secunderabad. It is one of the oldest clock tower inaugurated in the year 1897.Started in 10 acres of land ,the park size is reduced drastically due to road widening. A martyr memorial is  established in the park.It is just a drive around spot nothing much to see.

Name: jmodi1981
Title: Good Tower
Review: This is very good tower for old remembrance at the place. you can see the place once visiting the near by place.

Name: P M
Title: Amazing clock
Review: Such an amazing tower clock I visited that with freinds actually that time we are passing from that place and we got stuck in traffic that time, everyone noticed that clock so seriously like we are looking back to back to that clock and what was the time, what was the time. We noticed that older time how that clock was  made and how much space that clock has covered bla bla..so it is one of the best thing in Secunderabad.

Name: Ravindra V
Title: Oldest landmark
Review: This is one of the oldest and historical landmark in the twin city of Secunderabad. The clock always shows correct time.

Name: Abhilash K
Title: Nice
Review: It is very nice place and a large tower with the clock and other great monument with lot of seen and many things

Name: Anamika K
Title: A good historical building to visit
Review: Clock tower is one of the important sightseeing place in Hyderabad. Good to see these place here because it has some attracting power so many people are visiting these place.

Name: shivamsmh
Title: Great
Review: Standing all alone to symbolize the futility of our life and remind that time goes on. This can be noticed easily and is a piece of architecture.

Name: Sam S
Title: The Clock on a tower in Secunderabad!
Review: I have worked for Tulip Telecom Co. Ltd., at its branch office in Navketan Towers located opposite to the clock tower. It was a wonderful experience to peep out during the tea breaks. The road on the eastern side goes to Uppal whereas west houses the Yashoda Hospital. The parade grounds can be reached easily just by crossing the Sardar Patel road. The southern side of the road from the tower goes to the Secunderabad railway station. There are a couple of Churches nearby it built in the British-Nizam era. On the west side of the road, there is Kamat Hotel, Post Office crossing, petrol pumps, cloth shops. Nearby Chenoy trade centre, regimental bazaar route takes you to the famous biryani serving Paradise hotel, Sindhi hotel or take a left to go to the tank bund.

Name: hingarajiya s
Title: A landmark is located around the circle
Review: The Secunderabad Clock Tower is located in a small garden located in a busy intersection. located just a kilometer away from secunderabad railway station, constructed by British Governor General, the clock still working.

Name: naiduks24
Title: Ideally located around the circle
Review: Located just a kilometer away from secunderabad railway station, constructed by erstwhile British Governor General, the clock still working, amazing, a memorable.

Name: chasteboy
Title: Faded Glory!!
Review: This is a very famous monument which has been neglected for many years. It's one of the iconic symbols which needs to be restored and highlighted.

Name: Manish K
Title: A landmark, but not well-maintained
Review: The Secunderabad Clock Tower is located in a small garden located in a busy intersection. A landmark dating back to the British times, this is today surrounded by hawkers and is not in too good a condition. One can see it from a distance, but need not necessarily take out time to go to it.

Name: Siva G
Title: For movie
Review: Nice and historic place located in secunderabad and fewmetres away from secunderabad railway station

Name: Arvind Kumar Yerram
Title: Losing its historical charm
Review: This is a historical structure constructed well before India got its independence. This place no longer needs seperate time as every visit of Secunderabad would be incomplete without this.  This is now left on the road with no attention being given to it or its importance.  Slum dwellers and rag pickers frequent this place in the evening and nights.I wonder if this is the same place which has left us with wonderful memories since my childhood.  Amidst the never stopping traffic, this historical monument is slowly losing its charm.  The park which used to surround it and the herbs and flowers are long gone.

Name: venkatakarthik
Title: Initially i didn't know that this is a historic place
Review: i came across this on my way to Secunderabad railway station and initially, i thought it was just a clock tower and nothing more but later I learnt that this was a historic place not that old but is used as a landmark there.Nothing fancy here it is just a clock tower

Name: Mohammed Sohail Ahmed
Title: Secunderabad's identity
Review: It's been here for a long period and in same condition. Now the structure is in danger due to pollution as it's in the middle of heavy traffic road.

Name: sandeep g
Title: clock tower
Review: it more of a spot than a tourist spot , don't plan exclusive to visit only this place . just a historic place

Name: Ravikanthvadamala
Title: Old Structure
Review: It is located near to Secundrabad Railway Station. We pass through this tower once in a month at least. There is a small part also attached to it.

Name: Jimmy B
Title: Interesting for few minutes
Review: Near the lake and the buddha, accessible by cab only, the clock tower has a very good old style.It seems very well preserved but only acessible from outside where there is a small park.You will need 10minutes, not more.

Name: Aravind M
Title: The Landmark of Secunderabad
Review: Built and functional since the times of Nizams, this iconic tower, is at the heart of the city "Secunderabad.". It's clock is well maintained and has never been out of sync. During special occasions like the state formation day, the lighting and other decorations that are done, make this tower even ore attractive.

Name: aviditor
Title: Icon of Secunderabad
Review: Great build by the Britishers. Icon of Secunderabad. No place for you to stand and admire, As it is fenced on all sides and the main road surrounds the Clock Tower, with lot of traffic all the time.

Name: renu_73
Title: A landmark of hyderabad/secunderabad
Review: A monument and landmark very well known around Hyderabad/Secunderabad.Part of the old world charm in the city.

Name: zap r
Title: Not a must visit site
Review: 1.  This is one of the oldest clock towers of the city.2.  Right in the middle of the junction.3.  The clock hardly works, needs maintenance4.  Very bust street, crowded.5.  Go, only if you are around secunderabad area.6. Not a fun place, the government cldve done a great job with it, but unfortunatly its just left unnoticed.

Electricity bill payment office is situated  which is an obnoxious location for an office.  Shifting out is ideal, poor feeding is done by ISKON @Rs 5/- every lunch collected byGHMC .

Name: Niroop P
Title: Gr8 ancient architecture
Review: A firman issued by Nizam Sikandar Jah established the city of Secunderabad after his name in 1806. [2] To honour the progress achieved by the British officers stationed atSecunderabad Cantonment in Hyderabad , the erstwhile British government established 10 acres (4.0 ha) of land for this purpose in 1860.[3] A 120-ft high clock tower was constructed in a park of 2.5 acres (1.0 ha) in 1896. [1] The tower was inaugurated by Resident Sir Trevor John Chichele Plowden on 1 February 1897. The clock on the tower was donated by Dewan Bahadur Seth Lachmi Narayan Ramgopal, a businessman. [2]In 2003, the tower was placed on a demolition list drawn up by the Municipal Corporation of Hyderabad to accommodate the increasing traffic. A senior official at this civic agency of the Government of Andhra Pradesh said that they were trying their best not to demolish this structure. [4] In 2006, the park housing the tower was chosen for renovation by the same agency. Carried out at a cost of ₹ 10 million (US$150,000), the park's size was reduced to widen the roads. In addition, the tower was renovated, the park was landscaped with lawns and hedges, and a waterfall was installed. The renovation was completed in 2005, and the park was inaugurated by then Chief Minister of Andhra Pradesh Y. S. Rajasekhara Reddy in 2006. [1][5] A martyr's memorial was also established inside the park in memory of the first police firing in 1969 during a separateTelangana agitation .[6] Within a year after this, two of the tower's four clocks experienced technical problems and stopped working. [3]The tower was declared a heritage structure in the twin cities of Hyderabad - Secunderabad.[3] It was as a result of the efforts put by the civic agency at sites like this tower that the proposal to seek UNESCO Heritage status for Hyderabad was revived. [7]In 2006, the 200-year celebrations of the formation of Secunderabad were organised by the Government of Andhra Pradesh. The clock tower was chosen as the subject of the logo, which was designed by a local firm. [8] The outline of the Clock Tower was first conceived by the students of a city architectural college. [9] A short cinema film of 9 minutes, 30 seconds by director Mani Shankar was released as a part of this celebration. The film, which relates the history of the city, features the clock tower in it.[10]The park housing the tower also served as a venue for promoting various citizen-centric events such as a children's film festival, [11] awareness programs among others. [12]

Name: SMahesh3670
Title: A plain old clock tower that is iconic to Secunderabad
Review: Other than it being over 100 years old, the tower per se has limited architectural intricacies or designs. It was originally part of a large park - but the park is long gone and it is now a small trimmed park in the middle of a big traffic zone. The best way is view it to drive past it - very limited space to walk around, given the vehicular and pedestrian movement around the place

The tower was inaugurated by Resident Sir Trevor John Chichele Plowden on 1 February 1897. The clock on the tower was donated by Dewan Bahadur Seth Lachmi Narayan Ramgopal, a businessman

Review: This is a central secunderabad monument / attraction with the clock put on the tower. The place has been renovated to great extent. Its all clean and green inside and being used a lot for all sorts of meetings. Really happy with the maintenance in and around this place.

Thanks to Telangana Govt. celebrations. standing taller than the years passed and stores more memories of various incidences. a silent witness of the past glory of City of Hyderabad. good to visit in the late evenings to see the lightings.From Paradise circle it is exactly 1.3 kms. just before Hyderabad Regional Passport Office and Eastern side of famous Kamat Restaurant.

Name: Praveen K

On one side will be the iconic Garden restaurant. The clock Tower stands in the middle of a decently maintained garden. However there are quite a few homeless guys and drug addicts who sleep there so beware before exploring on your own.

From there you can walk on the bridge and admire the lake. However you cannot go to the lake as it is fenced. Near canteen there are few stairs which take you to a sort of view point from where you can get clear view of the lake.

If you are wit friends, nice place to hang over with them and also to explore around:) Just dont get near the water :)

One  of the popular attractions inside the Park is the rose garden with variety of roses in all colors. We also saw the Sanjeevaiah memorial, Butterfly garden, national flag and got a absolutely  amazing view of the Hussain Sagar Lake.

Name: V V S Ganesh N
Title: Park on Lake side
Review: Sanjeevaiah park in Hyderbad on Neklace road is located on hussian sagar lake side with nice view of Sagar lake with rare collection of Birds.Rose Gardens inside the Saneevaiah park is the special attraction over there.

Name: Sravan Vadde

Name: shivaraikod
Title: A must visit for nature lovers

Title: Big Green Park

Name: superb114
Title: Place to Refresh
Review: Sanjeevaiah park in the Necklace road is a nice place to hang on along with the friends you can feel relaxed if you have a morning or evening walk along with your friends

Name: Sachin D
Title: A morning walk catching the Sunrise:)
Review: This park is a nice spot to find morning walkers,yogis,sports enthusiasts etc.It has this nice location where sunrise can beautifully be seen.It's very spacious with lots of greenery flaura and fauna and 100+ varieties of trees.The place has nice facilities like canteen,washroom and plenty of trees to relax under.*cycling inside the park is allowed which is a very nice thing as one can get the view of the whole park in shorter span of time.Entry for morning Walker's is 5 and evening visitors is 10bucks.Final verdict:No complaints. A good place to start your mornings;)

Name: Harshith358
Title: Park on the Necklace Road
Review: The is the one and only park located on the necklace road. Its good place to spend time alone as well as when your are in company.

Name: THEROAMINGSAM
Title: A Time to relax
Review: Went with family for a picnic to theis garden. The Park is situated on the Hussain Sagar lake. Pleanty of trees and lush green grass to lie down and enjoy. There are some games for tiny tots, nothing for grown ups. A nice rose garden has been developed by the Municipal Authorities.  It is frequented by young lovers who hide among the bushes in the park. Familis come for picnic to this place. A nice place to spend in the evenings. Restaurants are very costly.

Name: KASI VENKOBA RAO
Title: Park with Landscapes
Review: Sanjeevaiah Park spread over a huge area of about 920 acres is situated in the heart of the city towards Secunderabad. This park is named after Sri Damodaram Sanjeevaiah, former Chief Minister of Andhra PradeshThe park, along the banks of Hussain Sagar Lake is managed hy HMDA.The Park holds best open landscapes and is a feast to the eyes to see and enjoy the park.Large number of visitors throng the part on Holidays and week ends.The Rock Garden, Floral Clock and a variety of Roses are the main attractions at the Park. All ages people enjoy here. The cool breeze flowing from the Lake makes one's mind afresh and spend a few hours forgetting the outside world.

Name: Robin A
Title: Park is fine
Review: One can plan to spend some time here. Located in middle of city, nearby a local railway station also can help people travelling from far-off places.Its on bank of HUssain sagar, but this art has lost its glimpse, as it is not maintained and bad odour also spoils your mood.

Name: Kashyap Kocherlakota
Title: Usual Park alongside hussainsagar lake
Review: Used to visit this place a lot of times during childhood and after my recent visit, I found it to be a good place and with a lot of renovation. Nothing great though, its just a park with a huge place to walk around and relax.

Name: madabushi
Title: Excellent weekend spot  for family with large meadows and greenery to play around
Review: During one of the weekends we went round for a change and felt Sanjeevayya par kis ok to spend a little longer and to play with kids.We had been to this place many times in the past, we never felt bored here, hence a safe place to quickly get in as it is adjacent to tank bund in the necklace road.  It is hardly 7  kilometers from Bowenpally.It is a large green grass mat with slight ups and downs like a mountainous region.  We played throw ball for sometime, then had some cool drink thereitself and thenwe had the running race for kids inside the park.   We rested and chatted for sometime and then walked around and all small standard park children play facilities like parallel bars, swings, merry go round, rocking systems  and so on.  spread over a large area. To get so much space inside the city is really great.   It is also not noisy at all.   If you want to spend leisure time with your family and discuss all concerns and get closer to every one of your family , it is a great place with lot of privacy and great lawns every where.

Name: Yash147
Title: Perfect Picnic
Review: It is one of the best places to go for a picnic within the city. Go there as a large group with friends/family, get Hyderabadi biryani takeaway to eat in the park, play flying discs/tennikoit, debate about current affairs, relax for the whole afternoon and go back home at sunset. It is wonderful that there is such a beautiful getaway without leaving the city.

Name: sugunapriya b
Title: Average park
Review: Just went for a visit on the go but couldnt find anything enjoyable. Went there with kids and they too got bored. Its much of a lovers park and u can see more of couples than families. better to go to lumbini or NTR park if with kids.

Name: sunnychandani
Title: walk to ur health
Review: very near to my home. i keep visiting. ticket only 5 rs. long walk way. big area. they are developing a beautiful rose garden inside the park, it is nearly developed but i think formal inauguration is pending. very good and scenic location just con is beside tank bund should be cleaned so it becomes stench free.

Name: nikrang
Title: Good potential lousy environment
Review: The lake is so polluted that it takes away the charm of this little park.Well maintained park area(could be much better though),reputation a bit dodgy ,because of large daytime population of young couples seeking privacy.If the lake were clean- that would be something then

Name: Sri Satya Sai S
Title: Huge Park in the center of the city
Review: Sanjeevaiah Park is located next to Hussain Sagar lake and on necklace road. Park is spread on huge area and it can accommodate thousands people at a time. There are nice rides for kids inside the park and plenty of green space for family gathering.

Name: Sanjeev_Sharma
Title: Okiee
Review: Not much to do here. ideal if you are looking for the kids to have some  play area (Picnic Spot) or if you like to go for walk then visit here

Name: raviarya
Title: superb
Review: really awesome place..one of the greatest place to visit...atleast i visited here for 10 to 15 times even though i did not felt bore..such a pleasant place for every one and really good, must visit and see.

Name: Prakash S
Title: Many attractions for children
Review: The park is more like an amusement centre. It is a great place for an outing with kids. There is lot of space to run around and play. The greenery is nice. Various games and rides also dot the park. Food outlets are plentiful. On the whole a nice day for a picnic or an outing with children.

Name: Sunil G
Title: Good
Review: First of all you will definitely confused here in selecting brands and things. It contains so many clothing and footwear brands. It's well maintained and following all the covid precautions.It is one of the old and famous mall in Hyderabad city

Name: Ranadeepreddy
Title: Hope less
Review: It is hope less ,they don't know how to recieve customers .No electricity when I went .Better to close the mall.

Name: Baburao S
Title: Very bad experience
Review: Worst shopping experience that I ever had.(1) Buy2Get1 Offer: Even though we selected apparel from offer spot, cashier told couple of items were not categorized under offers. We end up going back and forth, contacted manager to get offer. Wasted 30 mins time at billing. We couldn't alter our jeans due to this time wasted by staff.(2) Buy for 5999 and get 2000 vouchers: This is another false/fake promise. I didn't receive vouchers even after 4 days to my registered phone number.(3) Website, Email and Phone numbers as shown on the receipt won't work. Please see the pics attached.

Name: coped
Title: one of the best mall in Hyderbad
Review: central mall is good looking .best to go shopping for clothes.to attrative to people to watch the movies best place to go central mall pvr

Name: Srinivas
Title: Worst experience
Review: Online mycentral.in is much better compared to Hyd Central.Pls don't visit HYD Central, 1. No Covid Precautions2. Misbehaviour of staff and security.3. No proper parking arena.4. High rates compared to online.5. Always system shutdowns.6. No seniors available in the store.Worst ever store in Hyderabad

Name: Niya1315
Title: Good Mall
Review: Hyderabad Central Mall is near Punjagutta crossing. There are two buildings in this mall. Central mall is especially good to buy clothes. The options for dining are limited. This mall can be easily reached by public transport.

Name: Xyzz
Title: Central mall
Review: It is one of the expensive mall in Hyderabad.. Located near gacchibawli... Place is nice and expensive.

Name: Sami
Title: My opinion
Review: Recently I have wented to Central mall with family. It is clean and good parking, good facilities there I have watched movie and have snacks and there every thing is nice.

Name: ceenu1969
Title: One stop to shop
Review: Good place and in heart of city and have foidcourt and multiplex and shopping... Its access to metro train and all modes of transport

Name: Arihant Katariya
Title: Very Much Poor Place For Shopping
Review: I Would Not Like To Go Back For Shopping In Hyderabad Central Mall.. It's Day By Day Getting Very Worst & Quality & Range Of Items In Clothing...I Tried & Searched Many Brands But Was Not At All Satisfied With Anyone Because They Had A Very Limited Range And As Well As Old Stock Of Items...This Kind Of Unsatisfactory Review Doesn't Suit For The Brand "Hyderabad Central"

Name: Girish Kumar Goud
Title: Umbrella of brands
Review: This is my 1 of all time favourite stores in the city which consists of all top brands including a PVR multiplex

Name: Praveen
Title: Good
Review: I visited last 15 days back. Maximum all the brand's are avaliabe in the mall. Good to visit again...

Name: Naveen K
Title: Shopping
Review: Best place for complete family shopping Wide range of products in each categoryBest in discount and offers

Name: Happy life
Title: Very nice
Review: Very nice place for visit. We can spend 4-6 hour here for shopping with family. Also there is fun game.

Name: Sam
Title: Good place for branded clothes
Review: A good destination for branded and stylish clothes. Discounts available on majority brands. Nice destination for shopping.

Name: Silpa
Title: Food prices
Review: Shoping prices are good but food cost is very high. If the management ask KFC and other vendors to cut down the price definitely you can expect good results.

Name: jainms
Title: Central
Review: Hyderabad central mall is very good for shopping and lot of options to choose around. located exactly near punjagutta flyover. Cafeteria is OK.

Name: Mahesh M
Title: Best shopping destination for everyone!!
Review: I have spent 5000 rs on shopping at central panjagutta . There is many types of brands and the cost is also reasonable and best cloth , so friends visit and enjoy..

Name: Favoh
Title: Very famous for shopping,  movies and favourite food
Review: Very famous for shopping,  movies and favourite food.The mall includes Marks and Spencer, as well as a range of movies, music, books, coffee shops, a food court, supermarket and restaurants.

Name: Sathvik
Title: It is very good
Review: The central HYDERABAD is very very good in shopping and it gives soo much offers for all the people in the HYDERABAD so i request you to construct a branch on karimnagar so i will come twice a week so the central shopping mall so it is very good to buy in the central

Name: Manaswini Sridhar
Title: Well laid out mall with friendly sales people.
Review: Quite a collection of bags and footwear. The display is not cluttered like in most malls. They have a huge watch and perfume section as well.

Name: SAnkeath
Title: Hyderabad central
Review: It is located in Banjara hills Hyderabad,The biggest mall for the shopping and the best place to get much and more amount of collections as well as much and more discounts too... The mall will be of 2 parts named tower A and Tower B.... There will be an connection internally from a to b.... In tower B there will be an hamelys, along with men and women garment's and in top floor there will be a food court I am including the photos of that food court too.... The name of the food court is THE WORK here the food is also good..... And reasonable.... And the attached floor consist of home Town where they will be of n_number of products which were used in our home and gifts and idols etc..,

Name: Shivateja
Title: Happy shopping
Review: It was a very pleasant experience to shop at Hyderabad central. A place where we can find all brands of shirts and jeans with great offers of discounts and vochers. We cannot strain ourselves in shopping as there is quiet and silent environment with PVR on the top floor. We can also get complementary movie tickets if we shop more than ten thousand. There are many offers all the time in the mall which makes us to buy more and more. The costs of the items will be available to all class people

Name: atlblond
Title: Very good store for clothes
Review: This “mall” was closest to my hotel (ITC Kakatiya) and a 57 rupee Uber ride away. It’s two big stores, one for home goods which is more limited, the other for clothes which is extensive. Loved the styles and prices. Wish I could shop for clothes in India all the time! Reminds me of Paris but a third of the price. Be sure to take a cloth bag or you can buy one for 13 rupees there.

Name: JOEKENNEDY
Title: Visit
Review: It's a nice mall with good ambienceand good for children and nice food joints at fair price. It's worth while a visit along with family members

Name: LostMySelfTraveling
Title: Very accessible nice Central Mall at Punjagutta circle,
Review: It's a fantastic mall  at Punjagutta Circle. Its a fantastic mall with Shopping, PVR multiplex for cinemas for movies, Store for gadgets and mobiles, KFC if you are a non-veg lover. Above all its very close to many places. And there will public transportation available for every place. It's one of the best mall that I found in Hyderabad. Watched two movies. In ground floor you have chat variety also. It's a perfect place for spending the day with your loved ones. You can spend a whole day once you visit here. And the prices are also reasonable and and same as many multiplex theatre. It's a must visit place. It's exactly opposite to Punjagutta police station. So you need not worry about the security if you are watching a late night show too.

Name: Anjani I
Title: Lack of people
Review: Came here for buying some clothes for me and my friends, collection are of wide range and one will definitely choose your one ,but wherever you go you have to call for people for help Everytime and most irritating thing is that at the end while billing you have to wait a long que as among many billing counter very few are manned, that too unprofessional and busy in themselves rather helping out.needs lot of improvement in terms of customer service.

Name: Asma
Title: Disheartened for losing my money
Review: I bought few items for sum amount of 5500 rupees and 3300 rupees on 19th jan 2019.Later i returned two items on 28th jan 2019( a shoe and t.shirt) worth 3000 rupees approximately and was given a credit note and that day itself that is on 28th jan 2019 i purchsed shoes for 1400 rupees from that credit note and i was given another credit note for remaining amount approximately 1600 rupees. Unfortunately I lost that credit note and the bill. I visited cebtral mall panjagutta and they were not able to help me out saying once credit note is lost nothing can be done. Then i wrote a mail and personally called to customer care central(1800-210-7777) and they said they too cannot help me out with this as it's not in their hands. However they asked me to visit store once. I did it and i was asked to write a mail to Hyderabad team. I wrote the mail on 26th feb 2019. And i contacted them. They again told me today that they too dont have any details. Before contacting  Hyderabad central i called payback center and they said they don't save details of purchase made frm credit note.Now my question is How come they dont save details of purchases credit note return etc in their system? It isnt a small amount.  I want to use my money of credit note. It was just a small slip. Help me out central team. Im not going to keep quite. My email id is asma_hafeeza@hotmail.com

Name: Manishpal
Title: good shopping experience
Review: huge mall,a good collection,cannot be completed in a day as there are two units.overall clean ,& a good ambience

Name: YatriForever
Title: Food & Shopping
Review: Nice to see the mall thriving even after two decades. The food options are plenty and interesting, now.  The mall was quite crowded on a Sunday afternoon when we were here , with so many for the shows in the PVR. The car parking was relatively easy.Good place to be for movie-food-shopping.

Name: chandrasekhar g
Title: Branded cothes
Review: Went to buy clothes.But there are no offers and cost is very high.Only branded clothes are available.Movie theatres are also available.

Name: Jayanta Ray
Title: Cool well decorated all brands
Review: This place has a very good ambience and the architecture is also nice. it is situated in a crowded location of hyderabad and all types of brands  are tgere selling casual formal wears apparels, gymwear, perfumes, footwear anything to everything related to fashion.On third floor ther are having furnitures also.And the best part is that they all are having discounts.So haply to hear about discounts on everything.😁😁😁

Name: purplepassion212
Title: Horrible place to eat in the foodcourt.
Review: We went there and saw that the place has changed. There is a new wing now to the building.Where ohris use to be we saw there was another chain which was horrible n dirty. The prives were too high and food was tasteless and spicy. We opted for the chinese which was a disaster.All money wasted and stomach upset. If anynody wants to risk their lives go there.

Name: Rjkool
Title: Not good
Review: done with my shopping  at hyderabad central...............🙂🙂 its nice to feel 😊😊😊 and products are not good

Name: Resort52967924763
Title: Very good
Review: A very good place to shop, a little bit expensive, but good in product quality, better to visit in weekdays.

Name: karthikakavya
Title: Varients varieties Costs
Review: Can get from food grocery furnish goods to clothes and all other things. costs are not so affordable that and even clothes are costly as like obviously a such big mall wont sell at cheap prices though.!! further clothes quality is very good but not affordable for mostly budget shopping people. need to have patience abd energy to roam all over the mall to shop the needs . has lift and escalator facility . parking is available for large no.of vehicles.Thats it

Name: Sohith
Title: Hyderabad central
Review: Its best place for couples and students to enjoy with couples its best time pass place to visit having a theatre and shopping complex

Name: Kamal K Sirra
Title: Ethnic stuff
Review: Its one of the few shopping malls where you can find Some  typical indian dresses. I'd say the choice is not very big but you always come across something that catches your attention. Staff are attentive & helpful.

Name: Raja Pantham
Title: Worst Experience
Review: Food court on 4th floor has no sense at all they don't even know the difference between fork and a spoon and when we requested to arrange one spoon they were rude and called manager Teja Chowdary who says this itself is spoon and you need to have sambar or raitha only with this showing forkPathetic serviceWorst foodWorst customer experience

Name: Flyer64665265495
Title: Attract by keeping gifts like VIP luggage trolly's but they never give as always say no stock of gifts
Review: Done a shopping for my family during Dashara 2018 in Hyderabad Central mall at Panjagutta and I was suppose to get a VIP Trolly bag as gift. When visited customer desk, they said they do not have stock and said they will call back once the stock is ready. But they never called and when I visted they told the stock is still not available and I would receive a call once the stock is ready. But now its Diwali time and no one from central reached me. This is pathetic, they attract people by keeping festive gifts but they never give and always says no stock. Please do not get attracted by these kind of offers.

Name: Sightseer826292
Title: Very bad response
Review: Very bad service to customers Many brands but very expensive compared to otherNo response from customer side

Name: Surendar M
Title: Customer service
Review: Am shopping in central more than 30 times but always am observing there is no improvement in customer service, they didn’t change till now, especially in Kukatpally ( Hyderabad), no one respond to customers queries and they are telling irresponsible answers and didn’t have faith also. They don’t know how handle the publicMy suggestion please recruit educated and responsible persons for customer service purposeAm not explain my issues that is also wrost situation, please educate them and provide the quality services to public.

Name: Abhilash K
Title: Very huge
Review: It is very huge mall and it have lot of shopping destination and you can found large number of brand outlets

Name: Saikiran Rao
Title: Shopping Mall
Review: Sprawled across five floors, the massive Hyderabad Central Mall is one of the most popular shopping malls in Hyderabad. Easily accessible from major parts of the city, this shopper’s pit-stop is located on Punjagutta Road and is a one-stop-shop for designer labels and international brands. Spanning 2,50000 sq. ft., Hyderabad Central houses book shops, cafes, restaurants, apparel stores, jewellery showrooms and even a food court. From Hidesign and Guess to Giovani and Blackberrys, there are a countless high-end stores for the big spenders here. The mall also offers something for movie buffs with a PVR Cinemas on its top floor.

Name: vmsatheesh22
Title: Good
Review: Hyderabad center mall, big and best mall we all like the time spend here, visit all shops for just time pass

Name: deepa v
Title: Good variety of clothes
Review: Wide range of brands are available for both men and women.Its better for western wear for women.prices are a bit high.Punjagutta central is the best outlet.gachobowli hasnt that much variety.

Name: gopi j
Title: awesome
Review: good place to shop. Hyderabad Central is a shopping mall in located on the Punjagutta road. The mall includes Marks and Spencer, as well as a range of movies, music, books, coffee shops, a food court, supermarket and restaurants. The shopping space is spread over four levels, with PVR Cinemas located on the top (fifth) floor

Name: tiktianc
Title: Take note, no cameras allowed inside.
Review: I was barred from entrance as I had a film SLR in my bag, but was told smart phones are fine to take in as it would be infeasible to ban them too. Make of it what you want of all the photos posted of the inside on whether there is a difference between a smartphone and a camera.The inside of the mall is ok, fairly typical. Did not check on the quality of the bathrooms or anything, which makes are usually good for. Poor review primarily because of silly rules.

Name: njydlife
Title: Shopping & entertainment
Review: Good place to go shop and also has all the top known eateries . This place hosts Pvr cinemas as well with all recent movies played

Name: TrueCityZen
Title: Absolutely clumsy;Pathetic parking;Limited elevators only till 3rd floor;None while coming down
Review: This one of the centrally located places in Hyderabad but with the worst facilities and management. I was there this weekend and it was chaotic.The first one to greet you would be the mall security and Punjagutta traffic, to let you know that there is no parking available. If you have tickets for PVR, you are on your own.Once you enter the mall, the elevators take you till 3rd floor and then you need to take the fire evacuation stairs.On the way back from fifth floor, there are absolutely no elevators - you need to walk down. The other day I saw parents with young kids and elderly people struggle a lot while getting down the stairs.Its a pity that the GHMC, Fire and Police let this mall operate with such low standards - The L&T Next mall a few metres away is much much better than this.Do avoid this mall if possible- there are much better and safer malls in Hyderabad. Have a safe visit by going to them.

Name: renn
Title: Nice shopping place
Review: A one stop solution for clothing, spread over 5 floors and a large area. It has clothing, accessories from all popular brands. Renovation of some parts were in progress when I visited.

Name: JaneFonda57
Title: Shopping at Central Mall
Review: My husband & I , together with our grown up sons visited this Mall on 19th Feb.We were pleasantly surprised with the  wide choice of Western & Ethnic wear, shoes and bags.Staff at the various outlets were helpful and attentive.The place was clean.Alteration service for clothes was prompt..it being a Monday.We enjoyed our shopping here.

Name: Travellove1025
Title: Plenty of options
Review: Well located and have plenty of options. The year end sale is worth waiting for. Though it may seem smaller compared to other new malls, it has everything one needs. Only negative is that it doesnt have lots of front space

Name: rama r
Title: Family
Review: Recently i went with my family to buy clothes lot of people r sujjest me to go that place and buy something the price was pretty good and lot of designs we all r enjoy to buy clothes and everything

Name: Georgio Valentino Rayala
Title: Looks really cool after the Renovation
Review: I visited this place along with a friend after more than a year and what I saw was a beautiful transformation for the better. It has been divided into two blocks [A & B] and there is a internal connection between both the blocks.Block A had PVR multiplex on the top floor and mostly dedicated to Men's wear, Women's wear, luggage, perfumes etc. It also has MC Donalds, KFC, Pizza Hut and Sub way in its basement. There is also a Cafe coffee day on the 3rd floor.Block B has Food Bazar on the top floor along with a food court which is about to open and on the 2nd and 3rd floors it has Hometown. The first floor is dedicated to Kids wear and Hamleys Outlet. The ground floor is dedicated to foot wear.The Mall is done really well and it looks classy. My only request is to increase the seating in the basement food court and make it more organized.

Name: SuvodipMoitra
Title: Decent mall
Review: Not the best of the lot but yes for a change you can drop by. But none of the fancy brands in the mall. Only central and some other shops and a pvr. Thats it.

Name: Rajani K
Title: Great place for weekend hangout
Review: So many branded stores under one roof of the central mall.  Apparels, foot wear, accessories, watches, bag packs, suitcases, glasses, electronics etc. are seen in stores here. There are restaurants and also Theatre/screen to watch a movie. Best place to spend quality time over weekend watching a movie, shopping and enjoy delicious food.

Name: Vallabha S
Title: Experience view and shopping
Review: Nice place to shopping and max brands available an exciting  offers and PVR MOVIE Experience  .Near by restaurants are available for more stuff . FOOD Court are available at basement for east access to food court .

Name: annejang
Title: One of the oldest and popular malls in Hyderabad
Review: Centrally located and hosts many popular shopping outlets. One can find everything here from shoes to watches to clothes. The places to eat are also decent.

Name: Mahesh M
Title: All in at one place?
Review: When I was wishited Hyderabad central with my friends ,we found that there are many types of shopping malls and like branded showrooms many more in that.My suggestion is best auccation for friends get together. I was forget to say that there is also a PVR CINEMA theater .

Name: Jikuza
Title: Mall Central to Hyderabad
Review: This mall stays true to its name and is central to Hyderabad. It is a decent mall to shop with outlets aplenty. It also houses the usual run of the mill outlets and quick service restaurants.

Name: zap r
Title: Good place for shopping!!
Review: 1.  Shopping here is quite good, offers and discounts on many brands.2.  Clothing,Watches, sunglasses, footwear, home needs, all under on roof.3.  PVR cinema has quite a few screens, movie experience is good.4.. Restaurants are ok, McD & kFC AVAILABLE.4.  No play zone for kids.5.  Parking is available.

Name: Repala S
Title: ALL UNDER ONE ROOF.....
Review: Hyderabad Central Mall is the Shopping Mall placed the center of the city. It is the best place for Entertainment and Shopping. It is the one shop store where all your needs are available under one roof. It is one of the biggest shopping mall consisting of Bookshops, Cafes, Restaurant, Jewelry showroom, Food Court.

Name: SamWorld
Title: Good discounts on brands
Review: A good place for brand shoppings at discounts... Not much entertainment or activities in mall... Just shopping, few restaurant and pvr cinema.... decent collections, good discounts and offers...Worth a visit!!

Name: Gowthamcivilion
Title: Shopping & Entertainment
Review: This place provides you wide range of brands for shopping. Which is easily accessible through public transport. Parking facility is available. PVR cinemas is available in the top floor.

Name: Ron G
Title: Good Place for Shopping
Review: Who are trying to purchase branded items on clothes, gifts or accessories of Men and Women.As well as entertainment of movie theater.Best Place for food courts of KFC, Pizza Hut, McDonald's. etc.

Name: SuvodipMoitra
Title: Mall with a PVR
Review: Not a big mall, but situated at the Punjagutta junction and has decent brands like the "Central", "PA" and has a food court with KFC & other stalls. It has a PVR cineplex too.

Name: Abdul
Title: Central  mall in the center
Review: My favourite brands like lombard, park avenue and KFC, pizza Hut available there, also the mall is in right in the center, always crowded, i love this place.

Name: Georgio Valentino Rayala
Title: Nice Mall In The Center Of City
Review: Its one of the Earlier Malls of the city which also has a Multiplex.It's located right in the center of the city and is very easy to travel and locate.It is a Six Floor Store with the top floor dedicated Exclusively to PVR Multiplex.Of the other Floors ,the Ground Floor has the three Fast food centres KFC,Mac Donalds ,Pizza Hut and a Womens Ethnic clothes Area.The other 4 Floors are divided along Youth Area,Kids Area,Mens Area and Womens Area.Over all the collection here is very good but the only problem is with the Parking space.

Name: Xavier D
Title: Indira Park
Review: Near to Hussain sagar lake, this is a nice and green park. Has a small pond in the lake. Good for early morning jogs.

Name: Kaushik G
Title: Good Park but needs better care
Review: During our sightseeing in Hyderabad, we had visited Indira Park which is located right opposite Ramakrishna Math. Entrance tickets are priced at 10 rupees per person. The park has pathway in between different varieties of trees to walk around and a small lake where one can enjoy boating. The place needs better maintenance especially the Lake with smelly water. We saw a baby owl on the branch of a tree and another big bird with long tail in the bushes.

Name: jainms
Title: Good for walking
Review: Good place for early morning and evening wallking. maintenance is not that much good but OK. Cna see lot of plants  over the park.

Name: SRIKAKOLAPU
Title: nice and good
Review: This is a park with lots of greenery and with almost 70 acres in the midst of the city.Good to visit in the mornings and evening

Name: Daniel T
Title: Nice park for Morning walks
Review: Very good place to peaceful walking & jogging. Many come here daily and even on holidays. Good place to chill with loads of greenery to enjoy. You have to buy a entry ticket during day time visit.

Name: Sumit S
Title: not the old charm
Review: This is an average park now and have lost the old charm of viisting . Can be avoided unless you have nothing else to do

Name: chandrasekhar g
Title: Place for walking/jogging
Review: Good place for early morning walking and walking. Romantic place for lovers.Hospitals are available near to indira park. coaching centers(education) are also available.Infront of indira park vegetable market and fruits are also available.Entry fee is must for customers

Name: srk-rk
Title: Large Park
Review: Indira Park is large park in Hyderabad with  lot of trees and greenery. It has good facilities for morning walks, play ground for children and outdoor gym equipment. There is boating facility. On the negative side, the park is unclean. Lot of garbage is dumped ruining experience. Greenery is pleasant sight to eyes.

Name: idea614354
Title: For Fresh Air
Review: Indira park a place where lot of trees and plants planted visit evening time for a fresh Air. good place evening walk.

Name: lovetravelonly
Title: Popular Landmark and park
Review: Very large greenary park. There is many facilities like childrens play, boating etc. Very beautiful. There is a small entrance fee. Children will surely enjoy.

Name: Mintstar
Title: Greenery park
Review: A very good place for morning walkers.so much of greenery. The largest circle anyone can walk is about 2.7 kilometers. There are also multiple pathways. It is crowded. There's a playground for kids. A few open gym tools. They don't charge for early morning walkers. You have canteens inside and there's cycle boating too.

Name: logharsh
Title: My favourite Indira Park
Review: I wait every morning to get the glimpseLove the first line of sight of sun,Piercing through the air,Cutting across the trees and leafsAnd reaching me.WOW The hope has just arrived,the smiles have been multipliedthe view of ‘sunlight’makes me wonderthat it can be still all day longno change, no colour needed.To appreciateTo experienceTo peaceTo calmTo loveThe morning sun blesses you.Like to go dailyAt my favourite ‘Indira Park’Hyderabad, India.Indira Park, Hyderabad, IndiaIndira Park, Hyderabad, India Mornings 6.30amBest time to reachNot late, not early,To catch the best light of the day,To view the best nature of the day.Spread in 76 acres,Sounds great.But to jog and runMakes you sweat.Indira Park, Hyderabad, IndiaIndira Park, Hyderabad, India Green is whatMakes the swagBut it’s the freshness of the parkWhich makes it quite enchanting.Indira Park, Hyderabad, IndiaIndira Park, Hyderabad, India I love to visit it daily,ping me if you are around,Will, take you there.

Name: Vinod K
Title: Indira Park
Review: Indira ParkIts a huge park, disappointing factor is, totally unclean and such a waste of spaceIt can still be an awesome place within the twin cities to have a place for family to have a picnic or just an outing

Name: Rao1940497
Title: Good park
Review: Sprawling park at the lower tank bund side of Secunderabad near Rama Krishna mission, worth spending an hour.

Name: shivaraikod
Title: Relaxing and peaceful
Review: Visited this place with my spouse and found it green, relaxing and peaceful. Good quality time spent here.

Name: santosh2ind
Title: Indira park
Review: This park is named by prime minister of india this is very beautiful park.in this we have very beautiful garden.all morning walkers are come to this park.

Name: kmegha911
Title: Awesome Park
Review: Indira park is a well designed park constructed without disturbing the pre-exisying natural elements.Musical dancing fountains,waterfalls and a commercial nursery are the other attractions of this garden.The park also has a skating area and a small pond.

Name: KGSAnil
Title: Good Park with lots of greenery
Review: This park is located in lower tank bund opposite to Ramakrishna Math and beside to NTR Stadium. The park is so big,it has many tree. Good choice for walking and Jogging. Also good place for couples and lovers to spend d time.

Name: BRKanth
Title: Place to go with Family
Review: Visited this place along with family and all enjoyed especially Kids. Much place to play everyone and love nature.

Name: jainneha
Title: Indira park
Review: It is a beautiful park . The layout is also very nice . Best thing of Hyderabad is that it is clean and tidy .

Name: Vankam S
Title: NICE PARK
Review: This park is very beautiful & nice . Everybody must seeing this park and enjoy with friends & family .And political leaders are meeting here .

Name: nagesh1955
Title: Visit of Indira park
Review: The very biggest place for children in the city, lot of items available in this park to play. We can also enjoy the scating in morning times

Name: Saiprasad_2804
Title: Good place to spend evenings
Review: This park is a good place to go for a walk in the evening and boating is available.But this place needs ot of maintenance.

Name: bkumar123
Title: Beautiful Park
Review: Its a beautiful park spread in a vast area with lot of pleasant greenery around. You can many couples relaxing and chit chatting. Its good to visit during summer as we can sit and relax under the trees and enjoy the fresh air.

Name: nishit
Title: Green and clean
Review: a nice garden to relax and unwind. Not polutted, needs some cleanliness awareness though. Overall good

Name: Javid C
Title: clean park
Review: indira park is very neat park and must visit places for families and childrens to enjoy a day picnic

Name: hajarathvalige
Title: Big parks near tankbund..loosing it's charm
Review: Its good for moring walk and spend some time with family but it is lossing it's charm due  to undermaintance...

Name: Narasimha Prasad G
Title: lasting craze !!!!!!!!!
Review: Earlier 1990's Indira Park was only option for Twin cities but now many many modern parks and theme parks at the same time officials also not caring and promoting this sincerely.But still it's worth to visiit

Name: VYR306
Title: For Nature Lovers
Review: Nature lovers can enjoy mostly in this park. You can also see many couples having chit chats and roaming in this park.

Name: Gyanendra K
Title: Beautiful but not maintained
Review: Place Is really good.....but its not maintained by g9verment...its attracts lots of crowd ...children park is mostly used by adults. No dustbin around. This is one of the lovers point as well. Lovers are seen indulged in wrong activity publicly.

Name: Chandrapc
Title: famous and oldest park
Review: it is closer to rama krishna matt with full of greenary. it is not like ntr gardens, lumbini park . it is a big nature enjoyable park. it is picnic spot you can spend the whole day with families and children can play more.it has a lake and boating also.

Name: Mahanama
Title: Horribly Neglected Park
Review: In the early days this park was a nice place to spend some time. That was way back in the 1980s. But over the years the park has deteriorated terribly. I can mention 4-5 things which need immediate attention.1. Large sections of the park are dusty. The pathways are very hard, and the poor walkers have to suffer much. Foolishly some sections have been cemented. So you can expect foot trouble for many walkers.2. The large pond (I won't call it a lake!) in the middle of the park has been filled with sewage water, so that it is practically one sewage dump. You can see foam and froth at the edges of the pond. There is a small walkway (mini bridge) to cross from one side of the park to the other side. You can see the walkers holding their noses and walking over - the smell is so bad. Not only hydrogen sulphide, but methane also - are the poisonous gases emanating from the stagnant pond. Part of the lake is covered with weeds. Many who are working in the park throw rubbish into the park. If the pond is dredged, you can see the filth that is at the bottom. 3. You can always see stray dogs running around in the park. 4. Except for the section called the Rose Garden (where lots of money is spent!), every other spot in the park needs rectification. It is just one cheap third-rate municipal park, which is becoming worse year after year.5. Foolishly watering is done in the park in the early morning time, so that the humidity is very high. And the poor walkers suffer from colds, coughs, bronchitis and pneumonia - walking through the wet sections of the park, suffering the chill and the damp, especially in December and January. Proof: The increasing number of patients who go to Sai Vani Hospital opp the park for chest xrays!6. Some of the ugliest sculptures are found in this park. You don't know what those stone figures mean. It is one of those scams for which the Municipal Corporation is 'famous'. 7. Most of the park looks like a desert or scrub jungle trying its best to recover from the ill-treatment at the hands of the park authorities who have no idea of plants, gardens, horticulture or park management. 8. The best thing about the park is perhaps the vegetable and fruit vendors outside the park. Here you get good vegetables and fruits, fresh and at reasonable rates. In fact many people come to the park, not to enjoy the park, but to buy from the unofficial market that is outside the park premises! 9. Hyderabad is one city where lakes and parks are fast vanishing. One good park is the Sanjeeviah Park which is located in a secluded area. But I visited that park 2 years ago. It must have deteriorated by now, I'm sure.

Name: vibha123
Title: A Park away from city pollution..now losing charm
Review: I remember visiting Indira park sometime back and I was just traveling down the memory lane to draw a comparison....it has lost its charm...Its landmark on the map of twin cities, however like any other public place is running without maintenance and care..Might be worth while if you are close by to see this garden with kids else this place has nothing much to offer in comparison with NTR gardens and lumbini park.

Name: Beemidi Kiran
Title: A very well planned park in the heart of the city
Review: This is one of the best parks located in the center of the city by all means. The plan and the layout of the park is perfect for all purposes. Its best for early morning jog and walk along the park. It is best for picnic with family during the day and it is also the best park to take out your kids to have a nice evening time. It has decent food options. The other main plus to this place is the water pond which is huge and gives a very beautiful outlook to this park. A must visit if you are in anywhere around Himayatnagar or tank bund.

Name: Naganna Travel and Food Expert
Title: Best of Hyderabad parks...
Review: It's near Ramakrishna Matt.... It's really nature loving and good place for nature lovers.... This place is available in morning and evenings.... Most said is lovers park....

Name: SRINIWAAS S
Title: Located in the heart of the city
Review: Indira Park is a recreation park dedicated to the late Prime Minister of India, Indira Gandhi.it lies alongside the Husain Sagar Lake of Hyderabad. The foundation of the Indira park was laid in the year 1975 by the then President of India, Late Faqruddin AhmedThe park has been one of the favorite picnic spots for the children as well as the families.

Name: Praveen K
Title: Serene park.
Review: a nice botanical park near tankbund. Indira park is a walkers paradise for people near the CBD. The park has an artificial lake and has boating. It is spread across a large area and is opposite Ramakrishna mutt.

Name: plan41
Title: Indira Park - the Ideal Spot for a Week-end Picnic...
Review: When Indira Park was started somewhere in the nineties, it was considered to be such a beautiful concept providing greenery in the midst of rapidly growing urbanisation by way of multi-storeyed apartments and shopping complexes in this traditionally shy city that shunned modernism for a long, long time. There were a variety of saplings and trees planted by the State Horticulture Department who had maintained the Park so well for a number of years. The lake in the midst of the Park remained ever pure and un-contaminated and boating in the lake used to be such a pleasurable experience. There were a number of aquatic birds providing a visual delight to the visitors to the park. Alas! over the years there has been a systematic neglect of this once-upon-a-time beautiful Park right in the centre of the City. Today the lake has turned out to be totally lacking in maintenance, filthy with stagnant water and the boating having stopped long time ago. The present government is considering renovation of the whole area into something that is modern and attractive, for which plans are under way. Time alone will tell what kind of shape this sprawling Park is going to assume in the near future!

Name: kijji
Title: park for all activities
Review: Free entry in the morning hours,otherwise nominal entry fee.Indira park is 3km away from my home.In summer we go here for walking.It has beautiful trees ,green  lawns,rose garden,lake for boating,you find children playing in the park (Merry go round,see saw,slide etc...),people play different games.small canteen is there,musical fountain is there,free yoga demos in the morning.cinema shooting is done here sometimes,change of atmosphere,nice air.families come here as picnic spot,vanamahotsav in the month of july will be celebrated by people.

Name: madabushi
Title: Beautiful park with boating, trees and plants and large lawn and play areas for all.
Review: Indira park is located between Secunderabad and Hyderabad, at the lower side of Tank Bund.  Boating rock garden, and some plants organised attractively are good to enjoy.   The water may not be that good in the boating area, but boating is neverthless enjoyable, as pedaling becomes a part of physical activity.Large lawn is available for kids and adults to play throw ball, football, and other games.  Some childrens' play structures are available to climb,slide, jump, rock etc.,   This park is good for picnic and family time pass and you can spend much longer time here especially in winter seasons.The other side of the water boating, you still have large trees and land space, you can walk around and enjoy.It is a good park and we keep visiting often as it is much inside the city only 7 kms from our home and near many other tourist attractions and amusement parks etc.

Name: Pankaj_Zaparde
Title: Nice & Beautiful
Review: Superb for first timers.. If you are new to hyderabad, its worth visiting Indira Park. The environment is great there. I was there on last weekend. You will find good places to sit & relax. The scenic beauty will make you wow.

Name: KASI VENKOBA RAO
Title: Park So So
Review: Indira Park,  located at Lower Tank Bund near Domalguda,  is a Public Park with greenery. It is located at the heart of the city and well connected to both Hyderabad & Secunderabad.The Park is named after the late Prime Minister of India Mrs. indira Gandhi. Musical fountains, Rose garden, Boating, Rock Garden are the highlights of this park. its a good place for jogging and picnics for the family.  It is said that the Rock garden is developed by an Officer of Central Government..The drawback in the park is poor maintenance. Though acclaimed as one of the biggest part ( spread over 76 acres), it is not being maintained well. Thousands of visitors come here for boating, relaxing and for picnic. I have visited this park recently and I am of the opinion, that the concerned authorities can improve the maintenance and attract more visitors.

Name: ExplorerAwasthi
Title: Smelly Lake
Review: We went for the first time to do a boat. Area adjacent to Lake is poorly maintained and Lake was in horrible state, it was not cleaned for a long time. Pedal Boat was also in a sorry state; although staff was helpful. You can avoid going there.

Name: mdgouse
Title: park
Review: a good place to go with friends for just like outing.one of the very good parks in hyderabad to visit.

Name: MARGDARSHI
Title: Average Park, Not Maintained
Review: The Indira Park is on the lower Tank Bund road & its only significance is the idea behind it `To keep the natural existing landscape without disturbing it much to construct a new park`! So you have semblance of a rock formation with some famialar trees of sandalwood,wild Date palms & flowers.A small lake with boats.There is also a Maisamma Temple often visited.The musical fountain installed here rarely works.The park is now often used for public  rallies & agitations.Not worth wasting your time.

Name: nanajiak07
Title: Enjoyment in Indira Park
Review: Ihave been visited Indira Park with friends on December 2014 at evening time. A pleasent experience in our life for this memory with friends.

Name: Karthik A
Title: Not preffered for families
Review: Indira park is not that much of charm. Families can avoid going there. It is even not maintained well.

Name: Janet S
Title: OK, but nothing special
Review: For Hyderabad, this is a decent place to spend some time walking, but that is about it.  Small lake in the middle has some boats available.  There is a 10 year old lovely fountain with cascading waterfall area in the back which is no longer functional, falling apart , and must have not been maintained to be in such condition after only so few years.  The landscape is passable, with a rose garden and some other areas that actually are quite pretty (again, for Hyderabad standards).  I wouldn't go here unless desperate for a place to walk...which we were.  Lovely temple on the street side of the property.

Name: higghligght shiva
Title: This park is normal for all
Review: this is D best park for lovers and atmosphere is good  & some place is not so clean & not much grass vl  . morning is for walking & jogging 4 all no entrance fee for morning at evening time fee cost 5rs at around 6 to 7  lights & water fountain is nice cam is free food & drinks they come &ask anything u want  not 4 free this is D +point for this

Name: Gururaj
Title: Revamped
Review: The park had been revamped with beautiful and lush green surroundings. The entry fees ensures that the park remains clean. Although there is nothing amazing, I would recommend this park for a nice walk in the morning. Photography is prohibited although.

Name: bhaskardileep
Title: good one
Review: it s located opposite to ramakrishna matt , lower tank bund.it s good place for walking in the morning . i say it has become a place for lovers  so better watch out

Name: digitalldreamzz
Title: Don't waste your time going here...
Review: It's great that people still consider this as a good park and it has obtained a place in Tripadvisor. The only plus is the skating rink in this park which is one of the biggest in Hyderabad.No greenery, No play pen, No boating... the entrance of the park is always busy with people who are doing dharnas and strikes and the other end of the park is always stinking as it's close to the municipal dumping yardIt's used for walking and yoga for many people around the park who stay at a walkable distance but it's not worth for any one else

Name: Sounak Poddar
Title: Dumpyard
Review: Maybe once upon a time, it was a very beautiful lake but now as it has turned out to be a place where all the dumping takes place.

Name: jainms
Title: OK
Review: Not maintained well, Not an main attraction place but can visit once, pollution less as it is far from city.

Name: SRIKAKOLAPU
Title: Artifical lake
Review: Its the place for nature lovers and one of the best places in Hyderabad to hangout away from pollution and chaos of the city

Name: Ashish Kumar
Title: Nice place for bird-watching, but no proper maintenance.
Review: The place is nice with different kind of birds all over, but need a lot of improvement with the waste management.A lot of plastic bottles can be seen all around with all sitting placed in damaged condition.Though a nice place to watch birds like earget, pond heron, cormorant, blue tailed bee eater, swallow, parakeet, shikra, Oriental Robin, water hen are few to be named.During entrance you'll be warned with a board "Beware of Crocodiles" but i didnn't found any in my 3 visits.

Name: Karthik Dasu
Title: An Okay place
Review: It is very decent place to visit in the city of Hyderabad.Please do visit, only in the rainy season.

Name: Amartya1987
Title: Walk a mile with the nature
Review: Let's set the right expectations. It's a reservoir with sluice gates in case water needs to be released downstream and there's a nearby park. That's it.Reaching the place is quite easy, take the APPA junction exit on ORR and come towards the himayat Sagar road. There are plenty of signage so you can't get lost enroute.There is a parking ready to accommodate around 30 -40 cars. Once you are in the place, you see 2 gates, one for the park and other for the reservoir.The reservoir doesn't close till late but the park gate closes by 5pm, so plan accordingly.The gate for the reservoir takes you on a mile of walk along the reservoir fence right up to the sluice gates and you can cross the gates and have some extra walk. The waking road is clean and picturesque. You can take a lot of nice pics. You can see a variety of birds chirping around, just be ready with your cameras to take the best shot.The park beside the reservoir also had some nice species of flowers and birds. There's a small play area for kids.Best is to walk the long distance along the reservoir and then take some rest in the park. But choice is always individual.The reservoir and parking is free, however, for the park, adults are charges 15/- per head.Coming to the food, you see a lot of bhutta(corn) sellers. Refreshing to have them in reading season.Right opposite to the place you have small refreshments points with some tea and bhajji sellers.Few of them sell fish fry, it's cheap and tastes great, non veg lovers can have a bite.

Name: Veer2468
Title: Average
Review: It is good to visit this lake on a weekend but not daily. The park beside is good but there is an entry to it. There are also parking charges.

Name: Anamika K
Title: Good for morning stroll
Review: A very good place to hangout with friends and we enjoyed a lot at Himayat Sagar..!! There is one thing that everyone to do at Himayat Sagar is swimming, a pure water and taking pictures. As well a good sight for everyone, the great moments.

Name: higghligght shiva
Title: A Normal lake side by beautiful park
Review: About Himayath sagar lakeAll are telling that on sunday public is crowd But public is not there that to on sunday. this should be not there in the tourist list  But normal 2 see for a view of lakeOnly some birds are coming like pigeon, parrot, kingfisher different types of birds.Lake is normal on left side many rocks stones r there in middle Lotus plants r there.. This park is best for Nature Lover's. Tickect is Rs5 for each person But they r taking 10Rs for each person. We r given only 5RS for each . In this park u can see many birds & beautiful flora & fauna  .Here u can see many people's,family & couple's are there. it is a small place to play for children's Many people's r prepare food at home they bring & eat  in this picnic spot.from mehdipatnam 288B & 288M or 288n Bakaram. In this park u can take nice pics over there. if people where depressed or tension they can relief here.Neatnessis very good in this park. it is a silent & peaceful for couple's.Out side of the park ghouse bhai fish stall is there. some people r coming take parcel.Many people eating there only .Once is enough to see lake.Taste is so delicious. Murrel, Rohu ,catla, Pomfret  fishes Rs 30 for 1 piece & 50 for 1 fish.

Name: koteswararao
Title: lake for drink
Review: this lake constructed for drinking for Hyderabad nearly 100 years back when over floon   to save the city

Name: pjanil1968
Title: Excellent picnic spot
Review: This place is very good for kids and families. Kids would love the place. Good for morning and evening walk. Very calm and peaceful picnic spot. Good to view sun rise. Lots of birds around kids would like the atmosphere

Name: Tirtho1911
Title: Nice calm place visited for bird watching
Review: I have visited with my friends in month of May, for the purpose of Bird watching. While we spend lot of time on Bridge, we also trekked into other side of lake in jungle area. Its a wonderful place and to our delight we have seen lot of species. Its a nice place for Morning walk, and view from Bridge during early morning hours is awesome. Bird watcher please try it out

Name: zap r
Title: Good place for a morning or evening walk.
Review: 1. This lake is quite a place to visit, especially in the morning (before 8 or evening after 5)  Sunrise and sunset view is good. 2.  This lake is quite far from the main city, takes an hr drive.3.  Free of cost.4.  Nothing much around this lake, food or shopping, can spend around 1hr here.5.  Not much of a fun place for kids too. 6.  Best time of the yr ti visit is Aug to march. ( Avoid summers, as the lake will be a bit dry. and its too hot to be around.)

Name: Uma
Title: Volunteer Visit with cycling friends
Review: A must visit place for people who are into cycling, yoga (outdoor) and running... Good timing will be early mng and evenings... Caution - You are not allowed to cross fencing.

Name: Manish K
Title: Good picnic spot
Review: Himayat Sagar Lake, along with the nearby Osman Sagar Lake, was constructed to supply water to residents of Hyderabad. Located just off the Outer Ring Road, this lake is also a good picnic spot, which is frequented by families and youngsters alike. One can take good photographs of the lake or can walk down to the dam itself. Also, parking  here is still free, unlike that at Osman Sagar.

Name: swiftydrifts
Title: For morning and evening stroll
Review: Around 20 kms from Gachibowli... is an artificial lake built prior Indian independence.This place is good for early morning walk or to stroll in the evening. Sunrise aint so prominent still worth a visit during that particular time.Not so crowded and you will find some cycling or jogging..

Name: shivaraikod
Title: Good sunset view
Review: Been here in the month of Jan 17 , the lake here is really big with good views from all around and the sun set is not to be missed out.

Name: Lav Dwivedi
Title: Good views on sun-rise and sun-set
Review: Himayat Sagar has scenic beauty around. This is a good place in Hyderabad for selfi-lovers. The fresh air and the atmosphere during the evening is really enjoyable moreover it comes on the way to airport, so is well connected. Recommend for morning and evening views.

Name: santosh2ind
Title: Himayat sagar lake
Review: This is beautiful lake in hyderabad.it was constructed by meer osmanalikhan. every one have to see this lake.

Name: kmegha911
Title: Great Place
Review: The grassy banks that embrace the lake make it an ideal picnic spot.The beautiful road on the bund of the Himayat Sagar Lake makes for an exhilarating driving experience.Feeling of Cool and Clean air near the lake was also soothing experience.

Name: Gowthamcivilion
Title: Scenic Lake View !
Review: This is one of the lake view spots in hyderabad, which is 10-15km away from hyderabad. Parking facility is available. People are not allowed to go after 6PM

Name: nagesh1955
Title: visit of river
Review: Very oldest lake developped in nizams period. This is very strong consturction made by them. The view is very good.

Name: NKReddy
Title: Weekend gateaway
Review: Perfect time to visit the lake as water levels increased . One should feel the  sunset and have good snaps
