Name: Ravindra V
Title: Nice place to visit when there is water
Review: This lake is nice place to visit and walk when there is water in the lake. There is a small dam where you can walk. There is a very small park as well. Other than that nothing much. Go when the weather is good and it has rained well recently.

Name: superb114
Title: Nice
Review: Nice place to visit but there are no water and it a long drive destination and best place to visit along with friends

Name: RajibLayek
Title: Nice long drive destination but not for Tourist !!
Review: This is a nice long drive destination in the evening. We went here couple of times and spend some soothing time in the afternoon. But this is not well maintained and noting much to see as water level is very low during the year and everything is fenced.So, this is a place where you can spend 1/2 hour but this is not a ideal place for tourist !!

Name: SuvodipMoitra
Title: Good drivethrough
Review: The dam road is a beatiful evening drive through. We took diversion from ORR. Opened our windows, pleasant breeze. Very scanty water though in the sagar lake.

Name: Sreedhar R
Title: Himayat sugar lake
Review: Birla temple is the nice and cool place in hyderabad  This lake  is near to many corporate office and engineering colleges ,  there is a temple near this lake  lord venkateshwara swamy. Here I found many couples,  family,  youngsters solo people use to come for this temple for peace of mind. Whenever my mind is not cool and when am in depression mood I always prefer this temple here I will get good peace of mind and relaxation

Name: BRKanth
Title: No Water to see but great breeze
Review: Went to this place along with family and there is absolutely no water. Unless if you wanted to have some fresh air, not much to see.

Name: Sivanageswara R... B
Title: A must visit place near Hyd
Review: I recently visited this place. It will be pleasant and eye catching in the evening.A must visit place for nature lovers.Best place to spend some time with family/friends in the evening.

Name: Ravi K
Title: lovers park
Review: Its a reservoir. water supplies from here for twin city's its a good place for family or friends gathering.

Name: rkkoya
Title: Good to see
Review: Himayat Sagar Lake is just ok. It can be reached by public and private transport as well.It has no special attraction now It was well planned during the olden days with high technology.

Name: travelMakesWiser
Title: Non tourist spot
Review: This place is not meant for tourists, though you will find people loitering around trying to get a good look at the lake. A reservoir, meant for water replenishment for the city, barricaded all around with high fences. The nursery next to the lake is in state of ultimate neglect. If you are a local who has kind of done everything else in Hyderabad this may be just a casual thing to cross off you "things to do in hyderabad" bucket list.

Name: AfrozJaved
Title: A clean family destination
Review: Himayat sagar has improved a lot with cleanliness, fencing, no drive zone on the lake and so on.  The place require slightly more maintenance, like the steps to go down opposite the dam.  There used to be a garden, that can be renovated and maintained.Stray Eunuchs still come to beg, but we did not find them as aggressive as encountered in Maharashtra and trains. The walk on the adjacent road is pleasant, best time to visit would be in December January, sunsets are really good near the lake.

Name: navedsaeed
Title: Great view
Review: This place is not well maintained. Though the place has great views around and the road around the lake provides great view while driving.

Name: DRSSDASH
Title: Azam Jah Lake
Review: This lake is situated around 12 km from the city of Hyderabad and named after  Mir Himayath Alikhan(Azam Jah) on river Musi to control floods in 1927.Very popular picnic spot .

Name: sudmaha
Title: Hangout in the Evening
Review: The place is full of public and have beautiful view in the evening. a good place to hangout on weekends.

Name: SukantaDe
Title: Sunset at Himayat Sagar Lake
Review: Its one of the nice place to visit along with the family. We visited the place on 7th Oct'15, while returning from Mahakali Temple to Chevella. Two/Three boats were floating on the lake water, may be the fishermen. One small dam, also observed. We enjoyed the scenic beauty of sunset....the shadow of the red coloured lake water during sunset....Cool breeze.....Kids were enjoyed a lot.

Name: seedhunter
Title: Nice water body with cool breeze.
Review: Located on south-west side of Hyderabad, this is artificial lake and a source of drinking water for the city. A small but nice dam is also there for controlling floods. Nice spot for evening hours to feel cool breeze as well as nice sun set. During summer, there is chances you may get any water in the lake.

Name: slayer_prashanth
Title: Beautifully built over a lake
Review: The powerful breeze that takes you off your tensions and soothens your mind after a full day work. A perfect place to be in the evenings with friends, family and also alone if you prefer.

Name: MARGDARSHI
Title: Tourism Potential To Be Developed
Review: While visiting Hyderabad any visitor would be impressed with the number of lakes & gardens that have been  built here by the rulers but this is also tinged with a sense of regret that the later rulers did not  build up on this foundations & fully exploited its tourism potential.This artificial lake is 20 kms from Hyderabad & was built by the last Nizam Osman ali Khan & named it after his youngest son Himayat Ali Khan.This lake was built in 1927 drawing the waters of the tributory of Musi river parallel to the Gandipet lake to cater to the water needs of the city & also as a flood control measure.A cool pleasant breeze welcomes you & is a good picnic spot.

Name: VikashTripurari
Title: Lake with winds !!
Review: visit any time you will get either cool breeze or nice winds. though its not a very hot spot to visit but good water body and its huge.must be developed as a good attraction as natural beauty is what you get here with fresh air

Name: manan_8712
Title: Great Experience
Review: It is great service provided and nice place to visit ever. Along with other places in hyderabad. It also on way of airport from city.

Name: panks_41086
Title: good for picnic
Review: This lake is beautiful, calm & peaceful. It is good for one day picnic. It is situated in out skirts of hyderabad city.

Name: PROF.HARAGOPAL MATHSYARAJA
Title: Himayath sagar lake
Review: In the out skirts of the city, on the way to and close to the airport we can find this lake and its tank bund is well maintained. How ever, thee days we find the lake slowly drying up due to encroachments on the riverbed.Once it was a nice picnic spot  for its scenic location now needs to be developed as an attractive tourist spot by developing parks and planting trees and making the place Echo friendly.

Name: Karan K
Title: A Scenic Beauty Within a drive able Distance. . !
Review: approximately about 30 min drive distance from Hi-tech City, this Lake is a very beautiful place to have a picnic with family or friends, just the 4th exit from the Outer Ring road from Gachibowli its a very calm and peaceful place with a lot of hot spots for a very artistic background perfect for Pics !! MIND YOU - its very very difficult to find any means of transport so make sure u have your own.. also there arent any food joints anywhere around this place  so make sure u take food with you, likes - very beautiful , not a single man made structure in sight once here, not many vehicles come by here hence no pollution, dislikes - not accessible via public transport easily, no food or atm available near around

Name: A Padma
Title: go for a morning walk
Review: it it one of those for somebody who wants to explore the beautiful nature spots around hyderabad. Enjoy your morning or evening walk, also good for bird watchers. Don't forget to carry your lunch pack, snacks, a camera and a book. you can select a quiet place and enjoy the lovely scenery of the lake while reading a book.

Name: vibha123
Title: Nice view always...especially in the evening..
Review: Himayat sagar is another place I feel like driving to many a times just to see the calm waters giving people peace..soothes the eye....but lacks maintenance like many other good places in the city of nawabs...

Name: SABER_Wanderlust
Title: No Fun due to Wires
Review: This is a place which was fun till sometime back, especially  in evenings. There are huge Jaalis now put up which spoils views, devoid the place of sitting around and enjoying the sunset.

Name: KASI VENKOBA RAO
Title: Himayat Sagar Lake-Picnic spot
Review: Himayat Sagar is an artificial lake situated at distance of about 20 Kms from Hyderabad in ,India. It lies parallel to an another artificial lake  called Osman Sagar and the place is known as Gandepet.. The Himayat Sagar along with Osman Sagar was a source for water supply to Hyderabad.till recently. But due to population growth it is not sufficient for water supply to Hyderabad city at present.Hussain Sagar Lake was built during the reign of the last Nizam of Hyderabad, Nizam VII and so it is named after his youngest son Himayat Ali Khan.. The grassy area adjoining the lake is an ideal picnic and recreation spot. The road atop the bund is popular for a good drive.Even now, large gatherings are seen on Week ends and public holidays. People from Hyderabad spend from morning till late evening and enjoy the spot which has cool breeze from the lake.Public transport is available from the city to reach the spot.

Name: subhanmirzabaig
Title: wonderful place in hyderabad
Review: its a wonderful place in hyderabad wher we can feel relax and confortable and awasome place good atmosphere

Name: KASI VENKOBA RAO
Title: Hyderabad Metro Easy and Fast Transport.
Review: Hyderabad Metro is one of the fastest mode of transport in the Twin City. At present three routes are covered, one from L B Nagar to Miyapur,  secondly from Nagole to Raidurg and the third One from Parade grounds to MG Bus Station.A comfortable journey in any route. The stations are well maintained. To avoid queues in the peak hours , one can take Metro Card which gives a 10% discount on every travel made.Metro trains are very punctual and traffic free .  Each Metro stations are provided Lifts, Escalators and steps on both sides of the station. Separate seats are provided for the benefit of Senior citizens and one Bogie is reserved for Ladies.

Name: jainms
Title: Metro Rail
Review: Great experience and we can avoid lot of traffic and pollution. Maintained neat and well also reaching destination is vert fast.

Name: Sri Satya Sai S
Title: Excellent mode of transport for Hyderabadis
Review: Good quality metro coaches, neat & reachable stations, mostly ontime metros, cleanest coaches describes L&T Metro Rail. This is the most efficient mode of transport for Hyderabadis. Its a boon to the citizens of Hyderabad. Thanks to the Metro, some of the roads of Hyderabad are widened and u-turn concept is brought at many junctions instead of traffic signals which is helping a lot in traffic movement. Names of some of the stations are not properly selected as metro station name and actual place name are not at the same place (example are Bala Nagar, JNTU, Raidurg etc). Should start metro in other routes also where traffic is high.

Name: sree143in
Title: Good view
Review: L&T Started metro service to hyderabad people. in telangana. it runs a metro for every 4 minuts. connects almost 30 Km. fast and easy to reach destination.

Name: Shanti Swaroop K
Title: Never before experience in Hyderabad
Review: The best way to commute in Hyderabad. I was a regular commuter before I shifted near to my workplace. The prices are reasonable and it is definitely a state-of-the-art mass transportation system in Hyderabad.

Name: BRKanth
Title: Great international experience
Review: I have traveled using the Hyd metro rail and it was a pleasant experience and the staff and others are very cooperative. Truly worldclass experience.

Name: Srinsiri
Title: Hyderabad Metro
Review: Hyderabad Metro, makes every hyderabadi very proud. It is adding a new feather in already super duper hyderabad city.

Name: savvyuec
Title: Excellent Service
Review: The Hyderabad metro provides very good service to the commuters.It can also be used to go to Secunderabad railway station which is .5 KM from the metro station. With the Hi-Tech City line also starting it provides very good connectivity as well and not as congested yet as the Bangalore metro.As some trivia, it is a tribute to the engineering prowess of L&T given the Metro Man (E Sreedharan) had casted doubt on its feasibility given the rocky terrain of Hyderabad.

Name: EkMusafir
Title: Faster, Cleaner, Cooler, Cheaper.
Review: Traveling by the L&T Metro Rail of Hyderabad is a much better option of getting around the congested city. It is faster because it avoids the long waits at the traffic signals. It is cleaner by far than the dusty streets, cooler because all the bogies are air conditioned and much cheaper than road transport if you are traveling alone. Recently the Blue Line got an extension from Ameerpet to Hitech City. We used the metro to travel from Hitech City to Secunderabad East to catch our Shatabdi Express from Secunderabad Junction Main Station. It took us 40 minutes in the metro and 10 minutes to walk from Secunderabad metro station to the main station. If we had taken a rickshaw or cab it would have taken us an hour and a half. At the metro stations, elevators are available to take you up from the road level to the platform level. The staff are very helpful and guide you to the concourse. There are some seats reserved for senior citizens and ladies. Small luggage can be kept under the seats.For the local commuters of Hyderabad, the Metro is a blessing, as it serves as a Rapid Transport System, avoiding the massive traffic jams and bottlenecked roads which the city is fast becoming. It serves the main areas of Hyderabad, but one still has to make use of the buses and autos to connect to the outlying areas. Work on expansion and new routes are still underway, and hopefully should be operative in the near future.

Name: idea614354
Title: First Metro
Review: Hyderabad First metro is running by L&T they started recently in hyderabad for public use. very nice and good.

Name: Dilip kumar
Title: One of the best invention
Review: This has gained lot of imoortance in less days by making all the passengers comforatbel and is easily to be enjoyed while travelling

Name: GLOBALSEAS
Title: metro
Review: time saver for travelers in Hyderabad every 3-5 mins we have a metro connecting to reach all places in Hyderabad

Name: Usha65
Title: Very convenient
Review: The Metro provides smooth travel and hassle free travel in the crowded traffic areas. Very well maintained and has all the accessory facilities like lifts, washroom facilities in the platform,

Name: SRIKAKOLAPU
Title: well maintained
Review: Its well maintained though cost is on the higher side .Seating is problem during peak times.Its world class in terms of infrastructure

Name: vinodkhedkar
Title: Good Connectivity
Review: L&T metro rail service is a good connectivity project in Hyderabad city. This metro service is useful for both local residents and tourists. Hygienic railways stations and trains are the main features of this metro rail.Staff at tickets counters are helpful.We traveled in this city using Metro rail service. Indeed, a very nice experience.

Name: Daniel T
Title: Awesome thing in Hyderabad
Review: L&T Metro Rail is one of the best things to happen to Hyderabad as a city. The fully air-conditioned transport will change the way city dwellers will commute in the coming future.Well connected from Nagole to Miyapur, MGBS, Lakdikapool, Ameerpet - almost all major places of the city are covered.All stations are neat & clean. Do travel via Hyd Metro once.

Name: Paul G
Title: Bird's-eye view -- of widely travelled roads when growing up in Secunderabad
Review: It was nostalgic as I enjoyed the Metro Rail travel looking at the places from above, which I frequently travelled on my 1962 Vespa, while growing up in Secunderabad. Took the metro from Begumpet to Secunderabad .Neat and clean. Less crowded during off peak hours. Fare is cheap- The fare is Rs 10 for 2 km, Rs 15 for 4 km and steadily increases to Rs 55 for up to 26 kms. The fare for a distance more than 26 km has been fixed at Rs 60. The maximum you pay is Aud$1.20 (1/3rd price of a cappuccino). I advise Visitors to avoid traffic and travel on the Metro Rail and have a wonderful experience while exploring the city.

Name: vijayagopal
Title: Has made local travel stress free
Review: Traveling from Nagole to most parts of the commercial parts of the city has become easy with the metro. Just awaiting opening of line till hitec city.

Name: Lokesh1981
Title: Hyderabad Metro
Review: 1. No doubt that it is a breakthrough transformation for the City both social as well as on economical front.2. I took many trips in last couple of months, however on long run how management is going to sustain maintenance related issues that may be a herculean challenge.3. All proposed networks shall be completed at the earliest and put on use for the public.4. LB Nagar to Nagole connection is strategic requirement and much needed, it shall be instrumental to make it a grand success, or else it is at present quite inconvenient, 5. Price is on much higher side, for daily users it is painful and not economic at all, management may rethink and plan accordingly.6. Naming of all stations may be re looked  which is at present quite confusing !!!!All the best management, no doubt it is pride of hyderabad!!!!!

Name: koteswararao
Title: New and good Metro Rail
Review: In India this is  new metro rail  People of Hyderabad happy with the rail   The transport is good  The govt done good work

Name: kkespana2016
Title: Practical & efficient!
Review: A welcome addition not only to Hyderabad commuter landscape but also for sheer pleasure of riding on a train which is what I did with my two young children. It was also an opportunity to take pride in the native land’s evolving infrastructure!My children loved the ride and I took delight in guiding them to my native city from an elevated level. The stations and the trains were clean, and the staff everywhere. Just needs ongoing daily maintenance to keep the user-experiences at higher levels. I do sincerely wish that the users let people get off the trains first before ‘barging’ in. Metro authority must do more to raise awareness and enhance travel etiquette amongst the general population!Shops and supermarkets located at Ameerpet junction, and presumably at major intersections offer convenience shopping for commuters.A few points on my wish list would be;1. There needs to be an option of buying a return ticket and it needs to be slightly cheaper, keeping in with Europeans rail networks. This not only will be user-friendly but also proudly announces to the world that India cares for its people.2. It was annoying having to leave the station, ie exit the barriers to buy the return ticket! One should be able to buy it without doing so I’d imagine!3. Can’t wait to see introduction of prepaid smart cards!4. Station parking facilities need to be more robust to encourage higher usage of the service.5. Last but not least, I didn’t agree with the policy that children were charged at adult rates. Sincerely request that this needs reviewing!On the whole,the Metro is a step in the right direction and I’m pleased to have used it with my children. Well done Team Hyderabad Metro.

Name: muthukrish2000
Title: Metro
Review: Compared to Delhi, Bangalore not all the lines are open yet. Only for a shorter distance currently it's opened. I was expecting from OMC to charminar but it's not available. It was crowded and not well maintained.

Name: Devdas P
Title: Worst Travellers & Worst Systems
Review: Public are not allowing to get downAs if there's huge gap between the manners and literary hereIn Mumbai and Delhi they follow a system of getting down and getting in.Here there are no attendants, people just push back people inside and always a problem of mannersNo systemsNo mannersNo senseBehave like illiterateOnly outsiders know systemAir-conditioning is UselessLots of suffocation

Name: Karthik Dasu
Title: One of the better ones
Review: It is on par with Mumbai metro.The maintainence is pretty decent.A very good transportation facility.

Name: PROF.HARAGOPAL MATHSYARAJA
Title: Saves time
Review: Introduction of METRO rail in Hyderabad is really good to control traffic problems on roads.. Now Nagole to Ameerpet  Metro line is in operation.   Lb nagar to City center (Now on trial )

Name: Subbarami Reddy
Title: Awesome addition to Hyderabad
Review: Travelled from Miyapur to Begumpet.These station's looks small from outside but they are very spacious.Ameerpet exchange is damn good ...only compain is price is little higher.

Name: shivaraikod
Title: A long wait
Review: It seemed like i had been waiting since ages to take a joy ride in this metro as i stay a bit far away and this doesn't come on the way to my office neither. The cost seems to be a bit higher when compared with other metros however the staff are really helpful who are helping out at every stage in each station for the convenience of the public as this being a new one to the city.

Name: Georgio Valentino Rayala
Title: From Nizampet To Begumpet in 30 minutes
Review: I had to go to White House building for some work and decided to use the metro as the building is located close to the Begumpet metro station.The train was not crowded and I got a seat. I reached Ameerpet station within 20 minutes and from there it took 10 minutes to reach begumpet station.The journey was very comfortable and I just hope they will start full services very soon.

Name: naiduks24
Title: GREAT SERVICES TO HYDERABAD CITY
Review: The Metro Rail inaugurated during this year and the services are very good, the fare is justified, you can sit and watch the city, a nice Metro rail.

Name: Kirannelli
Title: Pride of Hyderabad
Review: Went to Ameerpet from Rasul pura in metro which took 10 mins(normally it takes 40mins by road). Thanks to metro. Journey was so convenient and smooth. Best for hyd to avoid heavy road traffic.

Name: TraveFreak
Title: Life saver
Review: can you imagine reaching Ameerpet to Kukatpally in 15 mins? Well, now you can with train services every 8 mins on a luxurious Air conditioned coaches. It feels more secured with a security check towards the platform and with train doors automatically closing avoiding people dangerously hanging on the steps.There are still some small vendors selling stuff inside the coaches and some irritated folks issuing tickets at the counter. But, with smart cards, easy recharging options can help avoid queues making life damn easy. Kudos Hyderabad!

Name: Georgio Valentino Rayala
Title: Awesome Metro Train Service In Hyderabad
Review: It has been in the making for a long time and finally it opened its service on November 28 th 2017. Only half of the two lines [Red and Blue] are opened i.e. from Miyapur station to Ameerpet station [Red Line] and Nagole station to Ameerpet station [Blue Line] and you have change the train at Ameerpet station if you want to travel from Miyapur to Nagole.I travelled the full length i.e. from Nagole station to Miyapur station and it cost me sixty rupees on January 2 nd 2018 and it has been a great experience. The train coaches were modern and the staff working were very efficient. I hope they start the full operations very soon which will help reduce traffic and pollution in Hyderabad.

Name: SRIKAKOLAPU
Title: good
Review: Has a history of 150+ years and it is decently maintained.Great architecture. Peaceful and gives a amazing experience

Name: Jitendra K
Title: Very beautiful
Review: So much of positivity and so much of peace it was mind blowing experience. Must visit place at least once

Name: idea614354
Title: Big church
Review: Big church in this area, Christmas celebrations will do very highly. lot of people will come here in this season.

Name: Daniel T
Title: One of oldest & most recognised Church in Hyderabad
Review: Those who grew up in Hyderabad, Gunfoundry was one area very famous in 90's. This Church was a major landmark in this area. Located between All Saints High School & Rosary convent, its an iconic Church.We grew up in its vicinity. Have fond memories of the bell which rings every evening signalling the start of Mass.Nice place of worship. Sunday worship is attended by thousands. Worth a visit for a tourist.

Name: DILIP2dilip
Title: Peaceful church
Review: One of the oldest churches in india. It is a peaceful church for you Sunday mas. I have attached mass timings in a photo. It has a glorious history. A monument indicating the same is displayed at the entrance.It has a adoration chapel for offering your prayers.

Name: lovetravelonly
Title: Oldest Cathedral
Review: It is said to be one of the oldest churches in India. This church is soo old but well maintained though it is not a  famous  tourist destination. Amust visit to this place to know the ancient religion and cultural background.

Name: Shailendra
Title: One of the oldest church in Hyderabad
Review: Saint Joseph Cathedral is a Catholic Church located in Gunfoundry Hyderabad. It is one of the oldest and beautiful historic church in Hyderabad notable for the beautiful architecture and huge bells.Worth a visit if you are   interested in history and architecture.

Name: GreenCarpet11
Title: You got to see the Bells
Review: St. Joseph's Cathedral standing tall , aloft a high standing area.A church that stands there telling a story of the treasures it holds within.The Bell fascinates me. Can you imagine the Ave Maria being played on these bells.You got to hear it ring.Visit at around 12 in the noon and hear your heart thud with the clanging of the bells in your ears.The clock high on the Cathedral has been ticking since 1852?! It really speaks a great story from the depth of the past.The doors, the pieta, chandelier, the painting from the Nizam, the relic of the Holy Cross, The relic of St. Antony and a lot more. Feel like a prayer and a song.See it and enjoy it. Pray and Sing. You love it.

Name: Veer2468
Title: Beautiful
Review: Very beautiful Church. It is one place which provides a lot of peace. Must visit when you are in Hyderabad.

Name: Manish K
Title: Very beautiful and peaceful church
Review: St. Josephs Cathedral is located near Basheerbagh and is well worth a visit. I visited this cathedral as well as got to attend the mass (it's closed at other times). Worth seeing are the bell tower and the relief of St. Joseph holding the infant Jesus. Do not miss the lovely statues of Jesus Christ and all the apostles outside the church, they deserve a few photographs. A place which provides one peace and satisfaction.

Name: 48aravindh
Title: Beautifully crafted church...!!!
Review: It is one of the oldest churches in INDIA, the architecture of the church depicts old Roman catholic one, it is easily accessible, the church was soo old and well maintained, it is completely untouched tourist destination, less crowdy, the landscape at the background adds over extra beauty, the priests were soo professional.. overall it's a must visit attraction in Hyderabad...!!!

Name: Raoul P
Title: Very beautiful church
Review: Heard Wednesday mass at this church, beautiful and very old church. Location is not easily accessible and needs maps and/or direction to reach here.

Name: raja p
Title: excellent
Review: this is a beautiful and ancient church in hyderabad.it is 200 years old church.it has beautiful architecture.it is a roman catholic cathedral.

Name: vibha123
Title: Memorable & beautiful Cathedral
Review: I remember visiting this cathedral for my best friends wedding...and trust me its a beautiful place to be...Its calm..soothing and peace giving...you will be at peace....inner peace they call it...Must visit if you believe in visiting all places of worship..

Name: Rohitflies
Title: Grand old Church
Review: It is a century old church but it is well maintained even to date . One can't fail to admire the architecture and interiors of the church.

Name: JnKumar
Title: Serenity at its best
Review: The structure is more than a hundred years old.One gets a good view of the hussle bustle all around.they also have services in quite a few languages.

Name: Dhrubashis
Title: Oldest and beautiful church
Review: It's a beautiful church with historic memories. One of the oldest church in Hyderabad and maintained well. I went there on Xmas day last year.

Name: keralablogger
Title: Nice church with English mass every day
Review: Located this church by surfing the net for English mass in Hyderabad. This roman Catholic Church is almost two centuries old, and maintained well. I went there by taxi and the nearest landmark is the gun foundry.  Here are some clicks of mine.

Name: Santoso Jaeri
Title: Not recommended
Review: At the first impression it will be wonderfull mall. But when enrer thst place there is very limited counter and some of them are closed.

Name: Wilayat
Title: Casual visit
Review: Kashmir Emporio is your go-to. The fact that Kashmiri Emporio has plenty of embroidered sling bags with tassels, ponchos in maroons, blues, and greens, and totally adorable fur shawls makes it quite awesome.

Name: jainms
Title: Good place
Review: One of the best mall in Hyderabad. located in center of the city but not so many options for shopping, parking is good here.

Name: mka003
Title: Big mall near Mangalore central railway station
Review: A good mall with almost all the brands. It is spread over in four floors and there are enough outlets for food also.

Name: latika d
Title: A little bit of everything in the mall
Review: There is a little of everything for everyone here. You will find branded wear of different budgets. From boutiques to budget buys to higher brand wear. My favorites are the Crossword with the cafe attached and the DIY gift shop

Name: scud56
Title: Usual mall shopping but some good restaurants up on the 5th floor
Review: This is an easy walk for most people staying in Banjara Hills and whilst the shops are almost all clothing retailers there is a good choice of restaurants up on the 5th floor, including the amazing Sahib Sindh Sultan.

Name: Rajivglobaltraveller
Title: Good shopping mall in the City
Review: The mall is located at prime location at Mall Road. The mall is big and there is large number of shopping shops and restaurants too. You can shop here for many of the brands. The kids can play the games. The parking is good.

Name: Dhruv M
Title: Detiorated Mall.
Review: This mall used be be my favorite for quick shopping until a few years ago, but has now detiorated badly. The mall was bought over by another firm since then and they have ruined it. It is so poorly maintained that it actually stinks when you enter the mall (after McDonald's). The stairs and toilets are dirty and all of the stores it was known for have closed down (Timezone, ezone, levis etc.)

Name: deepa v
Title: Good collection
Review: Men's formal clothing is good.Suits are good.Check Van Heusen brand and Manyavar for marriage collections.Situated in city centre,becomes very accessible.

Name: mohamedriji
Title: Good mall
Review: Even though this mall is in the heart of the city, there is not much crowd. It has outlets of almost all brands and a good food court. For those who enjoy shopping without rush, this one is an ideal choice.

Name: Shri Krishan Kansal
Title: Ordinary Mall
Review: Opposite Taj Krishana on Banjara Hills this mall do not have good brands rather ordinary brands. Kids goods in basement shops and fbd are some what gives a little bit choice.

Name: bose_rima
Title: Big mall in Banjara Hills
Review: Being centrally located has its advantages, and the mall houses a decent number of brands with options for food too.

Name: niya27
Title: In Banjara Hills
Review: I visited this mall in the afternoon. It was not much crowded at that time. There was many branded shops here. The food court is on the top floor, which spreads over a large area.

Name: hingarajiya s
Title: Good mall for visiting mall and for buying shopping items.
Review: This is good mall for visiting mall and for buying shoping items i have many items to shop in this mall and this is time pass to it in mall.

Name: drn85
Title: City centre mall.. good one..
Review: City centre mall is located in the banjara hills close to the rainbow hospital and LV prasad eye hospital. It has got adequate parking space and almost all famous brands are having an outlet here. I visited the mc Donald's which is located in the first floor. It was a bit busy kind, but they are so quick in their service. Altogether it's a good place to spend our leisure time in Hyderabad.

Name: Amazing_Neo
Title: An Average place for shopping
Review: many people visit this place to shop for various brands available here.Has a well spaced area for shops and Decent food options available too.

Name: fatih75
Title: Good choice
Review: It is small mall put you get all needed especially T-shirt and trouser brand , i purchased shirt from Urbana fantastic water proof good for raining season

Name: annejang
Title: A good place to shop
Review: Not a very huge mall but it caters to most of our needs. Good options for clothes and shoes. Even cosmetics. Decent food places are available as well. Do see a lot of kids in the play area.

Name: Payal G
Title: Go for food
Review: A small mall by today's standards. Shopping options are more or less the usual brands available in malls across India. Was quite crowded on Sunday evening. Rather the restaurant options are better. For Indian/mughlai style food go to Sahib Sindh Sultan. Food may seem expensive but the ambience and food quality make it up.

Name: Georgio Valentino Rayala
Title: Nice Mall for Parents with Kids
Review: This Mall is located on the Road No.01,Banjara Hills just Opposite to the Barbeque Nation restaurant and I visited this Mall on June 17th 2017 along with a friend after having lunch.It was celebrating its 10 th Anniversary and there was a small event happening on the ground floor and next to it was the kids play area and a small fish spa.This Mall is divided into Six levels and on the top level there were various restaurants like Sahib singh sultan, Aromas of china, Firangi Paani etc.There was a food court and a bowling alley along with a Laser gaming zone on the fourth level.Other then that there were Max store, Globus Store, Reliance Trends, FBB Store along with a Mc Donalds and a cafe coffee Day.We were there for two hours from 4 pm to 6 pm and by the time we were leaving it started becoming crowded.Over all I think its a good mall for parents with kids as they can leave them in the play area and relax for a while.

Name: zap r
Title: Not a must visit place.
Review: 1. This mall is quite expensive for shopping.2. Quite a few good brands outlets available.3. Location is good, easy to access, in the city.4. Restaurants, play zone, cinema etc..5. Quite a small mall.

Name: RAVI K
Title: Best place for Shopping
Review: Best place for dining has 4 great restaurants on the 5th floor ground floor has shopping and mcd and 4 th floor has food court with health lovers, the sultans, and many more has shopping for almost all brands fbb reliance Titan fastrack crossword and cafe coffe day...And has svm bowling and games centre on 3rd floor with laser ops which is a must experience of your in a group of more than 5 will have the best time ... With just 125 per head for 15 mins...

Name: Pushpendra M
Title: GREAT
Review: Its really very good place for everyone like children, young couple and old age persons. Everything is here like food, shopping, games, movies etc.

Name: Ravindra V
Title: Small mall
Review: This is a small mall with options like PVR multiplex, bowling etc. Probably oldest mall in Hyderabad.

Name: DrBennyC
Title: Great Place
Review: This mall has some nice branded showrooms and a food court on the top floor. PVR also is inside this mall. A nice place overall

Name: anshuvilla
Title: Good mall
Review: but most restaurant on top floor closed for renovation.  They have most good shops in mall.  Parking is free.  Which is rare as from Delhi.

Name: Repala S
Title: DONT LEAVE IT...
Review: Its one of the best and famous mall of Hyderabad.It is full at all type of material that is enjoyed by everyone.he mall includes Marks and Spencer, as well as a range of movies, music, books, coffee shops, a food court, supermarket and restaurants.

Name: indiragogineni
Title: Good
Review: Restaurants used to be good here but not up to the mark now....there's Cafe Coffee Day within the book store on the ground floor and one can walk in, have coffee and also get to read some books there....coffee is served in large cups and is priced at 150/- per cup...parking space available in the cellar...can shop for some good stuff here

Name: shivaraikod
Title: Small but good one
Review: The mall is small but is in the heart of the city. This one is good for shopping and eatery which is a kind of one time.

Name: ReetaKarki
Title: Shopping and eating in the mall.
Review: Not a very big mall but has almost everything that you get in a bigger mall. Good restaurants and good number of shopping brands.

Name: Georgio Valentino Rayala
Title: Average Mall
Review: This Mall looks like one which was famous once upon a time and after the entry of the dazzling new Malls it looks like it lost it's glory.It is small compared to GVK One Mall which is nearby but contains every thing one looks for in a Mall.It's got a Gaming Zone,Food Court,Stores like Max,FBB and Reliance Trends and also nice little place to Hangout and for children to play.

Name: vmohanv
Title: Ok for a visit once while but very small
Review: A very small..don't know whether it's ok to be called a mall at all. Attracts a little crowd and not a kind of place if you wish to hang around in a happening place. Children's play area is overpriced as compared to the kind of games available.

Name: Prasad B
Title: Good Mall with all amenities...
Review: All types of stores with state of art amenities...Good hospitality and other arrangementsNeed to improve on Infrastructure.

Name: Sravan Vadde
Title: Decent Place
Review: this mall has good combination of stores, places to hang out and restaurants. there is some event going on at the mall's common area more often than not.

Name: Ram P
Title: Good place
Review: Nice place but the selection is not as vast as the other malls in the city but has good stores. The restaurants are good and the pan was great 😀Recommended!

Name: Suvarghya
Title: Decent mall
Review: This is a decent mall in the Banjara Hills area. There are better shopping malls than this one, can skip this.

Name: DrStrategy
Title: Hangout place
Review: City Center mall is located in the heart of Hyderabad. There are 4 floors which are filled with shopping stores and the entire fifth floor is of restaurants, and the laser ops, bowling are the best part to hangout i think.

Name: 640sameerp
Title: Boring mall
Review: No WiFi, no branded shops.No AC chilling. Bad mall. GVK one and Inorbit is better than it.If they could add Free Wi-Fi, I am sure they will get lot of customers.

Name: Nish0901
Title: Good Mall to spend some time here
Review: This mall is situated in the Banjara Hills. It is just a normal mall will a lot of branded stores. On the top floor, there are 8-10 eateries. You can spend some good time in this mall with your family.

Name: Praveen K
Title: As the Name Suggests this is in city center
Review: In teh center of city in banjara hills this mall is truely in the city center. has a good range of shopping and eateries.

Name: health34
Title: Great mall in Banjara Hill
Review: City center  mall is  in the  great  locality of  Banjara hills.  Very good  mall with many  branded items show rooms and  big  food court which  houses  so many  branded  eateries. Nice place where  people hang around  to spend  their  evenings.  Do visit this  place, enjoy shopping , dining

Name: Mohammed S
Title: Small mall to hangout
Review: It was a good experience many brands like fbb and max give a good dress and main thing it has a bowling alley and specially lazer ops had an awesome time they charge Rs120 for 12 minutes for a person

Name: SanjayPanjiyar
Title: Good Mall for kids wear
Review: A good place to have all the items needed for young kids available in one roof. The basement is full of kids store. Otherwise average place.

Name: nitinydv28
Title: It just a normal mall.
Review: It just a normal mall with some known brands. There is one bowling arcade at the top floor and laser light shooting arcade. Few restaurants are there too and few small food stalls. You can visit KBR National Park if you are visiting here. It just few KMs from City Centre Mall.

Name: Suhail D
Title: Good mall to relax
Review: Was not very busy but good place to hang around. Shopping was good. cheap bargains a@ max store. COOL place to spend some time with family

Name: darshanshah_01
Title: Ok types mall
Review: Ok types mall where you have good options for fine dining restaurants..for shopping you will find more of local stores than branded outlets.

Name: Arun V
Title: Interesting Place to Roam and have fun
Review: Good Place to have some fun with friends and family!!! Very exciting to have some good food in the restaurants and enjoy quality time with friends making the visit altogether an experience to reckon again.

Name: Karan K
Title: Has no spark at all
Review: May be this carries the tittle of - A Mall , but to be honest there are plenty of better places in hyd and even better , just a few minutes away from city center, there is a big lack of a multiplex in the place, and as far as stores go, yes it has a few, but not up to the level for the other Malls, likes - a small time mall , easy in and easy outdislikes - over hyped and not much to do apart from shop and shop and just carries a couple of eateries,,,,

Name: seedhunter
Title: Nicely located but crowded
Review: Very nicely located on Road No. 1, it is one of the good city malls of Hyderabad. Being bit small, it becomes crowded on weekends. You may get almost all the brands here.

Name: AmitVikram
Title: All brands and all things under one roof
Review: It is the best spot for any Hyderabadi and a short-term tourist like me for shopping.It has offers on any given day and if you are lucky then you can get 30 % - 50 % for most days in a week and wear branded clothes at cheaper rates.

Name: Akillchowdary
Title: Business and leisure for shopping and corporate decisions
Review: On one side: Lots of shopping malls with eateries and movies - for entertainment cum shoping purpose with foodiesOn another side:Corporate businesses with high level companies and their growths...I love this mall with entertainment cum shopping , both childrens and families(including couples and lovers)can visit this place...

Name: Supraja
Title: Enjoyed shopping
Review: I have been to this mall for shopping seriously I enjoyed my entire shopping I visited shoppers stop etc..

Name: Nishi
Title: Manjeera Trinity Mall
Review: Nice time pass place in Kphb, can hangout with friends and family, Have movie theater also, so you can have fun there.

Name: Srisadhana
Title: Small but good one in this area
Review: Though the mall is small we can find all amenities here. All international brands have their stores here. My favourite is cloth section. I just spenders endless hours here. Restrooms are always maintained well which I feel good about this mall.

Name: ramakrishnabanoth3
Title: Small but decent mall.
Review: Looks small compared to other malls but has enough facilities and availability of fashion stores.Food court on the top with various stores.

Name: Ratna Kamalakar V
Title: Mall with limited options
Review: A mall with minimum options. However, decathlon's presence makes this place popular. Food options are about average.

Name: Krishna C
Title: Not a must see place
Review: This place is good for movies...not a great shopping place..for sports yes..you have Decathlon...Not recommended with young kids...

Name: Kumar
Title: The Worst place which I have naver seen
Review: As I have visited the mall in the month of May, People always walk-in to the mall for Multiple perpose, As I am a common man, which I have visited for shopping, when I have entered in to the parking space they were charging the Money for Parking space.When I have asked them why are you charging fees for parking, then the person person replied me very Harshly who is an incharge at parking area.As I have visited multiple malls, no one is charging the fees for parking, only Manjeera Commercial mall is one who are charging the fees for parking even if u park it for 5 min.As I am a customer the way the person from parking space treated my very badly and harshly.What the bloody service u provide to the customers. Bloody service.I want to file a suit against the mall becz of the worst support.

Name: ramakrishnabanoth3
Title: Mini mall with all facilities
Review: It's a mall which has everything like movies,shopping, and food places too.A mini spot to chill out with friends.

Name: beyondtravel
Title: Modest mall
Review: Located in the crowded kukatpally area, is a modest mall offering decathlon, hypercity, cinepolis etc.

Name: kurukuntla raviteja
Title: Manjeera
Review: Manjeera mall is located in Hyderabad near kphb it is good place TO watch the movies there is a shopping complex sounds effect is good you Will comfortable with this mall

Name: Georgio Valentino Rayala
Title: Nice Anchor Stores Like Decathlon, Hypercity and Shoppers Stop
Review: I had to shop for sports wear from Decathlon so I visited this place along with a friend. It is a nice mall with several Anchor stores like Decathlon, Hypercity, Shoppers Stop, Cinepolis and Lifestyle is also opening very soon.Also it has a nice food court and various eating out places like McDonalds, Café Coffee Day, KFC, Tibbs Frankie etc. Also there is a bowling and gaming area on the top floor called SVM Bowling. It is also not that crowded like the other mall nearby.

Name: njydlife
Title: Best place
Review: One of the nice place for movies and some shopping. This place also a food court with kfc & mcd outlets

Name: SVRSAGAR
Title: Small mall but have major shops, cinema, food courts
Review: Located at prime place near to hitec city , in KPHB. Though small one, it has major shops like Decathlon, Hyper City etc., Cinepolis in 4th floor for movie buffs. Food courts and bowling area would add to spend half a day. Parking management needs improvement though

Name: Medagam Praveen
Title: For Quick Shopping
Review: One of the best and beautiful shopping mall,Love Shoppers Stop & Hypercity in it.It has Cinepolis and Several Restaurants to Dine in.Most of the Movie & TV shows Shootings happens here.It has KFC & Mc'D to dine in.Mavericks to Drink.

Name: Georgio Valentino Rayala
Title: Nice Mall with a Decathlon Store
Review: It is a small mall compared to the Forum Sujana Mall which is located close to this Mall [5 minutes walk] but what I liked about this mall is the existence of a Decathlon store in its ground floor. Also there is a Hypercity department store right next to the Decathlon store.I visited it along with a friend and we watched a movie at Cinepolis multiplex which was good. Next we had snacks at the McDonalds outlet on the first floor and after that we explored the mall. It has a Shoppers Stop outlet on two floors of the mall and a SVM gaming zone on the third floor.Also there is a Toni and Guy Saloon and various other retail brands but it doesn't have high quality restaurants like the Forum mall.

Name: KASI VENKOBA RAO
Title: Not Impressive
Review: Manjeera Trinity Mall, is located at KPHB Colony, Kukatpally, Hyderabad.  Manjeera mall is has 6 levels of shopping pleasure and 4 levels of parking space. Manjeera Mall is said to be from the house of Manjeera Group which is committed to providing world class infrastructure, retail and living spaces to its patrons.  The Mall has a mix of National & International Brands like  Shoppers Stop, Hyper City, Cinepolis, Canon, Nike, Pepe Jeans, Wrangler, Jash, Soch, Woodland, BIBA, AND, Global Desi, Mc Donalds, KFC, Subway, Casio, Titan, Celio etc. But I observed that many shops have since closed for the reasons now known. But It has a number of food courts and Cinepolis multiplex theatres. One can enjoy the food as multiple choices of food are available here. We were here at this mall to watch a movie and spent some time at this mall. However I an not impressed about the shops at the mall.  its just ok for window shoping and to spend some time here with family/friends.

Name: Vidyadevisaroja
Title: Good mall in prominent area.
Review: Great place to shop, eat and enjoy. It is a good package of having fun, events to participate, movies, parties, exploring. I witnessed many flashmobs, film shooting, events because of its design allows great view than any other mall in the city.

Name: Chahar Ajay Kumar
Title: One shop Stop
Review: Let it be Shopping, Fun , entertainment ,masti time with friends just walk-in along with your family members to have a family time or friends to have the best of your time or your professional crew for time apart from job along with colleagues

Name: savvyuec
Title: Cinepolis, Hypercity, Shoppers Stop and Decathon
Review: It is a very good option to watch movies at Cinepolis. The price is more reasonable than Forum and the parking is more accessible as it is less crowded than forum.Shopping options are rather limited compared to Forum, In-Orbit as quite a few shops have closed down for some reason but you have HyperCity, Shoppers Stop, Woodlands and Decathon is opening soon.Food options are decent, although slightly less than other larger malls but it is not a problem.You also have games arcade and bowling alley in the mall.

Name: Jikuza
Title: Decent shopping and food options
Review: This is typically a run of the mill mall with a few fast food outlets such as McDonalds, Jumbo King Vadapav, a few restaurants, shopping outlets and a movie multiplex by INOX. It is a decent place to spend time but Forum Mall nearby is better than this one.

Name: njydlife
Title: Nice mall
Review: This is a very good mall in very close proximity to jntu and have public transport availabale to this place

Name: Prasad B
Title: Simple and sober shopping destination
Review: Mall has pleasant infrastructure and nice shopping and entertainment amenities....However,it needs a proper ventilation.

Name: Sukhbir K
Title: Shop, Eat, Play, Watch movies!
Review: Again I would say, it's a regular mall. the specialty is the newly opened Cinepolis cinemas which are really good for watching 3D movies, that's why i visit this place- to experience the real-D of Cinepolis! and sometimes to shop too :)

Name: jayapratap
Title: Budjet spending mall
Review: It is convenient to spend the time with family and kids in this mall. Has access to cinema and the food stuff is less costlier while comparing with the other malls in hyderabad.

Name: Ravindra V
Title: Nice mall
Review: This was one of the most visited malls in kphb area before forum mall started. Due to forum mall (within a km), this mall is comparatively less crowded. However there is Hypercity, shoppers stop and cinepolis multiplex which is making this mall occupied. On the top but one floor there is food court along with movie hall.

Name: Sudheer chowdar... s
Title: One of the best Malls in Hyderabad
Review: The spacious food court is my fab in manjeera Mall. The food court has almost all the top branded fast foods and it is a great place to hang out with friends. It also has 5 movie screens and the show timings are good. You will have atleast one show every time you visit. It also has branded cloth showrooms, furniture showroom and many more.

Name: naveenmn
Title: Nice Mall
Review: Ambience of mall is good. It has may showrooms, food outlets and multiplex too. Location is right near to JNTU. Its good mall to visit near Kukatpally.

Name: Repala S
Title: GREAT AMBIANCE....
Review: One of best and big mall in Hyderabad very good and cool ambiance very nice and large place to shop and we can enjoy a lot here parking huge facility many branded shops like .lifestyle,puma etc. money is little costly and huge place to sit and eat we fell very comfortable to shop

Name: ronitsingla
Title: Awesome mall
Review: Very good mall in kukatpally. It is full of branded stores. Eating stuff is also available in wide variety there.

Name: ravirjy
Title: Good mall
Review: Its good mall and very near to Kukatpally kphb and nizampet residents. Its very much crowd on Saturday and Sunday. Nice place to see

Name: Ramm
Title: Poor facilities!
Review: Well, its a decent mall around Kukatpally and there is no doubt about it when it comes to proximity or positioning and also has few super stores like Shoppers stop and Hypermart along with few branded stores.Lets start from the parking: Poor direction signage's, parking to mall is entry is not at all welcoming.Important: If you plan to use the rest-room next to the lift lobby on Shoppers stop side, please carry a mask and enter, i suggest-avoid if you can. This was one of the point i want to stress on, value of a place is directly proportional to its cleanliness and this is lacking to the core.  Well, moving on to Cinepolis, you will have a bang during the intermission of the film, the food is over-priced, a piece of chocolate cake - INR 100+, Popcorn starts - 120+ etc. This pricing becomes value for money when the management provides the right amenities to the visitor.A place, has a lot of potential to improve in all means!

Name: raavi2006
Title: Excellent mall
Review: Trinity mall is excellent mall. It is having restaurant mobile shops. Most of the things are available in this mall.

Name: Rvmanyata
Title: Very good Mall
Review: The Mall is very good having various types of shoes for shopping. Good multiplexes for movies lovers. Weekends more fun games are conducted by various corporates for children and few times having occassions are conducted by like by FM radio city,  cine stars. Overall should have good time spending time in the Mall. But the Last not the least is the Mall is providing around 45 minutes of free wifi to enjoy on internet.

Name: ravirjy
Title: Fun Place
Review: good place to enjoy everybody and one of the best malls in hyderabad city. Especially for children would love this place

Name: Rajat
Title: Place to be on Weekends!
Review: Manjeera mall's biggest attraction is the cinepolis movies which are way better than pvr of sujana or inorbit. The place has all brands like pizza hut, mcdonalds and some local ones which makes you always keep occupied. Perfect for weekend to shop, dine and enjoy a movie.

Name: Bharadwaj P
Title: Eat,Shop n' enjoy
Review: This is one of the best mall,there is a mc Donald for having food and a theatre for movies. And there are many fun zones to play.

Name: Nishant M
Title: Not a good visit
Review: The mall is not so good as compared other better malls in the nearby such as Forum mall and Inorbit mall which is in Hitec area. I went there for a movie in cinepolis and had a very bad experience. The movie hall was not so good and the seating was also not so comfortable. On top of that the food served by them was also stale. Moreover, the food court does not provide with many choices and lacks some really good brands, which you can easily find at other places.

Name: 007shivateja
Title: Small
Review: Very Small than inorbit. Waste time in the mall. All the shops are with very very less crowd and all the things are old.the shops and restaurants don't have even seating

Name: travellerBulu
Title: good local flavored mall
Review: Good parking arrangement. neat and clean mall. Not very crowdy during the day. Food restaurants there. Of course a movie theater is also there.so OK for the purpose...

Name: Suresh R
Title: its a Good place for shopping,Eat and watching movies with Friends and Family
Review: me with Friend went to this manjeera mall for watching movie...its a good mall but parking is charging 20 ruppes..need to improve parking place

Name: krishna1939
Title: Beautiful architecture
Review: Best architecture and best stores are available in the mall .Maintainace is so good.It's located at centre of city so everyone will be attracted.

Name: shivaraikod
Title: A low range mall
Review: Don't know why i find this mall less attractive, may be bcoz of forum mall at just a stone throw away distance. There aren't many option to show apart from shoppers stop. Needs improvement for the parking too.

Name: vamsi
Title: Decent and small mall
Review: I didn't find much activity in this mall, but its well maintained with nice movies and dine options. Its location is very prime and located on the main road from Kukatpalli to Hitech city.

Name: RavitejaReddy
Title: Good to watch the movies -- On time
Review: Good to watch the movies in Cinepolis.. They will start and end the movie in time.. and coming to shopping we will find HeperCity mart in it which we will find groceries in some what cheap rates

Name: Srikanth_KSLR
Title: Okay kind of
Review: Okay kind of mall.. Parking is not planned.. I go only for movies... Even Conepolis is not that great... Lot of traffic...

Name: vibha123
Title: I love this mall.....
Review: I think when this mall was under construction I used to think what a location in the middle of the road, parking will be an issue etc.now that its functional, trust me this one of the places I feel like going to for all the stores that it has and offcourse the multiplex (though I don't want movies often here).nice place, good eateries, nice collection in all stores especially SS.Parking is ample and a lot for kids to do.

Name: Pavan K
Title: Not up to expectations
Review: I had been here for a movie. Parking places are not well organized. Every where you will find speed breakers. Even escalators in the mall have to be searched. Somehow i didn't find anythimg great.

Name: Krishna
Title: Not a biggy
Review: Visited in the diwali season 2014, mall loaded with crowds, not able to get movie tickets, so went to watch inside the mall, its not big mall like other mall in hyderabad, just an average

Name: Krishna Prasad
Title: Crowded with acutely unplanned parking
Review: The car park is a night mare with improperly placed entry gates and boom bars that don't open or close according to the movement of the car, most irritating of all improperly placed speed bumpsThe mall is too crowded as it is crammed with shops and eateries Hypercity is crazy with closely spaced Isles and high shelvesOver all it is a disaster of a mall if they don't reduce the number of shops The only plus point is Cinepolis which as usual is of high standard with great screens and good movies playing

Name: WondererGuy
Title: Variety of Water Games
Review: I visited Srinidhi Joy N Joy Resorts with my family.Its full of Greenery and they have variety of water games to enjoy.

Name: SRIKAKOLAPU
Title: decent
Review: They have decent pool ,water games. Maintenance can be better.Food is not great and service is not great as well

Name: Travel Enthusiast
Title: Enjoy The Holiday Outing, Very Economical Resort
Review: Very good experience, very good place for spending with family OR Friends. 1. The greenery was nice and pleasant. 2. Water play area And Rain Dance was awesome 3. Food was good. 4. More things/equipments Are Being Added.

Name: neha
Title: Good experience
Review: Srinidhi Resorts - a perfect holiday getaway near Hyderabad.I have been here for day outing with family and we all had so much fun here.This resort has a lot of greenery and is spread over 20 acres. It offers various indoor/ outdoor games, kids playpan and water games for entertainment.Availed discount on dayouting package from UPto75.com

Name: idea614354
Title: Water PArk
Review: WAter rides, rides, and pools, park nice time spend place in holidays with kids. they must enjy all the rides here.

Name: mail2mathews96
Title: Srinidhi Joy N Joy Resorts
Review: Srinidhi Joy N Joy Resorts is an affordable resort it a budget friendly resort like to inform that a small water park

Name: pravallikaa2016
Title: Good for kids only
Review: To surprise they didn't accept cash even after 3months of demonetisation, and good enough for kids only, safety features are not quite a good in rides as no one watching. Of course rain dance is pretty good

Name: Pride H
Title: Affordable Getaway Resort In Hyderabad
Review: We were a group of 32 people so we have opted for a package with food n amusement n hitea in the evening,resort is nestled among greenery into peaceful calm entertainment destination..its   Very near to Hyderabad on Warangal highway

Name: uttamb2014
Title: Good place for weekened
Review: The resort was good at Ghatkesar road, around 30-35 km from Hyderbad City. A small resort with decent water games and greenery. Good for a weekend trip.

Name: phvillage
Title: Best Day Outing In Hyderabad
Review: Good Place To Spend Time with Your FriendS or Family admist mother nature ...far away from tensions,Sound & Air pollution ...Many Activities are their to try your hands on...

Name: JagadeshAnne
Title: Mind Spinning with laugh and Fun we had
Review: it is a all - inclusive fun oriented resort suitable for all age group .... All Stay here is memorable i still remember the fun we had here ...plethora of activities we've done from swimming pools to water games to rain dancing to fun dance in lawns to great room of indoor games followed by outdoor sports ..surely best suggested for teenagers also as it is has quite reasonable fare.

Name: 444lennyd
Title: Best place for day Outing
Review: This is a must visit place full of greenery just in outskirts of Hyderabad..has best rain dance facility and water park is good too ..their are lot of activities to try your hands on

Name: moogul818
Title: Well Maintained Stadium
Review: The GMC Balayogi Atheletic stadium is inside the Sports Authority of Telangana sports complex at Gachibowli Hyderabad. It has a synthetic running track and a grass football pitch in the centre. The stadium is well maintained and hosts sports events through out the year.The athletics stadium has its own parking and a practice/warm up ground outside. It is worth a visit along with other sports arenas ( indoor badminton, hockey)  inside the sports complex.

Name: Ravindra V
Title: Great experience
Review: We went there for watching Pro Kabaddi match. The experience was simply amazing. The players were clearly visible and it felt different experience than watching on the TV. They sell food like popcorn, sweetcorn, sandwiches, burgers etc but only popcorn and sweetcorn is allowed inside. The lights and decoration was good inside the indoor stadium. Has ample parking inside the stadium complex.

Name: SRIKAKOLAPU
Title: nice athletic track
Review: This place serves as end place for Airtel marathon when we start from peoples plaza.this has all the facilities needed for sports and its amazing

Name: idea614354
Title: big stadium
Review: Balayogi stadium very famous and big in hyderabad. Conducting amny games here local and national yearly.

Name: Amazing_Neo
Title: Huge and well planned ground
Review: This is a huge place and well accommodates events and sports activities. There is ample parking and other facilities too.

Name: Karthik Dasu
Title: Good stadium
Review: We have visited this stadium, during the kabbadi premier leahue.The stadium is very close to city, unlike upplal.

Name: Veer2468
Title: Very nice
Review: This is a stadium at an excellent location- Gachibowli. Located near IT offices. Its well maintained

Name: koteswararao
Title: improved    stadium
Review: improved  with all facilities  good stadium  was constructed which is popular in India and state for games

Name: Nikhil P
Title: Nicely maintained stadium
Review: Also known as Gachibowli stadium, it’s a world class stadium which hosts lots of athletic and trek and field events in Hyderabad and its also the finishing point for Airtel Hyderabad Marathon. Its huge and spacious and nicely maintained.

Name: BRKanth
Title: Good place for Yoga
Review: Best place for morning walk and for any public occassions. Neatly planned and built with in the city.

Name: ravirjy
Title: Nice Stadium
Review: It is very good stadium for yoga and good trainings purposes. It has very minimum fees and open for public. so try to go this stadium and enjoy the facilities.

Name: Sukhbir K
Title: Great facilities for that athlete inside you!
Review: This stadium is very close to my place and i go here regularly for my morning runs, strength training sessions and yoga sessions. Running track and Swimming pool in this stadium are of international levels. The best part is that this stadium is open to public by payment of nominal fees. People living around the stadium must make a use of this facility.I am thankful to the Stadium administration for allowing amateur runners, sportspersons like me to allow the use of the stadium facilities.

Name: shivaraikod
Title: World class stadium
Review: This stadium is another feather in hyderabad's cap which is already known for its it and pharma companies. A country  where cricket is considered as a religion this athletic stadium stands out of the crowd

Name: SuvodipMoitra
Title: Latest EDM Venue
Review: This is the hottest destination for EDM fans. Apart from regular sports events, top class EDM concerts like Sunburn & Sensation is hosted here. Last week, went to this stadium for Tomorrowland Unite.

Name: Prashanth G
Title: Stadium
Review: This stadium is technically well built. Both indoor and outdoor sports can be played here at different places

Name: Praveen K
Title: World Class Stadium in Hyderabad
Review: this stadium is a world class Stadium in hyderabad. Been here for Airtel MArathon. the marathon ended here. Ample space for parking and Easy access to highway.

Name: Deepika E
Title: Some corrections for temple austerity
Review: I am firm believer of Kali Mata and I hail from Hyderabad, But I wish there is less of meat cutting & cooking and more of fresh vegetable cooking and offering. And I wish people chant Devi Aswadati stotram written by Kalidasa mahakavi when in the temple. I wish it rings in the temple.

Name: PurnimaJaay
Title: Peace
Review: Beautiful temple. Very peaceful and calm. Very large temple and expect to have crowd during the evening or on any special days. Plan ahead if you want to just pray. If not go along the crowd. No phones allowed. Buy turmeric and kumkum.

Name: SRIKAKOLAPU
Title: considered powerful
Review: People believe that this temple is powerful .Visit this place in the morning or evening and prefer mornings and we feel peaceful and calm going here

Name: Ankitha L
Title: Beauty with Peace
Review: This is a very beautiful temple located at srisailam highway... beautifully built and ann excellent source of peace for mind ...one can take blessings from lordess maisamma by performing the Pooja with all the grandeur ...it's a must visit fr devotees ...

Name: shivaraikod
Title: Scared
Review: This temple is to bring out the inner peace by praying and reciting god's name , thereby promoting peace all around.

Name: G.GURU PILLAI
Title: BEWARE OF SHOPKEEPERS AND PANDITS
Review: Review of Gandi Maisamma TempleGoddess Maisamma is very powerful and u can feel the spiritual vibration .I have heard about this temple and felt the same.We went for car pooja where they charge Rs.100 for tokenPlease carry pooja materials along with u when u plan to do poojas .Shop keepers charge Rs,450 for one marigold garland and small white pumpkin, camphor,incense sticks and 5 nos lemon.u cant bargain with them as there wont be any options for u to  procure.After pooja pandits demand for Rs.200 to 500 .pandit assistants demands Rs.50-100.U cant leave the place unless u pay to trangenders & lambardis orelse they start curse u by throwing soil on your car.Though its a nice powerful temple,the circumstance wont allow you to pray peacefully.Be safe

Name: PROF.HARAGOPAL MATHSYARAJA
Title: Good
Review: We can visit this temple near  Srisailam highway  and presiding Deity is DURGA  DEVI consort of lord siva.

Name: Mahesh M
Title: Bonal festival
Review: Bonal festival is the most important festival in Telangana state including in Hyderabad, where I was visited temple then so many people coming and do a festival.

Name: nagesh1955
Title: review of maisamma teml
Review: The famous temple in asif nagar and we can get blessing of god maisamma thalli, very famous god for th

Name: ravirjy
Title: Small Temple but Powerful
Review: It is very popular temple in hyderabad. Many devotees visit this place at the time of Batukamma festival in telangana

Name: raja p
Title: powerful goddess
Review: this is very popular goddess in telangana state.this is in chilukuru balaji temple road.temple is small.but very powerful temple.

Name: Naganna Travel and Food Expert
Title: most sacred and powerful temple....
Review: gand misamma gudi is most powerful temple and plz visit here on bonallu time and you feel astonished.... ist on outer ring road and 5 kms and bit small gudi....

Name: Sai P
Title: Small but a nice temple
Review: Its a nice temple near to outer ring road. Its about 5 kms from the police academy/outer ring road circle. Its on the way from mehdipatnam to chilukur balaji temple. This was under military survilience as this is built in miitary area of training of drivers very long back. But because of frequency of devotees, military could not deny them. Its a small temple but powerful goddess. Most devotees give away goats & hens to kalimata.

Name: Usha65
Title: Good but neglected temple
Review: While going to Umamaheswaram in  in Mahabubnagar District, on the way we visited this  temple  which is  very different than the other temples. This temple is in the Maisigandi village in Ammanagal mandal in Mahabobnagar district of Telangana state. Those who are visiting Srisailam can visit this temple on their way and it is about 70 km from Hyderabad. From Hyderabad one can go in the morning and return by evening. The temple is big with a giant (about 20 feet ht) idole and the Gopuram is also huge and different from all south Indian temples; Maa kaali is worshiped here.There are many small idols inside the temple and major attraction of this temple is the huge snake mound in the center of the inner side of the temple. However, it is not maintained very well and can see lot of dirt around. It is a very good temple with a very good idol and can not be missed.

Name: SRIKAKOLAPU
Title: Good without noice
Review: Its pleasant and we have very less or no noise from vehicles.Parking space is present.Entry fee is there and monthly pass as well

Name: Jitendra K
Title: Natural place
Review: We went in evening time, I think before dark it is good place to go. We can sit on the benches available.

Name: MathewsDcruz2017
Title: D.G.S Melkote Park
Review: Nice park just visited this park can see that people and kids are been enjoying the garden nice area we can see that nice place for photography but photography is not allowed

Name: gourishanker h
Title: Decent location for family
Review: A good place and park to visit with kids, well maintained by guards. opens in evening by 3pm with Rs5 entry ticketsThere is walking track, thanks HMDAlittle parking available for cars Location easily reached using google maps Combine this trip with weekly grocery from Spencer’s hyper which is 8mins drive. Thumbs up for now.

Name: mhussain_bohra
Title: Great times
Review: One of the best place to spend time with family. It has a nice walking path where one can either walk or jog and there are also small rides for children. Overall a great place.

Name: higghligght shiva
Title: Best park to relax
Review: v didn't plan 2 come here  v came 4 movie so its late that to 20 mins so nearby park is there  v eated and v gone 2 that place that to 1st v entered inside at  3pm its open i think best 2 go  at rainy season or evening  many birds and koyals were cmng whitling ,singing atmosphere in nice many r cmg 2 relax i think in that area nothing else park is there childrens play area is nice and small canteen ,toiilets, cool water at summer its very nice facilities overthere

Name: Dharanidhar13
Title: Awesome
Review: It was really awesome...we can have great piece of mind.. Good for joggers..for family.. And friends. The maintenance was also good.. We can get foodies there.. The entry was 5rs only..!! A good spot for piece.

Name: Shashank1961
Title: Good for Morning/Evening Walk
Review: Entry fee is Rs.5. Monthly pass also available. Entry Free for Senior Citizens. Paid parking for cars & two wheelers also available. Very well maintained. Spread over 7 acres. Children play area OK. Security good as cameras are installed all over park.Skating area small but good. Closed from 11.30 AM to 3.30 PM. Open all days of the year. Separate path for joggers/walkers. A place to relax.

Name: SATISH C
Title: Sunday Morning cycle ride
Review: A good and reasonably well maintained place complete with bicycles on hire and a 2km plus cycling track with varying gradients and terrain. A good way to get some exercise. Located opposite Botanical Garden near Kondapur,Hyderabad

Name: baburammarch25
Title: Natural seeing
Review: Food for natural trek and terrain, full of entertainment with full of physical activity.Enjoy moment.

Name: vandan J
Title: Nice park
Review: It was nice cycling park and had fun doing cycling in the park. The price is minimum so good option to exercise.

Name: EkMusafir
Title: Cycle To Your Heart's Content.
Review: “You don’t stop Bike Riding when you get old, you get old when you stop Bike Riding”. This is a quotation on one of the boards displayed as you go cycling around the well laid out cycling tracks in the Pala Pitta Cycling Park in the Kothaguda Reserve Forest in Hyderabad. It is located just opposite the Botanical Gardens in Kondapur.Here you can hire bicycles for ₹50 an hour. The track goes around a fenced in forest and is about 2.5 km in circumference. The track is a mixture of sand, gravel, and mud and is quite suitable for the sports bikes of which they have plenty available in their shed. They have ladies bikes, as well as smaller bikes for kids too. The park opens at 6 am and it is best to go early in the morning when it is cooler. It is only for cycling, and walking is not allowed on the cycle track. There are benches for sitting and there is a washroom.The terrain is flat but there are some small hillocks to challenge your pedal power, and the track curves around treacherously in some places, making your ride a bit challenging. If you are lucky you will get to see peacocks wandering around in the forest.

Name: Mega B
Title: Very nicely managed cycling park
Review: This is one of its kind cycling park situated in Kondapur.. Best would be to visit in early morning hours, 6 AM. Since you get to choose your bike from a huge collection, and a serene and calm environment with very less number of people. Own cycles are allowed but still an entry fees of 25 is applicable. If you take cycle on rent it is 50. There are kids cycles as well. And no one is allowed to walk inside. It's only a cycling park. There is place to sit for people to wait. And washrooms are available.

Name: Pavankumar G
Title: Cycling
Review: Best place to visit in the morning. The track is about 2.5kms and they charge 50rs for rental cycles. Cycles are in good condition and track is well maintained. There are sufficient no.of cycles

Name: MilwDaniel
Title: Calm and extensive gardens, free entry
Review: This place was only a few minutes away from my hotel so I grabbed an auto in the morning to check it out. The main open garden is a field of grass surrounded by walkways with benches. They were watering the lawn when I was there and the place was full of dragonflies buzzing around. Several people were walking on the paths taking excersise. I found the old museum where there was a student art fair taking place, which was fun. The back gardens had a nice lake, a pavilion, big trees, benches, lawns and lots of areas to walk or sit. Several joggers went through and a few families were sitting and enjoying the afternoon.

Name: Niya1315
Title: Good garden near Assembly Metro Station
Review: Public Gardens can be conveniently reached by Hyderabad Metro. The garden is spread in a very big area. There is no fee to get inside. There are many other attractions within Public Gardens such as AP State Museum, Health Museum, Shahi Masjid, etc.

Name: jainms
Title: Good place
Review: Its in the heart of the city, good place to hang out and garden is maintained OK, its one of the oldest park in city

Name: TabrezN
Title: The best place for family outings, walking, exercises and relaxation
Review: I visit this place everyday for my routine exercise and can claim this to be THE best place for the purpose of walking, exercise, relaxation, family outings. It is meticulously clean and has decent and very safe parking for INR 10 for bikes and 20 for cars. The gentry is very decent and is even a wonderful place for elderly. The canopy of trees adds to the beauty and ambiance of the place.

Name: Daniel T
Title: Nice place to enjoy greenery & to go for walk
Review: Located literally in the heart of the city, this is a very good park to walk around. Good place to bring young kids. There is lot of open spaces inside to sit n relax, ponds to walk around. Ample parking space. Overall its a nice place to enjoy.

Name: Abdul_Khader
Title: Great place to relax
Review: The place is best to visit at morning or evening. It’s a serene atmosphere. The place is having a pond which has a lot of fishes and tortoises. There is also a mosque and the legislative assembly building. It’s a great place for having walks.

Name: azharali1249
Title: Public garden
Review: Feels good as I daily use to walk n workout there....very refreshing sply early morning is the best time to walk jog run or workout and also yoga.

Name: Usha65
Title: Public park in the center of the city
Review: One of the oldest public park in the city center. There is a nice health museum, horticultural area and even a huge auditorium.An important place for all Hyderabadians.

Name: Sumitkumar_13
Title: Refreshing
Review: This is a big garden at the heart of the city. Nice place to relax. Additionally this place also hosts some cultural shows

Name: kartik1402
Title: interesting place
Review: as the name suggests, its a garden but houses the state assembly within its premises. also there is a health museum (although in a bad state) and an archaeology museum with several idols and an Egyptian mummy.

Name: Surya Katakam
Title: Best place to relax with team
Review: Public gardens is located mid if the city besides assembly. As such names there will not be much garden sort of thing, but can spend good time with friends or family members. Inside public gardens there is exbition center where every year exbition will organise in the month of December and will be extended till February.

Name: PROF.HARAGOPAL MATHSYARAJA
Title: Good place
