Review: Located Just in the heart of the city,next to State assembly, this place was very famous for greenery which is now missing due to location where noise and pollution are extreme.however still this place is worth visiting especially in the early hours.

Name: Satyendra Garg
Title: God Public Gardens in the vicinity of the Assembly and Government Offices.
Review: It must have been very important public Gardens earlier but with coming of other attractions this gets lesser importance. Still quite beautiful but may be less resources. Nice place for people to come for evening and morning walks but it seems with less resources the lake has dried up and so must be the footfall of visitors.Had a look at the place and liked the place overall. Its location which is very central in the city continues to be a big advantage for the place.

Name: Rao1940497
Title: Good one.
Review: One of the oldest public gardens in Hyderabad city, centrally located near Assembly house is a paradise for all.

Name: TADAKAMADLA A
Title: Good Nature Spot
Review: Public garden is very famous for nature and it is famous walking spot and the rose garden is very beautiful.

Name: sandeep g
Title: good
Review: good place to visit especially during morning , you find more people come for a walk ,good and decent

Name: BRKanth
Title: Heart of the city Garden
Review: Its the place for nature loving persons. One should visit especially during mornings for morning walk. Nice fresh air with good connectivity.

Name: Vankam S
Title: Nice garden
Review: This is very beautiful and nice garden.Every body seen this place get happly enjoy. This near assemly and birla temple and ravindrabharathi and planetorium. So all touristes are must seening this place.

Name: nagesh1955
Title: visit of public gardens
Review: Very big place in hyderabad, we have pleanty of trees in this area. Very peaceful area . we can get lot of enjoyment .

Name: Abhishek S
Title: Beautiful Garden with a Museum
Review: A good quiet and calm place with much cleanliness, we can enjoy this garden with our friends and family as well. For couples it's a great place and they can spend more time with each other.

Name: EmmanuelMurray
Title: In the heart of the city
Review: Nice and well-kept gardens in the heart of the city. Surely a good place for an evening stroll. Make sure to carry mosquito repellant if you are planning a visit in the evenings, particularly in the rainy season.

Name: Manish K
Title: Greatly shrunk since earlier...nothing to see
Review: The Public Gardens are located near the Nampally Railway Station and were once, a vast green space for the public to roam around. That is not the case now, however. As the gardens contain the buildings housing the Telangana and Andhra Pradesh Assembly and Legislative Council, along with certain other government departments, entry to a large portion of the complex is not allowed for security reasons.The gardens also house the AP state archeological museum and Health museum, but unless one is visiting them, there is nothing to see in the gardens themselves. There was a small artificial lake with boating facility, but with the current drought, the lake has dried up and the boating has been suspended.

Name: PavRao
Title: Still a great green space in the city
Review: A place I visit for a walk every time I'm in the city. Has fit smaller over time, can't imagine they have built new buildings inside a Public garden ! But still lots of nice green spaces and well lit even at night in the walking areas. The pond needs filling up and there is still so much scope to get it back to previous glory.

Name: MAhmed2014
Title: Public Garden has Shrinked
Review: Public Garden use to be Big. Now it has been taken by so many other Facilities, But it is still a nice park in the Heart of the city.

Name: Mohammed Z
Title: Garden of every one
Review: I have been visiting This place during my college days and it was an attraction of Hyderabad almost every Hyderabadi  visit  This Bag-e-aam as it is called in Urdu its a place were people from other towns visit and relax and it is place for relax in those days as well as today

Name: Beach170
Title: Nice 2 see public garden its most worth
Review: here in this garden wat is there i dont know but my frnd showed me some places .like ap state museum ,health museum ,and lalitha kala thoranam  public is medium i seen many never B4 water is dirty boats r there but its not running it must not maintained family and friends nice spot to relax at evening this garden must need some activities or changes

Name: higghligght shiva
Title: After NTR garden This is the 2nd D BEst in hyderabad
Review: Public Garden is one of the most popular in Hyderabad here u can go in after noon to see museums  after that u can relax well and u can take pics over there in this garden its  for nature lovers many were spotted over there family friends and couples here u can see several attractions likeState Archaeological Museum,health museum,tennis court ,Jubilee Hall, Jawahar Bal Bhavan and Telugu Lalita Kala Thoranam, an open-air theatre...etc .Recently exhibition is opened jan 1to feb 15. here u can see and shop many they provide stalls from different states its much worth for travellers 20per head free for 5yrs timings 3 to 10pm.  nearby one of the best Rayalaseema ruchulu is the best

Name: Robin A
Title: Ok to spend some time
Review: City has certainly better parks then this one.No attractions are here, also not maintained well.It has some amphitheatre for commercial programs or other activities.

Name: Praveen K
Title: Nizami time parks
Review: Public gargens was build during the nizam times. the park is located next to assembly and nampally. good place to spend an evening.

Name: Amazing_Neo
Title: Great Morning and Evening place
Review: I remember being here every morning during the school vacation days. Still is a great place for morning and evening walks. The gardens are well maintained and is filled with families. Its a more healthier, convenient and pocket saver to visit with the family for some garden sports like frisbee, shuttle and others.

Name: SRINIWAAS S
Title: It was built in 1846 by Osman Ali Khan, the VIIth Nizam of Hyderabad
Review: Public Gardens also known as Bagh-e-Aam or Bagham. In Urdu "Bagh" means Garden and Aam or Aam Jana means the public.

Name: MARGDARSHI
Title: Fine Harden With Elegant Buildings
Review: Also known as Bagh-e-aam this garden was set up  in 1846 & is easily accessible from all directions from the city.It has beautiful plants & lovely flowers scenic landscape,lawns,pathways & some prestigious institutions which has made it one of the most frequented spot for both tourists & for the locals.The elegant buildings include the state legislative assembly,state museum,Horticultural Dept,Indira ausiotorium,Jawahar Bal Bhavan including a toy train,mosque & above all a recent statue of Mahatma Gandhi in a prayer pose.Worth the visit with your family.

Name: sugunapriya b
Title: Best park for activities
Review: It was a park we used to go on picnics in childhood. After a ling gap visited it. Most of the senoir citizens , joggers , walkers occupy the park. Laughing clubs and other yoga related activities were going on. Kids had fun in the park.

Name: vibha123
Title: A nice place to show the history of hyderabad...
Review: its a nice place ..calm....clean and maintained unlike other places In Hyderabad....Next to public gardens I the famous statue of Bapu (Gandhiji) which is my personal favorite...its the symbol of strength, tolerance and peace for me and I think I wish I could see his statue for sometime when I  need peace...

Name: Hemanthgowdakv
Title: Not for tourists.
Review: Well this place is decent for morning walk and jog for the locals and not really for the tourists to see anything serene here.

Name: KASI VENKOBA RAO
Title: Public Garden-Nice Place To Relax
Review: This is one of my favorite visiting spot in Hyderabad. I often go and enjoy at this park. I have visited this garden for the first time way back in 1959 and I have an attachment with this Park for the past 55 years and I still admire it.. Public Gardens, the name itself reveals that the Garden is meant for the Public. It is located at the heart of the city of Hyderabad.  It is well connected from all the parts of Hyderabad and Secunderabad..Public Gardens is also called as Bagh-e-aam (This is a Urdu Word).. Bagh means Garden and Aam means public/people.   It was built in 1846 by Osman Ali Khan, the VIIth Nizam of Hyderabad and is the oldest park in Hyderabad. It was called as "Bagham" during the Nizam regime.Potti Sriramulu Telugu University, "Lalitha Kala Toranam" (Open Air theatre), "Jawahar Bal Bhavan", The Legislative Assembly and Legislative Council buildings are located here.I have seen many students.studying at the park during the day while enjoying the  natural environment. Lovers find it as a meeting place.. Some of the Telugu pictures shooting have taken place here. A railway Track leading to the Nampally Station is situated just back of the Public Gardens..

Name: Shailendra
Title: good old park in the heart of the city
Review: Public Gardens (Bagh-e-aam) is a good old park in the heart of the city of Hyderabd situated near AP Assembly. If you have interest in photography this is a good place to catch birds and butterflies. The bonus is YSR Reddy AP State Museum if you have interest in history. There is a small lake in the park with boating facility. It also has play are for kids. The park has free entry and you can spend some good time here.

Name: murtuza_sb
Title: Nice place in the middle of the city bustle
Review: The public garden next to the AP Assembly is a nice place to spend a few hours lazing around. The upkeep is decent for a free park and there are nice lawns for kids to play. The lake is dirty but offers a rickety paddle boat ride, which is fun. There are a few small museums inside, but they don't keep regular hours, so its just your luck.

Name: Shyam
Title: Amazing
Review: Good entertainment, we can have good time with friends and family.and amazing game friendly staff and very nice

Name: Tina!
Title: Awesome
Review: This is a fantastic place and thrilling activity for team game. One must visit this place for some cool games!

Name: Imran
Title: Feedback
Review: Very nice game and intresting game. We came with friends its lots of fun. And we so much enjoy and staff also very good and friendly

Name: Genji
Title: Exhilarating
Review: Had a really great time with my friends. great for cardio and exhilarating. As a big group it is more fun.

Name: Ayub Farooqui
Title: Superb experience must try once in a while
Review: Had an amazing  experience  ...the best thing is getting exhausted after playing 20 minutes ..must try with family/friends

Name: joe
Title: very exciting
Review: amaingazExcellent place to enjoy with family Family Very cool place. We enjoyed a lot with my family. Had loads of fun. Worth spending time with.

Name: Parth
Title: Good one
Review: ExcellentIt was a wonderful experience and please visit laser shooter there wil be a group games and wonder

Name: David
Title: Great experience
Review: Wonderful experience good to play with friends Best for teenagers nice experience with friends wonderful

Name: Aruan
Title: Excellent
Review: It Was very great experience very good customer interaction from staff and had blast playing with friends

Name: kabeer
Title: thrilling
Review: Excellent place to enjoy with family Family Very cool place. We enjoyed a lot with my family. Had loads of fun. Worth spending time.A unique experience and very exciting and thrilling only laser lights in a dark room. You forget the time playing with a team finding

Name: Faisal
Title: Amazing
Review: Excellent place to enjoy with familyFamilyVery cool place. We enjoyed a lot with my family. Had loads of fun. Worth spending time with friends and family

Name: Axionstar
Title: Awsome, exciting
Review: A unique experience and very exciting and thrillingonly laser lights in a dark room. You forget the time playing with a team finding and killing the opponent team with laser lights alone in the dark place. It was lot of fun. Kids love even more. Awesome experience. It's so good especially for celebrating birthday parties

Name: genjiblast
Title: awesome place for fun
Review: The best place to entertain yourself. Best with teenagers. I have a very good experience and haha lot of exercise also it was my first time experience and it was great. The instructor was also very kind and explained each and everything very clearly. Thank you Laser Shooter Team.

Name: LostMySelfTraveling
Title: Lots of fun finding oppononent team
Review: It was lot of fun finding the opponent team with only laser lights in a dark room. You forget the time playing with a team finding and killing the opponent team with laser lights alone in the dark place. It was lot of fun. Kids love even more. Awesome experience. It's so good especially for celebrating birthday parties differently.

Name: Suhan
Title: Excellent place to enjoy with family
Review: Very cool place. We enjoyed a lot with my family. Had loads of fun. Worth spending time with friends and family.

Name: Irshad asfandyar
Title: Laser tag game
Review: It’s an amazing game..like we play TDM house mode in PUBG. The same you’ll find here .. amazing experience with real life PUBG ..you guys will definitely enjoy if you are gaming lover 🥇🔫

Name: Rajesh
Title: Awesome Game
Review: Need to visit. The best game in Hyderabad. You will feel a real Pub G game. Should be a good number of people where you will get the real fun.

Name: deepa v
Title: Fun
Review: It's really fun time..Very few places in the city which have these type of games. It's totally a different experience ..

Name: om a
Title: AMAZING
Review: This trip was really fun. We were divided into teams and sent into the dark. The lights were the only thing guiding us. We shot each other with those play laser guns on the lit shields. This was for a bday party. I think the time flew by really fast, though I don't know whether it was less time or more enjoyment.

Name: tangbot1111
Title: Best Team Outing
Review: Lazer Ops is one of the best physical indoor game zones for the team playing, You will get a good exercise here

Name: Raajkumar1991
Title: Best place for team activity
Review: We went to this place as a part of our office team activity. It is a very good place to enjoy the lazer game. Sufficient place is there to run and hide as well. Bunkers are also designed very perfectly. overall it is very good. But the managers of the place are not so pleasant.

Name: Jikuza
Title: Good place to enjoy a laser tag game
Review: I visited this place twice- once with my friends and once with my office colleagues. The floor is quite big and the equipment is top notch.

Name: Zain A
Title: Great place to celebrate birthday party for the kids
Review: Hello Jayesh, thank you for your review. We are glad to hear that you have visited us multiple times, and hope to see you again soon.

Name: Vivek G
Title: good place
Review: Hello Jayesh, thank you for your review. We are glad to hear that you have visited us multiple times, and hope to see you again soon.

Name: Sravan Vadde
Title: Could offer more customization in the gameplay
Review: I have been to many Laser tag place in the US and this one meets international standards. The staff was helpful and helped our group of 12 to be split into two teams. The game itself is about 20 minutes and lots of fun. Just be careful so you do not run into each other. You get individual and team scores. We will be back.

Name: Gaurav5430
Title: Just had good times and very exciting fun with school friends in Lazer Ops city center.
Review: one of the few laser tag places in the city. it is an unbelievable workout and too much fun. It is also very addictive

Name: meet_smokie3s
Title: Good place to visit with friends
Review: The gear is in good shape. You get about 20 mins of gameplay. It is costly as compared to other cities.The arena is asymmetric, the team areas/sensors won't be activated unless you have teams of 5, friendly fire can't be turned on.Overall, well maintained, but costly. Worth trying if you haven't yet.

Name: avinash6583
Title: Overall a good experience needs improvement
Review: Just Tope fun visited many times in a year. Just want a membership of Lazer Ops city center mall. Visit atleast 200 day a year with friends. This is the only nearest place of gaming with bowling and Lazer ops. So, me and my friends visit here.

Name: anvesh2502
Title: Good adrenalin rush!
Review: Good place and good arena. Detailed statistics post match. It would be exceptional if teams have a target to attack on rather than just attacking the opponents.

Name: Zain A
Title: Lazer ops fun
Review: this is the second time I have visited Laser ops..I had great fun with my friends for 12 minscoming to the improvements.. I feel that we do need to have a laser pointing all the times rather than having it at the time of firing it i.e, I see the red spot when I fire at a person which is not required after you fire.

Name: Al U
Review: Thank you for the review and the feedback Anvesh. That's actually a really interesting suggestion and something we'll definitely think about. Thanks! Do come again soon! :)

Review: Thank you for the review and the feedback Anvesh. That's actually a really interesting suggestion and something we'll definitely think about. Thanks! Do come again soon! :)

Review: Good place and good arena. Detailed statistics post match. It would be exceptional if teams have a target to attack on rather than just attacking the opponents.

Name: Zain A
Title: Lazer ops fun
Review: this is the second time I have visited Laser ops..I had great fun with my friends for 12 minscoming to the improvements.. I feel that we do need to have a laser pointing all the times rather than having it at the time of firing it i.e, I see the red spot when I fire at a person which is not required after you fire.

Name: Al U
Review: Thank you for the review and the feedback Anvesh. That's actually a really interesting suggestion and something we'll definitely think about. Thanks! Do come again soon! :)

Name: Zain A
Review: Thank you for the review and the feedback Anvesh. That's actually a really interesting suggestion and something we'll definitely think about. Thanks! Do come again soon! :)

Name: Joyjit D
Review: Had a lotta fun in this place with my girlfriend. Location is great and price is just right. Will try to come back for more.

Name: Zain A
Review: Thanks for the review Alex. We're glad you had fun and we're looking forward to seeing you again!
Thanks for the review Alex. We're glad you had fun and we're looking forward to seeing you again!
Had a really good time and looking forward to come for the same... Everything in lazerops is well maintained
Thank you for the review. We're glad you had a good time. We look forward to seeing you again :)
Thank you for the review. We're glad you had a good time. We look forward to seeing you again :)

Name: Shyam
Title: Amazing
Review: Good entertainment, we can have good time with friends and family.and amazing game friendly staff and very nice

Name: Tina!
Title: Awesome
Review: This is a fantastic place and thrilling activity for team game. One must visit this place for some cool games!

Name: Imran
Title: Feedback
Review: Very nice game and intresting game. We came with friends its lots of fun. And we so much enjoy and staff also very good and friendly

Name: Genji
Title: Exhilarating
Review: Had a really great time with my friends. great for cardio and exhilarating. As a big group it is more fun.

Name: Ayub Farooqui
Title: Superb experience must try once in a while
Review: Had an amazing  experience  ...the best thing is getting exhausted after playing 20 minutes ..must try with family/friends

Name: joe
Title: very exciting
Review: amaingazExcellent place to enjoy with family Family Very cool place. We enjoyed a lot with my family. Had loads of fun. Worth spending time with.

Name: Parth
Title: Good one
Review: ExcellentIt was a wonderful experience and please visit laser shooter there wil be a group games and wonder

Name: David
Title: Great experience
Review: Wonderful experience good to play with friends Best for teenagers nice experience with friends wonderful

Name: Aruan
Title: Excellent
Review: It Was very great experience very good customer interaction from staff and had blast playing with friends

Name: kabeer
Title: thrilling
Review: Excellent place to enjoy with family Family Very cool place. We enjoyed a lot with my family. Had loads of fun. Worth spending time.A unique experience and very exciting and thrilling only laser lights in a dark room. You forget the time playing with a team finding

Name: Faisal
Title: Amazing
Review: Excellent place to enjoy with familyFamilyVery cool place. We enjoyed a lot with my family. Had loads of fun. Worth spending time with friends and family

Name: Axionstar
Title: Awsome, exciting
Review: A unique experience and very exciting and thrillingonly laser lights in a dark room. You forget the time playing with a team finding and killing the opponent team with laser lights alone in the dark place. It was lot of fun. Kids love even more. Awesome experience. It's so good especially for celebrating birthday parties

Name: genjiblast
Title: awesome place for fun
Review: The best place to entertain yourself. Best with teenagers. I have a very good experience and haha lot of exercise also it was my first time experience and it was great. The instructor was also very kind and explained each and everything very clearly. Thank you Laser Shooter Team.

Name: LostMySelfTraveling
Title: Lots of fun finding oppononent team
Review: It was lot of fun finding the opponent team with only laser lights in a dark room. You forget the time playing with a team finding and killing the opponent team with laser lights alone in the dark place. It was lot of fun. Kids love even more. Awesome experience. It's so good especially for celebrating birthday parties differently.

Name: Suhan
Title: Excellent place to enjoy with family
Review: Very cool place. We enjoyed a lot with my family. Had loads of fun. Worth spending time with friends and family.

Name: Irshad asfandyar
Title: Laser tag game
Review: It’s an amazing game..like we play TDM house mode in PUBG. The same you’ll find here .. amazing experience with real life PUBG ..you guys will definitely enjoy if you are gaming lover 🥇🔫

Name: Rajesh
Title: Awesome Game
Review: Need to visit. The best game in Hyderabad. You will feel a real Pub G game. Should be a good number of people where you will get the real fun.

Name: deepa v
Title: Fun
Review: It's really fun time..Very few places in the city which have these type of games. It's totally a different experience ..

Name: om a
Title: AMAZING
Review: This trip was really fun. We were divided into teams and sent into the dark. The lights were the only thing guiding us. We shot each other with those play laser guns on the lit shields. This was for a bday party. I think the time flew by really fast, though I don't know whether it was less time or more enjoyment.

Name: tangbot1111
Title: Best Team Outing
Review: Lazer Ops is one of the best physical indoor game zones for the team playing, You will get a good exercise here

Name: Raajkumar1991
Title: Best place for team activity
Review: We went to this place as a part of our office team activity. It is a very good place to enjoy the lazer game. Sufficient place is there to run and hide as well. Bunkers are also designed very perfectly. overall it is very good. But the managers of the place are not so pleasant.

Name: Jikuza
Title: Good place to enjoy a laser tag game
Review: I visited this place twice- once with my friends and once with my office colleagues. The floor is quite big and the equipment is top notch.

Name: Zain A
Title: Great place to celebrate birthday party for the kids
Review: Hello Jayesh, thank you for your review. We are glad to hear that you have visited us multiple times, and hope to see you again soon.

Name: Vivek G
Title: good place
Review: Hello Jayesh, thank you for your review. We are glad to hear that you have visited us multiple times, and hope to see you again soon.

Name: Sravan Vadde
Title: Could offer more customization in the gameplay
Review: I have been to many Laser tag place in the US and this one meets international standards. The staff was helpful and helped our group of 12 to be split into two teams. The game itself is about 20 minutes and lots of fun. Just be careful so you do not run into each other. You get individual and team scores. We will be back.

Name: Gaurav5430
Title: Just had good times and very exciting fun with school friends in Lazer Ops city center.
Review: one of the few laser tag places in the city. it is an unbelievable workout and too much fun. It is also very addictive

Name: meet_smokie3s
Title: Good place to visit with friends
Review: The gear is in good shape. You get about 20 mins of gameplay. It is costly as compared to other cities.The arena is asymmetric, the team areas/sensors won't be activated unless you have teams of 5, friendly fire can't be turned on.Overall, well maintained, but costly. Worth trying if you haven't yet.

Name: avinash6583
Title: Overall a good experience needs improvement
Review: Just Tope fun visited many times in a year. Just want a membership of Lazer Ops city center mall. Visit atleast 200 day a year with friends. This is the only nearest place of gaming with bowling and Lazer ops. So, me and my friends visit here.

It is costly as compared to other cities.The arena is asymmetric, the team areas/sensors won't be activated unless you have teams of 5, friendly fire can't be turned on.Overall, well maintained, but costly. Worth trying if you haven't yet.

Name: avinash6583
Title: Overall a good experience needs improvement
Review: Just Tope fun visited many times in a year. Just want a membership of Lazer Ops city center mall. Visit atleast 200 day a year with friends. This is the only nearest place of gaming with bowling and Lazer ops. So, me and my friends visit here.

Name: anvesh2502
Title: Good adrenalin rush!
Review: Good place and good arena. Detailed statistics post match. It would be exceptional if teams have a target to attack on rather than just attacking the opponents.

Name: Zain A
Title: Lazer ops fun
Review: this is the second time I have visited Laser ops..I had great fun with my friends for 12 minscoming to the improvements.. I feel that we do need to have a laser pointing all the times rather than having it at the time of firing it i.e, I see the red spot when I fire at a person which is not required after you fire.

Name: Al U
Review: Thank you for the review and the feedback Anvesh. That's actually a really interesting suggestion and something we'll definitely think about. Thanks! Do come again soon! :)

Name: Zain A
Review: Thank you for the review and the feedback Anvesh. That's actually a really interesting suggestion and something we'll definitely think about. Thanks! Do come again soon! :)

Name: Joyjit D
Review: Had a lotta fun in this place with my girlfriend. Location is great and price is just right. Will try to come back for more.

Name: Zain A
Review: Thanks for the review Alex. We're glad you had fun and we're looking forward to seeing you again!
Thanks for the review Alex. We're glad you had fun and we're looking forward to seeing you again!

Title: Amazing
Review: Good entertainment, we can have good time with friends and family.and amazing game friendly staff and very nice

Title: Awesome
Review: This is a fantastic place and thrilling activity for team game. One must visit this place for some cool games!

Name: Imran
Title: Feedback
Review: Very nice game and intresting game. We came with friends its lots of fun. And we so much enjoy and staff also very good and friendly

Name: Genji
Title: Exhilarating
Review: Had a really great time with my friends. great for cardio and exhilarating. As a big group it is more fun.

Name: Ayub Farooqui
Title: Superb experience must try once in a while
Review: Had an amazing  experience  ...the best thing is getting exhausted after playing 20 minutes ..must try with family/friends

Name: joe
Title: very exciting
Review: amaingazExcellent place to enjoy with family Family Very cool place. We enjoyed a lot with my family. Had loads of fun. Worth spending time with.

Name: Parth
Title: Good one
Review: ExcellentIt was a wonderful experience and please visit laser shooter there wil be a group games and wonder

Name: David
Title: Great experience
Review: Wonderful experience good to play with friends Best for teenagers nice experience with friends wonderful

Name: Aruan
Title: Excellent
Review: It Was very great experience very good customer interaction from staff and had blast playing with friends

Name: kabeer
Title: thrilling
Review: Excellent place to enjoy with family Family Very cool place. We enjoyed a lot with my family. Had loads of fun. Worth spending time.A unique experience and very exciting and thrilling only laser lights in a dark room. You forget the time playing with a team finding

Name: Faisal
Title: Amazing
Review: Excellent place to enjoy with familyFamilyVery cool place. We enjoyed a lot with my family. Had loads of fun. Worth spending time with friends and family

Name: Axionstar
Title: Awsome, exciting
Review: A unique experience and very exciting and thrillingonly laser lights in a dark room. You forget the time playing with a team finding and killing the opponent team with laser lights alone in the dark place. It was lot of fun. Kids love even more. Awesome experience. It's so good especially for celebrating birthday parties

Name: genjiblast
Title: awesome place for fun
Review: The best place to entertain yourself. Best with teenagers. I have a very good experience and haha lot of exercise also it was my first time experience and it was great. The instructor was also very kind and explained each and everything very clearly. Thank you Laser Shooter Team.

Name: LostMySelfTraveling
Title: Lots of fun finding oppononent team
Review: It was lot of fun finding the opponent team with only laser lights in a dark room. You forget the time playing with a team finding and killing the opponent team with laser lights alone in the dark place. It was lot of fun. Kids love even more. Awesome experience. It's so good especially for celebrating birthday parties differently.

Name: Suhan
Title: Excellent place to enjoy with family
Review: Very cool place. We enjoyed a lot with my family. Had loads of fun. Worth spending time with friends and family.

Name: Irshad asfandyar
Title: Laser tag game
Review: It’s an amazing game..like we play TDM house mode in PUBG. The same you’ll find here .. amazing experience with real life PUBG ..you guys will definitely enjoy if you are gaming lover 🥇🔫

Name: Rajesh
Title: Awesome Game
Review: Need to visit. The best game in Hyderabad. You will feel a real Pub G game. Should be a good number of people where you will get the real fun.

Name: deepa v
Title: Fun
Review: It's really fun time..Very few places in the city which have these type of games. It's totally a different experience ..

Name: om a
Title: AMAZING
Review: This trip was really fun. We were divided into teams and sent into the dark. The lights were the only thing guiding us. We shot each other with those play laser guns on the lit shields. This was for a bday party. I think the time flew by really fast, though I don't know whether it was less time or more enjoyment.

Name: tangbot1111
Title: Best Team Outing
Review: Lazer Ops is one of the best physical indoor game zones for the team playing, You will get a good exercise here

Name: Raajkumar1991
Title: Best place for team activity
Review: We went to this place as a part of our office team activity. It is a very good place to enjoy the lazer game. Sufficient place is there to run and hide as well. Bunkers are also designed very perfectly. overall it is very good. But the managers of the place are not so pleasant.

Name: Jikuza
Title: Good place to enjoy a laser tag game
Review: I visited this place twice- once with my friends and once with my office colleagues. The floor is quite big and the equipment is top notch.

Name: Zain A
Title: Great place to celebrate birthday party for the kids
Review: Hello Jayesh, thank you for your review. We are glad to hear that you have visited us multiple times, and hope to see you again soon.

Name: Vivek G
Title: good place
Review: Hello Jayesh, thank you for your review. We are glad to hear that you have visited us multiple times, and hope to see you again soon.

Name: Sravan Vadde
Title: Could offer more customization in the gameplay
Review: I have been to many Laser tag place in the US and this one meets international standards. The staff was helpful and helped our group of 12 to be split into two teams. The game itself is about 20 minutes and lots of fun. Just be careful so you do not run into each other. You get individual and team scores. We will be back.

Name: Gaurav5430
Title: Just had good times and very exciting fun with school friends in Lazer Ops city center.

The game itself is about 20 minutes and lots of fun. Just be careful so you do not run into each other. You get individual and team scores. We will be back.

Name: Gaurav5430
Title: Just had good times and very exciting fun with school friends in Lazer Ops city center.
Review: one of the few laser tag places in the city. it is an unbelievable workout and too much fun. It is also very addictive

Name: meet_smokie3s
Title: Good place to visit with friends
Review: The gear is in good shape. You get about 20 mins of gameplay. It is costly as compared to other cities.The arena is asymmetric, the team areas/sensors won't be activated unless you have teams of 5, friendly fire can't be turned on.Overall, well maintained, but costly. Worth trying if you haven't yet.

Name: avinash6583
Title: Overall a good experience needs improvement
Review: Just Tope fun visited many times in a year. Just want a membership of Lazer Ops city center mall. Visit atleast 200 day a year with friends. This is the only nearest place of gaming with bowling and Lazer ops. So, me and my friends visit here.

Name: anvesh2502
Title: Good adrenalin rush!
Review: Good place and good arena. Detailed statistics post match. It would be exceptional if teams have a target to attack on rather than just attacking the opponents.

Name: Zain A
Title: Lazer ops fun
Review: this is the second time I have visited Laser ops..I had great fun with my friends for 12 minscoming to the improvements.. I feel that we do need to have a laser pointing all the times rather than having it at the time of firing it i.e, I see the red spot when I fire at a person which is not required after you fire.

Name: Al U
Review: Thank you for the review and the feedback Anvesh. That's actually a really interesting suggestion and something we'll definitely think about. Thanks! Do come again soon! :)

Name: Zain A
Review: Thank you for the review and the feedback Anvesh. That's actually a really interesting suggestion and something we'll definitely think about. Thanks! Do come again soon! :)

Name: Joyjit D
Review: Had a lotta fun in this place with my girlfriend. Location is great and price is just right. Will try to come back for more.

Name: Zain A
Review: Thanks for the review Alex. We're glad you had fun and we're looking forward to seeing you again!
Thanks for the review Alex. We're glad you had fun and we're looking forward to seeing you again!
Had a really good time and looking forward to come for the same... Everything in lazerops is well maintained
Thank you for the review. We're glad you had a good time. We look forward to seeing you again :)
Thank you for the review. We're glad you had a good time. We look forward to seeing you again :)

Name: Shyam
Title: Amazing
Review: Good entertainment, we can have good time with friends and family.and amazing game friendly staff and very nice

Name: Tina!
Title: Awesome
Review: This is a fantastic place and thrilling activity for team game. One must visit this place for some cool games!

Name: Imran
Title: Feedback
Review: Very nice game and intresting game. We came with friends its lots of fun. And we so much enjoy and staff also very good and friendly

Name: Genji
Title: Exhilarating
Review: Had a really great time with my friends. great for cardio and exhilarating. As a big group it is more fun.

Name: Ayub Farooqui
Title: Superb experience must try once in a while
Review: Had an amazing  experience  ...the best thing is getting exhausted after playing 20 minutes ..must try with family/friends

Name: joe
Title: very exciting
Review: amaingazExcellent place to enjoy with family Family Very cool place. We enjoyed a lot with my family. Had loads of fun. Worth spending time with.

Name: Parth
Title: Good one
Review: ExcellentIt was a wonderful experience and please visit laser shooter there wil be a group games and wonder

Name: David
Title: Great experience
Review: Wonderful experience good to play with friends Best for teenagers nice experience with friends wonderful

Name: Aruan
Title: Excellent
Review: It Was very great experience very good customer interaction from staff and had blast playing with friends

Name: kabeer
Title: thrilling
Review: Excellent place to enjoy with family Family Very cool place. We enjoyed a lot with my family. Had loads of fun. Worth spending time.A unique experience and very exciting and thrilling only laser lights in a dark room. You forget the time playing with a team finding

Name: Faisal
Title: Amazing
Review: Excellent place to enjoy with familyFamilyVery cool place. We enjoyed a lot with my family. Had loads of fun. Worth spending time with friends and family

Name: Axionstar
Title: Awsome, exciting
Review: A unique experience and very exciting and thrillingonly laser lights in a dark room. You forget the time playing with a team finding and killing the opponent team with laser lights alone in the dark place. It was lot of fun. Kids love even more. Awesome experience. It's so good especially for celebrating birthday parties

Name: genjiblast
Title: awesome place for fun
Review: The best place to entertain yourself. Best with teenagers. I have a very good experience and haha lot of exercise also it was my first time experience and it was great. The instructor was also very kind and explained each and everything very clearly. Thank you Laser Shooter Team.

Name: LostMySelfTraveling
Title: Lots of fun finding oppononent team
Review: It was lot of fun finding the opponent team with only laser lights in a dark room. You forget the time playing with a team finding and killing the opponent team with laser lights alone in the dark place. It was lot of fun. Kids love even more. Awesome experience. It's so good especially for celebrating birthday parties differently.

Name: Suhan
Title: Excellent place to enjoy with family
Review: Very cool place. We enjoyed a lot with my family. Had loads of fun. Worth spending time with friends and family.

Name: Irshad asfandyar
Title: Laser tag game
Review: It’s an amazing game..like we play TDM house mode in PUBG. The same you’ll find here .. amazing experience with real life PUBG ..you guys will definitely enjoy if you are gaming lover 🥇🔫

Name: Rajesh
Title: Awesome Game
Review: Need to visit. The best game in Hyderabad. You will feel a real Pub G game. Should be a good number of people where you will get the real fun.

Name: deepa v
Title: Fun
Review: It's really fun time..Very few places in the city which have these type of games. It's totally a different experience ..

Name: om a
Title: AMAZING
Review: This trip was really fun. We were divided into teams and sent into the dark. The lights were the only thing guiding us. We shot each other with those play laser guns on the lit shields. This was for a bday party. I think the time flew by really fast, though I don't know whether it was less time or more enjoyment.

Name: tangbot1111
Title: Best Team Outing
Review: Lazer Ops is one of the best physical indoor game zones for the team playing, You will get a good exercise here

Name: Raajkumar1991
Title: Best place for team activity
Review: We went to this place as a part of our office team activity. It is a very good place to enjoy the lazer game. Sufficient place is there to run and hide as well. Bunkers are also designed very perfectly. overall it is very good. But the managers of the place are not so pleasant.

Name: Jikuza
Title: Good place to enjoy a laser tag game
Review: I visited this place twice- once with my friends and once with my office colleagues. The floor is quite big and the equipment is top notch.

Title: Great place to celebrate birthday party for the kids
Review: Hello Jayesh, thank you for your review. We are glad to hear that you have visited us multiple times, and hope to see you again soon.

Name: Vivek G
Title: good place
Review: Hello Jayesh, thank you for your review. We are glad to hear that you have visited us multiple times, and hope to see you again soon.

Name: Sravan Vadde
Title: Could offer more customization in the gameplay
Review: I have been to many Laser tag place in the US and this one meets international standards. The staff was helpful and helped our group of 12 to be split into two teams. The game itself is about 20 minutes and lots of fun. Just be careful so you do not run into each other. You get individual and team scores. We will be back.

Name: Gaurav5430
Title: Just had good times and very exciting fun with school friends in Lazer Ops city center.
Review: one of the few laser tag places in the city. it is an unbelievable workout and too much fun. It is also very addictive

Name: meet_smokie3s
Title: Good place to visit with friends
Review: The gear is in good shape. You get about 20 mins of gameplay. It is costly as compared to other cities.The arena is asymmetric, the team areas/sensors won't be activated unless you have teams of 5, friendly fire can't be turned on.Overall, well maintained, but costly. Worth trying if you haven't yet.

Name: avinash6583
Title: Overall a good experience needs improvement
Review: Just Tope fun visited many times in a year. Just want a membership of Lazer Ops city center mall. Visit atleast 200 day a year with friends. This is the only nearest place of gaming with bowling and Lazer ops. So, me and my friends visit here.

Name: anvesh2502
Title: Good adrenalin rush!
Review: Good place and good arena. Detailed statistics post match. It would be exceptional if teams have a target to attack on rather than just attacking the opponents.

Name: Zain A
Title: Lazer ops fun
Review: this is the second time I have visited Laser ops..I had great fun with my friends for 12 minscoming to the improvements.. I feel that we do need to have a laser pointing all the times rather than having it at the time of firing it i.e, I see the red spot when I fire at a person which is not required after you fire.

Review: Excellent place to enjoy with family Family Very cool place. We enjoyed a lot with my family. Had loads of fun. Worth spending time.A unique experience and very exciting and thrilling only laser lights in a dark room. You forget the time playing with a team finding

Name: Faisal
Title: Amazing
Review: Excellent place to enjoy with familyFamilyVery cool place. We enjoyed a lot with my family. Had loads of fun. Worth spending time with friends and family

Name: Axionstar
Title: Awsome, exciting
Review: A unique experience and very exciting and thrillingonly laser lights in a dark room. You forget the time playing with a team finding and killing the opponent team with laser lights alone in the dark place. It was lot of fun. Kids love even more. Awesome experience. It's so good especially for celebrating birthday parties

Name: genjiblast
Title: awesome place for fun
Review: The best place to entertain yourself. Best with teenagers. I have a very good experience and haha lot of exercise also it was my first time experience and it was great. The instructor was also very kind and explained each and everything very clearly. Thank you Laser Shooter Team.

Name: LostMySelfTraveling
Title: Lots of fun finding oppononent team
Review: It was lot of fun finding the opponent team with only laser lights in a dark room. You forget the time playing with a team finding and killing the opponent team with laser lights alone in the dark place. It was lot of fun. Kids love even more. Awesome experience. It's so good especially for celebrating birthday parties differently.

Name: Suhan
Title: Excellent place to enjoy with family
Review: Very cool place. We enjoyed a lot with my family. Had loads of fun. Worth spending time with friends and family.

Name: Irshad asfandyar
Title: Laser tag game
Review: It’s an amazing game..like we play TDM house mode in PUBG. The same you’ll find here .. amazing experience with real life PUBG ..you guys will definitely enjoy if you are gaming lover 🥇🔫

Name: Rajesh
Title: Awesome Game
Review: Need to visit. The best game in Hyderabad. You will feel a real Pub G game. Should be a good number of people where you will get the real fun.

Name: deepa v
Title: Fun
Review: It's really fun time..Very few places in the city which have these type of games. It's totally a different experience ..

Name: om a
Title: AMAZING
Review: This trip was really fun. We were divided into teams and sent into the dark. The lights were the only thing guiding us. We shot each other with those play laser guns on the lit shields. This was for a bday party. I think the time flew by really fast, though I don't know whether it was less time or more enjoyment.

Name: Raajkumar1991
Title: Best place for team activity
Review: We went to this place as a part of our office team activity. It is a very good place to enjoy the lazer game. Sufficient place is there to run and hide as well. Bunkers are also designed very perfectly. overall it is very good. But the managers of the place are not so pleasant.

Name: Jikuza
Title: Good place to enjoy a laser tag game
Review: I visited this place twice- once with my friends and once with my office colleagues. The floor is quite big and the equipment is top notch.

Name: Zain A
Title: Great place to celebrate birthday party for the kids
Review: Hello Jayesh, thank you for your review. We are glad to hear that you have visited us multiple times, and hope to see you again soon.

Name: Vivek G
Title: good place
Review: Hello Jayesh, thank you for your review. We are glad to hear that you have visited us multiple times, and hope to see you again soon.

Name: Sravan Vadde
Title: Could offer more customization in the gameplay
Review: I have been to many Laser tag place in the US and this one meets international standards. The staff was helpful and helped our group of 12 to be split into two teams. The game itself is about 20 minutes and lots of fun. Just be careful so you do not run into each other. You get individual and team scores. We will be back.

Name: Gaurav5430
Title: Just had good times and very exciting fun with school friends in Lazer Ops city center.
Review: one of the few laser tag places in the city. it is an unbelievable workout and too much fun. It is also very addictive

Name: meet_smokie3s
Title: Good place to visit with friends
Review: The gear is in good shape. You get about 20 mins of gameplay. It is costly as compared to other cities.The arena is asymmetric, the team areas/sensors won't be activated unless you have teams of 5, friendly fire can't be turned on.Overall, well maintained, but costly. Worth trying if you haven't yet.

Name: avinash6583
Title: Overall a good experience needs improvement
Review: Just Tope fun visited many times in a year. Just want a membership of Lazer Ops city center mall. Visit atleast 200 day a year with friends. This is the only nearest place of gaming with bowling and Lazer ops. So, me and my friends visit here.

Name: anvesh2502
Title: Good adrenalin rush!
Review: Good place and good arena. Detailed statistics post match. It would be exceptional if teams have a target to attack on rather than just attacking the opponents.

Name: Zain A
Title: Lazer ops fun
Review: this is the second time I have visited Laser ops..I had great fun with my friends for 12 minscoming to the improvements.. I feel that we do need to have a laser pointing all the times rather than having it at the time of firing it i.e, I see the red spot when I fire at a person which is not required after you fire.

Name: Al U
Review: Thank you for the review and the feedback Anvesh. That's actually a really interesting suggestion and something we'll definitely think about. Thanks! Do come again soon! :)

Name: Zain A
Review: Thank you for the review and the feedback Anvesh. That's actually a really interesting suggestion and something we'll definitely think about. Thanks! Do come again soon! :)

Name: Joyjit D
Review: Had a lotta fun in this place with my girlfriend. Location is great and price is just right. Will try to come back for more.

Name: Zain A
Review: Thanks for the review Alex. We're glad you had fun and we're looking forward to seeing you again!
Thanks for the review Alex. We're glad you had fun and we're looking forward to seeing you again!
Had a really good time and looking forward to come for the same... Everything in lazerops is well maintained
Thank you for the review. We're glad you had a good time. We look forward to seeing you again :)
Thank you for the review. We're glad you had a good time. We look forward to seeing you again :)

Name: Shyam
Title: Amazing
Review: Good entertainment, we can have good time with friends and family.and amazing game friendly staff and very nice

Name: Tina!
Title: Awesome
Review: This is a fantastic place and thrilling activity for team game. One must visit this place for some cool games!

Name: Imran
Title: Feedback
Review: Very nice game and intresting game. We came with friends its lots of fun. And we so much enjoy and staff also very good and friendly

Name: Genji
Title: Exhilarating
Review: Had a really great time with my friends. great for cardio and exhilarating. As a big group it is more fun.

Name: Ayub Farooqui
Title: Superb experience must try once in a while
Review: Had an amazing  experience  ...the best thing is getting exhausted after playing 20 minutes ..must try with family/friends

Name: joe
Title: very exciting
Review: amaingazExcellent place to enjoy with family Family Very cool place. We enjoyed a lot with my family. Had loads of fun. Worth spending time with.

Name: Parth
Title: Good one
Review: ExcellentIt was a wonderful experience and please visit laser shooter there wil be a group games and wonder

Name: David
Title: Great experience
Review: Wonderful experience good to play with friends Best for teenagers nice experience with friends wonderful

Name: Aruan
Title: Excellent
Review: It Was very great experience very good customer interaction from staff and had blast playing with friends

Name: kabeer
Title: thrilling
Review: Excellent place to enjoy with family Family Very cool place. We enjoyed a lot with my family. Had loads of fun. Worth spending time.A unique experience and very exciting and thrilling only laser lights in a dark room. You forget the time playing with a team finding

Name: Faisal
Title: Amazing
Review: Excellent place to enjoy with familyFamilyVery cool place. We enjoyed a lot with my family. Had loads of fun. Worth spending time with friends and family

Name: Axionstar
Title: Awsome, exciting
Review: A unique experience and very exciting and thrillingonly laser lights in a dark room. You forget the time playing with a team finding and killing the opponent team with laser lights alone in the dark place. It was lot of fun. Kids love even more. Awesome experience. It's so good especially for celebrating birthday parties

Name: genjiblast
Title: awesome place for fun
Review: The best place to entertain yourself. Best with teenagers. I have a very good experience and haha lot of exercise also it was my first time experience and it was great. The instructor was also very kind and explained each and everything very clearly. Thank you Laser Shooter Team.

Name: LostMySelfTraveling
Title: Lots of fun finding oppononent team
Review: It was lot of fun finding the opponent team with only laser lights in a dark room. You forget the time playing with a team finding and killing the opponent team with laser lights alone in the dark place. It was lot of fun. Kids love even more. Awesome experience. It's so good especially for celebrating birthday parties differently.

Name: Suhan
Title: Excellent place to enjoy with family
Review: Very cool place. We enjoyed a lot with my family. Had loads of fun. Worth spending time with friends and family.

Name: Irshad asfandyar
Title: Laser tag game
Review: It’s an amazing game..like we play TDM house mode in PUBG. The same you’ll find here .. amazing experience with real life PUBG ..you guys will definitely enjoy if you are gaming lover 🥇🔫

Name: Rajesh
Title: Awesome Game
Review: Need to visit. The best game in Hyderabad. You will feel a real Pub G game. Should be a good number of people where you will get the real fun.

Name: deepa v
Title: Fun
Review: It's really fun time..Very few places in the city which have these type of games. It's totally a different experience ..

Name: om a
Title: AMAZING
Review: This trip was really fun. We were divided into teams and sent into the dark. The lights were the only thing guiding us. We shot each other with those play laser guns on the lit shields. This was for a bday party. I think the time flew by really fast, though I don't know whether it was less time or more enjoyment.
